MAT 16:24 Peniya Yecho ajhakwalobholela bhabholwa bhake, “Anda mundo jhojhoha jwapala kubhehe na nenga, akihila hote jwenio, na atole nchalaba gwake angengame.
MAT 16:25 Nhwalo mundo jwapala kuughombola ughome gwake, nauhobhecha, nambo mundo jhola jwapala kuhobhecha ughome kwa nhwalo gwa nenga, naukombola kabhele.
MAT 16:26 Bho, najhambulila nike mundo kubhehe na ilebhe mbwee ya pannema pano, nambo kongo ughome gwino uhobhalele? Nhwalo kibhiijhe kilebhe chahoto kupiya mundo kwa kuukombola ughome gwake.
MAT 16:27 Nhwalo Mwana gwa Mundo pabhandikila kuhika muukolo gwa Tate gwango pamonga na akatumiche bhake bha kunane kwa Chapanga na kunepa kila mundo ghala ghatehila.
MAT 16:28 Ninnobholela chakaka, bhabhii bhando bhange pambano pano nabhawejhe kabula jha kumona Mwana gwa Mundo akahika abhii mu Nahota nkolongwa.”
MAT 17:1 Pighapetita machiko chita, Yecho ajhakwatola Petile na Yakobu na Yohane unung'una mundo, bhajhakuhobhoka ade panane jha kitombe kitandamaho na kwenio bhakibha kanjika chabhe,
MAT 17:2 na kwenio Yecho ajhakughalambuka ubhonekano pamiho palonge jhabhe, ajhakung'anyima mbumbumbu, na ngobho yake ing'anyima ngita lumule.
MAT 17:3 Peniya bhabholwa bhatato bhala bhajhakummona Mucha na Eliya bhakilongila na Yecho.
MAT 17:4 Bhahe, Petile ajhakunnobholela Yecho, “Bhambo, nibhona pambano pambone hake kutama twenga! Anda mipala nanjenga ichimba itato, chimo chino, chimo cha Mucha na chimo cha Eliya.”
MAT 17:5 Petile pajhendilila kulonge, dola lihunde lihuo lya mbumbumbu lijhakwayekelela, na lilobhe lijhakujhokanikika kuhumii kulihunde lyenio lilongila, “Jhonjo ndi Mwanango jhunimpahile jwatenda ghunipala, munyokanikiye!”
MAT 17:6 Bhabholwa pubhajhohina lilobhe lyenio, bhajhakubhehe na bhoghohe hake, na bhajhakugwegha na kuhikila mangukama.
MAT 17:7 Nambo Yecho ajhakwaheghelela, ajhakwapapaha na kwalobholela, “Jhemangana, nkotokujhoghopa!”
MAT 17:8 Pibhananwila miho ghabhe bhakamwene ndeka mundo jhonge, nambo nga Yecho kanjika chake.
MAT 17:9 Bhahe, pibhahelila kukitombe, Yecho ajhakwakanakiya, “Bhakotoka kunnobholela mundo jhojhoha ghamughahwene ade Mwana gwa Mundo papala kuyokechwa kuhumii mukuwegha.”
MAT 17:10 Peniya bhabholwa bhake bhajhakunkonya, “Nhwalo gwa nike bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo bhilonge, nalongolela Eliya hote kuhika?”
MAT 17:11 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Chakaka Eliya nalongolela kuhika, kulenganikiya ilebhe yoha.
MAT 17:12 Nambo ninnobholela mangota, Eliya ahikite njwe, bhando bhahumanyite ndeka nambo bhajhakuntendela ghoha ghubhaghapalita. Helahela Mwana gwa Mundo nang'ahika mu mabhoko ghabhe.”
MAT 17:13 Bhahe, peniya bhabholwa bhala bhajhakukomboka abhalongolila malobhe gha Yohane Mbatichajhe.
MAT 17:14 Yecho na bhabholwa bhake bhajhakuliheghelela lilongo lya bhando, mundo jhumo ajhakunheghelela Yecho na kutama makilikite palonge jhake,
MAT 17:15 ajhakulonge, “Bhambo, mukolele kiya mwanango alagha na ulwalo gwa kihinduhindu. Kila pukihika kihinduhindu ugwelela pakihinja amu umache.
MAT 17:16 Nikaletii bhabholwa bhino nambo bhakahotwi ndeka kunnamicha.”
MAT 17:17 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Mangota kibheleko changabhehe na kihobholelo na chikihobhalile! Bho, nandama na mangota ade ligha? Bho nanihimbilila mangota ade ligha? Munnete pamba kangombo jwenio.”
MAT 17:18 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakupwatalila nchuka ghola, na gwene ujhakummoka kwa mwana jhola papa ajhakubhehe njelembo.
MAT 17:19 Peniya bhabholwa bhala bhajhakunyendela Yecho pangabhando na kunkonya, “Nhwalo gwa nike twenga tukahotwi ndeka kubhenga nchuka ghola?”
MAT 17:20 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Nhwalo kihobholelo chino chandina. Ninobholela chakaka, ngamehe na kihobholelo chikibhii ngita lumbejho lwa lindebhele, mihoto kukilongolela kitombe chenje, ‘Bhoka pamba, unheghelele pala!’ Na chenie ngakijheketile. Nhwalo kibhii jhe changahoto kuhengeka kwino.
MAT 17:21 Nambo nchuka ngita ghongo nauhotola jhe kuchomoka nambo kwa kuleka kulyegha na kunyopa Chapanga.”
MAT 17:22 Bhabholwa pubhakonganika pamonga ku Galilaya, Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Mwana gwa Mundo nabhankamuha mu mabhoko gha bhando bhanganandela,
MAT 17:23 na bhene nabhankoma, nambo lichiko lya utato nayokechwa.” Bhahe, bhabholwa bhajhakubhehe ngolongonde hake.
MAT 17:24 Yecho na bhabholwa bhake pubhahikita ku kilambo chuku Kapelenaumo, bhibhalepecha kode jha Nyumba jha Chapanga bhajhakunnyendelela Petile na kunkonya, “Bho, Mmola gwino alepa kode jha Nyumba jha Chapanga?”
MAT 17:25 Petile ajhakwajhanguu, “Chakaka, alepa.” Bhahe, Petile pajhingila nkate jha unyumba jha Chapanga anatumbu jhe kulonge kilebhe, Yecho ajhakunkonya, “Simone, mwenga mihola bhole? Akanahota bha nnema akatola kode kuhumii kwa ghane? Kuhuma kwa akolo kilambo amu akaghene?”
MAT 17:26 Petile ajhakwajhanguu, “Kuhuma kwa akaghene.” Na Yecho ajhakunnobholela, “Yamaha, akolo kilambo bhalepa ndeka.
MAT 17:27 Nambo yamaha ndeka kwatenda bhabhehe na lilaka. Nnyende kulilabha mukalopole. Na luhomba lwakutumbula kulopola, mulunanakule nnomo namwikolela mbijha. Mwitole yenio ikwela kulepe kode kwa twenga bhabhele.”
MAT 18:1 Machiko ghala bhabholwa bhajhakunyendelela Yecho na kunkonya, “Bho, ndi ghane jwabhii nkolongwa Munahota gwa kunane kwa Chapanga?”
MAT 18:2 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakunkema mwana na kunnyemeka pakate jhabhe,
MAT 18:3 na ajhakulonge, “Ninnobholela chakaka, changaghalambuka na kubhehe ngita yana henge, nanyingii ng'o mu Unahota nkolongwa gwa kunane kwa Chapanga.
MAT 18:4 Bhahe, kila mundo jwapala kubhehe unyenyekeho ngita mwana jhonjo, ndi jwabhii nkolongwa mu Unahota gwa kunane kwa Chapanga.
MAT 18:5 Jwenio jwampoke mwana kwa liina lyango, ambokii nenga.
MAT 18:6 “Mundo jhojhoha jwapala kuhobhecha jhumo jwa bhamba bhana bhibhahobholela bhatende jwahenge uhakaho, mbaha kwa mundo jwenio bhantabhalila lwalwa lukolongwa pantandala na kuntaghii umbwane. Millstonejpgcol Bhando bhabhele bhiyagha kwa lwalwa 18:6 Millstone. jpgcol Bhando bhabhele bhiyagha kwa lwalwa
MAT 18:7 Nabhalola choto bhando bha nnema kwa nhwalo ibhii ilebhe twe ibhatenda bhando bhange bhahenge uhakaho! Ilebhe yenio ipalwa kupitila, nambo nalola choto kwa mundo jhola jwaileta ilebhe yenio!
MAT 18:8 “Anda lubhoko amu lugholo lwino luntenda nhenge uhakaho, mbaha muluhekete na kulutaghi oko! Mbaha kwino kujhingii mu ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta kongo mmii na lubhoko lumo amu mmii na lugholo lumo, kuliku kutaghilwa mu mwotu gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
MAT 18:9 Na liho lino anda lihobhiche, mulibhohe na kulitaghi oko! Mbaha kujhingii mu ughome gwa machiko ghoha kongo na liho limo, kuliku kubhehe na miho mabhele na kutagwa mu mwotu gwa machiko ghoha.
MAT 18:10 “Mukilolekehe nkotoka kupucha jhumo jwa yana henge. Nhwalo akatumiche bhabhe bha kunane kwa Chapanga, bhubhabhii palonge jha Tate gwango jwa kunane kwa Chapanga machiko ghoha.
MAT 18:11 Nhwalo Mwana gwa Mundo ahikite kunkombola jhola jwahobhalile.
MAT 18:12 “Mihola bhole, anda mundo abhii na mambelele makome kome, na limo pakate jhake lihobhalile. Naghaleka jhe mambelele makome ticha na ticha kughalucha na kujhenda kulipaha lilihobhalile lela?
MAT 18:13 Anda alihwene limbelele lela, ninobholela chakaka, nalihanganila kuliku ghala makome ticha na ticha ghangahobhelela.
MAT 18:14 Helahela Tate gwino jwa kunane kwa Chapanga apala ndeka jhumo jwa yana yandina ihobhelele.
MAT 18:15 “Anda nnongo gwino anemwiye, nnyende mukanangiye chalemwite, kongo mmii mabhele tugha. Na anda anyeketile namma mupatite nnongo gwino.
MAT 18:16 Nambo anda amekii lighoho, mutole mundo jhonge jhumo amu bhabhele nnyendengane pamonga, kwa malobhe gha bhando bhabhele amu bhatato bhubhalolite mihalo ihadabulilwe ngita chighalongela Majhandiko gha Chapanga.
MAT 18:17 Anda abhakundii lighoho na bheniya, mwalobholele likunde lya bhando bhubhanyeketela Kilichitu. Helahela anda alikundii lighoho likunde lyenio, bhahe, mumalangila ngita mundo jwangaumanya Chapanga amu ntocha kode.
MAT 18:18 “Ninnobholela chakaka, chochoha chipala kukanikiya pannema helahela nakikanikiwa kunane kwa Chapanga, na chochoha chikipalwa kujheketelwa pannema helahela nakijheketelwa kunane kwa Chapanga.
MAT 18:19 “Kabhele ninnobholela, bhabhele pakate jhino bhajheketile kwa kilebhe chochoha pannema pano chiwapala kujhopa pamonga panane jha kilebhe chochoha, nabhahengelwa kilebhe chenie na Tate gwango jwa kunane.
MAT 18:20 Nhwalo popoha pubhakonganika bhabhele amu bhatato kwa liina lyango, na nenga mii papa peniya pakate jhabhe.”
MAT 18:21 Peniya Petile ajhakunyendelela Yecho na kunkonya, “Bhambo, bho anda nnongo gwango anemwihe, ninekekeya palenga? Bho, ninnekekeye mala chaba?”
MAT 18:22 Yecho ajhakujhanguu, “Naha tu jhe, ibhaha makome chaba mala chaba.
MAT 18:23 Ndi nhwalo Unahota nkolongwa gwa kunane kwa Chapanga ulandina naha. Munahota jhumo jwapata kubhalanga maghambo gha akatumiche bhake.
MAT 18:24 Patumbwila kubhalanga maghambo ghake, bhajhakunetela mundo jhumo jwakibha na lighambo lya mamilione gha mbijha.
MAT 18:25 Na mundo jwenio akibhanacho jhe kilebhe cha kulepa, munahota gwake ajhakunnobholela, achuluchwe jwenio pamonga na nhwana mundo na yana mundo na ilebhe yake yoha. Achuluchwe ngita mmanda, pange lighambo lilepeke.
MAT 18:26 Bhahe, ntumiche jhola ajhakuntamii makilikite palonge jha nkolo gwake jhola na kulonge, ‘Nhimbilile hote, naninepa lighambo lino.’
MAT 18:27 Munahota jhola ajhakumwone kiya, ajhakunnekekeya lighambo lyake. Na kunneka ajhende.
MAT 18:28 “Nambo ntumiche jhola pabhokita, ajhakukongana na mundo nnyake jwakibha na lighambo lyake lya mbijha lyandina tugha. Ajhakunkamula na kupyeneneka palikolomelo alongila, ‘Nnepe lighambo lino!’
MAT 18:29 Ntumiche jhola ajhakutama makilikite na kumpembelekeya, ‘Unhimbilile hote naninepa lighambo lino!’
MAT 18:30 Nambo akajheketindeka, ajhakupeleka kuntabha mu kipungo ade papala kulepa lighambo lyake.
MAT 18:31 Bhahe, akatumiche ajhake pubhalolita kilebhe chenie bhajhakubhehe ngolongonde hake. Bhajhakujhenda kunobholela munahota gwabhe mambu gheniya.
MAT 18:32 Peniya munahota jhola ajhakunkema ntumiche jhola na kunnobholela, ‘Mwenga ndi matumiche bhukokotwike hake! Nhwalo nenga ukambembekiye nyakunekekeya lighambo lino lyoha.
MAT 18:33 Na mwenga bho, yamaha ndeka kunkolela kiya ntumiche nnyino ngita nenga chinikolii kiya?’
MAT 18:34 Bhahe, munahota jhola ajhakubhehe nnomo nduu, ajhakupeleka ntumiche jhola mukipungo bhang'ahe ade papala kulepa lighambo lyake.”
MAT 18:35 Yecho ajhakukuntila kwa kulonge, “Helahela Tate gwango jwa kunane natendela hele mangota anda nanekekeya ndeka nnongo mundo kuhumii kumwojho.”
MAT 19:1 Yecho pajhomolila kulonge malobhe gheniya, ajhakubhoka ku Galilaya nu kujhenda ku Yudeya, kwiye jha lukemba lwa ku Yolodane.
MAT 19:2 Lilongo lya bhando lijhakunkengama na jwenio Yecho ajhakulamicha malwalo ghabhe.
MAT 19:3 Bhahe, Mapwalichayo bhange bhajhakunyendelela Yecho na kunkonya kwa kunnyambila, “Nhwalo gwa nike Lilaghalikilo lito linnyeketela munalome kunneka nhwana mundo kwa nhwalo ghoghoha ghola?”
MAT 19:4 Yecho ajhakujhanguu, “Bho, mukachomite ndeka Majhandiko gha Chapanga, kuhumii makacho Chapanga akapangine mundo munalome na mwikeghe?
MAT 19:5 Peniya Chapanga alongela, ‘Kwa nhwalo ghongo munalome nanneka tate mundo na majhe mundo, nalombana na nhwana mundo, na bhoha bhabhele nabhabha yegha jhimo.’
MAT 19:6 Bhahe, bheniya bhabhele jhe, nambo nabhabha yegha jhimo. Chalombaniche Chapanga, abhii jhe mundo jwakulekanicha.”
MAT 19:7 Mapwalichayo bhajhakunkonya Yecho, “Bho, nhwalo gwa nike Mucha akatulaghalikiye tujhandika baluwa jha kulekana na kuneka mwikeghe?”
MAT 19:8 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Mucha akanyeketile mangota kulekana na akahana bhino nhwalo gwa miojho jhino kujhundupa. Nambo kuhumii kupanganwa kwa nnema ghakibha jhe ngita ghanga.
MAT 19:9 Nambo nenga ninobholela, kila mundo jwalekana na nhwana mundo na kutolela, nambo anda chi kwa ulemo gwa ngongola tugha, na kuntolela mwikegha jhonge, jwenio atenda ngongola.”
MAT 19:10 Bhabholwa bhake bhajhakunnobholela, “Anda mambu ghabhii naha kwa munalome na mwikeghe peniya ndi mbaha kutama nhwolo.”
MAT 19:11 Yecho ajhakujhanguu, “Chi bhoha bhahotola kuhimbilila libholo lende, nambo bhala tugha bhubhahaghulilwe na Chapanga.
MAT 19:12 Nhwalo ghabhii mambu ghamahele ghahoto kunhibhilikiya nkoto kutolela, bhange bhabhelwike yenio, na bhange bhatendwitwe yenio na bhando bhange na bhange bhakapai bhene kubhehe yenio kwa nhwalo gwa Unahota gwa kunane kwa Chapanga. Jwahotola kulighegha libhole lende, na aligheghe!”
MAT 19:13 Peniya bhando bhange bhajhakuileta yana ichokombe kwa Yecho abhabhekele mabhoko na kwakuchulila. Nambo bhabholwa bhake bhajhakwapwatalila bhando bheniya.
MAT 19:14 Nambo Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Muileke yana yandina ihike kwa nenga, mangaibhilikiya nhwalo Unahota gwa kunane kwa Chapanga gwa bhando bhubhabhii ngita yana henge.”
MAT 19:15 Bhahe, pajhomolila kwakuchulila, Yecho ajhakubhoka peniya.
MAT 19:16 Mundo jhumo ajhakunyendelela Yecho na kunkonya, “Mmola, bho, ndende nike chambone mme na ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta?”
MAT 19:17 Yecho ajhakunkonya, “Nhwalo gwa nike ungonyekeya kilebhe chambone? Abhii jhumo jwaumbone ndi Chapanga. Anda mipala kujhingii mu ughome, nkamule lilaghalikilo lya Chapanga.”
MAT 19:18 Mundo jhola pakonyita, “Lilaghalikilo ghane kabhele?” Yecho panyangita, “Nkotoka kukoma, nkotoka kutenda ngongola na nkotoka kukwatula na nkotoka kwalobholela bhange uwange,
MAT 19:19 mwatembekehe tate gwino na majhe gwino na mupale nnyino ngita chimukipala mabhene.”
MAT 19:20 Kangombo jhola ajhakunobholela, “Gheniya ghoha nighakamwile pumila mwana, bho, kilebhe ghane chenge chimbongokiwe?”
MAT 19:21 Yecho ajhakunnobholela, “Anda mwipala kubhehe ma mundo bhambone chakaka, nnyende mukachuluche ilebhe hino yoha, na makabhaghulile akahocho, na mwenga namaha na kihukilo kunane kwa Chapanga. Peniya ungengama.”
MAT 19:22 Nambo kangombo jhola pajhohina malobhe gheniya, ajhakukijhendela kongo abhii ngolongonde. Nhwalo akibha na ilebhe mbwe hake.
MAT 19:23 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakwalobholela bhabholwa bhake, “Ninobholela chakaka, ijhundwipe kwa mundo jwabhii na ilebhe mbwee kujhingila mu Nahota gwa Chapanga.
MAT 19:24 Kabhele ninobholela, ijhojwike kwa kinyama chikikemwa ngamiya kuholota pa lihoto lwa luchungulo lwa mpacha, kuliku jwabhii na ilebhe twe kujhingii mu Unahota nkolongwa gwa Chapanga.”
MAT 19:25 Bhabholwa bha Yecho pubhajhohina malobhe gheniya, bhajhakubhehe hechu, bhajhakunkonya Yecho, “Bho, ghane ngohe nahotola kughombokoka?”
MAT 19:26 Yecho ajhakwapikiya miho, ajhakulonge, “Ilebhe henge kwa mundo ahoto jhe kuhenga, nambo kwa Chapanga ghoha ghiwechekana.”
MAT 19:27 Peniya Petile ajhakunkonya Yecho, “Dolekeya! Na twenga bho? Ghoha tughalekite tunkengime mwenga, bho, natujhambulila nike kwino?”
MAT 19:28 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Ninnobholela chakaka, Mwana gwa Mundo papala kutama pa kigoda chake cha ung'alicho cha ulongoche mu nnema nhyono. Mangota bhungengime nantamangana mwigoda kome na ibhele, mughahadabula makabila kome na mabhele gha Ichilahele.
MAT 19:29 Kila mundo jwahilekite nyumba jhake amu tate mundo amu majhe mundo amu nnongo mundo amu nnombo mundo amu yana mundo amu chaghila chake kwa nhwalo gwa nenga, napokela makome kome ngoheno na kupelwa ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
MAT 19:30 Nambo bhubhalongolile nabhabha bhakujhomolela ngoheno, na bhakujhomolela nabhabhaha bhakutumbula ngoheno.
MAT 20:1 “Unahota gwa kunane kwa Chapanga ulandine na mundo jhumo jwabhii na nng'onda gwa michabibo. Jwalabhite lukela kwapalaha bhando bhakuhenga lihengo munng'onda gwake.
MAT 20:2 Ajhakughana nabho kwalepa mbijha kipande chimo cha madine gha feza kwa lichiko, peniya ajhakwapeleka kunng'onda gwake gwa michabibo.
MAT 20:3 Puhikila chaa tato jha lukela, ajhakubhoka kabhele ajhakwabhona bhando bhange bhajemite mu maghuliho, bhakwete jhe chakuhenga.
MAT 20:4 Ajhakwalobholela, ‘Nnyende na mangota mukahenge lihengo munng'onda gwango gwa michabibo, na nenga naninepa.’
MAT 20:5 Bhahe, bhajhakujhenda. Nkolo nng'onda jwenio ajhakubhoka kabhele puhikila chaa chita na chaa ticha, na ticha ajhakutenda helahela.
MAT 20:6 Puhikila chaa kome na jhimo jha kimiye, ajhakujhenda kabhele, ajhakukongana na bhando bhange bhajhemangine palighuliho pala. Bhahe, ajhakwakonya, ‘Nhwalo ghane ngohe mpipikiye muhe jhoha changalihengo pambano?’
MAT 20:7 Na bhene bhajhakunyanguu, ‘Nhwalo abhii jhe mundo jwatupikiye lihengo.’ Peniya ajhakwalobholela, ‘Mangota helahela nnyende mukahenge kunng'onda gwango gwa michabibo.’
MAT 20:8 “Pulitipika lyobha, nkolo nghonda ajhakunnobholela jwajhemelela jhola, ‘Mwakeme bhubhahengita lihengo na mwalepe malepo ghabhe, ntumbula kwa bhala bhakujhomolela ade kwa bhala bhibhalongolila.’
MAT 20:9 Bhahe, bhala pibhatumbwila kuhenga chaa kome na jhimo jha kimiye, kila jhumo ajhakulepwa mbijha kipande chimo cha madine gha feza.
MAT 20:10 Na bhala bhibhakatumbwile kuhenga lukela bhahambwika nabhajhonjekewa mbijha henge, nambo nabhene bhajhakulepwa kipande chimo cha madine gha feza kila jhumo.
MAT 20:11 Pibhapokila malepo ghabhe bhajhakutumbuu kunkokolekeya nkolo nng'onda.
MAT 20:12 Bhalongila, ‘Bhando bhamba bhubhahikite kujhomolela bhahengite kwa lichaa limo tugha, nambo mwalepite ngita twenga bhutuhengita lihengo muhe jhoha pa lyobha?’
MAT 20:13 Nkolo nng'onda jhola ajhakunnyanguu jhumo pakate jhabhe, ‘Makoche, niponjite ndeka kilebhe. Bho, tughalaghine ndeka malepo gha kipande chimo cha madine gha mbijha kwa lichiko?
MAT 20:14 Bhahe, npokele feza jhino nnyende. Nipala kupekeya jhonjo jhunimpeila lihengo lya kujhomolela ngita mwenga.
MAT 20:15 Bho, nihoto jhe kuhenga chochoha chinipala kwa ilebhe yango? Nhwalo gwa nike umeke wiho nenga naumbone?’ ”
MAT 20:16 Yecho ajhomolila kwa kulonge, “Ndi naibhaha, bhakujhomolela nabhabhaha bhakutumbula na bhakutumbuu nabhabhaha bhakujhomolela.”
MAT 20:17 Yecho pahohwika kujhenda ku Yeluchalemo, ajhakwaghegha bhabholwa bhake kome na bhabhele na kulonge nabho kongo bhakityanga mundela pangabhando na kwalobholela,
MAT 20:18 Ajhakwalobholela, “Unyokanikiye tujhenda ku Yeluchalemo na kwenio Mwana gwa Mundo nabhankamuha kwa Akapiya matambiko bhakolo na bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo. Na bhene nabhanhadabulwa akomwe,
MAT 20:19 peniya napelekwa kwa bhando bha ilambo henge. Na bhene nabhantendela chanake na kunnapula yato na kumamba panane jha nchalaba, nambo lichiko lya utato nayokechwa.”
MAT 20:20 Peniya majhe yana mundo Zebedayo pamonga na yana yake ibhele ajhakunyendela Yecho. Bhahe, majhe jhola ajhakutama makilikite palonge jha Yecho, kwa kunnyopa antendele chakipala.
MAT 20:21 Yecho ajhakunkonya, “Bho, mipala nike?” Na jwenio ajhakujhanguu, “Chonde mwalobholele kubhehe yana yango ibhele nabhatama jhumo lubhoko lwalelo na jhonge lubhoko lwa ngejha pumipala kubhehe mu Nahota gwino.”
MAT 20:22 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Umanyite jhe chimujhopa. Bho, mihoto kunywegha mukibaba cha malagho chininywegha nenga?” Na bhene bhajhakunyanguu, “Tuhotola.”
MAT 20:23 Yecho ajhakwalobhalela, “Ninongolela chakaka, naunywela kibaba chango cha malagho, nambo kutama lubhoko lwalelo amu lwa ngejha, lihengo lyango ndeka kupanga. Kilebhe i napelwa bhala bhubhalenganikilwe na Tate gwango.”
MAT 20:24 Bhala bhabholwa bhange kome pibhajhohina malobhe gheniya, bhajhakwayomela akalongo bheniya bhabhele.
MAT 20:25 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakwakema bhoha na kwalobholela, “Umanye ilongoche ya nnema ulongocha bhando kwa makakala, na bhakolo bheniya ubhatenda bhando kubhehe bhabhe.
MAT 20:26 Nambo kwa mangota nahijhe, nambo jwapala kubhehe nkolongwa pakate jhino abhehe ntumiche jwa bhoha,
MAT 20:27 na jwapala kubhehe nkolongwa pakate jhino bhoha, ipalwa abhaha ntumiche jwino.
MAT 20:28 Ngita chabhii Mwana gwa Mundo jwenio ahikiti jhe kuhengelwa, nambo kunhengela na kubhoha ughome gwake kwakombola bhando bhamahele.”
MAT 20:29 Yecho na bhabholwa bhake pubhabhokita ku Yeliko, lilongo lya bhando lijhakwakengama.
MAT 20:30 Bhahe, pakibha na bhando bhabhele bhangalola bhatamita muupele jha ndela. Pubhajhohina Yecho atenda kupeta bhajhakunonoha malobhe, “Bhambo, Mwana gwa Daude umonele kiya!”
MAT 20:31 Lilongo lya bhando lela lijhakwapwatalila, bhalongolila bhatame nuu. Nambo bhene bhajhakuchocha kulalama, bhalongila, “Bhambo, Mwana gwa Daude, mutubhone kiya!”
MAT 20:32 Yecho ajhakujhema na ajhakwakema na kwakonya, “Bho, mipala nintendele nike mangota?”
MAT 20:33 Na bhene bhajhakunyanguu, “Bhambo, tujhopa tulole!”
MAT 20:34 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakwabhonela kiya, ajhakupapaha miho ghabhe. Papa bhajhakulola, na kunkengama.
MAT 21:1 Yecho na bhabholwa bhake pubhabhandikila kuhika ku Yeluchalemo na kuhika ku Betifage pakitombe chuku Micheitune. Yecho ajhakwatuma bhabholwa bhake bhabhele,
MAT 21:2 ajhakwalobholela, “Nnyende ade pachenda jha palonge jhino na namukolela liponda likongilwe na libhii na litohe lyake. Mulijhoghole na nhwike nako kwa nenga.
MAT 21:3 Anda mundo ankonyite nhwalo gwa nike mutenda naha, munnobholele, ‘Bhambo alipala,’ na jwenio nanekekeya papa.”
MAT 21:4 Kilebhe chenie kitendika kupala ghakamilike ghighalongilwa na nnondole jwa Chapanga,
MAT 21:5 “Mwalobholele bhando bha muche kwa ku Sayune Dolekeya, Munahota nkolongwa gwino atenda kuhika! Abhii nhihimo na atamite panane jha liponda. Ahika panane jha mwana liponda, kinyama chikijhegha mihigho.”
MAT 21:6 Bhahe, bhabholwa bhajhakujhenda na kutenda ngita Yecho chibhalaghalikiye.
MAT 21:7 Bhajhakunetela liponda Yecho pamonga na litohe lyake, bhajhakujhala ngobho panane jhabhe na Yecho ajhakutama panane jhake.
MAT 21:8 Bhahe, lilongo lya bhando lijhakujhala ngobho undela, bhange bhajhakujhala matuto gha mikongo mwenio undela.
MAT 21:9 Lilongo lya bhando likalongolile na lela lilikengima unyuma jhake bhajhakunonoha malobhe, “Ulombwe Mwana gwa Daude! Jhuna mota jwahika kwa liina lya Bhambo! Chapanga alombwe kunane!”
MAT 21:10 Yecho pajhingila ku Yeluchalemo bhando bhoha bhajhakubhehe ngenyangenya. Bhando bhajhakunkonya, “Jhonjo ngohe ndi ghane?”
MAT 21:11 Bhahe, lilongo lya bhando ujhakujhanguu, “Jwenio ndi nnondole Yecho, ahumii ku Nachalete ku muche gwa ku Galilaya.”
MAT 21:12 Peniya Yecho ajhakujhingii pa Nyumba jha Chapanga, na kutumbuu kwabhenga bhando bhoha panja bhibhachulwicha na kuhemela ilebhe mwenio. Helahela ajhakupendengula njangwale yabhe ibhajhanganganila mbijha na igoda ya bhala bhibhachulwicha ngunda.
MAT 21:13 Ajhakwalobholela, “Ijhandikwe naha mu Majhandiko gha Chapanga, ‘Nyumba jhango nahibha nyumba jha kunnyope Chapanga.’ Mangota mwenga uyohite nkwembe gwa kukwatulila ilebhe!”
MAT 21:14 Bhangalola na bhibhalemile bhajhakunyendelela Yecho pa Nyumba jha Chapanga, na jwenio ajhakwalamicha.
MAT 21:15 Bhahe, Akapiya matambiko bhakolo na bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo bhajhakuyoma pubhalolita iiebhe yambone yatehila Yecho, na kujhoha yana ikachobhela pa Nyumba jha Chapanga ilongila, “Nnombwe mwenga, Mwana gwa Daude!”
MAT 21:16 Bhahe, bhajhakunkonya Yecho, “Bho, nnyohine malobhe ghibhalonge yana hengeno?” Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Chakaka, nnyohine. Nambo mukachomite ndeka mu Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghighalonge, ‘Kuhuma mumilomo jha yana napokela chipwa jhilenganile.’ ”
MAT 21:17 Bhahe, ajhakwaleka na kujhenda ku Betaniya na ajhakugholoka koko.
MAT 21:18 Lukala jhake Yecho pabhujhita ku Yeluchalemo, ajhakubhona njala.
MAT 21:19 Ajhakubhona nkongo gwa nkojho mupele jha ndela, ajhakuheghelela nambo ukapambike ndeka nga mahamba tebha. Yecho ajhakulapanikiya alongila, “Kubhoke ngoheno nkotoka kupambika uhohe kabhele!” Papalapala nkongo ghola ujhakujhoma.
MAT 21:20 Bhabholwa pubhalolita kilebhe chenie bhajhakuhechuka hake na kukikonya, “Nhwalo gwa nike nkojho ghongo ujhomite kajhombe?”
MAT 21:21 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Ninobholela chakaka, nkwete jhe kiholo, mihoto kuhenga chindeile kwa nkojho ghongo. Na kupeta kwa lyenio mihoto kukilobholela kitombe chenje, ‘Heghela hoko, mukitaghile kumbwane,’ nahitendeka hele.
MAT 21:22 Anda mmii na kihobholelo, kilebhe chochoha chimujhopa mu kumnyopa Chapanga, nampelwa.”
MAT 21:23 Peniya Yecho ajhakujhingii pa Nyumba jha Chapanga, atehila kubhola. Akapiya matambiko bhakolo pamonga na ighogholo bhajhakunyendelela na kunkonya, “Bho, muhenga ghangano kwa ukindendeke gwa ghane? Na ghane ngohe jwapekiye mwenga ukindendeke gwenio?”
MAT 21:24 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Na nenga ninkonye kilebhe chimo. Anda unyangwii, helahela naninobholela nihenga kwa ukindendeke gwa ghane.
MAT 21:25 Bho, ukindendeke gwa Yohane gwa kubaticha bhando uhumila kwa ghane, kwa Chapanga amu kwa bhando?” “Bhene bhajhakubhehe chwapu, anda tulongile ukindendeke gwake, ‘Uhumii kwa Chapanga,’ natukonya, ‘Nhwalo gwa nike ngohe minyeketela ndeka?’
MAT 21:26 Anda tulongile, ‘Uhumila kwa bhando,’ tujhoghopa lilongo lya bhando nhwalo bhoha bhajheketela kubhehe Yohane akibha nnondole jwa Chapanga.”
MAT 21:27 Bhahe, bhajhakunnyanguu Yecho, “Tumanyite ndeka.” Na jwenio ajhakwalobholela, “Na nenga hele naninobholela ndeka nihenga kwa ukindendeke gwa ghane.
MAT 21:28 “Yecho ajhakuchocha kulonge, bho, mangota mihola nike panane jha ilebhe hengeno? Pakibha na mundo jhumo jwakibha na ichongolo ibhele, ajhakutumbula kunobholela mwana jwa kutumbula, ‘Mwanango, deleno mukahenge mughonda gwa michabibo.’
MAT 21:29 Na mwana jhola jwa kutumbula ajhakujhanguu, ‘Mbahijhe,’ nambo paligha ajhakujheketela kujhenda kuhenga lihengo.
MAT 21:30 Tate mundo jhola ajhakunobholela mwana mundo jhubhele jhola ngita chanobholila jwatumbwila jhola. Na jwenio ajhakujhanguu, ‘Nijhenda tate!’ Nambo ajhenda ndeka.
MAT 21:31 Bho, ghane pakate jha bhabhele bhano jwateile ghaghapala tate gwabhe?” Bhajhakunyanguu, “Ndi jhola jwatumbwila kunobholela.” Bhahe, Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Ninobholela chakaka, bhiakatola kode na bhibhatenda ngongola nabhannongolela mangota kujhingii mu Nahota gwa Chapanga.
MAT 21:32 Nhwalo Yohane akahikite kwino kunangiya ndela jha chakaka jha kutama, na mangota mikanyeketi ndeka. Nambo akatola kode na bhatenda ngongola bhanyeketile. Pamonga na kulola ilebhe yoha yenio mangota mulekite ndeka uhakaho gwino na kunnyeketela.”
MAT 21:33 Peniya Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Nnyokanikiye nnandanikiho ghonge. Mundo jhumo ajhakulema nghonda gwa michabibo, ajhakutindikiya ubhegho, ajhakutengenecha chehemo jha kuminyila chabibo, na kuchenga kilendo kitandamaho. Ajhakwajhahikicha bhubhalema na jwenio kujhenda ku kilambo chukutale.
MAT 21:34 Pughahikita machiko gha mahuno, ajhakwatuma akatumiche bhake bhajhende kwa bhala bhubhajhahike mighonda, bhakatole lipungo lyake lya mahuno.
MAT 21:35 Nambo bhala bhubhajhahike mighonda bhajhakwakamula akatumiche bhala. Jhumo bhajhakuntyala, na jhonge bhajhakunkoma na jhonge bhajhakukong'onda maghanga.
MAT 21:36 Nkolo nghonda jhola ajhakwatuma akatumiche bhange bhamahele, nambo bhala bhubhajhahike mighonda bhajhakwetendela hele.
MAT 21:37 Na kujhomolela kwake ajhakuntuma mwana mundo kwabhene, ‘Kongo awachila, nabhanyeketela nhwalo mwanango.’
MAT 21:38 Nambo bhubhalema bhala pubhamwenita mwana jhola, bhajhakupwepwelana, ‘Jhonjo ngoheno ndi nabhujhila mighonda, tunkome na nghonda ghongo tubhujhii twenga!’
MAT 21:39 Bhahe, bhajhakunkamula, bhajhakunhutila kutale na nghonda gwa michabibo ghola na kunkoma.”
MAT 21:40 “Bho, ngohe nkolo nghonda papalakuhika, nabhatenda nike bhubhajhahike bhenabha?”
MAT 21:41 Na bhene bhajhakunyanguu, “Nabhalobholela chakaka nabhakoma bhando bhanganandela bhene na nghonda gwenio nabhapela bhando bhange, ndi nabhampela lipungo lya mahuno ghake chiipalwa.”
MAT 21:42 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Bho, mukachomite jhe kilebhe chenje mu Majhandiko gha Chapanga? ‘Lighanga lilikanwitwe na punde jwaichenga, ngoheno lihyokite lighanga lilipalwa hake kuliku ghoha. Ndi Bhambo, jwateii kilebhe chenje, nalyene ndi lya kukangacha hake kwito!’
MAT 21:43 “Kwa nhwalo ghongo,” “Unahota gwa Chapanga nahubhoka kwito na kupelwa bhando bha ilambo henge bhibhahenga ghapala Chapanga.”
MAT 21:44 Mundo jhojhoha jwapala kugwelelwa na lighanga lyenio naheketwa imbembela imbembela, na lighanga lyenio anda ligwelikile mundo jhojhoha naliyogha yoghoyogho.
MAT 21:45 Akapiya matambiko bhakolo na Mapwalichayo pubhajhohina milandanikiho jhene, bhajhakumanya kubhehe alongila panane jhabhe.
MAT 21:46 Bhahe, bhajhakupalaha ndela jha kukamuu Yecho, nambo bhajhogwipa bhando nhwalo bhene bhakanhwachile kubhehe jwenio ndi nnondole jwa Chapanga.
MAT 22:1 Yecho ajhakulonge nabho kabhele kwa milandanikiho,
MAT 22:2 “Unahota gwa Chapanga ulandine na nkolo jwakanenganikiye mwana mundo unyagho gwa kutolana.
MAT 22:3 Jwenio ajhakwatuma akatumiche bhake bhakakeme bhibhalalike bhala bhahike, nambo bhene bhajhakubhehe mbe kuhika.
MAT 22:4 Peniya ajhakwatuma akatumiche bhange, ajhakwalobholela alongila, ‘Mwalongolele bhando bhinalalike kubhehe unyagho ubhii lengalenga ngohe. Lipongo lya ng'ombi na matohe gha ng'ombi ghighahatite njinjite, kila kilebhe kibhii telatela, nhwike ngane pa unyagho!’
MAT 22:5 Nambo bhene bhakachitwike ndeka, kila jhumo ajhakujhenda kwakumanyite, jhumo kunghonda na jhonge kwachuluchila ilebhe yake,
MAT 22:6 na bhange bhajhakwakamula akatumiche na kwatyala na kwakoma.
MAT 22:7 Munahota nkolongwa jhola ajhakuchimwa, ajhakwatuma akomana ngondo bhake. Bhakwakomelekeya bhubhakoma bhala na kuchonja muche gwabhe kwa mwotu.
MAT 22:8 Peniya ajhakwalobholela akatumiche bhake, ‘Chakulya cha unyagho gwa kutolana ngoheno ubhii lengalenga, nambo bhinalalike bhakatopi ndeka kuhika.
MAT 22:9 Bhahe, nnyendengane mundela na jhojhoha jhola jhumipala kummona munete paunyagho gwa kutolana pano.’
MAT 22:10 Akatumiche bhala bhajhakujhenda mundela, bhajhakwakema bhoha bhubhakongina nabho, bhambone na bhanganandela, na nyumba jhene ijhakuhindamana ndi akaghene.
MAT 22:11 “Munahota nkolongwa pajhingila kwalolekeya akaghene, ajhakummona mundo jhumo akahwalite ndeka ngobho ya unyagho gwenio.
MAT 22:12 Munahota jhola ajhakunkonya, ‘Mwakoche, nhwalo gwa nike nnyingii mombo changa ngobho ya unyagho gwa kutolana?’ Jwenio ajhakubhehe nuu.
MAT 22:13 Peniya munahota nkolongwa jhola ajhakwalobholela akatumiche bhake, ‘Mutabhe magholo na mabhoko na mukataghii kulubhendo. Kwenio nalela na kuyagha mino.’ ”
MAT 22:14 Peniya Yecho ajhakulonge, “Bhando bhunkemitwe bhamahele, nambo bhala bhibhahagwile ndi bhandina.”
MAT 22:15 Peniya Mapwalichayo bhajhakubhoka na bhajhakulenganikila ndela jha kunyonja Yecho mu malobhe ghake.
MAT 22:16 Bhahe, Mapwalichayo bhajhakwatuma bhabholwa bhake pamonga bhabholwa bha kikunde cha Helode kwa Yecho. Bhajhakunkonya Yecho, “Mmola, tumanya mwenga ndi mundo jwa chakaka, na mibhola mabholo gha chakaka gha ndela jha Chapanga. Changannolekeya mundo kumiho helahela muloloke jhe hilu ukolo gwa mundo jhojhoha.
MAT 22:17 Ngoheno mutulobholele, bhole yamaha amu yamaha ndeka kulepa kode kwa munahota nkolongwa jwa ku Loma liina lyake Kaichale?”
MAT 22:18 Nambo Yecho akamanye ndela jhabhe jhanganandela, ajhakwajhanguu, “Mangota mukitenda bhando bhaumbone, Bho, munyighanikiya nhwalo gwa nike?
MAT 22:19 Unangiye hote mbijha jhene jhimulepe kode.” Na bhene bhajhakunangiya litobholo lya mbijha.
MAT 22:20 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakwakonya, “Bho, chula jhenje na liina lilijhandikwe leno lya ghane?”
MAT 22:21 Bhajhakunyanguu, “Ndi lya munahota nkolongwa jwa ku Loma.” Yecho ajhakwalobholela, munahota nkolongwa jwa ku Loma mupele jwenio na ghughabhii gha Chapanga mupele jwenio Chapanga.
MAT 22:22 Pubhajhohina malobhe gheniya bhajhakukangachwa nako, bhajhakuneka, “Yecho na bhajhakubhoka peniya.”
MAT 22:23 Lichiko lele Machadukayo bhange bhibhalonge bhubhawile bhayoka jhe, bhajhakunyendelela Yecho,
MAT 22:24 bhajhakunkonya, “Mmola, Mucha akalongi, mundo jwatolile anda awile changaneka yana, nhwacha mundo ipalwa amujhila majhe jwenio lipwela apapila yana nnongo mundo jwawile.
MAT 22:25 Bhahe, pamba pito pakibha akalongo chaba. Jwakutumbula ajhakutolela na kuwegha changaleka mwana. Na nnongo mundo ajhakubhujhila lipwela lyenio,
MAT 22:26 Ijakubhehe hele kwa nnongo mundo jhubhele na jwa utato, ade jhola jwa chaba.
MAT 22:27 Bhakawii bhoha chaba, na mwikeghe jhola ajhakuwegha hele.
MAT 22:28 Bho, lichiko lya bhando lya kuyokechwa, mwikeghe jwenio nabhaha nhwana gwa ghane, nhwalo bhoha chaba bhakantolile?”
MAT 22:29 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Mangota ntei kulemwa nhwalo gwangamanya Majhandiko gha Chapanga hilu likakala lya Chapanga.
MAT 22:30 Nhwalo bhando pubhapala kuyokechwa kuhumii kubhawile kutolela amu kutolelwa kubhii jhe, nabhabha ngita akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga.
MAT 22:31 Na panane jha kuyokechwa kwa bhubhawile, bho, nchomite jhe malobhe ghannobholila na Chapanga?
MAT 22:32 ‘Nenga na Chapanga jwa Ulahimo na Chapanga jwa Isaka na Chapanga jwa Yakobu.’ Yecho pajhendelila kwalobholela, jwenio chi Chapanga jwa bhando bhubhawile nambo Chapanga jwa bhando bhubhabhii ghome.”
MAT 22:33 Lilongo lya bhando ghola pubhajhohina mabholo gheniya, bhajhakuhechuka hake.
MAT 22:34 Peniya Mapwalichayo pubhajhohina Yecho ajhakwahibha milomo Machadukayo, bhajhakukonganika pamonga.
MAT 22:35 Na jhumo jwa bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo, jwakibha mundo jwakaimanye Malaghalikilo mbone ajhakunyendelela Yecho na kunkonya kwa kunyighanikiya,
MAT 22:36 “Mmola,” “Lilaghilo ghane likolongwa mu Malaghalikilo ghoha?”
MAT 22:37 Yecho ajhakujhanguu, “ ‘Mupale Bhambo Chapanga kwa mwojho gwii ghoha, na kwa uhuke gwii ghoha na malango ghii ghoha.’
MAT 22:38 Lende ndi lilaghilo likolongwa na lya kutumbula.
MAT 22:39 Chubhele ilandana na lende, ‘Mupale nnyino ngita chimukipala mabhene.’
MAT 22:40 Malaghalikilo ghoha gha Chapanga ghapekiwe Mucha na mabholo ghoha gha milondole bha Chapanga ghahobholela mihilo jhenje mibhele.”
MAT 22:41 Peniya Mapwalichayo pubhakonganika pamonga, Yecho ajhakwakonya,
MAT 22:42 “Mangota miwacha bho panane jha Kilichitu Nkomboche? Bho, Jwenio ndi mwana jwa ghane?” Na bhene bhajhakunyanguu, “Jwenio ndi Mwana gwa Daude.”
MAT 22:43 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Peniya nhwalo gwa nike kwa likakala lya Uhuke gwa Chapanga Daude ankemi jwenio ‘Bhambo?’ Ndi nhwalo akalongi,
MAT 22:44 ‘Bhambo, akanobholile Bhambo gwango. Ntame lubhoko lwango lwalelo, ade nabheke akamakoko bhino pahe jha magholo ghino.’
MAT 22:45 Bhahe, anda Daude ankema Kilichitu Nkomboche, ‘Bhambo,’ ahoto bhole kubhehe mwana mundo?”
MAT 22:46 Bhahe, abhii jhe mundo jhojhoha jwakahotwii kujhanguu lilobhe. Kuhumii lichiko lyenio Na bhene bhakajhighite jhe kunkonya machwale ghange.
MAT 23:1 Peniya Yecho ajhakulilobholela lilongo lya bhando pamonga na bhabholwa bhake,
MAT 23:2 “Bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo na Mapwalichayo ndi bhakibha na ukindendeke gwa kuchimulila Lilaghalikilo lya Mucha lyapekiwe na Chapanga.
MAT 23:3 Bhahe, nkamule na kuhenga chochoha chibhannobholela, nambo nkotoka kwajhigha ghibhahenga, nhwalo bhihenga ndeka ghala ghibhalongela.
MAT 23:4 Utabha mihigho mitopaho na kwatweka bhando mu mabhegha, nambo bhene bhapala ndeka kuhatambula hilu lukonje kwatangatila kughegha.
MAT 23:5 Nambo ghibhahenga ghoha bhapala bhabhonekane palonge jha bhando. Uhwala luhunga lukolongwa lwa ngobho lulujhandikwe majhandiko gha lilaghalikilo panane jha libhonge na mu mabhoko na ujhonjekeya ihundo ya luche itabhitwe mu malombolo gha ngobho yabhe.
MAT 23:6 Bhapala kutama mupwache ya palonge jha muunyagho gwa kulyegha, na mwighoda ya nkate jha nyumba jha kukonganikii Akayahude.
MAT 23:7 Upala kujhambuchwa kwa kutembekewa mu maghuliho na kupala kukemwa na bhando, ‘Mmola.’
MAT 23:8 Nambo mangota nkotoka kujheketelwa kukemwa ‘Mmola,’ nhwalo Mmola gwino ndi jhumo na mangota bhoha makalongo.
MAT 23:9 Amu nkotoka kunkema mundo jhojhoha ‘Tate jwa pannema,’ nhwalo abhii Tate jhumo jwabhii kunane kwa Chapanga.
MAT 23:10 Nkotoka kupala kunkemwa, ‘Kilongoche,’ nhwalo kilongoche jhino jhumo ndi Kilichitu Nkomboche.
MAT 23:11 Jwabhii nkolongwa pakate jhino ajheketela kubhehe ntumiche jhino.
MAT 23:12 Na mundo jhojhoha jwakitenda nkolongwa, kubhehe kilebhe nacho, na jhojhoha jwakitenda kilebhe nacho nabhaha nkolongwa.
MAT 23:13 “Nanola choto akabhola bha Malaghalikilo na Mapwalichayo, mangota mukitenda bhando bhaumbone! Midinda nnyango gwa Unahota gwa Chapanga bhando bhakoto kujhingila. Mangota mabhene mujhingii ndeka nkate, kabhele bhalekekeya jhe bhibhapala kujhingila bhajhingile.
MAT 23:14 Nanola choto bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo na Mapwalichayo, mangota mukitenda bhando bhaumbone! Nhwalo mupoka akanawela ilebhe yabhe na kukitenda mukilangila ndi bhando bhaumbone kwa kunnyopa Chapanga kwa malobhe ghamahele. Nhwalo gwenio luhadabulo lwino nalutenda kuchocha hake!
MAT 23:15 “Nanola choto bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo na Mapwalichayo mukitenda bhando bhaumbone! Bhumutyanga kujhomboka umbwane na ku ilambo henge mipala kwang'alambula bhando, jwenio ajheketele mabholo ghino. Pajheketela mutenda abhehe na uhotolo bhabhe na kujhenda mu mwotu gwangahimika kwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta kuliku mabhene.
MAT 23:16 “Nanola choto ilongoche yangalola bhumibhola! ‘Mangota milonge mundo anda akilapanikiye kwa Nyumba jha Chapanga, lulapanikiho lwenio lukwete jhe likakala, nambo mundo anda akilapanikiye kwa chaabo jhibhii nkate mu Nyumba jha Chapanga, lulapo lono lubhii na likakala.’
MAT 23:17 Mangota mangalola na bhupumbumwike! Bho, nike kikolongwa chaabo amu Nyumba jha Chapanga jhiitenda jhene chaabo kubhehe nyahinyahi?
MAT 23:18 Kabhele milonge ‘Anda mundo alapanikihe kwa njangwale ya matambiko lulapanikiho lwenio lubhii jhe na likakala, nambo anda mundo akilapanikiye kwa tambiko jhibhekwitwe panane jha njangwale ya matambiko, kilapo chenie kibhii na likakala.’
MAT 23:19 Chakaka, mangota mangalola! Bho, nike chikibhii kikolongwa litambiko amu njangwale ya matambiko jhitenda litambiko kubhehe lya nyahinyahi?
MAT 23:20 Mundo jwalapanikiya kwa njangwale ya matambiko, akilapaniki kwa njangwale yenio ya matambiko na kwa chochoha chikibhekitwe panane jhake.
MAT 23:21 Na jwalapanikii kwa Nyumba jha Chapanga akilapanikii kwa Nyumba jhene na kwa jwenio jwaatama nkate jhake.
MAT 23:22 Na jhola jwakilapanikii kunane kwa Chapanga akilapanikii kwa kigoda cha unahota nkolongwa cha Chapanga na kwa jwenio jwatama kunane jhake.
MAT 23:23 “Nanola choto, mangota bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo na Mapwalichayo, mangota bhumukitenda bhaumbone! Kongo majhopa bhando chaka jha ndimbilo na mandebhele na mahamba ghange gha makolo. Na mahamba ghighanungulila mbone, na iliki na kalafuu kongo mighaleka gha chakaka ngita kiya na kihobholelo. Ghanga ndi ghighapalwa kuhengwa changaleka na gheniya ghange.
MAT 23:24 Mangota ilongoche yangalola! Mujhengulua mabhembe mu ilebhe hino ya kunywegha, nambo mumila ngamiya!
MAT 23:25 “Nanola choto bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo na Mapwalichayo, mangota mukitenda bhando bha umbone! Mangota mukeya kibaba na chahane kwa panja, nambo kwa nkate kutwelii ilebhe ipatite ya uchojho.
MAT 23:26 Mwapwalichayo mwangalola! Ntumbula hote kukeya kibaba kwa nkate na panja napabhaha nyahinyahi.
MAT 23:27 “Nanola choto bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo na Mapwalichayo, bhumukitenda bhando bhaumbone! Muwanana na mambe ikilimwe kwa undope nhuo kwa panja ghabhonekana ghambone, nambo nkate ghatwelii ihupa ya bhando bhubhawile na luku longe.
MAT 23:28 Pamonga na gheniya, mangota kwa panja mubhonekana ngita bhando bhumitenda ghapala Chapanga, nambo kwa nkate milandana na bhando bhubhakitenda bhaumbone na ubhoho.
MAT 23:29 “Nanola choto bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo na Mapwalichayo! Muchengelela mambe ya milondole bha Chapanga na kulembekeya mambe ya bhando bhambone.
MAT 23:30 Kabhele milonge, ‘Anda twenga ngatubhehe mu machiko gha akahoko bhito, ngatujheketile ndeka kubhehe pamonga kwa kwakoma milondole bha Chapanga.’
MAT 23:31 Bhahe, milonge hotuhotu mabhene kubhehe mangota ndi kibheleko cha bhando chibhakomita milondole bha Chapanga!
MAT 23:32 Chakaka, nnyomolele lihengo lela libhatumbulicha kuhenga akahoko bhino!
MAT 23:33 Mangota kibheluko cha lijhoka na yana ya lijhoka! Bho, nahotola bho kulubhambala luhadabulo lwa mwotu gwangahimika?
MAT 23:34 Kwa nhwalo gwenio, nenga naninetela milondole bha Chapanga na bhando bhubhabhii na malango na bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo. Mangota namakoma na bhange kwabhamba panchalaba na bhange kwakenyula yato munyumba jha kukonganikii Akayahude. Na bhange namabhutuha kubhoka muche ghumo na ghonge.
MAT 23:35 Bhahe, luhadabulo loha nalumpata kwa nhwalo jha miyahe jha bhando bha umbone jhijhitike panane jha nnema, nahibhaha panane jhino. Chakaka, kuhumii kukomwa kwa Abele jwangahenga kilebhe kibhoho, ade miyahe jha Zakaliya mwana gwa Bakaliya, jwakakomitwe pa lubhanja lwa Nyumba jha Chapanga pakate jha chehemo jha nyahinyahi na pakachangwale ka litambiko.
MAT 23:36 Ninobholela chakaka, luhadabulo kwa nhwalo gwa bhando bheniya bhubhakomitwe nahibhaha panane jha kibheluko chenje.”
MAT 23:37 “Mabhando bha ku Yeluchalemo, mabhando bha ku Yeluchalemo! Mikoma milondole bha Chapanga na kwakong'onda maghanga bhala bhibhatumitwe kwino. Palegha nnyighite kubheka mabhoko ghango panane jha bhando bhino, ngita ngoko chajhobhotela yana yake kwa mapapanilo ghake. Nambo mukapahii jhe!
MAT 23:38 Dolekeya, ngoheno nyumba jhino jha Chapanga nailekwa mahundo.
MAT 23:39 Bhahe, ninobholela, naubhone jhe kabhele ade pumpala kulonge, ‘Jhuna mota jwahika kwa liina lya Bhambo.’ ”
MAT 24:1 Yecho ajhakupita pa Nyumba jha Chapanga, pakibha akijhendila. Bhabholwa bhake bhajhakuhikilila na kunangiya Nyumba jha Chapanga chichengwitwe.
MAT 24:2 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Chakaka, mihoto kughalolekeya ghanga ghoha. Ninnobholela chakaka, libhii jhe hilu lighanga limo lilipala kuhighalika panane jha lighanga lenge. Kila kilebhe nakiyangabhanwa.”
MAT 24:3 Peniya Yecho pakibha atamite panane pa kitombe chuku Micheitune, bhabholwa bhake bhajhakunyendelela pangabhando na kunkonya, “Chonde mutulobholele ilebhe henge naihengeka ligha? Bho, na nginyililo ghane jhipala kulangiya kuhika kwino na upehekelo gwa machiko?”
MAT 24:4 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Mukilolekehe mundo akoto kunkopokeya.
MAT 24:5 Nhwalo bhando bhamahele nabhahika na kulonge kila jhumo, ‘Nenga ndi Kilichitu!’ Na bhene nabhankopokeya bhando bhamahele.
MAT 24:6 Pumipala kujhoha malobhe gha ngondo na mbwepo ya ngondo, bhahe, nkotoka kujhoghopa, nhwalo gheniya ghipalwa kupitila. Nambo kujhomokela kwake kwamela.
MAT 24:7 Bhando bha kilambo chimo na akakomana na bhando bha kilambo chenge, unahota nkolongwa ghumo naukomana na unahota ghonge. Pamba na pala pabhaha na njala na nnindimilo gwa nnema.
MAT 24:8 Gheniya ghoha naghabhaha ngita kutumbuu kwa lipyanda lya kupapa mwana.
MAT 24:9 “Peniya nanyambilwa, na kung'ahichwa na kukomwa. Bhando bha ilambo yoha naichimwangana kwa nhwalo gwa kunyekete nenga.
MAT 24:10 Machiko gheniya, bhamahele nabhakileka kihobholelo chabhe, nabhajhambilana bhene kwa bhene na kuchimwana.
MAT 24:11 Mu machiko gheniya nabhapitila milondole bhamahele bhuwange, na bhene nabhakuloha bhando twe.
MAT 24:12 Nhwalo kujhonjekeka kwa ghanganandela, upalo gwa bhando mabhahele nautundingila.
MAT 24:13 Nambo jwapala kuhimbilila ade kujhomolela jwenio naghombokoka.
MAT 24:14 Lilobhe lya Mbone lya unahota gwa kunane kwa Chapanga nalitangachwa kwa bhando bha ilambo yoha ili bhando bhoha kwalangiya kabula jha kuupekeya kwa nnema.
MAT 24:15 “Pumpala kubhona ‘Lijhambu lihakanaho lilihangabhana,’ lilongilwa na Daniele nnondole jwa Chapanga lijhemite chehemo jha nyahinyahi pa Nyumba jha Chapanga.” Jwachoma na amanye!
MAT 24:16 Peniya bhubhabhii ku Yudeya bhabhutikila ku kitombe.
MAT 24:17 Bhahe, mundo jhojhoha jwapakubhehe pa kipaghalo akotoka kuhuluka kujhingii nkate na kutola ilebhe yake, na helahela jwabhii kunng'onda akotoka kubhujha kutola ilebhe yake.
MAT 24:18 Mundo jwabhii kunghonda akotoka kubhujha kutola ngobho yake.
MAT 24:19 Nakole kiya hake kwa akakeghe bhubhabhii na ndumbo na bhibhajhongecha nabhabha mumalagho kwa machiko gheniya.
MAT 24:20 Mbaha tunnyope Chapanga kuntila kwino kukota kubhehe machiko gha malile amu Lichiko lya Kupomolela!
MAT 24:21 Nhwalo machiko gheniya napabha na lung'ahe lukolongwa lyanapitii jhe kuhumii mukupanganwa nnema ade ngoheno, hilu nalipitijhe kabhele.
MAT 24:22 Na anda Chapanga nakupongocha jhe machiko gha malagho, abhii jhe hilu mundo jhumo nga ghombokwikwe, nambo machiko gheniya naipongochwa kwa nhwalo jha bhala bhubhahaghulilwe.
MAT 24:23 “Bhahe, mundo anda anongalile, mangota kwa machiko gheniya, Kilichitu Nkomboche abhii pamba! amu Kilichitu Nkomboche abhii kola! Nkotoka kunyokanikiya.
MAT 24:24 Nhwalo nabhapitila bhakilichitu bhuwange na milondole bhauwange. Nabhalangiya nginyililo ngolongwa na ikangacho ya kuhotu kwakopokeya bhando hilu bhala bhubhahaghulilwe na Chapanga.
MAT 24:25 Unyokanikiye chakaka, ninnobholile njwe mangota lichaa lyamela lyanghika.
MAT 24:26 “Bhahe, pubhapala kunnobholela mangota, ‘Dolekeya, abhii kunjenga!’ Nkotoka kujhenda kwenio, amu dolekeya, Kilichitu Nkomboche ajhobhite muchumbe! Mwangajhokanikiya.
MAT 24:27 Nhwalo nahibhaha ngita lumule lwa mbamba chilulangala kubhoka kulihumii lyobha ade kulitipikila lyobha. Ndi chipala kubhoneka kwa Mwana gwa Mundo papala kuhika lichiko lyenio.
MAT 24:28 “Pughakonganika matumbuhe, ndi pubhii ntuhe.”
MAT 24:29 “Papa pulupala kupeta lung'ahe lwa lichiko lyenio, lyobha nalibhaha lubhendo tyoo na mwehe naupiha jhe lilangamule. Ndondo nahigwaha kubhoka kumahunde, na makakala gha ilebhe ya kunane kwa Chapanga nainyukanyuka.
MAT 24:30 Peniya nginyililo ya kuhika kwa Mwana gwa Mundo nahibhonekana kumahunde, bhahe, bhando bha makabila ghoha gha nnema naghalela. Mwana gwa Mundo nabhamona akahika pakate jha mahunde kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga abhii jhuna likakala na ukolo twe.
MAT 24:31 Lipenenga nalilela kwa lilobhe likolongwa na jwenio nabhatuma akatumiche bhake bha kunane kwa Chapanga, kwa pande yoha ncheche ya nnema kwaponga bhubhahaghulilwe na Chapanga kuhumii mujhomokelo ghongo ade upeekeho gwa nnema.”
MAT 24:32 “Mukibhole nnandanikiho ghongo kuhumii nkongo gwa nkojho, mandabhe gha nkongo ghabhii mabhehe utumbuu kupiya mahamba, umanye kubhehe machiko gha kuhuna ghabhandikile.
MAT 24:33 Helahela kwa mangota pumipala kughabhona ghahengeka gheniya ghoha, umanya kubhehe lichaa libhandikile kuhika.
MAT 24:34 Ninobholela chakaka, kibheluko chenje nakipete jhe kabula jha kuhengeka ghanga.
MAT 24:35 Kunane kwa Chapanga na nnema nahipeta, nambo malobhe ghango naghapeta ng'o.”
MAT 24:36 Nambo abhii jhe mundo jwamanya lichiko amu lichaa lyenio nalihika ligha, hilu akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga. Hilu Mwana, nga Tate ndi jwamanya.
MAT 24:37 Ngita chikibha mu machiko gha Nuho, ndi naghatendika helahela kuhika kwake kwa Mwana gwa Mundo
MAT 24:38 Nhwalo lichiko lyenio nahikoma hula ngolongwa na mache kuheluka pannema ghoha, bhando nabhajhendelela kulyegha na kunywegha, kutolela amu kutolelwa ade Nuho pajhingila mungalabha ngolonga jhikemwa chapina.
MAT 24:39 Na bhene bhakamanyite jhe kilebhe chikipala kupitila ade hula ngolongwa na mache pughahelwika pannema poha, na kwakoma bhando bhoha. Ndi chikipala kupitila kwa Mwana gwa Mundo kuhika kwake.
MAT 24:40 Machiko gheniya bhando bhabhele nabhabha mukulema, jhumo natolwa na jhonge nalekwa mwenio mughonda.
MAT 24:41 Akakeghe bhabhele nabhabhaha pa lwalwa kuyagha, jhumo natolwa na jhonge nalekwa papa.
MAT 24:42 Chonde nkeluwe bhahe, mukilenganikiye nhwalo umanyitejhe lichiko lya kuhika kwa Bhambo gwino.
MAT 24:43 Nambo nkomboke lilobhe lendeno, nkolo nyumba ngamanya lichiko lya mwihe papala kuhika, ngailekiti jhe hilu nyumba jhake ihangabhanwe.
MAT 24:44 Bhahe, mangota helahela mukilenganikiye, nhwalo Mwana gwa Mundo nahika kwa lichaa lya kupwitikilila pwitu.
MAT 24:45 Peniya Yecho pajhendilila kulonge, “Bho, ndi ghane ntumiche jwahobholeka na jhuna malango? Jhola munahota gwake nameka kwajhemelela akatumiche bhake, abhapekehe yakulyegha pulihika lichaa lyake.
MAT 24:46 Jhuna mota ntumiche jwabhii na munahota gwake papala kuhika nakolela akahenga gheniya.
MAT 24:47 Ninobholela chakaka, nkolo gwake nameka ntumiche jhola ajhemelele ilebhe yake yoha.
MAT 24:48 Nambo anda ntumiche ndi mundo jwanganandela, nakilongolela jwenio ku mwojho kubhehe ‘Bhambo abhii na kiyoto kubhujha,’ na atumbula kwakong'onda akatumiche bhajhake,
MAT 24:49 na kulyegha na kunywegha pamonga na bhibhanywe ughembe.
MAT 24:50 Bhahe, munahota jwa ntumiche jhola nahika lichiko lyangalihobholela na lichaa lyangalimanya.
MAT 24:51 Na jwenio nabhatyala hake na kubheka likunde limo na bhando bhubhakitenda bhaumbone. Kwenio nakubha kulela na kuyagha mino.
MAT 25:1 “Kwa machiko gheniya, Unahota gwa kunane kwa Chapanga naulandana na ichikana kome bhibhatohi kolobohi yabhe na kujhenda kumpoke nnyinamwale.
MAT 25:2 Nhwano pakate jhabhe bhatei kupumbumuka na nhwano bhakibha bhina malango.
MAT 25:3 Bhibhapumbumwike bhala bhakatohi kolobohi yabhe, bhakatoijhe mahuta gha kihukilo.
MAT 25:4 Nambo bhina malango bhala bhakagheghita mahuta ghange mu chupa pamonga na kolobohi yabhe.
MAT 25:5 Nhwalo nnyinamwale akacheliwe kuhika, akachikana bhoha bhajhakutumbuu kuchichila na bhajhakugholoka.
MAT 25:6 “Pakate jha uhiko, pajhakubhehe na njobhele, ‘Jhimuka, jhimuka! Nnyinamwale abhii kuhika, nnyende mukampokele!’
MAT 25:7 Ichikana hela ijhakujhimuka yoha, na kulenganikiya kolobohi yabhe.
MAT 25:8 Ipumbumwike hela ijhakwalongolela bhala bhubhabhii na malango, ‘Mutupele mahuta ghandina nhwalo kolobohi hito ipala kuhima.’
MAT 25:9 Nambo ichikana ibhii na malango hela ijhakulonge, ‘Ghakwela jhe kumpela mangota na twenga, mbaha nnyendengane mukahemele kubhachulucha.’
MAT 25:10 Bhahe, ichikana ipumbumwike hela pubhajhawila kuhemela mahuta, nnyinamwale ajhakuhika, na hela ichikana ibhii na malango bhakibha telatela kujhingii pamonga na jwenio munyumba jha unyagho gwa ndowa na nnyango ujhakupungwa.
MAT 25:11 “Palonge pandina bhala akachikana bhibhapumbumwike bhajhakuhika na kukema, ‘Bhambo, mabhambo!’ Mutudindulile litangala!
MAT 25:12 Nambo jwenio ajhakwajhanguu, ‘Ninnobholela chakaka,’ nimanyingine jhe mangota.”
MAT 25:13 Peniya Yecho ajhakulonge, “Nkeluwe, nhwalo mulimanyitejhe lichiko hilu lichaa papala kuhika Mwana gwa Mundo.
MAT 25:14 “Machiko gheniya naibhaha ngita mundo jhumo jwakapahi kujhenda mwanja, ajhakwakema akatumiche bhake na kwakamua ilebhe yake.
MAT 25:15 Ajhakumaghulila kila jhumo ngita uhotolo gwake, jhumo mbijha talanta nhwano na jhonge mbijha talanta ibhele na jhonge mbijha talanta jhimo, peniya ajhakujhenda.
MAT 25:16 Papa jhola ntumiche jwakapatite mbijha talanta nhwano ajhakujhenda kuchuluchila na ajhakujhonjekeya henge nhwano.
MAT 25:17 Na jhonge jwakapatite mbijha talanta ibhele ijhakubhelekana henge ibhele.
MAT 25:18 Nambo ntumiche jwakapatite mbijha talanta jhimo ajhakujhenda kuhembe libhomba, na kuhibheka mwenio mbijha jha munahota gwake.
MAT 25:19 “Pighapetita machiko twe, nkolo jwa akatumiche bhala ajhakubhujha, na kutumbuu kubhalanga mbijha yake pamonga na bheniya.
MAT 25:20 Ntumiche jhola jwakakamwiwe mbijha talanta nhwano ibhelekine henge talanta nhwano, ajhakunobholela, ‘Bhambo! Ukambekii talanta nhwano, na ngoheno ibhelekine henge nhwano.’
MAT 25:21 Munahota jhola ajhakulonge, ‘Mwe ntei mbone, ntumiche mwaumbone na uhobholike!’ ‘Mwilebhe yandina, na ngohe nanimpela makolonga. Uhike nhwangane pamonga na nkolo gwino.’
MAT 25:22 “Ajhakuhika ntumiche jwakakamwiwe mbijha talanta ibhele, ajhakulonge, ‘Munahota, ukangamwiye mbijha talanta ibhele. Ngoheno ntole talanta ibhele ibhelekine.’
MAT 25:23 Munahota jhola ajhakunobholela, ‘Mbone, ntumiche jwa umbone na jhumuhobholeka!’ Uhobholike mwiilebhe yandina, na ngoheno nanikamua makolonga, ‘Uhike nhwangane pamonga na munahota gwino.’
MAT 25:24 “Nambo jhola jwakapatite mbijha talanta jhimo ajhakuhika, na kulonge, ‘Munahota, niumanye mwenga nkokotwike mwojho, muhuna pangamicha, mwiponga pangamicha.
MAT 25:25 Nikajhogwipe, nyakuhiya mbijha jhino mu undope. Ngoheno ntole mbijha jhino.’
MAT 25:26 “Munahota jhola ajhakunobholela, ‘Mwenga ndi mantumiche manganandela na matotoho! Umanyi kubhehe nenga nihuna pangamicha, na niponga pangamicha.
MAT 25:27 Bhahe, impalita kubheka mbijha yango kwa bhando bhibhahemela na kuchulucha mbijha, na nenga ngandohile mbijha imekite na hela ijhonjikike.
MAT 25:28 Mupoke mbijha yenio na mukapela jhola jwabhii na mbijha talanta kome.
MAT 25:29 Nhwalo, jwabhii na kilebhe napelwa na kujhonjekewa. Nambo jhola jwangabhehe nacho, hilu chela chandina chabhii nacho napokwa.
MAT 25:30 Na kwa jwenio ntumiche jwangahenga lihengo lya kujhokekeha, mutaghile panja palubhendo, kwenio nakubhaha kulela na kuyagha mino.’
MAT 25:31 “Mwana gwa Mundo papala kuhika mu ukolongwa gwake na pamonga na akatumiche bhoha bha kunane kumahunde, peniya natama panane jha mu kigoda chake cha unahota gwa kwa Chapanga chikibhii na ung'alicho.
MAT 25:32 Bhando bha ilambo yoha naikonganika pamonga palonge jhake, na jwenio nabhahaghula bhando ngita nnuchajhe pahaghula mambelele na mbuhe.
MAT 25:33 Naghabheka mambelele ngita bhando bhaumbone lubhoko lwake lwalelo na mbuhe ngita bhando bhanganandela lubhoko lwake lwa ungejha.
MAT 25:34 Peniya, munahota nkolongwa nabhalobholela bhala bhubhabhii lubhoko lwalelo, ‘Uhikengane mangota bhupekiwe mota na Tate gwango, nnyingile munahota ghumekilwe kuhumii mukupanganwa kwa nnema.
MAT 25:35 Nhwalo, punikibha na njala mangota mukambekihe chakulya, na punikibha na nyota na mangota mukambekihe mache, na punikibha naghene na mangota mukambokii ukajhino,
MAT 25:36 punikibha makengele, mukahwachile ngobho, nikibha na ulwalo mukahikite kundangatila, punikibha mukipungo, mukahikite kunninga.’
MAT 25:37 “Peniya bhando bhala bhaumbone nabhannyangula munahota jhola, ‘Bhambo, ligha tukamwene mmii na njala na twenga tujhakupekeya chakulya, amu pukibha na nyota tujhakupekeya mache?
MAT 25:38 Bho, kojhe kutumwene mmii maghene na twenga tujhakupokela, amu kojhe kutukolila mmii makengele na twenga tujhakuhwalicha ngobho?
MAT 25:39 Bho, ligha tukamwene pumukibha mukulwalwa amu pumukibha mukipungo tujhakuhika kuninga?’
MAT 25:40 Munahota nkolongwa nanyangula, ‘Ninobholela chakaka, kila kilebhe chimutendila jhumo jwa bhamba akalongo bhango bhachokombe ndi undendila nenga!’
MAT 25:41 “Peniya nabhalobholela bhala bhubhabhii lubhoko lwa ngejha, ‘Mmokengane palonge jhango mangota bhunapanikilwe! Nnyendengane mu mwotu gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta, gwabhekilwe Limbembela na akatumiche bhake!
MAT 25:42 Nhwalo punikibha na njala mangota mukambekii jhe chakulya, na punikibha na nyota mangota mukambekii jhe mache gha kunywegha.
MAT 25:43 Punikibha naghene mangota mukambokii jhe punikibha makengele mangota mukahikiti jhe ngobho, punikibha mukipungo mangota mukahikite jhe kunninga.’
MAT 25:44 “Na bhene nabhajhangula, ‘Bhambo, ligha tukamwene pumukibha na njala, amu punyohina nyota amu mmii maghene amu pumii makengele amu mitenda kulwalwa amu mupungwite, na twenga tukanhengii jhe?’
MAT 25:45 Jwenio munahota nanyangula, ‘Ninobholela chakaka, kila pukanita kwatangatii ilebhe yenio pakate jha yandina henge, unganila kundangatila.’
MAT 25:46 Bhahe, bhamba nabhajhenda mumalagho gha machiko ghoha, nambo bhambone nabhajhingila muughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.”
MAT 26:1 Yecho pajhomolila kulonge malobhe gheniya ghoha, ajhakwalobholela bhabholwa bhake,
MAT 26:2 “Umanyite ghahighalike machiko mabhele kubhehe na unyagho gwa Pachaka, Mwana gwa Mundo najhambilwa na kubhambwa pachalaba.”
MAT 26:3 Machiko gheniya, akapiya matambiko bhakolo na akanahota bhajhakutama pa Bwalo jha Kayafa jwakibha nkolo jwa mpiya litambiko.
MAT 26:4 Na bhene bhajhakulonge nginyika jha kuchenjela jha kunkamuu Yecho bhankome.
MAT 26:5 “Nambo bhajhakulonge likotoka kuhengeka machiko gha unyagho gwa Pachaka, kuhoto kubhehe na bhulo pakate jha bhando.”
MAT 26:6 Yecho pakibha ku Betaniya, kajha kwa Simone, helahela akemitwa Simone malohe,
MAT 26:7 Mwikeghe jhumo ajhakunhikilila Yecho na chupa jhitengenichwe kwa lighanga lya alabachita jhikibha na mahuta ghighachuluchwa kwa mbijha yamahele. Ajhakunhikilila Yecho pakachangwale palila na ajhakunyitila mahuta gheniya Yecho pamuto.
MAT 26:8 Bhabholwa bhake Yecho pubhalolita gheniya bhajhakuhyoma na kulonge, “Nhwalo gwa nike ajhitana ilebhe ngita hengeno?
MAT 26:9 Mahuta ghanga ghighanungulili petelele ghahoto kuchuluchwa kwa feza ya madine twe na gheniya ngaghahotwi kwabhaghanichila akahocho!”
MAT 26:10 Yecho akamanye chibhawachila, ajhakwalobholela, “Nhwalo gwa nike mung'aha mwikeghe jhonjo? Jwenio andendile kilebhe chambone hake nenga.
MAT 26:11 Nhwalo nantama na akahocho machiko ghoha, nambo nenga namejhe na mangota machiko ghoha.
MAT 26:12 Mwikeghe jhonjo annyitii mahuta gha petelele kwa nhwalo gwa kulenganikiya yegha jhango kwa kuchikwa.
MAT 26:13 Ninobholela chakaka, popoha pannema Lilobhe lya Mbone nalitangachwa, kilebhe chateii majhe jhola nakilongelwa na kukombokwa jwenio.”
MAT 26:14 Peniya Yuda Ichikaliyote, jhumo pakate jha bhabholwa bhala kome na bhabhele bha Yecho, ajhakujhenda kwa akapiya matambiko bhakolo,
MAT 26:15 ajhakwalobholela, “Bho, nanyambulila nike anda ninyambii Yecho mu mabhoko gwino?” Bhahe, bhajhakumalangila ipande makome matato gwa feza,
MAT 26:16 na kuhumii papa Yuda ajhakutumbuu kupalaha ndela jha kunnyambila Yecho.
MAT 26:17 Lichiko lya kutumbula kwa unyagho gwa mabumunda ghangalekela ngedule, bhabholwa bhake bhajhakunyendelela Yecho na kunkonya, “Bho, mipala kojhe tukalenganikiye chakulya cha Pachaka?”
MAT 26:18 Na jwenio ajhakwajhanguu, “Nnyendengane ku muche gwa likambako limo na mukannobholele: ‘Mmola alonge, lichiko lyango libhandikile. Kwino nenga na bhabholwa bhango natulya Pachaka pamonga kajhino.’ ”
MAT 26:19 Na bhene bhabholwa bhajhakuhenga ngita chabhalaghalikiye Yecho, bhajhakulenganikiya chakulye Pachaka.
MAT 26:20 Pihikila kimiye, Yecho ajhakutama pakulyegha pamonga na bhabholwa bhake bhoha kome na bhabhele.
MAT 26:21 Pubhakibha mukulyegha, Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Ninnobholela chakaka, jhumo pakate jhino nandenda kunyambila.”
MAT 26:22 Bhahe, bhabholwa bhake bhajhakubhehe ngolongondi hake ku mwojho, bhajhakutumbuu kunkonya jhumo jhumo, “Bhambo, ndi nenga?”
MAT 26:23 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Jwachwika libumunda pamonga na nenga mu bakule ndi jhonjo jwambala kunyambila.
MAT 26:24 Chakaka, Mwana gwa Mundo nahwa ngita Majhandiko gha Chapanga chighalonge, nambo nalola choto mundo jhola jwapala kunnyambila Mwana gwa Mundo! Ngaibhii mbaha kwa jwenio ngabhelwike jhe!”
MAT 26:25 Yuda, ndi jhola jwapala kunyambila, ajhakunkonya, “Mmola, ndi nenga?” Yecho ajhakunyanguu, “Mabhene ndi milongila.”
MAT 26:26 Pubhalila, Yecho ajhakutola libumunda, na ajhakunchenguu Chapanga ajhakumetula na kwapela bhabholwa bhake alongila, “Ntolengane nnyakile, jhenje ndi yegha jhango.”
MAT 26:27 Peniya ajhakutola kibaba cha divaye, helahela ajhakunnomba Chapanga na kwapela alongila, “Unywengane mabhoha,
MAT 26:28 nhwalo jhenje ndi miyahe jhango jhilangiya kubhehe lilaghano lya Chapanga na bhando ndi chakaka, miyahe jhijhitika kwa nhwalo gwa bhando twe nabhalekekewa uhakaho.
MAT 26:29 Ninobholela, nanywe jhe kabhele divaye jha chabibo ade lichiko lela pimpala kunywegha divaye yono na mangota mu Unahota gwa Tate gwango.”
MAT 26:30 Pubhajhomolila kujhemba nhwambo gwa kunnomba Chapanga, bhajhakubhoka na kujhenda ku kitombe chuku Micheitune.
MAT 26:31 Peniya Yecho ajhakwalobholela bhabholwa bhake, “Uhiko ghongo mangota mabhoha namaha iholo na nenga, nhwalo Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge, ‘Nanityala nnucha mambelele, na mambelele gha likunde naghapechengana.’
MAT 26:32 Nambo pumbala kuyoka kuhumii kubhawile, naninongolela kujhenda ku Galilaya.”
MAT 26:33 Petile ajhakunnobholela Yecho, “Hata bhange bhabhehe na iholo na kunneke, nenga natubhaha pamonga, naninekajhe.”
MAT 26:34 Yecho ajhakunobholela, “Ninobholela chakaka, uhiko ghongone lijhogholo nakubhekajhe, mwenga naunganila patato.”
MAT 26:35 Petile ajhakunyanguu, “Nanikana ng'o hata kuwegha, natuhwa pamonga.” Na bhabholwa bhange bhala bhoha bhajhakulonge helahela.
MAT 26:36 Peniya Yecho ajhakujhenda pamonga na bhabholwa bhake chehemo jhikemwa Getechemane, ajhakwalobholela bhabholwa bhake, “Ntamangane pamba nenga nijhenda palonge pala kunnyopa Chapanga.”
MAT 26:37 Ajhakulongohana na Petile na yana ibhele ya Chebedayo, ajhakutumbuu kubhehe ngolongonde na mang'ahiko kumwojho,
MAT 26:38 peniya, Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Mwojho gwango ubhii ngolongonde ngita nipala kuwegha. Ntamengane pambano nkeluwe pamonga na nenga.”
MAT 26:39 Ajhakujhenda palonge pandina, na ajhakukigwiya pahe mangukama, ajhakunyopa Chapanga, “Tate gwango, anda iwechekana, kibaba chenjeno cha malagho kimambale, nambo chi chinipala nenga, nambo chimipala mabhene.”
MAT 26:40 Pabhajhendilila bhabholwa bhake, ajhakwakolela bhagholwike. Bhahe, ajhakunnyimuha Petile na kunkonya, “Ma Simone, ngholwike? Uhotwijhe kukeluha na nenga pamba nobe lichaa limo?”
MAT 26:41 Nkotoka kugholoka na munyopengane Chapanga amambahe nkotoka kujhingii mumajhighanikilo, nhwalo uhuke ndi upala, nambo yegha itotokalile.
MAT 26:42 Ajhakujhenda jha ubhele kunyopa Chapanga, “Tate gwango, anda ichindikine kibaba chenje cha malagho kumbeta nenga changanywegwa, bhahe, limipala lihengeka.”
MAT 26:43 Ajhakwajhendelela kabhele, ajhakwakolela bhamela bhagholwike, miho ghabhe ghamela ghina lugwenio.
MAT 26:44 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakwaleka, na kujhenda kunyopa Chapanga mala jha utato kulonge malobhe ghagha.
MAT 26:45 Peniya ajhakwajhimuwa bhabholwa bhake na kwalobholela, “Bho, Mwamela ngholwike na kupomolela? Nnolekehe, lichaa lyenio libhandikile, ngoheno Mwana gwa Mundo nabhankamuwa mu mabhoko gha bhando bhubhabhii na uhakaho.
MAT 26:46 Nnyimukane, tijhangana. Dolekeya, ahika mundo jhola jwapala kunyambila.”
MAT 26:47 Bhahe, Yecho pajhandilila kulonge nabho papa ajhakuhika Yuda, jhumo pakate jha bhabholwa bhake kome na bhabhele. Pamonga jwenio bhakahikite bhando twe bhubhabhii na mapanga na indukwa bhibhakatumitwe na akapiya matambiko bhakolo na ighogholo ya bhando.
MAT 26:48 Bhahe, Yuda jhola jwapala kunyambila Yecho, ajhakwalangiya nginyililo jhenje, “Mundo jhunimpala kunkumbatila ndi umanya jhojho, mukamula.”
MAT 26:49 Bhahe, Yuda ajhakuheghelela Yecho na kunobholela, “Mbukwa, Mmola.” Peniya ajhakunkumbatila.
MAT 26:50 Yecho ajhakunnobholela, “Makoche, unhenge chihikita kuhenga!” Papa bhando bhala bhajhakuhika na kukamula Yecho, na kumeka pahe jha ulonda gwabhe.
MAT 26:51 Jhumo jha bhala bhubhakibha na Yecho ajhakuholomola upanga gwake na kuheketa lichikilo lya ntumiche jwa Mpiya litambiko nkolongwa.
MAT 26:52 Yecho ajhakunnobholela Petile, “Mmujhiche upanga gwino kuntohila, nhwalo jhojhoha jwakoma kwa upanga, nahwa kwa upanga.
MAT 26:53 Bho, pimihambuka ngahotwiijhe kunyopa Tate gwango na jwenio nganetii papa makunde kome na mabhele gha akakomana ngondo ndi akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga?
MAT 26:54 Bhahe, naghatimila bhole majhandiko gha Chapanga ghighalongela ghanga ghipalwa ghapitele?”
MAT 26:55 Lichaa lelelene Yecho ajhakulilobholela lilongo lya bhando lela, “Bho, nhwalo gwa nike uhikita kungamuu kwa mapanga na indukwa ngita nenga jwandwekwile lilaghalikilo? Machiko ghoha pumbipikiya pa Nyumba jha Chapanga kubhola, na mangota mukangamwii jhe.
MAT 26:56 Nambo ghatendika ghanga, malobhe ghighalongilwa na milondole bha Chapanga ghalenganile.” Peniya, bhabholwa bhake bhoha bhajhakunneka na kutila.
MAT 26:57 Bhahe, bhando bhubhakakamwii bhala bhajhakumupeleka Yecho ukajha kwa Kayafa, jwakibha Mpiya litambiko nkolo, kwenio bhakakonganike bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo na ighogholo.
MAT 26:58 Petile ajhakunkengamila Yecho chukutale ade ajhakujhingii nkate jha lwane lwa Nkolo jwa bhapiya litambiko. Ajhakujhingii nkate pamonga na akalonda apata alole ghighapala kutendeka.
MAT 26:59 Bhahe, akapiya matambiko bhakolo bha pa bwalo bhajhakupalaha matakalilo ghuwange panane jha Yecho bhankome,
MAT 26:60 nambo bhakaliwejhe lyalemwite, pamonga na kuhika kwa bhando twe bhibhalongila uwange. Na pakujhomolela bhajhakuhika bhando bhabhele,
MAT 26:61 bhalongila, “Mundo jhonjo alongila. ‘Nihoto kuitilulana Nyumba jha Chapanga na lichiko lya utato kulichenga kabhele.’ ”
MAT 26:62 Mpiya litambiko nkolo ajhakujhema palonge pa bwalo na kunkonya Yecho, “Bho, nhwalo gwa nike mitama nuu? Bho, bhando bhamba bhatakalila kwa kilebhe ghane?”
MAT 26:63 Nambo Yecho ajhakubhehe nuu. Mpiya litambiko nkolo ajhakunobholela, “Ninapanikii kwa liina lya Chapanga gwino jwabhii ghome, mutulobholele anda mwenga ndi Kilichitu Nkomboche, Mwana gwa Chapanga.”
MAT 26:64 Yecho ajhakujhanguu, “Mwenga ndi milongela. Nambo pamonga na gheniya, ninobholela mangota namumona Mwana gwa Mundo atamite lubhoko lwalelo lwa Bhambo jwabhii na likakala. Akahika mumahunde gha kunane kwa Chapanga.”
MAT 26:65 Peniya Mpiya litambiko nkolo ajhakujwepula ligwanda lyake, ajhakulonge, “Mundo jhonjo anigha Chapanga! Tupala ndeka mundo jhonge alongele, ngoheno mabhene nnyohine maligho ghake.
MAT 26:66 Mangota bho, mihola nike?” Na bhene bhajhakujhanguu, “Alemwite, ipalwa akomwe!”
MAT 26:67 Peniya ndi bhajhakunhunii mata kumiho, bhajhakuntyala mbalamande lapu. Bhange pubhajhendilila kutyala,
MAT 26:68 bhalongila, “Ma Kilichitu! Nnotele ngoheno ghane jwatyalite!”
MAT 26:69 Petile akatamite mulwane. Bhahe, ntumiche jhumo mwikeghe ajhakunyendelela na kulonge, “Mwenga helahela mukibha pamonga na Yecho jwa ku Galilaya.”
MAT 26:70 Petile ajhakukana palonge jha bhando bhoha alongila, “Chimulonge manyitejhe.”
MAT 26:71 Petile papitita panja jha litangala lya ubhegho, ntumiche jhonge mwikeghe ajhakumona na kwalobholela bhala bhubhakibha pala, “Mundo jhonjo bhakibha bhoha na Yecho jwa ku Nachalete.”
MAT 26:72 Petile ajhakukana kabhele kwa kukilapanikiya, “Nikilapanikii nenga niumanye jhe mundo jhonjo.”
MAT 26:73 Lichaa lyandina, bhando bhubhakajhemite pala bhajhakunyendelela Petile na kunobholela, “Chakaka, mwenga ndi pakate jhabhe, nhwalo hilu malongelo ghino milandana!”
MAT 26:74 Papa Petile ajhakutumbuu kukilongolela kwa kukilapanikiya alongila, “Mbamba ingome, niumanye jhe mundo jhonjo!” Na papa lijhogholo lijhakubheka.
MAT 26:75 Petile ajhakukomboka malobhe ghalongila Yecho, “Lijhogholo nakubhekajhe naunganila patato.” Bhahe, ajhakupita panja, na kulela kwa ungolongonde hake.
MAT 27:1 Pukuchila tugha, akapiya matambiko bhakolo bhoha na akanahota bha bhando bhibhakajheketii Yecho akomwe.
MAT 27:2 Bhajhakunpyeneneka minyonyolo, na kutola na kumpeleka kwa Pilatu, jwakibha nduna jwa kilambo jwabhekitwe na nkolo jwa ku Loma.
MAT 27:3 Peniya Yuda jhola jwanyambila Yecho, pamanyita njwe kubhehe Yecho bhahadabwile, ajhakulela na kwabhujhichila mbijha yabhe kwa akapiya matambiko bhakolo na anakahota ipande hela makome matato gha feza.
MAT 27:4 Ajhakwalobholela, “Nemwite kwa kunyambila mundo jwangalemwa akomwe!” Nambo bheniya bhajhakujhanguu, “Twenga tuhenge nike ngohe, bho, lyenio lino mwenga?”
MAT 27:5 Yuda ajhakutaghila ipande ya feza pa Nyumba jha Chapanga, ajhakupita na kujhenda kukikongela.
MAT 27:6 Akapiya matambiko bhakolongwa bhajhakulokota mbijha hela nu kulonge, “Yamaha ndeka kuhangalana na mbijha ya Nyumba jha Chapanga mu kihukilo chimo, nhwalo ndi mbijha ipatikine kwa ndela jha miyahe.”
MAT 27:7 Bhahe, bhajhakujheketelana mbijha yenio, bhahemelela nng'onda gwa undope gwa ibhegha gwa kuchikila akaghene.
MAT 27:8 Ndi nhwalo ade deleno nghonda gwenio ukemwa, “Nng'onda ghupatikine kwa mbijha jha miyahe.”
MAT 27:9 Naha ndi chighatimile malobhe gha Yelemiya jwakibha nnondole jwa Chapanga, “Bhakatoile ipande ya mbijha makome matato malepo ghibhabhekite bhando bha Ichilahele gha mundo jwenio,
MAT 27:10 bhajhakuhemelela nghonda gwa kubhombe ibhegha, anda Bhambo chanaghalikiye nenga.”
MAT 27:11 Yecho ajhakuhikichwa palonge jha Pilatu, jwakibha nduna jwabhekitwe na ulongoche gwa ku Loma. Bhahe, Pilatu ajhakunkonya, “Bho, mwenga ndi munahota nkolongwa jwa Akayahude?” Yecho ajhakunyanguu, “Mwenga ndi milongela.”
MAT 27:12 Nambo Akapiya matambiko bhakolo na ighogholo pubhakibha bhantakalila, Yecho akajhangwii jhe lilobhe.
MAT 27:13 Bhahe, Pilatu ajhakunkonya kabhele, “Bho, nnyohine jhe gheniya matakalilo ghibhalongela?”
MAT 27:14 Nambo Yecho akajhangwii jhe lilobhe, na Pilatu ndi nduna ajhakuhechuka hake.
MAT 27:15 Kila unyagho gwa Pachaka, Pilatu ipalwa kwadindulila mpungwa jhumo jhubhakampahile bhando.
MAT 27:16 Na mu machiko gheniya pakibha na mupungwa jhumo jwamanyikina hake, liina lyake Yecho Balaba.
MAT 27:17 Bhahe, bhando pubhakonganika pamonga, Pilatu ajhakwakonya, “Bho, mipala nidundulila ghane pakate jha bhamba bhabhele, Balaba amu Yecho, jwakemwa Kilichitu?”
MAT 27:18 Pilatu alongila naha akamanye hotu kubhehe bhapelika kwake nhwalo gwa wiho gwabhe.
MAT 27:19 Pilatu patamita pa kigoda cha luhadabulo, nhwana mundo ajhakunetela lilobhe, “Nkotoka kukihangalana pa mihalo jha mundo jwenio jwa umbone, nhwalo deleno naghite hake mukulotela kwa nhwalo gwake.”
MAT 27:20 Akapiya matambiko bhakolo na anakahota bhajhakukokolekeya bhando bhanyope Balaba adindulilwe na Yecho akomwe.
MAT 27:21 Nambo Pilatu ajhakwakonya, “Bho, mipala nidindulile ghane pakate jha bhamba bhabhele?” Na bhene bhajhakunyanguu, “Mutudindulile Balaba!”
MAT 27:22 Pilatu ajhakwakonya kabhele, “Bho, ngoheno mipala ndende nike Yecho jwakemwa Kilichitu?” Bhoha bhajhakujhanguu bhalongila, “Abhambwe panchalaba!”
MAT 27:23 Nambo Pilatu ajhakwakonya kabhele, “Bho, kilebhe ghane chateile? Bho, kilebhe ghane kibhoho chateile?” Bhene bhajhakuchocha kuchobhela bhalongila, “Abhambwe panchalaba!”
MAT 27:24 Bhahe, Pilatu pamanyita nahotojhe kutenda kilebhe chochoha, na ihoto kupitila bhulo, ajhakuto mache kukuha mu mabhoko palonge jha lilongo lya bhando alongila, “Nenga mii ndela jhimojhe na mangota mukunkoma mundo jhonjo, gheniya ghino mabhene.”
MAT 27:25 Bhando bhoha bhajhakulonge, “Miyahe jhake ibhaha panane jhito na panane jha yana hito!”
MAT 27:26 Peniya Pilatu ajhakwadindulila Balaba kuhumii mukipungo. Na kwalongolela bhakomana ngondo bhantyale yato Yecho na kummoha abhambwe panchalaba.
MAT 27:27 Peniya akakomana ngondo bha Pilatu bhajhakunyingiya Yecho nkate jha Liboma lya nduna, na likunde lyoha lya akakomana ngondo bhajhakuntindila mwono.
MAT 27:28 Bhajhakuhula ngobho yake, na kuwalikiya ngobho ya unahota ya lange ngele.
MAT 27:29 Peniya bhajhakuhingwa hingo jha mibha na kumeka pamuto, na bhajhakumekela nkongocho gwa nnahe lubhoko lwalelo, bhajhakutama makilikite palonge jhake kongo bhatendela chanake bhalongila, “Mbukwa munahota nkolongwa jwa Akayahude!”
MAT 27:30 Bhajhakunhunii mata, na kutola nnahe ghola na kunkong'ondela kumuto.
MAT 27:31 Pubhajhomolila kuntende chanake, bhakanhulite ngobho jhela jhibhakahwaliche, na kuhwalicha ngobho yake, bhahe, bhajhakumpeleka bhakamambe panchalaba.
MAT 27:32 Pubhakibha bhajhahwila, bhajhakummona mundo jhumo jwabhelukilwe ku chenda jha ku Kilene, liina lyake Simone, bhajhakukamulikiya augheghe nchalaba gwa Yecho.
MAT 27:33 Bhajhakuhikicha chehemo jhikemwa Goligota, mana jhake “Chehemo jha libhonge lya muto,”
MAT 27:34 bhajhakumpela divaye jhihangalwine na kilebhe chikibhabha. Nambo Yecho papahita, ajhakukana kunywegha.
MAT 27:35 Bhajhakumamba panchalaba, peniya bhajhakubhaghana ngobho yake kwa kahumbuumbu nnobhole.
MAT 27:36 Peniya, bhajhakutama chukutale kunnonda.
MAT 27:37 Panane jha nchalaba bhajhakubheka kibao chikijhandikwe naha, “Jhonjo ndi Yecho, mu Nahota nkolongwa jwa Akayahude.”
MAT 27:38 Helahela pakibha na bhando bhabhele bhubhakibha bhatoila kwa makakala ilebhe ya bhando, bhakabhambitwe mu michalaba jhabhe. Jhumo lubhoko lwalelo lwa Yecho na jhonge lubhoko lwa ngejha lwa Yecho.
MAT 27:39 Bhando bhubhapetita peniya bhajhakunnigha maligho kongo bhakinicha muto jhabhe bhalongila,
MAT 27:40 “Mwenga jhunongila nantilulana Nyumba jha Chapanga na machiko matato nachenga! Ngohe mukikombole mabhene anda mwenga chakaka ndi Mwana gwa Chapanga! Mukihuluwe kuhumii pa nchalaba!”
MAT 27:41 Pamonga na gheniya Akapiya matambiko bhakolo na bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo na akanahota bhajhakuntendela chanake Yecho bhalongila,
MAT 27:42 “Abhakombwila ajhake, nambo jwenio abhii chepa kukikombola! Jwenio ndi munahota nkolongwa jwa Akaichilahele, ngoheno ahuluke kuhumii pa nchalaba, na twenga natunyeketela.
MAT 27:43 Ahobholila Chapanga na alongila hote jwenio ndi Mwana gwa Chapanga, bhahe, ngoheno Chapanga ankombole anda chakaka ampahile.”
MAT 27:44 Helahela bhubhapokita ilebhe kwa makakala pubhabhambitwa pabhandikii Yecho panchalaba bhajhakunigha.
MAT 27:45 Pihikila muhe jha chaa chita ade chaa ticha, lubhendo lujhakubhehe tyoo pa kilambo choha.
MAT 27:46 Puhikita chaa ticha Yecho ajhakubohoma lilobhe likolongwa, “Eloe, Eloe, lama chabakitane,” mana jhake, “Chapanga gwango, Chapanga gwango nhwalo gwa nike uneka?”
MAT 27:47 Nambo bhando bhange bhibhakajhemite pahina pibhajhohina malobhe gheniya bhajhakulonge, “Inkema Eliya!”
MAT 27:48 Papa jhumo pakate jha bhala ajhakubhutuka mbelo na kutola lidodoke, na kulichwiya mu divaye jhibhabha, na kuhibheka mu nahe. Ajhakutondobhekeya Yecho ajhakumpela anyweghe.
MAT 27:49 Nambo bhange bhajhakulonge, “Deka tulole, anda Eliya nahika kunkombola!”
MAT 27:50 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakubohoma kabhele, na kuwegha.
MAT 27:51 Papala lipanjiya lya Nyumba jha Chapanga lijhakujwepuka ipande ibhele kutumbulii kunane ade pahe, nnema ghoha ujhakulindimila, na mandalabho ghajhakumetukana,
MAT 27:52 mambe ijhakubhehe mbe na bhando twe bha Chapanga bhubhakawile bhajhakuyokechwa,
MAT 27:53 na bhene, bhajhakupita mu mambe, pajhomolila kuyoka Yecho, bhajhakujhingii ku muche gwa Chapanga gwa nyahinyahi ndi Yeluchalemo, na bhando bhamahele bhajhakubhonekana.
MAT 27:54 Bhahe, nkolo jwa akakomana ngondo na bhala bhubhanondita Yecho pubhalolita nnindimilo gwa nnema na ghala ghoha ghighatendika, bhajhakujhoghopa hake bhajhakulonge, “Chakaka mundo jhonjo akibha Mwana gwa Chapanga.”
MAT 27:55 Chehemo jhene pakibha na akakeghe twe bhalingulila chukutale. Bheniya ndi bhala bhibhankengima Yecho kuhumii ku Galilaya, bhubhakibha bhanhengila.
MAT 27:56 Pakate jhabhe bakibha Maliya jwa ku kilambo chuku Magidala, na Maliya majhe gwabhe Yakobu na Uchupo, na nhwana mundo Chebedayo.
MAT 27:57 Puhikita kimiye, ajhakuhika mundo jwabhii na ilebhe mbwee, liina lyake Uchupo jwabhelwikilwe ku Alimataya. Jhonjo hele akibha mmolwa jwa Yecho.
MAT 27:58 Ajhakunyendelela Pilatu, kunyopa malelo gha Yecho. Bhahe, Pilatu ajhakunobholela, atole.
MAT 27:59 Uchupo ajhakutola malelo ghala, na kubhilingilila chanda,
MAT 27:60 Uchupo ajhakughoneka malelo gha Yecho umambe jhene yono jwenio Uchupo akakilenganikiye kwa kukihokonyolela mu lindalabho. Ajhakubhilimbiya lighanga likolongwa pa nnyango gwa mambe na ajhakubhoka.
MAT 27:61 Na Maliya jwa ku kilambo chuku Magidala na jhola Maliya jhonge bhajhakutama pala kuilolekeya mambe jhela.
MAT 27:62 Lichiko lilikengima, yane lichiko lya Kupomolela, akapiya matambiko bhakolo na Mapwalichayo bhajhakunyendelela Pilatu,
MAT 27:63 bhajhakunobholela, “Munahota, tukomboka jwatukolwiya akalongile pakibha ghome ete, ‘Mulichiko lya utato nayoka kabhele.’
MAT 27:64 Bhahe, malobholela akalonda, bhakalonde mambe ade machiko matato. Ikoto kulekwa bhabholwa bhake bhankotoka kuhika na kunyibha na kwalobholela bhando ayokite. Uwange ghongo gwa kujhomolela nahubhaha gwanganandela kupeta ghola gwa kutumbula.”
MAT 27:65 Pilatu ajhakwalobholela, “Nkwete akalonda, nnyendengane mukalonde chimipala.”
MAT 27:66 Bhahe, bhajhakujhenda na kuilonda mambe, bhajhakubheka unepo panane jhake na kwaleka peniya akalonda mambe.
MAT 28:1 Lichiko lya Kupomolela pulipetita, putiputi lichiko lya lichiko lya jumapile, Maliya jwa ku kilambo chaku Magidala na Maliya jhonge jhola bhajhakujhenda kuilolekeya mambe jhela.
MAT 28:2 Pajhakupitila nnindimilo nkolongwa gwa nnema, ntumiche jwa kunane kwa Chapanga jwa Bhambo ajhakuhuluka kuhumii kunane. Ajhakulibhilimbiya lighanga paupele jha mambe jhela, na kulitamila.
MAT 28:3 Jwenio alangila ngita lumule lwa mbamba na ngobho yake ikibha nhuo ya mbuu.
MAT 28:4 Akalonda bhubhalondita mambe bhala bhajhakuhechuka hake, bhajhakubhehe ngita bhatehi kuwegha.
MAT 28:5 Ntumiche jwa kunane kwa Chapanga jhola ajhakwalobholela akakeghe bhala, “Mangota nkotoka kuhechuka, nhwalo nimanya mipalaha Yecho jwakabhambitwe panane jha nchalaba.
MAT 28:6 Abhii jhe pambano, nhwalo ayokite ngita chalongila. Nnolekehe pakagholwike.
MAT 28:7 Bhahe, nnyende kajhombe makalobholele bhabholwa bhake kubhehe Yecho ayokite kuhumii kubhawile, na jwenio nabhalongolela kujhenda ku Galilaya. Ndi nabhammona kwenio, hena, nenga nikannobhalile njwe mangota.”
MAT 28:8 Bhabhii mu jhoghopa na luhangano lukolongwa, akakeghe bhajhakubhoka kajhombe pa mambe na kubhutuka mbelo kwalobholela bhabholwa bhake.
MAT 28:9 Papalapala Yecho ajhakwapitila pwitu akakeghe bhala na kwajhambucha, “Uteeke ubhaha kwino.” Akakeghe bheniya bhajhakuheghelela na kunkamuu magholo na kunyinamila.
MAT 28:10 Peniya Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Nkotoka kujhoghopa. Nnyende makalongolele akalongo bhango bhajhende ku Galilaya, ndi nabhamona koko.”
MAT 28:11 Akakeghe bhala pubhakibha undela kukijhendela, bhange akalonda bha mambe jhela bhajhakujhenda ku muche kwalobholela Akapiya matambiko bhakolo ilebhe yoha ipitile.
MAT 28:12 Bhahe, bhakolo bha bhapiya matambiko bhajhakukongana pamonga na akanahota, pibhajhomolila kulonge, bhajhakwapekeya akalonda bha mambe bhala mbijha twe,
MAT 28:13 na kwalaghalikiya bhalongila, “Mangota nnongela naha, bhabholwa bhake bhakahikite kilo kujhibha malelo ghake na twenga tukibha lughono tipitipi.
MAT 28:14 Na anda nduna ajhohine lilobhe lende, twenga natulongela nako na mangota name ndeka mu malagho.”
MAT 28:15 Bhahe, akalonda bhala bhajhakuitola mbijha hela, na bhajhakuhenga ngita chibhabholitwe. Malobhe gheniya ghajhakuchobhela pakate jha Akayahude na ade ngoheno.
MAT 28:16 Peniya bhabholwa kome na jhumo bhala bhajhakujhenda ku kitombe chikibhii ku Galilaya, ngita chakabhalaghalikiye Yecho
MAT 28:17 Pibhammonita Yecho bhajhakunyinamila, nambo bhange pakate jhabhe bhakibha na kiholo.
MAT 28:18 Yecho ajhakwaheghelela pahina na kwalobholela, “Mbatite ukindendeke ghoha kunane kwa Chapanga na pannema pano.
MAT 28:19 Bhahe, nnyendengane mu ilambo yoha mukalitangache Lilobhe lya Chapanga kwa bhando bhoha, makatende kubhehe bhabholwa bhango, kongo mabaticha kwa liina lya Tate na lya Mwana na Uhuke gwa Chapanga.
MAT 28:20 Na kwabhola kughajheketela malobhe ghoha ngita chininaghalikiye mangota. Nenga mii pamonga na mangota kwa machiko ghoha, ade pukupehekeya nnema.”
MAR 1:1 Ghangano ndi Malobhe gha Mbone gha Yecho Kilichitu, Mwana jwa Chapanga.
MAR 1:2 Ikatumbwii ngita chikajhandikwe mukitabo cha nnondole jwa Chapanga Isaya, dolokeya, “Chapanga akalongii, ‘Nanintuma jumbe gwango atengeneche ndela jhino.’
MAR 1:3 Mundo ilalama kanonoho kunjenga, alongila, ‘Ntengeneche ndela jha Bhambo, nnyocha ndela jhake!’ ”
MAR 1:4 Yohane Mbatichajhe ajhakujhenda kunjenga, atangachila bhando na kwabaticha. Abhalobholila bhando, “Muuleke uhakaho na kubatichwa. Chapanga nanekekeya uhakaho gwino.”
MAR 1:5 Bhando bhamahele kuhumii ku kilambo chaku Yudeya na muche gwa ku Yeluchalemo bhakajhahwii kwa Yohane kunyokanikiya na kulonge uhakaho ghubhatehila na jwenio Yohane ajhakwabaticha mulukemba lwa ku Yolodane.
MAR 1:6 Yohane ahwalita magwanda ghighatenganichwe kwa mangoma gha kinyama jwakemitwa ngamiya na luhunga lwa limbendela mukibhuno chake. Na kulye madidima na bhuche.
MAR 1:7 Yohane akatangachii bhando, “Jwahika ngohengohe payeto jhango, jhuna likakala kumbeta nenga, nitope ndeka kujhinama na kubhopo lughojhe lwa maghubache ghake.
MAR 1:8 Nenga nibaticha kwa mache, nambo jwenio jwahika chabaticha kwa Uhuke gwa Chapanga.”
MAR 1:9 Machiko gheniya Yecho akahikite kubhoke ku Nachalete ku kilambo cha ku Galilaya, na kubatichwa na Yohane mulukemba lwa ku Yolodane.
MAR 1:10 Papa tugha Yecho papitita umache, ajhakulibhona lihunde lidindwike, Uhuke gwa Chapanga ujhakuhuluka ngita ngunda.
MAR 1:11 Na lilobhe lya Chapanga kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga, “Lilongila mwenga ndi ma Mwanango jhunimpahile, anganichwe na mwenga.”
MAR 1:12 Papalapala, Uhuke gwa Chapanga ujhakunongocha kujhenda kunjenga.
MAR 1:13 Akatamite kwenio machiko makome ncheche, ajhakujhighanikilwa na Limbembela akibha na inyama ya kumanyahe, nambo akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga bhajhakuntangatila.
MAR 1:14 Yohane patabhitwa mukipungo, Yecho ajhakujhenda ku Galilaya, na kwatangachila bhando Malobhe gha Mbone gha Chapanga.
MAR 1:15 Akalongii, “Machiko gwa Unahota gwa Chapanga ghahikite. Muuleke uhakaho gwino na kuhenga ghambone na kughahobholela Malobhe gha Mbone!”
MAR 1:16 Yecho patyangita umbwane jha ku Galilaya, ajhakwabhona akalongo bhabhele bhapyeya homba Simone na nnongo mundo Anduleya, bhapyehita homba kwa lwaho.
MAR 1:17 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Ungengame nenga nanimmola kwapyeha bhando ngita hele chimupyeya homba.”
