LUK 21:24 Bhange nabhakomwa kwa upanga na bhange nabhapukilwa ngita akapungwa na kupechenganwa mu ilambo yoha. Helahela bhando bhangabhehe bhu ku Yeluchalemo nabhalebheta ade lichiko lyabhe pulipala kuhika.
LUK 21:25 “Peniya napabhaha nginyililo mu lyobha na mu mwehe na mu ndondwa. Bhando bha pannema nabhabha na malagho kwa nhwalo gwa bhoghohe ghuletwa kuhumii mu milindimilo jha mbwane na matuhe ghake gha mache.
LUK 21:26 Bhando nabhahinduka kwa bhoghohe, bhakilola nike chikipala kuukolela nnema, nhwalo ilebhe yoha ya kunane kwa Chapanga nainyukanyuka kwa makakala.
LUK 21:27 Peniya ndi, nabhamona Mwana gwa Mundo akahuluka mumahunde, na makakala na ulumbililo nkolongwa.
LUK 21:28 Puhipala kutumbula kupitila ilebhe yenio, nnyemengane na kujhinula mabhonge ghino kunane, nhwalo ughombokeko gwino ubhandikile.”
LUK 21:29 Peniya Yecho ajhakwalobholela nnandanikiho ghongo, “Mulolekehe nkongo gwa nkojho na mikongo jhenge jhoha.
LUK 21:30 Putumbula kutundula mahamba, mabhene umanye mahuno ghabhandikile.
LUK 21:31 Helahela mangota pumipala kubhona ilebhe yenio ikahengeka umanya kubhehe ndi unahota nkolongwa ubhandikile.
LUK 21:32 “Ninnobholela chakaka, bhando bha kibheluko chenje nabhawe ndeka ade ilebhe yenio ipitile.
LUK 21:33 Kunane kwa Chapanga na nnema nakupeta, nambo malobhe ghango naghapeta ng'o.
LUK 21:34 “Mme miho! Miojho jhino jhikotoka kukamulwa na kuhapa, kulobhela na kupikiya miho ilebhe ya mukilambo mone. Na lichiko nalihikilila kwa kupwitikilila pwitu ngita ntambo pugwijhonja.
LUK 21:35 Nhwalo nalyapwitikilila ngita ntambo bhando bhoha bhibhatama kila chehemo jha nnema.
LUK 21:36 Mukilolekeye na nnyope machiko ghoha na kubhehe likakala lya kujhomboka njelembo kwa mambu gheniya ghoha ghighapala kupitila, na kujhema palonge jha Mwana gwa Mundo.”
LUK 21:37 Machiko ghoha Yecho akibha mukubhola bhando pa Nyumba jha Chapanga, na kilo ajhahwila ku kitombe chuku Micheitune na kutama kwenio.
LUK 21:38 Bhando bhoha bhatehila kulabha kujhenda pa Nyumba jha Chapanga kunnyokanikiya Yecho.
LUK 22:1 Unyagho gwa mabumunda ghangaleke ngedule, jhikemitwa Pachaka piheghelila.
LUK 22:2 Akapiya matambiko bhakolo na bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo bhapaliya ndela jha kinyemela jha kunkoma Yecho, nambo bhajhogwipa bhando.
LUK 22:3 Bhahe, Limbembela lijhakunyingilila Yuda, jwakemitwa Isikaliyote, ndi jhumo jwa bhabholwa bhake bhala kome na bhabhele.
LUK 22:4 Yuda ajhakujhenda kwa akapiya matambiko bhakolo na akalonda Nyumba jha Chapanga, ajhakulonge nabho ndela jha kunnyambii Yecho.
LUK 22:5 Bhene bhajhakuhanganila hake na kulaghalana na Yuda nabhampela mbijha kwa lihengo lyenio.
LUK 22:6 Yuda ajhakujheketila, peniya ndi patumbwila kupalaha ndela jhamaha jha kunnyambila Yecho, lilongo lya bhando changamanya.
LUK 22:7 Bhahe, lichiko lya mabumunda ghangalekela ngedule pulihikita. Lichiko lyenio ndi lichiko lya kuchinja katole kalimbelele kakulye pa Unyagho gwa Pachaka.
LUK 22:8 Peniya Yecho ajhakwatuma Petile na Yohane, ajhakwalobholela, “Nnyendengane mukatulinganikiye chakulye Pachaka.”
LUK 22:9 Bhahe, na bhene pubhankonyita, “Mipala tujhende kojhe tukalenganikiye?”
LUK 22:10 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Unyokanikiye, pumujhingila pabomane nankongana na likambako jwatwekile kihulo cha mache. Jwenio ndi mukengemila ade munyumba jhajhingila.
LUK 22:11 Nkolo nyumba munnobholela, ‘Mmola ankonya, chumbi cha akaghene kibhii kojhe, chakulyegha Pachaka pamonga na bhabholwa bhango?’
LUK 22:12 Jwenio nanangiya chumbi kikolongwa cha ku gholofa chikikilimwe mbone, nnenganikila mwenio.”
LUK 22:13 Bhahe, bhajhakujhenda, na kukikolela kila kilebhe telatela ngita chabhalaghalikiye Yecho, na bhene ndi pibhatumbwila kulenganikiya chakulye Pachaka.
LUK 22:14 Lichaa lya kulyegha puliikita, Yecho ajhakwatola akatenga bhake na kutama nako kulyegha.
LUK 22:15 Ajhakwalobholela bheniya, “Noghii hake kulye Pachaka pamonga na mangota, kabula jha mang'ahiko ghango.
LUK 22:16 Ninnobholela chakaka, nilye ndeka kabhele ade puipala kulenganikiya mu Unahota nkolongwa gwa Chapanga.”
LUK 22:17 Yecho ajhakutola kibaba cha divaye, na kunchenguu Chapanga, alongila, “Mmaghana mabhoha.
LUK 22:18 Ninobholela, kutumbulii ngohe, nanywe jhe kabhele divaye jhenje, ade Unahota nkolongwa gwa Chapanga pala puupala kuhika.”
LUK 22:19 Bhahe, ajhakutola libumunda, ajhakunchenguu Chapanga, ajhakumetula na kwabhaghanichila, alongila, “Jhenjeno ndi yegha jhipelwa mangota. Ntenda naha kwa kungomboka nenga.”
LUK 22:20 Helahela akatei ndalilo, “Ajhakwapekeha kibaba cha divaye alongela, chenjeno ndi kibaba cha lilaghano liyono lya Chapanga lilijhemelelwa na miyahe jhango, jhijhitika kwa nhwalo gwino mangota.
LUK 22:21 “Nambo, umanye! Mundo jwambala kunyambila nenga minako pakiheneko pano!
LUK 22:22 Chakaka Mwana gwa Mundo nahwa ngita chilengankilwe, nambo nalola choto mundo jhola jwapala kunnyambila!”
LUK 22:23 Bhajhakutumbula kukonyana achi bhene chika, ndi ghane pakate jhito jwahipala kuhenga kilebhe chenie.
LUK 22:24 Helahela bhabholwa bhake Yecho bhajhakutumbula mitabho pakate jhabhe ghane jwaholelelwa kubhehe nkolongwa kuliku bhange.
LUK 22:25 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Akanahota akakolonga bha bhando bha ilambo henge ubhalongocha bhando kwa makakala, na bhala bhina ukolonga ukitina liina lya ‘Akakoche bha bhando.’
LUK 22:26 Nambo mangota ghakotoka kulandana na bheniya. Nambo jwabhii nkolongwa pakate jhino abhaha jwandina kuliku bhoha, na kilongoche abhaha mundo jwabhahengela bhoha.
LUK 22:27 Bho, ndi ghane jwabhii nkolongwa? Bho, jwaitama pakulyegha amu jwalenganikiya chakulyegha? Chakaka jhola jwaitama pakulyegha. Nambo nenga mii pakate jhino ngita natumiche.”
LUK 22:28 “Mangota ndi bhuhighalike pamonga na nenga mumang'ahiko ghango.”
LUK 22:29 Ngita Tate, chahagwii nenga kulongocha ngita munahota nkolongwa, na nenga nipelingine mangota hele unahota nkolongwa.
LUK 22:30 Peniya, nanyakila na kunomenekeya pamonga munahota nkolongwa gwango na kutama muigoda ya unahota nkolongwa na kulongocha makabila kome na mabhele gha Ichilahele.
LUK 22:31 Yecho palongila, “Ma Simone, Ma Simone! Jhokanikiya! Limbembela apala kunyembeluya ngita mponga.
LUK 22:32 Nambo nenga ninyope mwenga Simone, hilu kihobholelo chino kikotoka kuhokeka. Na mwenga pumpala kumujhila kabhele matangatila akalongo bhino.”
LUK 22:33 Petile ajhakunnobholela, “Bhambo, nanjino nyeketile kupungwa na mwenga amu bhatukoma tugha pamonga kilebhe jhe!”
LUK 22:34 Yecho ngalongila, “Ninnobholela ma Petile, lijhogholo nakubhekajhe naunganila patato.”
LUK 22:35 Peniya Yecho ajhakwakonya bhabholwa bhake, “Bho, punitumingina changaghegha mbijha amu lihako amu changahwala maghubache nike mukapongokiwe?” Bhajhakujhanguu, “Tukapongokiwe ndeka kilebhe.”
LUK 22:36 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Nambo kutumbuli ngoheno, mundo jwabhii na mbijha aghegha, na jwabhii na lihako helahela aghegha. Na jhola jwanga mbopo akachuluche ngobho yake na ajhende akahemela mbopo jhimo.
LUK 22:37 Nhwalo ghabhii lengalenga mu Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge, ‘Na jwenio nabhalangilwa pamonga na bhando bhibhatenda ghanganandela.’ Ninnobholela ghoha ghughajhandikwe kwa nhwalo gwa nenga ghapile ghapitile.”
LUK 22:38 Bhabholwa bhake ngabhanongolila, “Bhambo, dola pambano ibhii mbopo ibhele.” Jwenio Yecho ngajhangwila, “Bhahe, ikwela!”
LUK 22:39 Yecho ajhakubhoka ngita chakayobhalile, na kujhenda ku kitombe chuku Micheitune na bhabholwa bhake bhajhakubhehe pamonga.
LUK 22:40 Pubhahikita kwenio, ajhakwalobholela bhabholwa bhake, “Munyopengane Chapanga, nkotoka kujhingii mumajhighanikilo.”
LUK 22:41 Peniya ajhakwaleka, na kujhenda kutale ngita mundo ajhuhite lighanga kuliponile. Na kutama makilikite anyopa Chapanga,
LUK 22:42 alongila, “Ma Tate, anda mipala umokehe kibaba chenjeno cha malagho. Nambo chi ngita chinipala nenga, nambo ngita chimipala mabhene.”
LUK 22:43 Bhahe, ntumiche jwa kunane kwa Chapanga, ajhakupitila na kukangamalicha.
LUK 22:44 Yecho nhwalo akibha mulipyanda, ajhakunyopa hake Chapanga. Lihuke lyake likibha ngita mandonye gha miyahe ghahololila pahe.
LUK 22:45 Pajhomolila kunnyopa Chapanga, ajhakwajhendela bhabholwa bhake. Ajhakwakolela bhagholwike, nhwalo gwa ungolongonde.
LUK 22:46 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Nhwalo gwa nike migholoka? Jhimukana munyopengane Chapanga, nkotoka kujhingii mumajhighanikilo.”
LUK 22:47 Pajhendilila kulonge, lilongo lya bhando lijhakupitila kongo lilongochwa na Yuda, jwakibha jhumo jwa bhabholwa bhake bhala kome na bhabhele. Ajhakuheghelela Yecho na kunkumbatila.
LUK 22:48 Nambo Yecho ajhakunnobholela, “Yuda, nhwalo gwa nike munyambi Mwana gwa Mundo kwa kunkumbatila?”
LUK 22:49 Bhabholwa bhake bhala bhalolikiya ghughapala kupitila bhajhakunnobholela, “Bhambo, bho, twapyeke kwa mbopo?”
LUK 22:50 Jhumo pakate jhabhe ajhakuntyala ntumiche jwa Mpiya litambiko nkolo, na kuheketa lichikilo lyake lya lubhoko lwalelo.
LUK 22:51 Nambo Yecho palongila, “Nkoto kuhenga kabhele!” Ajhakupapaa lichikilo lya mundo jhola, ajhakulama.
LUK 22:52 Peniya Yecho ajhakwalobholela Akapiya matambiko bhakolo na ilongoche ya ulonda gwa Nyumba jha Chapanga na ighogholo bhubhakahikite kunkamula, “Bho, uhikingine na indukwa na mbopo, pimihambuka nenga nipoka ilebhe kwa makakala?
LUK 22:53 Machiko ghoha ndamita na mangota mwenga pa Nyumba jha Chapanga mukangamwi ndeka. Nambo lende ndi lichaa lya makakala gha lubhendo, kulongocha.”
LUK 22:54 Peniya bhajhakunkamula Yecho na kujhenda nako ade ku nyumba jha Mpiya litambiko nkolo. Petile akengemila kachoko chukutale.
LUK 22:55 Pakate jha mulwane lwa nyumba bhakakungine mwotu, na bhoha bhajhakutamangana peniya kujhota, na jwenio Petile akibha pakate jhabhe.
LUK 22:56 Ntumiche jhumo mwikeghe pamonita Petile aheghelii pahina jha mwotu, ajhakuningukiya na kulonge, “Mundo hojho chakaka akibha pamonga na Yecho!”
LUK 22:57 Nambo Petile ajhakunkanila, alongila, “Gwe majhe, niumanyite jwenio!”
LUK 22:58 Machaa pughachochita kujhenda, mundo jhonge, ajhakubhona Petile na jwenio ngalongila, “Mwenga ndi jhumo pakate jhabhe!” Nambo Petile pajhangwila, “Munahota, ne ndeka!”
LUK 22:59 Lichaa limo pulipetita, mundo jhonge ajhakupitila na kulonge helahela, “Chakaka mundo jhonjo bhahwelita pamonga na jwenio, helahela ahumii ku Galilaya!”
LUK 22:60 Nambo Petile pajhangwila, “Gwe mundo, chimulongela nikimanyi ndeka!” Palongela gheniya, lijhogholo lijhakubheka.
LUK 22:61 Bhambo Yecho ajhakughalambukila na kunnolekeya Petile. Peniya ndi Petile pakombwika malobhe ghalongila Bhambo ghala, “Deleno lijhogholo na kubhekajhe, naungannila patato.”
LUK 22:62 Petile ajhakupita panja jha ubhegho na kulela kwa ungolongonde.
LUK 22:63 Bhando bhubhanendelila Yecho bhala, bhajhakuntende chanake na bhajhakuntyala.
LUK 22:64 Bhahibhite miho kwa kitambala, kone bhankonyita, “Nnotele! Bho, ghane jwatyalite?”
LUK 22:65 Peniya bhajhakulonge malobhe twe gha kunigha.
LUK 22:66 Pukuchila tugha, ighogholo na akapiya matambiko bhakolo na bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo bhajhakukonganika pamonga, bhajhakumpeleka Yecho pa bwalo jha Kiyahude.
LUK 22:67 Ngabhannobhalila, “Bho, mutulobholele, mwenga ndi Kilichitu Nkomboche?” Nambo Yecho ngabhajhangwila, “Hilu ninnobholele, mangota naunyangula jhe.
LUK 22:68 Anda nikonyite, naunyangula ndeka.
LUK 22:69 Nambo kutumbuli ngoheno na kujhendelela, Mwana gwa Mundo natama lubhoko lwalelo lwa Chapanga jwabhii na makakala.”
LUK 22:70 Peniya bhoha bhajhakunkonya, “Bho, mwenga ndi Mwana gwa Chapanga?” Jwenio Yecho ngabhajhangwila, “Chakaka, ngita chimulongela.”
LUK 22:71 Bhene bhajhakulonge, “Bho, tupala mundo jhonge alonge panane jha mambu ghake? Twabhete tujhohine malobhe ghalongila jwenio!”
LUK 23:1 Bhahe, lilongo lyoha lya bhando bhajhakumpeleka Yecho palonge jha Pilatu.
LUK 23:2 Bhajhakutumbula kuntakalila bhalongila, “Tumwehine mundo hojho abhahobhecha bhando bhito. Na kabhele abhahibhilikiya bhando bhakotoka kupiya kode kwa munahota nkolongwa jwa ku Loma, na jwenio akikema ndi Kilichitu, Munahota nkolongwa.”
LUK 23:3 Pilatu ajhakunkonya Yecho, “Bho, mwenga ndi Munahota nkolongwa jwa Akayahude?” Yecho ngajhangwila, “Chakaka mwenga ndi milongela.”
LUK 23:4 Peniya Pilatu ajhakwalobholela akapiya matambiko bhakolo na lilongo lya bhando, “Nikihwene ndeka chalemwite mundo jhonjone.”
LUK 23:5 Nambo bhene bhajhakukangamala bhalongila, “Kwa mabholo ghake abhakokolekeya bhando bhataungane na unahota nkolongwa gwa ku Yudeya. Atumbulii ku Galilaya ade kongo.”
LUK 23:6 Pilatu pajhohina gheniya, ajhakukonya Yecho, “Bho, mundo jhonjo jwa ku Galilaya?”
LUK 23:7 Pilatu pamanyita Yecho ahumii ku kilambo chikilongochwa na Helode, ndi ajhakupeleka kwa Helode, jwakibha ku Yeluchalemo kwa machiko gheniya.
LUK 23:8 Helode pamwonita Yecho akahanganii hake nhwalo kwa machiko ghamahele apata ammone, akajhohine malobhe ghake, akibha ahobholila Yecho ahenge ilebhe ya kukangacha.
LUK 23:9 Bhahe, Helode ajhakunkonya machwale ghamahele, nambo Yecho akajhangwii jhe.
LUK 23:10 Akapiya matambiko bhakolo na bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo bhubhajhemita peniya, bhajhakughagha kwa likakala Yecho atakalilwe.
LUK 23:11 Bhahe, Helode na akakomana ngondo bhake bhajhakuntendela Yecho ghanganandela na chanake, peniya bhajhakuwalicha ngobho yambone ngita munahota nkolongwa na kumujhicha kwa Pilatu.
LUK 23:12 Kuhumii peniya, Helode na Pilatu bhajhakubhehe maghumba nde, nambo makacho bhakibha mu maghonga.
LUK 23:13 Pilatu ajhakwakema pamonga akapiya matambiko bhakolo na ilongoche ya bhando,
LUK 23:14 peniya ajhakwalobholela, “Munetite mundo jhonjo kwa nenga ngita mundo jwahobhecha bhando bhakomane na unahota nkolongwa gwa ku Loma. Nenga nikonyite palonge jhino, nambo kibhiijhe chalemwite mu matakalilo ghake.
LUK 23:15 Jwenio Helode atubhujhichile helahela twenga, nhwalo akiwejhe chalemwite. Peniya mundo hojho atehi ndeka kilebhe chochoha chikimpala akomwe.
LUK 23:16 Bhahe, nanichwapula luyato lwa ndomondo na kunekekehe ajhende.”
LUK 23:17 Nhwalo Pilatu achokolikiya adindulile mpungwa jhumo paunyagho gwa Pachaka.
LUK 23:18 Nambo lilongo lyoha lya bhando lijhakunonoha malobhe, “Mumohe pamba! Na mutudindulile Balaba!”
LUK 23:19 Balaba akatabhitwe mukipungo kwa kuhenga majhoghe ghighakapitile kubomane helahela nhwalo gwa kukoma bhando.
LUK 23:20 Bhahe, Pilatu akapahile kunekekeya Yecho, peniya ndi ngalongila nabho kabhele.
LUK 23:21 Nambo bhene bhajhakuchocha kunonoha malobhe, “Mumambe panchala! Mumambe pachalaba!”
LUK 23:22 Bhahe, Pilatu ajhakulonge mala jha utato na kwakonya, “Bho, nhwalo gwa nike? Bho, kilebhe ghane chalemwihe mundo hojho? Nikihwe ndeka chalemwite chikimpala akomwe. Bhahe, nanichwapula luyato lwa ndomondo na kunekekeya ajhende.”
LUK 23:23 Nambo bhajhakujhendelela kuchobhela hake, bhapata Yecho abhambwe panchalaba. Na kwa kuchobhela kwabhe bhajhakuntenda Pilatu ajheketele.
LUK 23:24 Bhahe, Pilatu ajhakulonge, unhenge ngita chimipala kuhenga.
LUK 23:25 Ajhakwadindulila mundo jhola jhubhampalita, jwakibha mukipungo kwa nhwalo gwa kuhenga majhoghe na kukoma, na kumpiya Yecho bhantende ngita chibhapala.
LUK 23:26 Pibhakibha bhampelika, bhajhakukongana na mundo jhumo liina lyake Simone jwabhelekilwe kuchenda jha ku Kilene, jwahumila kunng'onda. Bhajhakunkamula na kungheghecha nchalaba pahyeto jha Yecho.
LUK 23:27 Lilongo likolongwa lya bhando lijhakunkengama Yecho, pamonga na akakeghe bhibhakibha bhakwindikina na kunnelela Yecho.
LUK 23:28 Nambo Yecho ajhakwaghalambukila na kwalobholela, “Makakeghe bhu ku Yeluchalemo! Nkotoka kunelela nenga, mukilelela mabhene na yana hino.
LUK 23:29 Nhwalo machiko naghabhandikila, bhando nabhalongila, ‘Mbaha kwa mwikeghe jhola jwangamwana, na ntonga, hilu mabhele ghangajhongecha!’
LUK 23:30 Lichaa lyenio, ndi bhando nabhatumbula kulonge, itombe, ‘Mututilukile!’ Na ihogholo ‘Mutuyekelele!’
LUK 23:31 Anda bhando bhautendi naha nkongo mmehe, bho, naibhaha bhole kwa nkongo nnyomo?”
LUK 23:32 Helahela bhajhakwatola bhando bhabhele bhibhatenda ghanganandela, bhakapelikwe bhakomwe pamonga na Yecho.
LUK 23:33 Pubhahikita chehemo jhikemwa, “Libhonge lya muto,” peniya ndi bhajhakumamba Yecho pamonga na bhibhatehila ghanganandela kila jhumo na nchalaba gwake, jhumo lubhoko lwalelo na jhonge lubhoko lwa ngejha lwa Yecho.
LUK 23:34 Yecho palongila, “Tate gwango, mwalekekehe nhwalo bhamanyite jhe chibhatenda.” Peniya akalonda bhala bhajhakubhaghana ngobho yake kwa kahumbuumbu nnobhole.
LUK 23:35 Bhando bhibhakajhemite peniya kulolekeya, na bhene ilongoche ya Kiyahude bhantendela chanake. Bhalongila, “Abhakombwila bhando bhange, akikombole jwenio, anda jwenio ndi Kilichitu Nkomboche jwahaghulilwe na Chapanga!”
LUK 23:36 Helahela akakomana ngondo bhajhakuntendela chanake, bhajhakuheghelela na kumpekeya divaye jhibhabha,
LUK 23:37 bhalongila, “Anda chakaka mwenga ndi Munahota nkolongwa jwa Akayahude, mukikombole mabhene!”
LUK 23:38 Na panane jha nchalaba gwake pakajhandikwe malobhe ghanga, “Jhonjo ndi Munahota Nkolongwa jwa Akayahude.”
LUK 23:39 Mwihe jhumo pakate jha bhala bhabhele ajhakunigha Yecho, alongila, “Bho, mwenga ndi Kilichitu? Mukikombole mabhene na mutukombole na twenga!”
LUK 23:40 Nambo mwihe jhonge jhola ajhakupwatalila nnyake anongolila, “Gwe bhole, munendema jhe Chapanga? Na mabhene bhahadabwii ngita jwenio.
LUK 23:41 Mwenga na nenga bhatuadabwii chipalwa, tupokile malepo ghaghala ghutuhengita. Nambo mundo hojho kibhiijhe kilebhe chalemwite.”
LUK 23:42 Peniya nganongolila Yecho, “Yecho, ungotoka kunyehwa pumipala kubhehe Munahota nkolongwa gwino!”
LUK 23:43 Yecho ngajhangwila, “Ninobholela chakaka, kutumbulii ngoheno, natubhaha pamonga na nenga chehemo jha kukangacha jhikemwa ku pepo.”
LUK 23:44 Bhahe, Pihikila muhe jha chaa chita, lubhendo lujhakukamulana tyoo pa kilambo choha ade chaa ticha.
LUK 23:45 Peniya lipanjiya lilihibhikiya pa Nyumba jha Chapanga lijhakujwepuka jwee ipande ibhele kutumbulii kunane ade pahe.
LUK 23:46 Yecho ajhakubohoma kanonoha, “Tate gwango, mu mabhoko ghino nibheka uhuke gwango!” Palongila gheniya, ajhakubhehe kakalile.
LUK 23:47 Jhola nkolo jwa bhakomana ngondo palolita ghighatendika peniya, ajhakunnomba Chapanga alongila, “Chakaka mundo jhonjo akibha jwaumbone!”
LUK 23:48 Bhahe, lilongo lyoha lya bhando pubhalolita ghighakatindike, bhajhakujhenda bhabhii ngolongonde hake.
LUK 23:49 Nambo bhando bhoha bhubhakamanyite Yecho bhalingulila chukutale, bhaghalolekehe mambu ghanga. Pakate jhabhe bhakibha akakeghe bhalongohina nabho kuhumii ku Galilaya.
LUK 23:50 Pakibha na mundo jhumo liina lyake Uchupo, kuhumii ku muche gwa Alimataya ku chenda jha ku Yudeya. Akibha jhumo jwa nkolo jwaumbone pa Bwalo jha Akayahude.
LUK 23:51 Nambo ahumii ku Alimataya, akajheketii jhe mambu gha pa Bwalo jha Akayahude pubhapata kunkoma Yecho na pubhalenganikiya kuhenga lyenio. Jwenio alolila machaa gha Chapanga pantumita munahota nkolongwa gwake kuhika kulongocha.
LUK 23:52 Bhahe, Uchupo ajhakujhenda kwa Pilatu kunnyopa atole malelo gha Yecho.
LUK 23:53 Ajhakuhulua malelo ghala kuhumii panane jha panchalaba, ajhakubhilingilila chanda ajhakughoneka umambe jhibhahokonyolile palindalabho, na mambe jhene ikibhajhe na malelo.
LUK 23:54 Iikibha lichiko lya Ijumaa ndi libhandikila lichiko lya kutumbula Kupomolela.
LUK 23:55 Akakeghe bhala bhubhalongohina na Yecho kuhumii ku Galilaya bhajhakunkengama Uchupo na bhajhakubhona mambe na yegha jha Yecho chibhekwite.
LUK 23:56 Peniya pibhakelewika kajhabhe bhakalenganikiye mahuta ghighanungalila petelele. Na Lichiko lya Kupomolela, bhajhakutama hele ngita Lilaghalikilo chililaghalikiye.
LUK 24:1 Lichiko lya jumapile, putiputi akakeghe bhajhakughegha mahuta ghighanungila petelele ghibhakalenganikiye na kujhenda nagho ku mambe.
LUK 24:2 Bhajhakulikolela lighanga lela lya kuyekelela mambe libhilimbiwe kuupele jha mambe.
LUK 24:3 Nambo pubhajhingila nkate mu mambe, bhakaiwe ndeka yegha jha Bhambo Yecho.
LUK 24:4 Pubhajhendilila kukangacha nhwalo gwa kilebhe chenie, pahina jhabhe papa bhakajhemite bhando bhabhele bhibhawalalii ngobho nhuo ya mbuu.
LUK 24:5 Akakeghe bhala bhajhakutumbula kulendema, bhajhakulita pahe. Peniya bhando bhala pubhalongila, “Nhwalo gwa nike mipalaha jwabhii na ughome pakate jha bhubhawile?
LUK 24:6 Abhii jhe pambano, ayokite! Nkomboke channobholila pakibha amela ku Galilaya.
LUK 24:7 ‘Mwana gwa Mundo nakamulwa na bhando bhibhabhii na uhakaho, na bhene nabhamamba pa nchalaba na lichiko lyutato nayoka.’ ”
LUK 24:8 Peniya, ndi akakeghe bhala pibhakombwika malobhe ghalongila Yecho,
LUK 24:9 pubhabhujhita kuhumii ku mambe, bhajhakulonge mambu ghanga ghoha ghughapitile kwa bhabholwa bhake kome na jhumo bha Yecho na bhando bhange.
LUK 24:10 Akakeghe bhubhahikita kulonge gheniya kwa akatenga, akibha Maliya jwahumila ku kilambo chaku Magidala na Yoane na Maliya majhe mundo Yakobu, pamonga na akakeghe bhange bhubhakalongohine nabho.
LUK 24:11 Nambo bhabholwa bhala bhajhakughapucha malobhe. Bhahe, bhakajheketile jhe.
LUK 24:12 Nambo Petile akajhenda mbelo ade ku mambe. Ajhakulita kulingukiya nkate, ajhakubhona nga ngobho jha malelo tugha. Peniya ngabhujhita ukajha kongo abhii hechu kwa gheniya ghughapitile.
LUK 24:13 Lichiko lele, bhabholwa bhabhele bha Yecho bhakibha mu kutyanga bhajhawila kuchenda jhimo jhikemwa ku Emau chikibhii utale kilomita kome na jhimo kuhumii ku Yeluchalemo.
LUK 24:14 Bhakibha na malongeche gha ilebhe yoha itendike.
LUK 24:15 Pubhajhendilila na malongeche ghabhe na kukikonya, Yecho jwenio ndi pabhandikila na kulongohana nabho pamonga.
LUK 24:16 Bhene bhakamwene kwa miho ghabhe, nambo bhakaumanyite jhe.
LUK 24:17 Yecho ajhakwakonya, “Mangota milongolelana nike, kongo mmii mu kutyanga?” Na bhene bhajhakujhema, kumiho jhabhe kujhakungamala kwa ungolongonde.
LUK 24:18 Mundo jhumo pakate jhabhe, liina lyake Kiliopa, ajhakunyangula, “Bho, mwe maghene kanjika chino pa muche gwa ku Yeluchalemo, umanyite ndeka ilebhe itendike machiko gha pahina ghano?”
LUK 24:19 Jwenio ngakonyita, “Ilebhe ghane kabhele?” Na bhene ngabhajhangwila, “Ilebhe ipambalikine Yecho jwa ku Nachalete. Mundo jwenio akibha nnondole jhuna likakala lya kuhenga na kubhola palonge jha Chapanga na kwa bhando bhoha.
LUK 24:20 Akapiya matambiko na ilongoche hito bhajhakukamua kwa bhakolo bhu ku Loma bhahadabwii akomwe, na bhene bhajhakumamba panchalaba.
LUK 24:21 Nambo twenga tukahobholile jwenio ndi jwa kuhighombola Ichilahele! Kuchocha kwa gheniya deleno ndi lichiko lyutato kuhumii pubhatehila ilebhe yenio.
LUK 24:22 Helahela akakeghe bhange kuhumii pakate jhito bhajhakutukangacha. Putiputi bhajhakujhenda ku mambe,
LUK 24:23 nambo bhakaikoli ndeka yegha jha Yecho. Bhajhakukelebhuka na kutulongelela bhapitilwe na akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga, alongila Yecho abhii ghome.
LUK 24:24 Bhajhito bhange bhakajhenda ku mambe bhajhakulola ghala ghighalongilwa na akakeghe, nambo jwenio bhakamwe ndeka.”
LUK 24:25 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Mangota mwenga mupumbumwike naha! Mijheketela kachoko kachoko ghoha ghighalongoleka na milondole bha Chapanga!
LUK 24:26 Bho, ikampala ndeka Kilichitu kubhehe mulung'ahe, na peniya ndi ajhingila mu ukolo gwake?”
LUK 24:27 Bhahe, peniya ndi pajhendilila kwachimulila mbone mambu ghoha gwa jwenio hotuhotu ghughabhii mu Majhandiko gha Chapanga, kutumbulila itabo ijhandikwe na Mucha ade mu itabo henge ya milondole bha Chapanga.
LUK 24:28 Pubhabhandikila kuhika pa chenda jhene, Yecho ajhakutenda anda atenda kupetelecha.
LUK 24:29 Nambo bhene bhajhakupembelekeya chonde, “Uhighalike pamonga na twenga, nhwalo lyobha litipike na lubhendo lutumbwile.” Ajhakujhenda nkate na kutama.
LUK 24:30 Patamita pahe na kulye nabho, ajhakutola libumunda na kunchenguu Chapanga, na kuumetula na kwapekeya ajhake.
LUK 24:31 Papalapala miho ghabhe ghajhakudindulilwa, bhajhakumanya, nambo jwenio ajhakwaghala pakate jhabhe.
LUK 24:32 Bhahe, bhajhakukonyana, “Bho, miojho jhito ikananamwike jhe pakibha achimulila mu Majhandiko gha Chapanga mundela mola?”
LUK 24:33 Papalapala bhajhakubhoka na kubhujha ku Yeluchalemo. Bhajhakwakolela bhabholwa kome na jhumo bha Yecho na bhando bhange bhibhakibha pamonga na bhene.
LUK 24:34 Bhalongila, “Chakaka Bhambo ayokite! Akongine na Simone!”
LUK 24:35 Bhahe, bhando bhala bhabhele bhajhakulonge ilebhe ipitile undela, na pubhamanyita Yecho pametwila libumunda.
LUK 24:36 Pubhakibha mukulonge gheniya, Yecho jwenio akajhemite pakate jhabhe na kwalobholela, “Ntamengane kwa uteeke.”
LUK 24:37 Bhene bhajhakuchituka hake na kujhoghopa bhahambwika pange bhalihwene lihoka.
LUK 24:38 Nambo Yecho ngalongila, “Nhwalo gwa nike mijhoghopa? Nhwalo gwa nike mme na kiholo kumwojho gwino?
LUK 24:39 Nninge mabhanga gha mu mabhoko ghango na mabhanga gha mu makongono ghango, naumanya kubhehe ndi nenga. Umbapahe mmone, nhwalo lihoka likwetejhe yegha hilu mihupa ngita chiunolekeya.”
LUK 24:40 Pajhomolila kulonge naha, ajhakwalangiya mabhanga gha mu mabhoko pamonga na mabhanga gha mu makongono ghake.
LUK 24:41 Pubhakibha bhamela nakujheketela nhwalo gwa mukuhangana na kukangacha kwabhe. Yecho pakonyita, “Bho, kibhii chakulyegha pambano?”
LUK 24:42 Bhahe, bhajhakupekeha kimbembela chuluhomba lubhatutwihe.
LUK 24:43 Ajhakutola na kulyegha, kongo bhoha bhabhii kulola.
LUK 24:44 Peniya ajhakwalobholela, “Ghangano ndi mambu ghininongolila punikibha na mangota: Imbalita kutimila ghala ghoha ghighajhandikwe kwa nenga mu lilaghalikilo lya Mucha, na mu itabo ya milondole bha Chapanga, na Zabule.”
LUK 24:45 Bhahe, ajhakwatenda malango ghabhe ghahoto kumanya mbone Majhandiko gha Chapanga.
LUK 24:46 Ajhakwalobholela, “Ijhandikwe naha, Kilichitu Nkomboche natendwa kung'ahichwa na pa lichiko lya utato nayoka.
LUK 24:47 Kwa liina lyake, ilambo yoha kutumbulila ku Yeluchalemo itangachilwe kubhehe bhando bhipalwa kuleka na kulekekewa uhakaho.
LUK 24:48 Mangota mipalwa kwalobholela bhando kubhehe mambu ghanga ndi uchakaka.
LUK 24:49 Namwete naninetelangana jhola Tate gwango jhalaghalikiye kuntuma. Nambo uhighalike pa muche ade papala kumpekehe likakala kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga.”
LUK 24:50 Peniya Yecho pabhalongwicha bhabholwa bhake kuhumii ku Yeluchalemo ade ku Betaniya, ajhakujhinula mabhoko ghake na kwape mota.
LUK 24:51 Pakibha mu kwape mota, ajhakwaleka, ajhakutolwa kujhenda kunane kwa Chapanga.
LUK 24:52 Bhene bhajhakunyinamila, kabhele bhajhakukelebhuka ku Yeluchalemo, kongo bhabhii mu kuhangana hake.
LUK 24:53 Helahela bhajhendilila kupipikiya pa Nyumba jha Chapanga, kongo bhannombita Chapanga.
JOH 1:1 Peniya makacho kabula jha kupanganwa kwa ilebhe, jhumo jwakemitwa Lilobhe akibha. Na jwenio Lilobhe atamita na Chapanga, na jwenio akibha ndi Chapanga.
JOH 1:2 Kuhumii makacho atamita na Chapanga kabula jha Chapanga kupangana kilebhe chochoha.
JOH 1:3 Chapanga akapangine ilebhe yoha kupete kwa jwenio, changabhehe jwenio kibhii jhe kilebhe chochoha chikapanginwe.
JOH 1:4 Jwenio akibha lihembuko lya ughome, na gwenio ughome uletite lumule kwa bhando.
JOH 1:5 Na lwenio lumule lung'ala pa lubhendo, na lubhendo luluhotwi ndeka kuluhima.
JOH 1:6 Chapanga akatumite mundo jhumo, liina lyake Yohane.
JOH 1:7 Yohane akahikite kwalobholela bhando malobhe gha lumule, bhando bhoha bhajhohe na bhalujheketii lumule lwenio.
JOH 1:8 Yohane jwenio akibha lumule jhe, nambo akahikite kwalobholela bhando mana jha lumule lwenio.
JOH 1:9 Lwenio lumule lwa uchakaka, ndi lumule luluhika pannema pano na kwamulikila bhando bhoha.
JOH 1:10 Lilobhe jhola akibha pannema na kupete kwa jwenio Chapanga akapangine nnema, nambo bhando bha pannema bhakaumanyite ndeka.
JOH 1:11 Akahikite kwa bhando bhake jwenio, nambo bhando bhake bhakankanite.
JOH 1:12 Nambo bhando bhoha bhibhampokii na kunyeketela, ajhakwape ukindendeke gwa kubhehe yana ya Chapanga.
JOH 1:13 Bhabhii yana ya Chapanga chi kwa kubhelukwa ngita bhando chibhabhelukwa, amu kwa likakala lya yegha, amu chi kwa uhotolo gwa mundo, nambo kwa uhotolo gwa Chapanga jwenie.
JOH 1:14 Na Lilobhe jwenio ajhakubhehe mundo, na jwenio ajhakutama pamonga na twenga. Na twenga tumwene ung'alicho gwake, ung'alicho gwa Mwana jwa kanjika, jwahikite kuhumii kwa Tate Chapanga, atwelii hoko umbone na uchakaka.
JOH 1:15 Yohane akalongile malobhe gha mundo jwenio, alongila kwa lilobhe likolongwa, “Jhonjo ndi jhuninongila panane jhake, ‘Ahika mundo jhumo kuyeto jhango ndi nkolongwa kupeta nenga, nhwalo akibha nenga nandumbo jhe.’ ”
JOH 1:16 Kwa nhwalo gwa umbone gwake gwamahele, twenga tuchochite kupoke mota hake.
JOH 1:17 Chapanga akatupekiye Lilaghalikilo lyake kwa kupete Mucha, nambo na umbone na uchakaka utuhikilila kupete kwa ndela jha Yecho Kilichitu.
JOH 1:18 Abhii ng'o mundo jhojhoha jwamwene Chapanga. Nambo Mwana jwa kanjika jwabhii Chapanga na jwapahilwe na Tate, ndi jwatulobholila malobhe gheniya gha Chapanga.
JOH 1:19 Ghanga ndi malobhe ghalongila Yohane Mbatichajhe, pakibha na ilongoche ya Akayahude ku Yeluchalemo kola pabhatumitwa akapiya matambiko na Akalawe, bhankonye Yohane, “Mwenga ndi ma ghane?”
JOH 1:20 Yohane ajhakujheketela na ajhakujhanguu hotuhotu changayatila, ajhakulonge, “Nenga na Kilichitu Nkomboche ndeka.”
JOH 1:21 Bhajhakunkonya, “Bhahe, mutulobholele mwenga ndi ma ghane? Bho, mwenga ndi ma Eliya?” Yohane ajhakujhanguu, “Nai jhe, ne ndeka.” Bhajhakunkonya kabhele. “Bho, mwenga ndi jhola nnondole jwa Chapanga?” Na jwenio pajhangwila, “Ne jhe!”
JOH 1:22 Bhahe, bhajhakunkonya, “Bho, ngohe majhito maghane? Bho, ngohe mabhene milonge nike panane jhino? Mutulobholele, na twenga twalobholela bhala bhibhatutumita tunkonye.”
JOH 1:23 Yohane ajhakujhanguu ngita chalongila nnondole jwa Chapanga Isaya, “Nenga ‘Ndi lilobhe lya mundo jwaikema kunjenga, Nnenganikiye ndela jha Bhambo jhaipala kupeta.’ ”
JOH 1:24 Peniya Mapwalichayo bhibhakatumitwe,
JOH 1:25 bhajhakunkonya Yohane, “Anda mwe ma Kilichitu amu ma Eliya jhe amu jhola nnondole jwa Chapanga jhe, nhwalo gwa nike mibaticha bhando?”
JOH 1:26 Yohane ajhakujhanguu, “Nenga nibaticha kwa mache, nambo pakate jhino abhii mundo jhumo manaumanya jhe.
JOH 1:27 Ndi jwenio jwahika kuyeto jhango, nambo nenga nitope ndeka hilu kubhopo lughojhe lwa maghubache ghake.”
JOH 1:28 Ghanga ghoha ghatendika ku muche gwa ku Betaniya, kwiye jha lilabha lya ku Yolodane, kwakibha Yohane abaticha.
JOH 1:29 Kilabho jhake, Yohane ajhakummona Yecho auhikilila, ajhakulonge, “Jhonjo ndi litohe lya limbelele lya Chapanga, jwatola uhakaho gwa bhando bha nnema!
JOH 1:30 Jhonjo ndi jhunongila malobhe panane jhake, nongila ‘Kuyeto jhango ahika mundo nkolongwa kupeta nenga, nhwalo akibha nenga nandumbo jhe.’
JOH 1:31 Nenga namwete nikaumanyi jhe, nambo hikite kubaticha kwa mache nipala bhando bha ku Ichilahele bhaumanye.”
JOH 1:32 Yohane akalongi malobhe ghala ghaghawene, “Nimwene Uhuke gwa Chapanga ahuluka ngita ngunda kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga na kutolela panane jhake.
JOH 1:33 Nenga hele nikaumanye jhe, nambo jhola jwandumita kwabaticha bhando kwa mache jwanobholile naha, ‘Mundo jhola jhumipala kummona Uhuke gwa Chapanga kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga na kubhehe panane jhake, jwenio ndi jwabaticha kwa Uhuke gwa Chapanga.’ ”
JOH 1:34 Peniya Yohane ajhakulonge, “Nenga nolite kwa miho ghango na chakaka ninnobholela kubhehe jhonjo ndi Mwana jwa Chapanga.”
JOH 1:35 Lichiko lyubhele jhake, Yohane akibha ajhemite peniya pamonga na bhabholwa bhake bhabhele chehemo jwenio.
JOH 1:36 Pamonita Yecho akityanga, ajhakulonge, “Dola, jhonjo ndi Litohe lya Limbelele lya Chapanga!”
JOH 1:37 Bhabholwa bhabhele bhala pibhannyohina Yohane akalongila naha, bhajhakunkengama Yecho.
JOH 1:38 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakughalambuka, ajhakwabhona bhabholwa bheniya bhitenda kunkengama, ajhakwakonya, “Bho, mipala nike?” Na bhene bhajhakunyanguu, “Labe, kajhino kojhe?” Labe mana jhake Mmola.
JOH 1:39 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Nhwike mupalinge.” Jhakibha cha kome jha kimihe bhabholwa pibhajhahwila kupalinga chehemo jhatamita Yecho, bhajhakupipikiya bhoha lichiko lyenio.
JOH 1:40 Anduleya, nnongo mundo Simone Petile, akibha jhumo jha bhala bhabhele bhibhakanyohine Yohane akalongila gheniya, ajhakunkengama Yecho.
JOH 1:41 Anduleya ajhakumpalaha nhwacha mundo Simone, ajhakulonge, “Tumwehine Machiya.” Ndi kulonge Kilichitu Nkomboche.
JOH 1:42 Peniya Anduleya ajhakuntola Simone na ajhakumpeleka kwa Yecho. Yecho ajhakunnolekeya na ngalongila, “Mwenga ndi ma Simone mwana gwa Yohane, nambo ngohe nankemwa Kefa.” Kefa kwa Kigilike Petile, ndi kulonge lindalabho.
JOH 1:43 Lichiko lyubhele jhake Yecho ajhakubhoka na kujhenda ku Galilaya. Na kwenio ajhakummona Filipu, ajhakunnobholela, “Ungengame.”
JOH 1:44 Jwenio Filipu akibha abhelukilwe ku muche gwa ku Betisaida, muche gwahumii Anduleya na Petile.
JOH 1:45 Filipu ajhakummona Natanaele, ajhakunnobholela, “Tumwene mundo jhola Mucha jwakanyandike mukitabo cha Lilaghalikilo, na helahela milondole bha Chapanga bhakajhandike malobhe ghake. Jwenio ndi Yecho, jwahumii ku muche gwa ku Nachalete Mwana jwa Uchupo.”
JOH 1:46 Bhahe, Natanaele ajhakunkonya Filipu, “Bho, pumihambuka kilebhe chambone kihoto kubhoke ku Nachalete?” Filipu ngajhangwila, “Nhwike nninge.”
JOH 1:47 Yecho pamonita Natanaele itende kuhikilila, ajhakulonge, “Dola, jwenio ndi mwi Ichilahele jwa chakaka, anawahi jhe kunkopokeya mundo jhojhoha!”
JOH 1:48 Natanaele ajhakunkonya, “Umanyita bhole nenga?” Yecho ajhakujhanguu “Kabula jha Filipu kunkema nikamwene pimikibha pahe jha nkongo gwa nkojho.”
JOH 1:49 Peniya Natanaele ajhakunyanguu, “Mmola, mwenga chakaka ndi Mwana gwa Chapanga! Mwenga Manahota Nkolongwa jwa ku Ichilahele!”
JOH 1:50 Yecho ajhakujhanguu, “Bho, unnyeketela nhwalo pininnobholila nikamwene pahe jha nkongo gwa nkojho? Namughabhona makolongwa kupeta ghanga!”
JOH 1:51 Yecho pajhendilila kulonge, “Ninnobholela chakaka, nanola kunane kwa Chapanga kukadinduka na akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga nabhakwela nu kuhuluka panane na Mwana gwa Mundo.”
JOH 2:1 Na lichiko lyutato pakibha na unyagho gwa ndowa kwenio ku Kana, ku muche gwa ku Galilaya, na majhe mundo Yecho akibha papa.
JOH 2:2 Yecho na bhabholwa bhake helahela bhakalalikwe ku unyagho gwa ndowa gwenio.
JOH 2:3 Bhahe, divaye puijhomokila, majhe mundo Yecho ajhakunnobholela, “Bhakwete jhe divaye.”
JOH 2:4 Yecho ajhakunyanguu, “Nkotoka kumola lyakuhenga. Lichaa lyango lyamela.”
JOH 2:5 Peniya majhe mundo Yecho ajhakwalobholela akatumiche, “Lyolyoha lyapala kunnobholela, nhenga.”
JOH 2:6 Bhahe, pakibha na ihulo chita ya maghanga, itwelii mache, ikabhekwite peniya ngita chibhayobhalile Akayahude gha kukijhelebhula kwa kunyopa Chapanga. Kila kihulo chimo kikahotwii kujhingii mikambo ncheche amu nhwano.
JOH 2:7 Yecho ajhakwalobholela akatumiche, “Ntwelengane ihulo yenio mache.” Na bhene bhajhakutweleya lombilombi.
JOH 2:8 Peniya ajhakwalobholela, “Ngoheno nteke mupele nkolo unyagho.” Na bhene bhakatehile ngita chabhalongalile.
JOH 2:9 Jhola nkolo jwa unyagho pabhonjita mache gheniya ghajhakughalambuka na kubhehe divaye. Na jwenio akamanyite jhe kwihumile, nambo akatumiche bhubhatekilila mache bhakamanye. Peniya nkolo jwa unyagho ajhakunkema nnyina mwale paupele,
JOH 2:10 ajhakunnobholela, “Kila mundo atumbula kwapekeya akaghene divaye jhamaha. Peniya akaghene pibhanywila nu kukola, upiya divaye jhanganogha. Nambo mwenga nibhekite divaye jhinogha ade ngoheno!”
JOH 2:11 Yecho ndi nginyililo jhake jha kukangacha jha kutumbula kulangiya pakibha ku Kana, ku muche gwa ku Galilaya. Kwenio ajhakulangiya ung'alicho gwake na bhabholwa bhake bhajhakunyeketela.
JOH 2:12 Pajhomolila gheniya, Yecho ajhakuhelela na majhe mundo, na nnongo mundo pamonga na bhabholwa bhake, kujhenda ku muche gwa ku Kapelenaumo na ajhakuhighalika kwa machiko ghandina kwenio.
JOH 2:13 Unyagho gwa Akayahude ghu ukemwa Pachaka pubhandikila, Yecho ajhakuhobhoka kujhenda ku Yeluchalemo.
JOH 2:14 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakwakolela bhando pa Nyumba jha Chapanga bhakichulucha ng'ombi na mambelele na ngunda, bhubhajhangangana mbijha bhabhii panane jha njangwale bhatamangine.
JOH 2:15 Papa, Yecho ajhakupota luyato lwa lughojhe, ajhakwabhenga bhando bhoha panja pa Nyumba jha Chapanga bhoha pamonga na ng'ombi na mambelele. Helahela ajhakupendengula njangwale na mbijha yabhe ijhakupechengana yoha.
JOH 2:16 Peniya ajhakwalobholela bhala bhubhachulwicha ngunda, “Mmohengane ilebhe henge! Nkotoka kuhighalambula nyumba jha Tate gwango lighuliho!”
JOH 2:17 Bhabholwa bhake bhajhakukomboka Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghighalonge, “Mwe ma Chapanga, upalo gwango kwa nyumba jhino undiniya kumwojho gwango ngita mwotu.”
JOH 2:18 Bhahe, bhakolo Akayahude bhajhakunkonya Yecho, “Bho, nanangiya nginyililo ghane kabhele jha kukangacha kubhehe nkwete uhotolo gwa kuhenga ghangano ghoha?”
JOH 2:19 Yecho ajhakwajhangu, “Ntilulane Nyumba jha Chapanga, na nenga nanjenga kabhele kwa machiko matato.”
JOH 2:20 Peniya Akayahude bhajhakulonge, “Nyumba jhende jha Chapanga ikachengwite machiko makome ncheche na chita, mwenga nahotola bhole kujhichenga kwa machiko gheniya matato?”
JOH 2:21 Nambo Nyumba jha Chapanga jhalongela Yecho, ikibha ndi yegha jhake.
JOH 2:22 Bhahe, Yecho payokita kuhumii kubhawile, bhabholwa bhake bhajhakukomboka chela chalongila. Bhajhakujheketela Majhandiko gha Chapanga na malobhe ghange ghalongila Yecho.
JOH 2:23 Bhahe, Yecho pakibha ku Yeluchalemo ku unyagho gwa Pachaka, bhando bhamahele bhakaihwene nginyililo yatehila, bhajhakunnyeketela.
JOH 2:24 Nambo Yecho akabhajheketii ndeka, nhwalo akamanye bhando bhoha.
JOH 2:25 Akapahi jhe mundo jhojhoha annobholele malobhe gha bhando, nhwalo Yecho akaghamanye ghughabhii nkate jha miojho jhabhe.
JOH 3:1 Bhahe, pakibha na kilongoche nkolongwa jhumo jwa Akayahude, mundo jwa likunde lya Mapwalichayo, liina lyake Nikodemo.
JOH 3:2 Lichiko limo uwiko Nikodemo ajhakunyendelela Yecho, ajhakunnobholela, “Mmola, tumanye kubhehe mwenga ndi Mmola jhutumitwe na Chapanga. Nhwalo abhii jhe mundo jhojhoha jwahotola kuhenga nginyililo yumuhenga mwenga anda Chapanga nakubhehe jhe pamonga.”
JOH 3:3 Yecho ajhakujhanguu, “Ninnobholela chakaka, abhii jhe mundo nahotola kujhingila mu Nahota nkolongwa gwa Chapanga anda abhelwike ndeka mala jhubhele.”
JOH 3:4 Nikodemo ajhakunkonya Yecho, “Bho, mundo nkolongwa ihoto bho kubhelukwa mala jhubhele? Chakaka iwechekana jhe mundo ajhingii mulutumbo lwa majhe na kubhelukwa kabhele!”
JOH 3:5 Yecho ajhakujhanguu, “Ninnobholela chakaka, abhii jhe mundo jwa kujhingii mu Nahota Nkologwa gwa Chapanga anda abatichwe kwa mache na Uhuke gwa Chapanga.”
JOH 3:6 Mundo jwabhelwike kwa yegha kuhumii kwa majhe na tate mundo, nambo chikibhelwike kwa Uhuke ndi kihuma kwa Uhuke gwa Chapanga.
JOH 3:7 Nkotoka kukangacha nhwalo ninnobholela nipala mmelukwe mala jhubhele.
JOH 3:8 Upepo upogha kupala kupoghela, mujhoha puupogha, nambo muumanye jhe kuhumii hilu kupoghela. Ndi chikipitila kwa kila mundo jwabhelwike kwa Uhuke gwa Chapanga.
JOH 3:9 Nikodemo ajhakunkonya, “Bho, ilebhe naihotola kupitila?”
JOH 3:10 Yecho ajhakunyanguu, “Mwenga mwa mmola nkolongwa jwa ku Ichilahele, na mwenga muhimanyite jhe ilebhe hengeno?”
JOH 3:11 Chakaka ninnobholela, twenga tulonge ilebhe itumanya na natilongela ilebhe ituhwene kwa miho ghito, nambo mangota mwamela mujheketela ndeka malobhe ghito.
JOH 3:12 Mukannyeketii ndeka puninnobholila ilebhe ya pannema pano, bhole nanyeketela jhe anda ninnobholile ilebhe ya kunane kwa Chapanga?
JOH 3:13 Abhii jhe mundo jwajhihwii kunane kwa Chapanga, nambo Mwana gwa Mundo jwahumite kunane kwa Chapanga.
JOH 3:14 Ngita Mucha panyinwila lijhoka lya chaba kwa luyato kunjenga kola, helahela Mwana gwa Mundo ipalwa ajhinwulilwa,
JOH 3:15 kila mundo jwannyeketela abhehe na ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
JOH 3:16 Kwa nhwalo Chapanga akapahile hake bhando bha pannema, ade ajhakummoha Mwana jwa kanjika, kila mundo jwanyeketela akotoka kuhobha, nambo abhaha na ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
JOH 3:17 Nhwalo Chapanga akantumite ndeka Mwana mundo pannema pano kwahadabula bhando, nambo nnema aughombole kwa kupete jwenio.
JOH 3:18 Mundo jhojhoha jwanyeketile Mwana bhihadabu ndeka, nambo mundo jhojhoha jwangannyeketela akihahadabwii njwe, nhwalo anyekite ndeka Mwana jwa kanjika jwa Chapanga.
JOH 3:19 Naha ndi chimpala kuhadabulwa, lumule luhikite pannema, nambo bhando bhipala lubhendo na kululeka lumule, nhwalo ghibhahenga mabhoho.
JOH 3:20 Kila mundo jwaitenda mabhoho aluchimwa lumule, na jwenio hukana kuhika palumule, nhwalo ijhoghopa mabhoho naghabhonekana mbegha.
JOH 3:21 Nambo mundo jhola jwaitenda gha chakaka ujhenda palumule, kupala ghala ghahenga ghabhonekena mbegha kwa kunyokanikiya Chapanga.
JOH 3:22 Pughajhomokila gheniya, Yecho na bhabholwa bhake bhajhakujhenda ade ku muche gwa ku Yudeya, ajhakubhehe kwenio ajhakutama nako, kwenio abaticha bhando.
JOH 3:23 Helahela Yohane akibha abaticha ku Ainoniya, pahina na ku Salemo, nhwalo peniya pakibha na mache twe. Bhando bhamahele bhanyendilila, na jwenio ajhakwabaticha.
JOH 3:24 Ghanga ghatendika Yohane pakibha atabhitwe mukipungo.
JOH 3:25 Bhahe, pajhakubhehe na mitaungano pakate jha bhabholwa bha Yohane na Akayahude mambu gha kukijhelebhula kwa kunyopa Chapanga.
JOH 3:26 Bhabholwa bheniya bhajhakunyendelela Yohane na kunnobholela, “Mmola, mundo jhola jhumukibha pamonga na mwenga kwiye jha ku Yolodane, na jhumutulobholila malobhe ghake, ngoheno jwenio abaticha na bhando bhinyendelela.”
JOH 3:27 Yohane ajhakwajhanguu, “Abhii jhe mundo jwahoto kupokela kilebhe changapelwa na Chapanga.
JOH 3:28 Mangota mabhene umanye puninnobholila, ‘Nenga na Kilichitu Nkomboche jhe, nambo ndei kutumwa kulongolela.’
JOH 3:29 Jwabhii na nnyina mwale mwikeghe ndi jwake nnyina mwale munalome. Nambo njeche jwa nnyina mwale ajhema pahina na kujhokanikiya, nhwangana pahijhoha lilobhe lya nnyina mwale munalome akilongela. Naha ndi chibhii kwa nenga ngoheno luhangano lwango pulukamilika.
JOH 3:30 Bhahe, jwenio Yecho ipala abhaha nkolongwa na nenga maha jwandina.”
JOH 3:31 Jwenio jwahika kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga ndi nkolongwa kuliku bhoha. Mundo jwa pannema pano apitii pannema na ulongela ilebhe ya pannema, nambo jwahika kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga ndi jwalongocha ghoha.
JOH 3:32 Jwenio alongela ghala ghaghahwene na kughajhoha, nambo abhii jhe hilu mundo jhumo jwajheketela malobhe ghalongila.
JOH 3:33 Nambo mundo jhojhoha jwanyeketela malobhe ghake, chakaka ilangiya Chapanga ndi uchakaka.
JOH 3:34 Jhola jwatumitwe na Chapanga, ulonge malobhe gha Chapanga, nhwalo Chapanga untwelekeya lombilombi mundo jwenio Uhuke gwa Chapanga.
JOH 3:35 Tate impala Mwana mundo na akamwii ilebhe yoha mu mabhoko ghake.
JOH 3:36 Mundo jhojhoha jwanyeketela Mwana abhii na ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta, nambo mundo jhojhoha jwanga nnyeketela Mwana akwete jhe ughome, najhendelela kubhehe pahe jha luchwapulo lwa Chapanga.
JOH 4:1 Mapwalichayo bhakajhohine Yecho akwete bhando bhamahele kubhehe bhabholwa na kubaticha kupeta Yohane.
JOH 4:2 Nambo Yecho jwenio akabatiche ndeka bhando, nambo bhabholwa bhake ndi bhakabatiche bhando.
JOH 4:3 Bhahe, Yecho pajhohina gheniya, ajhakubhoka ku Yudeya na kubhujha ku Galilaya.
JOH 4:4 Mu mwanja gwake impalita apetele ku Samaliya.
JOH 4:5 Bhahe, ajhakuhika ku muche gwa ku Samaliya, ghuukemwa Sukale, ghuheghelile na nng'onda ghola gwa Yakobu gwakampekiye mwana mundo jwakemwita Uchupo.
JOH 4:6 Peniya pakibha na kilibha cha Yakobu, na Yecho nhwalo gwa kutotokela kwa mwanja, ajhakutama pahina jha kilibha. Ikibha chaa chita jha muhe.
JOH 4:7 Bhahe, mwikeghe jhumo Nsamaliya ajhakuhika kuteka mache. Yecho ajhakunnobholela, “Nijhopa mache nyweghe.”
JOH 4:8 Yecho akibha kanjika, bhabholwa bhake pubhajhahwile kubomane kuheme ilebhe ya kulyegha.
JOH 4:9 Mwikeghe jhola ajhakunnobholela Yecho, “Mwenga ma Yahude na nenga ndi Nasamaliya. Nhwalo ghane unyopa mache gha kunywegha?” Alongila naha nhwalo Akayahude na Akasamaliya bhilye ndeka pamonga.
JOH 4:10 Yecho ajhakunyanguu, “Anda ngaumanya hupo ya Chapanga na ndi ghane jwannyopa mache gha kunywegha, ngamunyopite na jwenio ngampekiye mache ghighaleta ughome.”
JOH 4:11 Mwikeghe jhola ajhakunnobholela, “Bhambo, nkwete jhe nteko gwa kuteke mache na kilibha kibhii nnyoli. Bho, ngoheno namughakolela kojhe mache ghighaleta ughome?
JOH 4:12 Amu pange mwenga mukitenda mwanahota kuliku tate gwito Yakobu? Jwenio akatupekii twenga kilibha chenje helahela na jwenio na yana mundo na inyama yake bhanywila mache gha kilibha chenje.”
JOH 4:13 Yecho ajhakunyanguu, “Jwanywegha mache ghanga najhohii jhe nyota kabhele.
JOH 4:14 Nambo jwapala kunywegha mache ghakumpekeya nenga, nabhe jhe na nyota kwa ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta. Mache ghunimpela kumpekiya ghunimpela nkate jhino naghabha chembwe cha mache ghighaleta ughome na kumpela ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.”
JOH 4:15 Mwikeghe jhola ajhakunnobholela, “Bhambo, umbekehe mache gheniya! Ngotoka kubhehe na nyota kabhele, na ngotoka kuhika kabhele kuteka mache pamba.”
JOH 4:16 Yecho ajhakunnobholela, “Nnyende mukankeme ungana gwino, na nhwike nako pamba.”
JOH 4:17 Jwenio mwikeghe ajhakunnobholela, “Nenga ndoline jhe.” Yecho ajhakunnobholela, “Unywagwii mbone, nkwete ndeka munalome.
JOH 4:18 Nhwalo mukibha na akanalome nhwano na munalome jhutama nako ngoheno jwii ndeka. Chakaka nnongii maha.”
JOH 4:19 Bhahe, mwikeghe jhola ajhakunnobholela, “Bhambo, nibhona mwenga ndi ma nondole bha Chapanga.
JOH 4:20 Akahoko bhito bhanyinamila Chapanga pakitombe chenje, nambo mangota Akayahude milongela ku Yeluchalemo ndi kwa kunyope Chapanga.”
JOH 4:21 Yecho ajhakunyanguu, “Mwe majhe unyeketele chinilonge, machiko ghabhii kuhika bhando nabhanyinamila ndeka Tate panane jha kitombe chenje amu kola ku Yeluchalemo.
JOH 4:22 Mangota mwaka Samaliya, munyinamila Chapanga jhola jwangaumanya, nambo twenga Akayahude tunyinamila Chapanga jhutummanye, nhwalo gwa ughombokeko uhumii kwa Akayahude.
JOH 4:23 Nambo machiko ghabhii kuhika, kabhele ghahikite, bhibhanyinamila Chapanga jwa uchakaka na bhanyopa Tate kuhumii muhuke gwa Chapanga na uchakaka. Nhwalo Tate abhapala bhando ngita bheniya bhannyinamile.
JOH 4:24 Chapanga ndi Uhuke na bhando bhibhanyopa ibhapala bhanyinamila Chapanga kwa kulongochwa na Uhuke gwa Chapanga na uchakaka.”
JOH 4:25 Mwikeghe jhola ajhakunnobholela, “Nimanya Machiya Nkomboche, jhuikemwa Kilichitu abhii kuhika. Papala kuhika na natulobholela hotuhotu kila kilebhe.”
JOH 4:26 Yecho ajhakunnobholela, “Nenga jhunilongela na mwenga, ndi nenga.”
JOH 4:27 Papa bhabholwa bhake bhajhakubhujha, bhajhakukangacha hake kubhona akilongela na mwikeghe jhola. Nambo abhii jhe mundo jwakankonyite, “Mipala nike?” Amu “Nhwalo gwa nike milongela na mwikeghe jwenio?”
JOH 4:28 Bhahe, mwikeghe jhola ajhakuuleka nkambo ghola papa na kubhujha kubomane kwalongelela bhando,
JOH 4:29 “Tijha mukanole mundo jwanobholile ilebhe yoha indehila. Bho, pange ihoto kubhehe jwenio ndi Kilichitu Nkomboche?”
JOH 4:30 Bhahe, bhando bhajhakubhoka ku bomane nu kujhenda kunninga Yecho.
JOH 4:31 Muda ghogho bhabholwa bhake bhampembelikiya Yecho bhalongila, “Mmola, nlyeghe!”
JOH 4:32 Nambo Yecho ajhakujhanguu, “Nenga ngwete cha kulyegha mangota mukimanyitii jhe.”
JOH 4:33 Bhahe, bhabholwa bhake bhajhakukonyana, “Bho, abhii mundo jwannetile chakulyegha?”
JOH 4:34 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Chinilyegha ndi kuhenga ghapala jhola jwandumita na kujhomola lihengo lyambekii kuhenga.
JOH 4:35 Mangota mulonge, ‘Jhamela miyehe ncheche tugha, na mahuno naghatumbula.’ Nambo ninnobholela, dolokeya mighonda chilenganikilwe kwa mahuno.
JOH 4:36 Mundo jwahuna alepitwe njwe malepo ghake na jwaponga mahuno kwa nhwalo jha ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta, hele jwamicha na jwahuna nabhahangana pamonga.
JOH 4:37 Nhwalo luhumo londo chakaka ‘Mundo jhumo umicha na mundo jhonge jwakuhuna.’
JOH 4:38 Nenga nitumingine mukahune mu mighonda jhangalema, bhando bhange bhakahengite lihengo, nambo mangota mwenga minong'omenekeya kwa lihengo lyabhe.”
JOH 4:39 Akasamaliya twe bha ku bomane jhela ngabhanyeketila Yecho kwa nhwalo gwa majhe jhola, “Anobholile ilebhe yoha indehila.”
JOH 4:40 Bhahe, Akasamaliya bhajhakunyendelela Yecho, bhajhakunnyopa bhatame nako, na jwenio ajhakutama kwa machiko mabhele.
JOH 4:41 Bhando bhamahele bhajhakunnyeketela Yecho nhwalo gwa malobhe ghala ghalongila.
JOH 4:42 Bhajhakunnobholela majhe jhola, “Twenga ngoheno tujheketile, chi kwa nhwalo kwa chela chinongela, nambo nhwalo twabhete tujhohine na tumanya mundo jhonjo chakaka Nchengula jwa bhando bhoha bha pannema.”
JOH 4:43 Pighapetita machiko mabhele Yecho ajhakubhoka kwenio, na kujhenda ku Galilaya.
JOH 4:44 Nhwalo Yecho jwenio alongila hotuhotu, “Nnondole jwa Chapanga ilendemwa ndeka ku kilambo chabhelukilwe.”
JOH 4:45 Bhahe, pahikita ku Galilaya, bhando bhamahele bhajhakumpokela nhwalo bhene bhakajhenda ku Unyagho gwa Pachaka kwenio ku Yeluchalemo, na bhakaihwene yoha yatehila Yecho pa unyagho gwenio.
JOH 4:46 Yecho pajhahwila kabhele ku Kana ghubhii ku muche gwa ku Galilaya, kwenio kwaghalambwiya mache kubhehe divaye. Kwenio pakibha na munahota jhumo mwana mundo atehila kulwalwa ku muche gwa ku Kapelenaumo.
JOH 4:47 Bhahe, munahota jwenio pajhohina Yecho ahikite ku Galilaya kuhumii ku Yudeya ajhakunnyendelela na kunnyopa anamiche mwana mundo jwakibha tepekatepeka.
JOH 4:48 Yecho ajhakunnobholela, “Mangota bhando changalola nginyililo na ikangacho minyekete jhe Chapanga.”
JOH 4:49 Munahota jwenio ajhakunnobholela, “Bhambo, chonde tujhende mwanango kabula jha kuwegha.”
JOH 4:50 Yecho ajhakunnobholela, “Nnyende tugha mwana gwino nabhaha ghome!” Mundo jhola ajhakujheketela malobhe gha Yecho, ajhakujhenda.
JOH 4:51 Munahota jhola pakibha undela kubhujha, akatumiche bhake ajhakukongana nako na kunnobholela mwana gwino abhii ghome njwe.
JOH 4:52 Na jwenio ajhakwakonya muda ghane patumbwila kubhehe mbaha, na bhene ngabhanyangwila, “Dicho cha chaba jha muhe punekikiya ulwalo.”
JOH 4:53 Tate jhola ajhakukomboka lichaa lelelalela pannobholila Yecho, “Mwana gwino amela ghome.” Bhahe, jwenio na nyumba jhake jhoha bhajhakunyeketela Yecho.
JOH 4:54 Ikibha nginyililo jhubhele jha kukangacha jhatehila Yecho pahumita ku Yudeya na kujhenda ku Galilaya.
JOH 5:1 Pughajhomokila gheniya, Yecho ajhakuhobhoka ku Yeluchalemo ku unyagho ghonge gwa Akayahude.
JOH 5:2 Na kwenio ku Yeluchalemo pahina na litangala likolongwa lilikemwa Nnyango gwa Limbelele, pakibha na litanda lilikemwita kwa Kiebulaniya Bethichata pahina na litanda pakibha na udamo nhwano.
JOH 5:3 Bhando bhamahele bhakibha muudamo bhibhalwalwa, na bhangalola, na bhibhalemile na bhibhatengwike.
JOH 5:4 Bhando bhubhalendila mache ghatimbughanwe, nhwalo ntumiche jwa kunane kwa Chapanga ahikita kutimbughana mache. Jwalwalwa jhojhoha jwalongolela kutumbukila mu mache ghughatimbughinwe, alamita ulwalo ghoghoha gwabhii nako.
JOH 5:5 Bhahe, peniya pakibha na mundo jhumo jwakibha alwalwita ulwalo gwa kutenguka kwa yaka makome matato na nane.
JOH 5:6 Yecho pammonita jwalwalwa jwenio agholwike peniya, akamanye akibha alwalwita kwa machiko ghamahele, peniya ajhakunkonya jwalwalwa jhola, “Bho, mwipala kulama?”
JOH 5:7 Jwalwalwa jhola ajhakunnyanguu, “Bhambo, nenga ngwete ndeka mundo jwakunyingii mu litanda pubhatimbukana mache. Kila punijhigha kutumbukila, mundo jhonge alongalile.”
JOH 5:8 Peniya Yecho ajhakunnobholela, “Jhema, tola mpacha gwino, nnyende.”
JOH 5:9 Papa peniya mundo jhola ajhakulama, ajhakutola mpacha gwake nu kujhenda. Kilebhe chenje kitendika Lichiko lya Kupomolela lya Akayahude.
JOH 5:10 Nhwalo gwenio Akakolo bha Akayahude bhajhakunnobholela mundo jwalamichwe jhola, “Deleno Lichiko lya Kupomolela, lilaghalikilo likanakiya kutola mpacha gwino.”
JOH 5:11 Nambo mundo jwenio ajhakwajhanguu, “Mundo jwanamiche jhola ndi jwannobholila, ‘Tola mpacha gwino na nnyende.’ ”
JOH 5:12 Bhahe, bhajhakunkonya, “Bho, ndi mundo ghane jwanobholile mwenga ntole mpacha gwino nnyende?”
JOH 5:13 Nambo mundo jhola jwalamichwe akahumanyi jhe Yecho akibha ghane, nhwalo bhando bhakibha bhamahele na Yecho akabhokite mandahe.
JOH 5:14 Pighapetita gheniya, Yecho ajhakummona jhola jwanamiche pa Nyumba jha Chapanga, ajhakunnobholela, “Jhokanikiya, ngoheno nnamite. Nkotoka kubhujhila kuhenga uhakaho kabhele, anda ntehi uhakaho nakipambalakana kilebhe kibhoho kupeta cheneche.”
JOH 5:15 Peniya mundo jhola ajhakujhenda kwalobholela ilongoche ya Akayahude kubhehe Yecho ndi jwanamiche.
JOH 5:16 Nhwalo Yecho akahengite kilebhe chenie Lichiko lya Kupomolela, Akayahude bhajhakutumbula kunchimwa.
JOH 5:17 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Tate gwango ahenga mahengo machiko ghoha na nenga helahela imbala henga.”
JOH 5:18 Kwa nhwalo gwa malobhe gheniya, ilongoche ya Akayahude bhapaliya ndela bhankome Yecho, chi kwa nhwalo akalipuchite Lilaghalikilo lya Lichiko lya Kupomolela tugha, nambo nhwalo akankemite Chapanga ndi Tate mundo, na ajhakukiwananicha alandine na Chapanga.
JOH 5:19 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Ninnobholela chakaka, Mwana ihoto ndeka kuhenga kilebhe chochoha kanjika chake, Mwana ihotola kuhenga chela chamwona Tate mundo akihenga, nhwalo chahenga Tate, helahela Mwana ihenga.”
JOH 5:20 Nhwalo Tate impala Mwana, na unangiya kila kilebhe chahenga jwenio. Peniya nanangiya ilebhe ikolongwa kupeta henge, na mangota nankangacha.
JOH 5:21 Ngita Tate chabhayoha bhubhawile na kwapela ughome, helahela Mwana abhapela ughome bhando bhabhapahile.
JOH 5:22 Na kabhele Tate ahuadabu jhe mundo jhojhoha, nambo ampela Mwana ukindendeke gwa kwahadabuu bhando bhoha,
JOH 5:23 kupala bhando bhoha bhanyokanikiye Mwana ngita chibhanyokanikiya Tate. Mundo jhojhoha jwakana kunyokanikiya Mwana, ankana Tate jwandumita.
JOH 5:24 “Ninnobholela chakaka, jwajhoha lilobhe lyango, na kunyeketela jhola jwandumita, abhii na ughome gwa machiko ghoha. Na jwenio nahadabulwa ndeka nhwalo ajhombwike kuhumii mu kuwegha na kujhingii muughome.
JOH 5:25 Ninnobholela chakaka, lichiko libhii kuhika, na ngoheno lihikite, bhando bhubhawile nabhalijhoha lilobhe lya Mwana gwa Chapanga, na bhala bhubhapala kujhoha nabhabha na ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
JOH 5:26 Ngita Tate chabhii lihembuko lya ughome, helahela anteii Mwana mundo lihembuko lya ughome.
JOH 5:27 Kabhele ampekiye ukindendeke gwa kuhadabula nhwalo jwenio Mwana gwa Mundo.
JOH 5:28 Nkotoka kukangacha kwa malobhe ghanga, nhwalo lichiko libhii kuhika bhubhawile bhoha bhubhabhii mu mambe nabhajhoha lilobhe lyake,
JOH 5:29 nabhayoka kuhumii mu mambe yabhe, bhala bhubhatehi ghambone na kubhehe na ughome, nambo bhala bhubhatei uhakaho nabhayoka na kuhadabulwa.
JOH 5:30 “Nenga nihoto ndeka kuhenga lihengo kwa uhotolo gwango namwete. Nihadabula ngita chinaghalikiwe kuhumii kwa Tate, nihadabuu chakaka. Nhwalo nihenga ndeka chinipala, nihenga chela chapala jwandumita.”
JOH 5:31 Punikilobholela malobhe ghango namwete, malobhe ghango ndi ghuwange.
JOH 5:32 Nambo abhii jhonge jwalongela malobhe panane jhango, nimanya kila kilebhe chalongela ndi chakaka.
JOH 5:33 Mangota mwenga makatumite bhando bhajhende kwa Yohane Mbatichajhe, na malobhe ghango ghalongila ndi gha chakaka.
JOH 5:34 Nipala ndeka mundo jhonge alongela panane jhango, nambo nilonge ghanga nipala mangota mwenga nghombokoke.
JOH 5:35 Yohane akibha ngita kolobohi jhijhaka na kulangala ndaa, na mangota mkahagwile machiko ghandina gha kuhanganila.
JOH 5:36 Nambo nenga namwete malobhe ghighanjimulila makolongwa kupeta ghala gha Yohane. Nhwalo lihengo limbekiwe na Tate nijhomole lihengo linihenga, ndi inangiya hotuhotu Tate jwandumite.
JOH 5:37 Tate jwandumita helahela ulongela malobhe ghango. Mukajhohine jhe lilobhe lyake amu kummona pamiho jhake chipabhii,
JOH 5:38 na malobhe ghake ghatama jhe nkate jhino, nhwalo mukanyeketii ndeka jhola jwandumita.
JOH 5:39 Mangota mughachoma hake Majhandiko gha Chapanga pimihambuka nkate jhake napata ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta, kone Majhandiko gheniya gha Chapanga ndi ghighalonge malobhe ghango!
JOH 5:40 Nambo mangota mipala jhe kuhika kwa nenga mme na ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
JOH 5:41 “Nenga nipala ndeka bhando bhangweya.
JOH 5:42 Nambo nimmanya mangota, nkwete jhe upalo gwa Chapanga kumiojho jhino.
JOH 5:43 Nenga ihikite kwa ukindendeke gwa Tate gwango mingana kumbokela, nambo mundo jhonge anda ahikite kwa ukindendeke gwake jwenio, namupokela.
JOH 5:44 Bhole, nahotola kunyeketela kone mangota mipala kukikweya mabhene, nambo mwikana kupokela chipwa kuhumii kwa Chapanga jwenio?
JOH 5:45 Nkotoka kuwachila nenga nanipyambanikiya kwa Tate. Mucha jhumuhobholela mangota ndi jhojho natakalila.
JOH 5:46 Anda chakaka ngamunyeketela Mucha, ngaunyeketile na nenga hele, nhwalo Mucha akajhandike malobhe panane jhango.
JOH 5:47 Nambo anda mughajheketela ndeka ghala ghighajhandikwe na Mucha, nanhotola bhole kughajheketela malobhe ghango?”
JOH 6:1 Pajhomolila kulonge gheniya, Yecho ajhakujhomboka kwiye jha lilabha lya ku Galilaya, helahela likemwa lilabha lya Tibeliya.
JOH 6:2 Lilongo likolongwa lya bhando lijhakunkengama Yecho nhwalo bhakalolite nginyililo yatehila ya kwalamicha bhibhalwalwa.
JOH 6:3 Yecho ajhakukwela ku kitombe, ajhakutama pahe kwenio pamonga na bhabholwa bhake.
JOH 6:4 Unyagho gwa Pachaka jha Akayahude ukibha ubhandikile.
JOH 6:5 Bhahe, Yecho palyangatika ajhakubhona lilongo likolongwa lya bhando libhii titili likanhikilila, ajhakunkonya Filipu, “Bho, natuhemela kojhe chakulye bhando bhamba?”
JOH 6:6 Yecho alongila naha anyighe Filipu, nhwalo akamanye chakuhenga.
JOH 6:7 Filipu ajhakunnyanguu, “Imbembela ya mbijha makome mabhele gha madine gha feza ghakwela jhe kuhemelela mabumunda kila mundo.”
JOH 6:8 Jhumo pakate jha bhabholwa bhake liina lyake Anduleya, unung'una mundo Simone Petile, ajhakunnobholela Yecho,
JOH 6:9 “Abhii pamba nchongolo, jwakwete mabumunda nhwano gha chayile na homba ibhele, nambo nabhajhukuta bhole bhando kwa ilebhe henge yandina?”
JOH 6:10 Yecho ajhakwalobholela bhabholwa bhake, “Mwatamike bhando pahe mwihibhogha ibhogha.” Peniya pakibha na manyahe titili bhahe, bhando bhoha bhakahikii elufo nhwano, bheniya akanalome tugha.
JOH 6:11 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakutola mabumunda gha chayile, na ajhakunchenguu Chapanga, na kwabhaghanichila bhando bhubhatamite pahe. Na homba ajhakuhibhaghanichila ibhogha yoha hele ngita chibhapalita.
JOH 6:12 Bhando bhoha bhajhukuta, Yecho ajhakwalobholela bhabholwa bhake, “Nnyolangane mahighiliko ghighahighilike changahobhelela chochoha.”
JOH 6:13 Bhahe, bhabholwa bhajhakujhola mahighiliko gha mabumunda gha chayile bhajhakutwelela ichukilo kome na ibhele ya mahighiliko.
JOH 6:14 Bhando bhoha pubhalolita nginyililo itehilwa na Yecho bhajhakulonge, “Chakaka jhonjo ndi nnondole jwalongilwa nahika pannema pano!”
JOH 6:15 Yecho akamanye bhando bhipala bhantende munahota nkolongwa kwa likakala, peniya ajhakujhenda ku katombe kanjika.
JOH 6:16 Pulitipika lyobha, bhabholwa bhake bhajhakuhuluka ade ku lilabha,
JOH 6:17 bhajhakujhingila mungalabha na kujhomboka lilabha bhajhakujhenda ade ku Kapelenaumo. Pakibha na lubhendo na Yecho amela anakongana nako jhe.
JOH 6:18 Lilabha lijhakutumbuu kutimbuka nhwalo gwa upepo nkolongwa ghupoghita.
JOH 6:19 Bhabholwa bhake pubhatyangita utale gwa maile itatu amu ncheche, bhajhakummona Yecho ityanga panane jha mache, akibhandikila ngalabha, bhabholwa bhajhakujhoghopa hake.
JOH 6:20 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Nkotoka kujhoghopa, ndi nenga!”
JOH 6:21 Bhahe, bhabholwa bhapata bhayungii Yecho mungalabha, papalapala ngalabha ikahikite pandumba pibhajhahwila.
JOH 6:22 Kilabho jhake lilongo likolongwa lya bhando likahighilike kwiye jha lilabha bhakamanye ibhii ngalabha jhimo tugha. Na bhakamanye Yecho akajhingi jhe mungalabha na bhabholwa bhake, nambo bhabholwa bhake bhakajhenda kanjika chabhe.
JOH 6:23 Na ngalabha henge ijhakujhonjekeka kuhumii ku Tibeliya ijhakuhika pahina na pala lilongo likolongwa lya bhando pubhalila mabumunda, Bhambo panombita Chapanga.
JOH 6:24 Bhahe, bhando bheniya pibhang'amwila kubhehe Yecho na bhabholwa bhake bhabhii jhe peniya, bhajhakujhingii mungalabha na kujhenda ku Kapelenaumo kwapalaha.
JOH 6:25 Bhando pibhamonita Yecho kwiye jha lilabha bhajhakunkonya, “Mmola, mwenga nhwikite ligha kongone?”
JOH 6:26 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Ninnobholela chakaka, chiumbalakiya chi nhwalo mukahwene nginyililo, nhwalo gwa mabumunda ghukapita ghala nu kujhukuta.
JOH 6:27 Nkotoka kukipikiya miho chakulya chikibhola, nambo mukipikihi miho chakulya chikitamikiya na kileta ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta. Mwana gwa Mundo napelangana mangota chakulya chenie, nhwalo Tate Chapanga anangiye kunhaghula na kunyeketela.”
JOH 6:28 Peniya bhajhakunkonya Yecho, “Bho, tuhenge nike tuhoto kuhenga ghala ghapala Chapanga tuhenge?”
JOH 6:29 Yecho pajhangwila, “Chenje ndi chapala Chapanga mukihenge, munyeketele jhola jwatumita.”
JOH 6:30 Bhahe, bhajhakunkonya, “Bho, natenda nginyililo ghane tupala tulole na twenga tunyeketele? Bho, naunhenga nike?
JOH 6:31 Akahoko bhito bhakalile chakulya chikikemitwa mana kunjenga, ngita chighalonge Majhandiko gha Chapanga, ‘Akabhapekiye libumunda lilihulwika kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga.’ ”
JOH 6:32 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Ninnobholela chakaka, chi Mucha jwakampeki libumunda kuhumi kunane kwa Chapanga, nambo Tate gwango ndi jwapekiya mabumunda gha chakaka kuhumi kunane.
JOH 6:33 Nhwalo libumunda lya Chapanga ndi ghola ghuhulwika kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga na kwapela ughome bhando bha pannema.”
JOH 6:34 Bhahe, bhajhakunnobholela, “Bhambo, machiko ghoha mutupela libumunda lya machiko ghoha.”
JOH 6:35 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Nenga ndi chakulya chikileta ughome. Bhala bhubhahika kwa nenga nabhabhehe ng'o na njala na jhola jwanyeketela nabhehe ng'o na nyota jha mache kabhele.
JOH 6:36 Ngita chininnobholila umwene nambo minyekete jhe.
JOH 6:37 Bhoha bhampela Tate nabhahika kwa nenga, mundo jhojhoha jwahika kwa nenga nanimmenga ng'o.
JOH 6:38 Uhulwike kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga chi kuhenga ghinipala namwete, nambo kutenda ghapala jhola jwandumita.
JOH 6:39 Jhola jwandumita apala naha, ngotoka kuhobhecha hilu jhumo pakate jha bhala bhambekiye, nambo nayokecha bhoha mukuwegha lichiko lya mwicho.
JOH 6:40 Nhwalo chapala Tate gwango kila mundo jwamona Mwana na kunyeketela nabhaha na ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta, na nenga naniyokecha lichiko lya mwicho.”
JOH 6:41 Bhahe, Akayahude bhajhakutumbu kukokolekeya nhwalo akalongi, “Nenga ndi libumunda lilihuluke kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga.”
JOH 6:42 Na bhene bhajhakulonge, “Bho, jhonjo Yecho chi mwana gwa Uchupo ndeka tate na majhe mundo twamanye? Ahoto bhole kulonge ahulwike kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga?”
JOH 6:43 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Mwileke ngokoleko pakate jhino.
JOH 6:44 Abhii ndeka mundo jwahoto kuhika kwa nenga, ngita Tate jwandumite chaunhutila kwa jwenio, na nenga nanihyokecha mundo jwenio lichiko lya mwicho.
JOH 6:45 Milondole bha Chapanga bhajhandikwe, ‘Bhando bhoha nabhabholwa na Chapanga.’ Kila mundo jwannyokanikiya Tate na kukibhola kuhumii kwa jwenio, nahika kwa nenga.
JOH 6:46 Abhii jhe mundo jhojhoha jwamwene Tate nga jhola jwahumila kwa Chapanga, ndi jwenio tugha jwamwene Tate.
JOH 6:47 Ninnobholela chakaka, mundo jhojhoha jwanyeketela abhii na ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
JOH 6:48 Nenga ndi chakulya cha ughome.
JOH 6:49 Akahoko bhino bhakalile mana kunjenga, nambo bhakawile.
JOH 6:50 Nambo lende ndi libumunda lilihulwike kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga, jhojhoha jwalyegha nahwejhe.
JOH 6:51 Nenga ndi libumunda lya ughome lilihulwike kuhumii kunane kwenio. Mundo jhojhoha anda alile, nabhaha na ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta. Na libumunda ndi yegha jhango, jhinipiya kwa nhwalo gwa bhando bha pannema bhoha bhabhehe na ughome.”
JOH 6:52 Bhahe, Akayahude bhajhakutumbuu kutaungana kwa lilaka pakate jhabhe, “Bho, mundo jhonjo nahotola bhole kutupekeya yegha yake tulyeghe?”
JOH 6:53 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Chakaka ninnobholela, na kulye jhe yegha jha Mwana gwa Mundo na kunywegha miyahe jhake, ughome nahubhehe jhe nkate jhino.
JOH 6:54 Mundo jhojhoha jwalyegha yegha jhango na kunywegha miyahe jhango abhii na ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta, na nenga nanihyokecha lichiko lya mwicho.
JOH 6:55 Nhwalo yegha yango ndi ndalilo jha chakaka, na miyahe jhango ndi kinywelekelo chakaka.
JOH 6:56 Mundo jhojhoha jwalyegha yegha jhango na kunywe miyahe jhango, jwenio natama nkate jhango, na nenga nitama nkate jhake.
JOH 6:57 Ngita Tate jwabhii na ughome andumite, na nenga nitama kwa nhwalo gwake, helahela mundo jwalyegha yegha jhango nalama kwa nhwalo jha nenga.
JOH 6:58 Bhahe, chenje ndi chakulya chikihulwike kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga, chi ngita mana ibhalila akahokolo bhino na bhajhakuwegha. Nambo mundo jwalyegha libumunda lende nabhaha na ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.”
JOH 6:59 Yecho alongila malobhe gheniya pabholita munyumba jha kukonganikii Akayahude ku Kapelenaumo.
JOH 6:60 Bhahe, bhando bhamahele pakate jha bhabholwa bhake pubhajhohina malobhe gheniya, bhajhakulonge “Mabholo ghanga ghanonwipe! Bho, ghane nahotola kughajheketela?”
JOH 6:61 Yecho akamanye kubhehe bhabholwa bhake bhatehila kukokoleka panane jha malobhe gheniya, bhahe, ajhakwakonya, “Bho, nhwalo gwa nike mabholo ghanga ghauhengelecha mwojho?
JOH 6:62 Naibhaha bhole, pala pumpapala kummona Mwana gwa Mundo akikelebhuka kwahumila kunane kwa Chapanga?
JOH 6:63 Uhuke gwa Chapanga ndi jwaleta ughome, nambo likakala lya mundo kilebhe nacho. Malobhe gheniya ghuninnobholela ghihuma kwa Uhuke gwa Chapanga na ghileta ughome gwa machiko ghoha gwangapeta.
JOH 6:64 Nambo bhange pakate jhino bhanyekete jhe.” Yecho alongela gheniya akamanye kuhumii makacho bhala bhangannyeketela, na hele jhola jwapala kunyambila.
JOH 6:65 Yecho ajhendilila kulonge, “Kwa nhwalo ghongo nikannobholile abhii jhe mundo jwapala kuhotola kuhika kwa nenga ade atangatilwe na Tate gwango.”
JOH 6:66 Bhahe, kwa nhwalo gwa malobhe gheniya, pakate jha bhabholwa bhala bhamahele kuhengeleka mwojho, na bhakankengime jhe kabhele.
JOH 6:67 Yecho ajhakwakonya bhabholwa bhake kome na bhabhele bhala, “Na mangota mwenga mipala kubhoka helahela?”
JOH 6:68 Simone Petile ajhakujhanguu, “Bhambo, na tujhenda kwa ghane? Mwenga milongela malobhe gha ughome gwa machiko ghoha gwangapeta.
JOH 6:69 Twenga tujheketile na tumanyite mwenga ndi Mwanyahinyahi jhuhumii kwa Chapanga.”
JOH 6:70 Yecho ajhakwakonya, “Bho, nikahaghuline ndeka mangota kome na bhabhele? Nambo jhumo pakate jhino ndi Limbembela!”
JOH 6:71 Malobhe gheniya Yecho alongila panane jha Yuda, mwana gwa Simone Isikaliote, pakate jha bhala bhabholwa kome na bhabhele ndi jhonjo jwapala kunyambila Yecho.
JOH 7:1 Pughajhomokila gheniya, Yecho atyangita kwenio ku Galilaya, akapahi jhe kujhenda ku Yudeya, nhwalo gwa bhakolo bha Akayahude bhapala kunkoma.
JOH 7:2 Unyagho ghumo gwa Akayahude ghunkemwa unyagho gwa Ichimba ukabhandikile.
JOH 7:3 Akalongo mundo Yecho bhajhakunnobholela, “Mmoke pamba na nnyende ku Yudeya, bhibhankengama bhakalolekeye mahengo ghimihenga.
JOH 7:4 Abhii jhe mundo jwaitenda ilebhe kwa kukihiya anda apala amanyikane pa bhando. Mwenga muhenga mahengo ghanga, mukilangiye palonge jha bhando bhoha!”
JOH 7:5 Helahela na akalongo mundo bhakannyeketile jhe.
JOH 7:6 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Lichiko lyango lyamaha lyamela lyanahika jhe, nambo kwino mangota kila lichiko telatela.
JOH 7:7 Bhando bha nnema ghongo bhahoto jhe kunchimwa mangota, nambo nenga bhanjimwite nhwalo gwa kwalobholela ilebhe yubhatenda yambone jhe.
JOH 7:8 Mangota nnyendengane tugha kuunyagho gwenio. Nenga nijhenda jhe kuunyagho gwenio, nhwalo lichiko lyango lyambone lyamela.”
JOH 7:9 Alongila malobhe gheniya, peniya ajhakuhighalika koko ku Galilaya.
JOH 7:10 Akalongo mundo pubhajhahwila kuunyagho gwenio, na jwenio Yecho helahela ajhakujhenda kwenio, nambo akilangiya jhe hotuhotu nambo akajhahwi kwa kugwala.
JOH 7:11 Pa unyagho gwenio bhakolo bha Akayahude bhakibha bhampaliya Yecho, na bhajhakunkonya, “Bho, abhii kojhe mundo jhola?”
JOH 7:12 Kuhumi pa likunde lela pajhakubhehe mbwepombwepo yamahele panane jha Yecho. Na bhange bhalongila, “Ndi mundo jhonjo jwaumbone hake.” Na bhange bhalongila, “Nahijhe, jwenio abhahobhecha bhando.”
JOH 7:13 Nambo abhii jhe mundo jwakalongile hotuhotu panane jha Yecho, nhwalo bhajhogwipa bhakolo bha Akayahude.
JOH 7:14 Unyagho gwenio puheghelila kujhomokela, Yecho ajhakujhingila pa Nyumba jha Chapanga, na kutumbuu kubhola.
JOH 7:15 Bhahe, bhakolo bha Akayahude bhajhakukangacha na kulonge, “Bho, mundo jhonjo apatite koo mabholo ghanga na jwenio anabholwa jhe na mundo jhojhoha?”
JOH 7:16 Peniya Yecho ajhakujhanguu, “Mabholo ghinibhola ghango jhe, ghahuma kwa jhola jwandumita.
JOH 7:17 Mundo jwapala kuhenga ghala ghapala Chapanga, namanya ngita mabholo ghango ghihumi kwa Chapanga, amu nilonge kwa ukindendeke gwango namwete.
JOH 7:18 Jwenio jwabombolokana ipalaha kukikweya jwenio, nambo jwapalaha chipwa kwa jhola jwandumite, jwenio ndi jwantembekeya, na nkate jhake ubhii jhe uwange ghoghoha.
JOH 7:19 Bho, Mucha akapehi ndeka Lilaghalikilo? Pamonga na gheniya, abhii jhe hilu jhumo pakate jhino jwakamwile Lilaghalikilo. Kilebhe ghane chiumbala kungomela?”
JOH 7:20 Lilongo lya bhando bhajhakunyangula, “Mwenga ntehi kuchikilwa michuka! Ghane jwapala kunkoma mwenga?”
JOH 7:21 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Nakatehi kikangacho chimo na mangota mikangacha.
JOH 7:22 Mucha akanaghalikiye majhingiye yana hino jando, pamo na Mucha amu akahoko bhino bhakatumbuliche lilaghalikilo lyenio, na mabhene kujhingii jando mwana Lichiko lya Kupomolela.
JOH 7:23 Bhahe, anda kujhingii jando mwana Lichiko lya Kupomolela lya Akayahude nhwalo gwa kulikamula lilaghalikilo lya Mucha kilebhe ghane chumbihikiya miho nduu, kunamicha mundo Lichiko lya Kupomolela?
JOH 7:24 Nkotoka kuhadabula kwa kunolekeya pamiho tugha, nambo ntende luhadabulo lwa mbone.”
JOH 7:25 Bhahe, bhando bhange bha ku Yeluchalemo bhajhakutumbu kukikonya, “Bho, jhola mundo ilongoche jhubhapala kunkoma jhonjo jhe?
JOH 7:26 Dolokeya abhii pamba! Abhapwatalila pakongoloho, abhii jhe hilu mundo jwannobholela lilobhe. Bho, ilongoche bhito bhamanye kubhehe jhonjo ndi Kilichitu Nkomboche?
JOH 7:27 Nambo Kilichitu papala kuhika abhii jhe mundo jwapala kumanya nahumila kojhe, nambo twenga tumanya kwahumii mundo jhonjo.”
JOH 7:28 Bhahe, Yecho pabholita pa Nyumba jha Chapanga ajhakulonge kanonoha, “Bho, chakaka umanye na umanye kuhumile? Ihikite jhe kwa ukindendeke gwango namwete, nambo jhola jwandumita nenga ndi jwa chakaka. Mangota umanyi jhe,
JOH 7:29 nambo nenga nimanya nhwalo nihuma kwa jwenio, na jwenio ndi jwandumite.”
JOH 7:30 Peniya bhando bhajhakupala kunkamula, nambo abhii jhe mundo jwakatondobhiye lubhoko lwake kunkamula, nhwalo lichiko lyake likibha lyamela.
JOH 7:31 Nambo bhando bhamahele kubhoke palilongo lya bhando bhakanyeketile, bhalongila, “Kilichitu Nkomboche pahika, bho, natenda nginyililo kupeta yatehila mundo jhonjone?”
JOH 7:32 Mapwalichayo bhajhakujhoha bhando bhakipwepa malobhe panane jha Yecho. Bhahe, akapiya Matambiko na Mapwalichayo bhajhakwatuma akalonda bha Nyumba jha Chapanga bhakapyeneneke Yecho.
JOH 7:33 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Natama na mangota kwa machiko ghandina tugha, peniya nanyenda kwa jhola jwandumita.
JOH 7:34 Naumbalaha, nambo naummona ndeka, nhwalo nauhoto jhe kuhika pala pumii nenga.”
JOH 7:35 Akakolo bha Akayahude bhalongila bhene kwa bhene, “Bho, mundo ojho najhenda kojhe ade natuhotola jhe kumona kabhele? Bho, najhenda kwa Akayahude bhubhapechingine pakate jha miche jha Akagilike, na kwabhola Akagilike?
JOH 7:36 Nhwalo gwa nike alongila, ‘Naumbalaha, nambo naumona ndeka, nhwalo nauhoto jhe kuhika pala pumii nenga?’”
JOH 7:37 Lichiko lya kujhomolela unyagho gwenio likibha lichiko likolongwa. Yecho ajhakujhema, ajhakulonge kwa lilobhe likolongwa, “Mundo jhojhoha jwabhii na nyota ahike kwa nenga anyweghe.
JOH 7:38 Ngita chighalonge Majhandiko gha Chapanga, ‘Mundo jhojhoha jwanyeketela nenga, ngemba ya mache ileta ughome naghakokola kuhumii nkate jhake.’ ”
JOH 7:39 Yecho palongila malobhe gha Uhuke gwa Chapanga, bhubhapala kumpokela bhando bhala bhubhannyeketile. Ade lichiko lyenio bhando bhakapokii jhe Uhuke gwa Chapanga. Nhwalo Yecho akibha amela analombwa jhe na Chapanga.
JOH 7:40 Bhando bhange pakate jha lilongo lela bhakajhohine malobhe gheniya, bhajhakulonge, “Chakaka mundo jhonjo ndi jhola nnondole jwa Chapanga!”
JOH 7:41 Na bhange bhajhakulonge, “Jhojhone ndi Kilichitu Nkomboche!” Nambo na bhando bhange bhajhakukikonya, “Bho, Kilichitu Nkomboche ihoto kubhelukilwa ku Galilaya?
JOH 7:42 Bho, Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghakalongii jhe, Kilichitu nahumila kulukolo lwa munahota nkolongwa Daude, na nabhelukila ku muche gwa ku Betelehemo, kwatamita Daude!”
JOH 7:43 Bhahe, bhando bhajhakupechangana nhwalo gwa Yecho.
JOH 7:44 Bhando bhange bhapata kunkamula, nambo abhii jhe jwakajhighite kunkamula.
JOH 7:45 Akalonda bha Nyumba jha Chapanga pibhakelehwika, akapiya Matambiko na Mapwalichayo bhajhakwakonya, “Bho, nhwalo gwa nike munkamwii jhe Yecho na kuhika nako pamba?”
JOH 7:46 Akalonda bhala bhajhakujhanguu, “Akibha jhe mundo jwahotwila kulonge kupeta mundo jhonjo!”
JOH 7:47 Bhahe, Mapwalichayo bhajhakwakonya, “Bho, na mangota helahela ankolwiye?”
JOH 7:48 “Bho, abhii kilongoche amu Pwalichayo jhumo jhumumwene anyeketile?
JOH 7:49 Nahijhe bhalimanyiti jhe Lilaghalikilo lya Mucha lilongo lene, nambo peniya alapanikiwe na Chapanga!”
JOH 7:50 Nikodemo, jhola jwannyendila Yecho, akibha jhumo jwa Mapwalichayo bhubhakibha peniya. Bhahe, ajhakwalobholela,
JOH 7:51 Lilaghalikilo lito lilongela, tuhoto ndeka kuhadabuu mundo jhojhoha anda na kunyokanikii jhe na kumanya alemwite nike.
JOH 7:52 Na bhene bhajhakunyangula, “Bho, na mwenga hele jwa koko ku Galilaya? Mukalingukiye Majhandiko gha Chapanga, naumanya abhii jhe nnondole jwa Chapanga jwahumii ku Galilaya.”
JOH 7:53 Bhahe, kila mundo ajhakujhenda kajhake.
JOH 8:1 Pughajhomokila gheniya, Yecho ajhakujhenda ku Kitombe cha ku Micheitune.
JOH 8:2 Kilabho jhake putiputi ajhakujhenda kabhele pa Nyumba jha Chapanga. Bhando bhoha bhajhakuntindila Yecho, na jwenio ajhakutama pahe na kutumbuu kwabhola.
JOH 8:3 Bhahe, bhabhola bha Malaghalikilo na Mapwalichayo bhajhakunnetela mwikeghe jhumo jwankamwilwe akihenga ngongola. Na kunyemeka palonge jhabhe.
JOH 8:4 Peniya, bhajhakunnobholela Yecho, “Mmola, mwikeghe jhonjo tunkamwii akihenga ngongola.
JOH 8:5 Mulilaghalikilo lito, Mucha akatulaghalikii naha, mwikeghe ngita jhonjo akong'ondwe maghanga ade ahweghe. Ngohe mwenga milonge bhole?”
JOH 8:6 Bhalongila naha bhanyonje Yecho bhabhehe na kihokola cha kuntakalila. Nambo Yecho ajhakulita, na kutumbuu kujhandika pahe kwa lukonje lwake.
JOH 8:7 Pubhajhendelila kunkonya, Yecho ajhakujhinuka na kwalobholela, “Mundo jhojhoha jwangabhehe na uhakaho pakate jhino atumbule kunkong'onda lighanga.”
JOH 8:8 Peniya Yecho ajhakulita kabhele na kujhandika pahe.
JOH 8:9 Bhando bhala pubhajhohina malobhe gheniya, bhajhakutumbu kupechengana jhumojhumo, bhatumbwila ighogholo kubhoka. Ajhakuhighalika Yecho na mwikeghe jhola ajhemite papa.
JOH 8:10 Yecho pajhinuka, ajhakunkonya mwikeghe jhola, “Bho majhe, bhando bhibhakamwila bhala bhabhii kojhe? Bho, abhii jhe hilu mundo jhumo jwahadabwile?”
JOH 8:11 Mwikeghe jhola ajhakujhanguu, “Bhambo, abhii jhe mundo jwahadabwile.” Yecho ajhakunnobholela, “Nenga helahela ninhadabu ndeka. Nnyende nambo nkotoka kuhenga kabhele uhakaho.”
JOH 8:12 Yecho ajhakwalobholela bhando kabhele, “Nenga ndi lumule lwa bhando bha pannema. Mundo jhojhoha jwangengama nenga natyange jhe mulubhendo, nambo nabhaha na lumule lwa ughome.”
JOH 8:13 Bhahe, Mapwalichayo bhajhakunnobholela, “Malobhe ghino mikilongelele mabhene tugha, malobhe ghimilonge gha chakaka ndeka.”
JOH 8:14 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Anda nikilongolile panane jhango namwete, malobhe ghango gha chakaka nhwalo manyite kunihuma na kunijhenda. Nambo mangota kibhii jhe chiumanya kojhe kunijhenda na kojhe kunihumila.”
JOH 8:15 Mangota mihadabu ngita bhando chibhahadabu, nambo nenga ninhadabu jhe mundo.
JOH 8:16 Nambo anda nihadabula, nihadabuu chakaka, nhwalo nihadabuu jhe kanjika, Tate jwandumita abhii pamonga na nenga.
JOH 8:17 Ijhandikwe Mulilaghalikilo lino bhando bhabhele bhilonge kwa kujheketelana chibhakihwene, bhahe, lilobhe lyenio ndi uchakaka.
JOH 8:18 Nenga nikilongelela chakaka namwete malobhe ghango na Tate jwandumita helahela inongelela chakaka panane jhango.
JOH 8:19 Bhahe, bhajhakunkonya, “Bho, Tate gwino abhii kojhe?” Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Umanyite jhe nenga hilu Tate gwango. Ngaumanya nenga, helahela ngamumanyite Tate gwango.”
JOH 8:20 Yecho alongila malobhe gheniya pakibha abholita pa Nyumba jha Chapanga, pahina na kihukilo cha mbijha. Akapitii jhe mundo jwa kunkamula nhwalo lichiko lyake likibha lyamela.
JOH 8:21 Yecho ajhakwalobholela kabhele, “Nenga ndenda kukibhokela, mangota naumbalaha, nambo nauhwa nako uhakaho gwino. Kunijhenda nenga mangota mihoto jhe kuhika.”
JOH 8:22 Bhahe, ilongoche ya Akayahude ijhakulonge, “Ilonge ihoto jhe kujhenda kwajhenda bho, apala kukikoma jwenio?”
JOH 8:23 Nambo Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Mangota bha pannema pano jhibhii pahe, nambo nenga jwa kunane kwa Chapanga. Mangota bhando bha pannema ghongo, nambo nenga jwa pannema pano jhe.
JOH 8:24 Kwa nhwalo ghongo nikannobholile nauhwa muwakaho gwino. Changanyeketela, ‘Nenga ndi Jhumile.’ Nauhwa muuhakaho gwino.”
JOH 8:25 Bhajhakunkonya Yecho, “Mwe mwa ghane?” Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Nenga ndi Jhojho, ngita chinikannobholile kuhumii makacho.
JOH 8:26 Ngwete ghamahele gha kulonge panane jha kuhadabula. Nambo jhola jwandumita jwa chakaka, na chinyohine kuhumii kwa jwenio ndi nikilonge kwa bhando bhoha bha pannema.”
JOH 8:27 Bhakamanyi jhe kubhehe Yecho akibha alongila malobhe panane jha Chapanga Tate mundo.
JOH 8:28 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Pumipala kuntondobheya Mwana gwa Mundo panchalaba, peniya ndi pumpala kubangatuka, ‘Nenga ndi Jhojho.’ Peniya naumanya nihenga jhe kilebhe chochoha kanjika, nilonge ghala ghamolita Tate gwango.
JOH 8:29 Jhola jwandumita tubhii maghumba nde na nenga, annekite jhe kanjika nhwalo machiko ghoha nihenga ghahanganila.”
JOH 8:30 Bhando bhamahele bhubhanyokanikiya Yecho palongila malobhe gheniya bhajhakunnyeketela.
JOH 8:31 Bhahe, Yecho ajhakwalobholela bhala Akayahude bhubhannyeketile, “Anda mughakengama mabholo ghango, na mangota namma bhabholwa bhango chakaka.
JOH 8:32 Na mangota namuumanya uchakaka naghunekekeya.”
JOH 8:33 Bhajhakunnyanguu Yecho, “Twenga twakachokolo bha Ulahimo, tunabhejhe akabhanda kwa mundo jhojhoha jhola. Nhwalo gwa nike milonge, ‘Na bho, milonge natulekekewa?’”
JOH 8:34 Yecho ajhakwajhanguu, “Ninnobholela chakaka, kila mundo jwatenda uhakaho ndi mmanda jwa uhakaho.
JOH 8:35 Mmanda ahoto jhe kutamikiya pakajha machiko ghoha, nambo mwana atamikiya pakajha machiko ghoha.
JOH 8:36 Mwana gwa Mundo anda anekekiye nanekekeya chakaka.
JOH 8:37 Nimanya mangota lukolo lwa Ulahimo. Umbala kungoma nhwalo mughakana mabholo ghango.
JOH 8:38 Nenga nilonge ghala ghanangiya Tate gwango, nambo mangota muhenga ghala ghunobholilwe na tate gwino.”
JOH 8:39 Bhajhakunyanguu, “Tate gwito Ulahimo.” Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Mangota ngamehe yana ya Ulahimo, nganteile ghahengita Tate gwino Ulahimo.
JOH 8:40 Nenga ninnobholela chakaka ghala ghinyohine kuhumii kwa Chapanga, nambo mangota mwamela mumbala kungoma. Ulahimo akatehi jhe yenio!
JOH 8:41 “Mangota muhenga ghaghala ghala ghatehila tate gwino.” Bhajhakunyanguu, “Twenga twayana ya pakituto jhe, tubhii na Tate gwito ndi Chapanga.”
JOH 8:42 Yecho ajhakwalobholela, “Anda Chapanga ngabhehe Tate gwino, ngaumbahi na nenga, nhwalo na nenga nhumi kwa Chapanga na ngoheno mii pambano. Ikite jhe kwa ukindendeke gwango namwete nambo kwa jhola jwandumita.”
JOH 8:43 Nhwalo gwa nike mibangatuka jhe ghuninobholela? Nhwalo mangota mwipala jhe kujhokanikiya malobhe ghango.
JOH 8:44 Mangota yana ya tate gwino Limbembela, na muhenga ngita tate gwino chaipala. Kuhumi makacho akakomite bhando, jwenio atamajhe muchakaka nhwalo ubhii jhe uchakaka kwa jwenio. Pailongela uwange alonge ngita chayobhalile, nhwalo ndi jwa uwange na tate jwa uwange ghoha.
JOH 8:45 Nhwalo nilongela gha uchakaka, ndi mana mangota minyeketela ndeka.
JOH 8:46 Ghane pakate jhino jwahotola kulonge nenga ngwete uhakaho? Anda nilongela chakaka, nhwalo ghane mwinyeketela ndeka?
JOH 8:47 Mundo jwa Chapanga ajhokanikiya malobhe gha Chapanga. Nambo mangota mighapala ndeka, nhwalo mangota chi bhando bha Chapanga.
JOH 8:48 Akayahude bhajhakunkonya Yecho, “Bho, tukalongii jhe chakaka mwenga kubhehe mwa Samaliya, na hele nkwete nchuka?”
JOH 8:49 Yecho ajhakujhanguu, “Nenga ngwete jhe nchuka, nenga nintembekeya Tate gwango nambo mangota mitenda jhe yenio.
JOH 8:50 Nenga nikipalakihi jhe ung'alicho gwango namwete, amu abhii jhumo jwambalakiya ung'alicho gwenio na jwenio ndi nnyomola mihalo.
JOH 8:51 Chakaka ninnobholela, jwachokolekeya mabholo ghango nahwe jhe natama machiko ghoha.”
