1CO 2:15 Nambo mundo jwakwete Uhuke gwa Chapanga, ahoto kughamanya ghoha, na abhii jhe jhonge jwahoto kunhadabhula.
1CO 2:16 Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghalonge, “Ghane jwahoto kumanya malango gha Bhambo? Ghane jwahoto kunnongocha Bhambo?” Nambo twenga tuwacha ngita Kilichitu chiihwacha.
1CO 3:1 Makalongo bhango, nenga nikahotwii jhe kulonge na mangota anda nilonge na bhando bhubhakwete Uhuke gwa Chapanga. Nipalwa kulonge na mangota anda bhando bha nnema, ngita yana ilemba mu kihobholelo cha Kilichitu.
1CO 3:2 Nipekii mabhele, na chi chakulyegha kijhundupaho, nhwalo ngauhotwii jhe kulyegha. Helahela ngohe mihoto jhe kulyegha.
1CO 3:3 Nhwalo mangota mwamela mitama ngita bhando bha kiyegha chibhatama. Bho, chakaka jhe kubhehe ubhii wiho na bhulo pakate jhino? Mambu ghanga ghalangii chakaka kubhehe mangota ndi bhando bha nnema, mitama ngita bhando bha nnema chibhatama.
1CO 3:4 Jhumo gwino palongela, “Nenga ninkengama Pauli,” na jhonge, “Nenga ninkengama Apolu” Bho, muhenga jhe ngita chibhahenga bhando bha nnema?
1CO 3:5 Apolu ndi ghane? Na Pauli ndi ghane? Twenga ndi akatumiche bha Chapanga kupete lihengo lito mangota nkwete kihobholelo, na kila mundo ahenga lihengo lyapatite na Bhambo.
1CO 3:6 Nenga nikamichite mbejho, Apolu ajhitilile mache, nambo jwamelecha mbejho ndi Chapanga.
1CO 3:7 Jwamicha mbejho na jhola jwajhitilila mache, kilebhe nacho nambo Chapanga kanjika ndi nkolongwa jwaitenda imele.
1CO 3:8 Mundo jhola jwamichite mbejho na jhola jwajhitilila mache bhoha bhahengite kilebhe chimo, nambo Chapanga channepa malepo kila mundo kwa lihengo lyake.
1CO 3:9 Nhwalo twenga tuhenga mahengo pamonga na Chapanga, na mangota ndi nng'onda gwa Chapanga. Mangota ndi nyumba jha Chapanga.
1CO 3:10 Kwa utangatilo gwa umbone gwa Chapanga, nimekite nchinge ngita mundo jwahoto kuchenga mbone, na mundo jhonge kuchenga panane jhake. Nambo kila mundo jwapala kuchenga akilolekiye papala kuchenga panane jhake.
1CO 3:11 Abhii jhe mundo jhonge jwahoto kubheka nchinge ghonge kuliku ghola ghubhekitwe, ndi Yecho Kilichitu.
1CO 3:12 Panane jha nchinge gwenio, mundo jhumo jwahoto kuchenga kwa chaabo, amu kuchenga kwa feza amu kuchenga kwa maghanga gha mbijha ngolongwa, amu kuchenga kwa mikongo, amu kuchenga kwa mahamba amu manyahe.
1CO 3:13 Kwa ndela jhojhoha jhambone jha lihengo lya kila mundo chilibhonekana hotu, mu machiko ghala gha Kilichitu. Nhwalo lichiko lyenio mwotu chaupema kila lihengo lya mundo, na mwotu gwenio naujhigha ngita lyambone.
1CO 3:14 Anda lihengo lya mundo jwenio litinike jhe pamwotu, mundo jwenio chapata hupo,
1CO 3:15 nambo anda chachengite kitinike, bhahe, mundo jwenio najhambulii jhe kilebhe, nambo jwenio chakombwilwe anda aholwite mu mwotu.
1CO 3:16 Bho, mu manyajhe mangota ndi Nyumba jha Chapanga, na Uhuke gwa Chapanga atama nkate jhino?
1CO 3:17 Bhahe, mundo jwahangabhana Nyumba jha Chapanga, Chapanga chahangabhana mundo jwenio. Nhwalo Nyumba jha Chapanga ndi nyahinyahi, na nyumba jhene ndi mangota mabhene.
1CO 3:18 Nkoto kukikolowa mabhene! Mundo jhojhoha pakate jhino jwawacha kubhehe jhuna malango gha pannema, mbaha kubhonekana lindindilima kupala kubhehe na malango chakaka.
1CO 3:19 Nhwalo, malango gha nnema ghongo ndi undindima palonge jha Chapanga. Helahela Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghalonge, “Chapanga ajhakwakamula bhubhabhii na malango mukukalamuka kwabhe.”
1CO 3:20 Kabhele Majhandiko ghange ghalonge, “Bhambo amanya kubhehe mawacho gha bhala bhubhabhii na malango kuchata jhe.”
1CO 3:21 Bhahe, mundo nkotoka kukilokela ghala ghibhahenga bhando. Nhwalo kila kilebhe ndi chino.
1CO 3:22 Abhe Pauli amu abhe Apolu amu Kefa, amu nnema amu ughome amu kuwe, mambu gha chaa jhenje amu ghala ghighapala kuhika palonge, nhwalo ghoha ndi ghino.
1CO 3:23 Nambo mangota ndi bhando bha Kilichitu, na jwenio Kilichitu ndi jwa Chapanga.
1CO 4:1 Kila mundo amanye kubhehe twenga ndi akatumiche bha Kilichitu, tupilwe chile jha Chapanga.
1CO 4:2 Chikipalwa kuhenga kwa mundo jhojhoha jhola jwahengita lihengo lende ndi kubhehe jhuna kihobholelo.
1CO 4:3 Kwa nenga kilebhe jhe kuhadabulwa na mangota, amu na udamo gwa pannema, hilu nikihadabula jhe namwene.
1CO 4:4 Ku mwojho gwango ngwete jhe matakalilo kwa lijhambu lyolyoha, nambo ilangii jhe ngwete jhe jwangokolekeya. Bhambo ndi jwahoto kuhadabula.
1CO 4:5 Bhahe, nkotoka kunhadabhula mundo kabula jha lichaa lyake, muneke ade Bhambo papakuhika. Jwenio chahumbula mambu ghoha ghughabhii mulubhendo, na kubheka hotu ghughabhii umiojho jha bhando. Peniya kila mundo chapata ulumbililo ghutopela kubhoke kwa Chapanga.
1CO 4:6 Makalongo bhango, nintumii Apolu na nenga namwene nhwalo kupete nnandanikiho ghongo mukibhole malobhe ghanga, “Nkamule ghughabhii mu majhandiko ghango.” Nkotoka kukilokela kwa mundo jhumo na kunpucha jhonge.
1CO 4:7 Ghane jwantehi mwenga kubhehe makolongwa kuliku bhange? Bho, Chapanga ammanyite jhe ilebhe yunkwete? Bho, anda mpatite nike chimukilokela anda mpokii jhe?
1CO 4:8 Bho, ngohe mpatite yoha imuipala? Bho, ngohe nkwete ilebhe mbwe? Mmii akanahota panga twenga! Chakaka, nipala mme akanahota ngita twenga mukulongocha pamonga na mangota.
1CO 4:9 Niwacha Chapanga atutehi twenga twakatenga bha bhando bha pahe, ngita bhando bhubhahadabwilwe kuwe, nhwalo tubhii anda unyagho palonge jha nnema ghoha, palonge jha akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga na bhando.
1CO 4:10 Twenga ndi akamandindilima nhwalo gwa kuntumikila Kilichitu, nambo mangota nkwete malango mu kulombana na Kilichitu! Tubhonekana bhando bhubhabhii leghele! Nambo mangota nkwete makakala! Mangota mitopela! Nambo twenga tubhonekana kupecheleka!
1CO 4:11 Ade ngoheno, twenga tukwete njala na nyota, tukwetejhe ngobho, tutyalwa, ngwetejhe pakutama.
1CO 4:12 Kabhele tubhikulagha hake kuhenga lihengo kwa mabhoko ghito twabhete. Putuligwa, twenga twajhopela mota, putung'ahika, twenga tuhimbalila,
1CO 4:13 Putuligwa twenga tujhangula mbone. Ade ngoheno tubhonekana ngita luku lwa nnema, na kwa kila mundo tubhonekana uchapo!
1CO 4:14 Nijhandika ndeka mambu ghanga kupala kwapeke hone, nambo nibhola ngita yana yango inipahile.
1CO 4:15 Ata ngabhehe akayaya elufo kome mu kulombana na Kilichitu, nambo tate gwino ndi jhumo, nhwalo mu kulombana na Yecho Kilichitu nenga ndi tate gwino jwa kunnetela Malobhe gha Mbone.
1CO 4:16 Ngohe, nipembelekeya chonde, nkengame nnandanikiho gwango.
1CO 4:17 Kwa kuntangatila nintuma Timocheyo kwino. Jwenio ndi mwana gwango mu kulombana na Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu, jhunimpala na jwahobholeka. Jwenio nankombocha ndela jhiniikengama nenga mu kulombana na Kilichitu. Ndela jhibhola kila chehemo kwa bhando bhoha bhubhannyeketii Kilichitu.
1CO 4:18 Bhando bhange pakate jhino bhatumbwile kuloka na kulonge nahikajhe kabhele kwino.
1CO 4:19 Nambo, anda Bhambo apahile, chahika kwino kajhombe, peniya ndi chanikinolela namwete chi chela chimilonge majhito bhibhaloka, nambo makakala ghughabhehe nako.
1CO 4:20 Nhwalo unahota nkolongwa gwa Chapanga chi malobhe tugha, nambo ndi likakala.
1CO 4:21 Bho, kilebhe ghane chikinhalalila? Bho, hike kwino nayato amu hike na mwojho gwa upalo na utokomalo?
1CO 5:1 Ghabhii malobhe gha uchakaka kubhehe bhabhii akatenda ngongola pakate jhino, kabhele ngongola yenio inapitila jhe hilu kwa bhando bhangaummanya Chapanga. Nobholilwe kubhehe jhumo gwino igholoka na mwikeghe jwa tate mundo!
1CO 5:2 Nauhotola bhole kuloka? Mbaha kwino kubhehe ngolongondi, na mundo jwahenga mambu gheniya abhengwa pakate jhino.
1CO 5:3 Na nenga, kiyegha mii kutale na mangota, nambo kiuhuke tubhii pamonga, anda mmi pakate jhino ninhadabwii njwe kwa liina lya Bhambo Yecho mundo jwenio jwahengite mambu gheniya gha hone.
1CO 5:4 Pumukonganika pamonga, na nenga mmii na mangota mu uhuke gwango, na likakala lya Bhambo gwito Yecho ibhii peniya,
1CO 5:5 mundo jwenio munkamuye kwa Limbembela kupala yegha jhake ihangalabhanwe na uhuke gwake ukombolelwe lichiko lela Bhambo papakuhika kwahadabuu bhando.
1CO 5:6 Kuloka kwino kuchata jhe! Bho, umanyitii jhe kubhehe kimela chandina kituta libuluma lya ukobha?
1CO 5:7 Mukijhelebhuhe kwa kuileka ngedule gha makacho jha uhakaho na mme mukumuku. Peniya nanandana na libuluma liyono lyangabhekwa ngedule. Ngita chimupalwa kubhehe. Nhwalo, Kilichitu ndi jwabhii Pachaka abhohitwe kubhehe litambiko.
1CO 5:8 Bhahe, tuhenge unyagho gwenio gwa Pachaka, chi kwa libumunda lya makacho, kimela cha ulemo na ubhoho. Nambo kwa libumunda lyangalekelwa ngedule, ndi mwojho gwambone na uchakaka.
1CO 5:9 Nikanyandikile mu baluwa jhango jhenge, nkoto kuhangalwana nako bhibhatenda ngongola.
1CO 5:10 Nilonge jhe kubhehe nkoto kuhangalwa nabho bhando bhangaummanya Chapanga, akatenda ngongola na bhubhapoka ilebhe na bhubhajhima na bhubhalongela uwange na bhubhaijhinamii inyagho. Nhwalo, kupala kwabhambala bheniya ndi ipalwa kubhoka pamba pannema!
1CO 5:11 Nambo ngohe ninyandikila nkoto kuhangalwanwa na mundo jhojhoha jwalonge anyeketela Kilichitu kone ndi ntenda ngongola na nnyime, ajhinamii inyagho na jhuna maligho na jwalobhela na jwapoka ilebhe. Mundongita jwenio nkoto kulye nako.
1CO 5:12 Bho, ndi lihengo lyango kwahadabhula bhando bhubhabhii panja jha bhubhannyeketii Kilichitu? Bho, mangota mipalwa ndeka kwahadabhula bhando bhubhabhii pakate jhino mabhene?
1CO 5:13 Nambo Chapanga jwenio nabhahadabula bhando bheniya bhibhabhii panja jha bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu, ngita Majhandiko gha Chapanga chighalonge, “Mabhenge kutale bheniya bhibhatenda ubhoho pakate jhino.”
1CO 6:1 Mundo anda abulana na nnyake, naibhabho jhumo kuntakalila pa Bwalo jha bhando bhangaummanya Chapanga kuneka kuntakalila kwa bhando bha Chapanga?
1CO 6:2 Bho, mmanyii jhe kubhehe bhando bha Chapanga chibhauhadabula nnema? Anda mangota uhoto kunhadabula nnema, nhwalo ghane mihoto jhe kuhadabula kwa mambu machokomachoko?
1CO 6:3 Bho, mmanyii jhe kubhehe, mangota chamwahadabula akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga? Bhahe, mangota mihoto kuhadabula kuchocha mambu gha ughome ghongo.
1CO 6:4 Pumibhehe na bhulo, bho, mwakema jhe bhando bhangabhehe na ukindendeke kwa bhando bhangannyeketii Kilichitu bhanhadabule? Bho, akajhomola mihalo ndi bhando bhangabhehe na ukindendeke kwa bhando bhubhanyeketii Kilichitu?
1CO 6:5 Nilonge naha mbala nkole hone mabhene! Bho, abhii jhe jhumo pakate jhino jwakwete malango kuhoto kujhomola mihalo pakate jha bhubhannyeketii Kilichitu?
1CO 6:6 Nambo mundo jwanyeketii Kilichitu ajhakunneta pa bwalo na kwaleka bhando bhangaummanya Chapanga bhahadabule!
1CO 6:7 Ibhonekana kutakalilana mabhene kwa mabhene pa bwalo ilangii nnepelile. Bho, kilebhe chambone jhe kwino kuhimbalila ghanganandela? Bho, chambone jhe kwino kupokwa ilebhe hino?
1CO 6:8 Nambo mangota ndi mwatendela ghanganandela na kwapoka, kabhele, gheniya mwatendela bhajhino bhibhanyeketii Kilichitu!
1CO 6:9 Bho, mmanyite jhe kubhehe bhando bhubhahenga ghanganandela nabhabhujhii jhe unahota nkolongwa gwa Chapanga? Mwangakolohana! Bhando bhubhahenga ngongola, bhubhajhinamii inyagho, amu bhubhagholoka na akanalome bhajhabhe,
1CO 6:10 wihe na bhibhapala ilebhe mbwe na bhubhalobhela ughembe na bhubhang'wenya, bhubhakopekeya bhange na bhubhaligha, bheniya bhoha chibhabhujhii jhe unahota nkolongwa gwa Chapanga.
1CO 6:11 Bhange pakate jhino mukibha ngita bhando bheniya. Nambo ngoheno nnekekiwe uhakaho gwino, mmekitwe kubhehe mwa nyahinyahi, na kubhehe mmihobholeka palonge jha Chapanga kwa liina lya Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu na kwa Uhuke gwa Chapanga gwito.
1CO 6:12 Mundo ahoto kulonge, “Kila kilebhe kijhekitelwa kwa nenga.” Telatela, nambo chi kila kilebhe chambone kwa nenga. Nijheketela kubhehe nihoto kulongocha kila kilebhe nambo nipala jhe kubhehe napungwa kwa kilebhe chochoha.
1CO 6:13 Mihoto kulonge, “Chakulyegha ndi kwa nhwalo gwa lutumbo, na lutumbo ndi kwa nhwalo gwa chakulyegha.” Nambo Chapanga chahangabhana yoha. Yegha jha mundo chi kwa nhwalo gwa ngongola nambo kwa nhwalo gwa Bhambo, na Bhambo ndi kwa nhwalo jha yegha.
1CO 6:14 Chapanga jwayokiche Bhambo kubhoke mukuwegha, natuyokicha na twenga helahela kwa likakala lyake.
1CO 6:15 Bho, mmanyitii jhe yegha hino ndi ihungo ya Kilichitu? Bho, miwacha nihoto kutola chehemo jha yegha jha Kilichitu na kuitenda kubhehe chehemo jha yegha jha mundo jwatenda ngongola? Nahi jhe!
1CO 6:16 Bho, umanyite jhe, jwalombana na mwikeghe jwatenda ngongola bhabhii yegha jhimo? Ngita chijhandikwe mu Majhandiko gha Chapanga, “Na bheniya bhabhele nabhabha yegha jhimo.”
1CO 6:17 Nambo jhola jwalombana na Bhambo bhabhehe pamonga ki Uhuke.
1CO 6:18 Mibhambale ngongola. Uhakaho ghoha ghonge ghuhengwa panja jha yegha, nambo jwahenga ngongola ahutende uhakaho yegha jhake jwenio.
1CO 6:19 Bho, mmanyitii jhe kubhehe yegha hino ndi Nyumba jha Uhuke gwa Chapanga jwabhii nkate jhino, jhola mumpokii kubhoke kwa Chapanga? Bhahe, mangota chi gwino mabhene.
1CO 6:20 Nhemelilwe kwa bei ngolongwa. Ngoheno, munnombe Chapanga kwa yegha jhino.
1CO 7:1 Kwa nhwalo gwa ghala ghunyandike. Mbaha munalome akoto kutolela.
1CO 7:2 Nambo kwa nhwalo gwa kubhambala ngongola, mbaha kila munalome abhehe na nhwana mundo, na kila mwikeghe abhehe na ungana mundo.
1CO 7:3 Munalome ahenge ghighapalwa kuhenga kwa nhwana mundo, na jwenio nhwana mundo ahenge ghighapalwa kuhenga kwa ungana mundo.
1CO 7:4 Nhwana mundo akwete jhe kindendeke panane jha yegha jhake, nambo ungana mundo akwete, helahela na jwenio munalome, akwete jhe kindendeke panane jha yegha jhake, nambo nhwana mundo akwete.
1CO 7:5 Kila mundo anganyima jhe nnyake, nambo anda nnyiline ntende pandina tugha, kupala nngongela kwa nhwalo gwa kunnyopa Chapanga. Peniya kila mundo amujhile nnyake kabhele, kupala kulibhambala Limbembela kwa nhwalo jha kubhehe gwangakamilika.
1CO 7:6 Ghanga nilonge nenga, chi malaghalikilo, nipala ntame maha.
1CO 7:7 Nikapahile bhando bhoha bhabhehe ngita nenga, nambo kila mundo jhumo akwete kitoi chake kuhumii kwa Chapanga, jhumo kitoi chenje na jhonge chela.
1CO 7:8 Nambo kwa bhala bhangatolela amu bhibhatolile amu mapwela, nenga nilonge naha yamaha kujhendelela kutama uholo ngita nenga.
1CO 7:9 Nambo anda mundo ahoto jhe kuhimbilila, atolele, amu atolelwe mbaha kutolela amu kutolelwa kuliku kupala ngongola.
1CO 7:10 Kwa bhala bhubhatolile na bhubhatolilwe napela lilaghalikilo lende, chi lilaghalikilo lyango, nambo ndi lya Bhambo, mwikeghe akoto kunneka ungana mundo.
1CO 7:11 Nambo anda atei yenio, bhahe atame uholo, amu ajhelane nako ungana mundo. Helahela munalome akoto kunneka nhwana mundo.
1CO 7:12 Kwa bhando bhange, ne nilonge naha, nambo malobhe ghanga ghahumitii jhe kwa Bhambo. Anda munalome akwete nhwana mundo jwanganyekete Kilichitu, na jwenio nhwana mundo ajheketile kujhendelela kutama na ungana mundo, munalome akotoka kunneka nhwana mundo.
1CO 7:13 Anda mwikeghe akwete munalome jwanganyeketela Kilichitu, na jwenio ungana mundo ajheketile kujhendelela kutama na nhwana mundo, bhahe, mwikeghe jwenio akotoka kunneka ungana mundo.
1CO 7:14 Kwa nhwalo munalome jwangannyeketela Kilichitu napokelelwa na Chapanga kwa kulombana na nhwana mundo. Na mwikeghe jhola jwangannyeketela Kilichitu, Chapanga napokelelwa na Chapanga kwa kulombana na ungana mundo. Anda nahijhe yana yabhe ngaibhii ngita yana yangaummanya Chapanga, nambo ngohe chakaka bheniya ndi yana ya Chapanga.
1CO 7:15 Anda mundo jwannyeketela Kilichitu apala kunneka nnyake jwanyeketela Kilichitu bhahe anneke tugha. Munalome amu mwikeghe jwannyeketela Kilichitu ahibhilikii jhe kutenda yenio. Chapanga atukemite twenga tutame kwa uteeke.
1CO 7:16 Mwe makeghe jhumujheketii Kilichitu, naumanya bho, anda namunkombola jhe ungana gwino? Amu mwenga manalome jhumujheketile Kilichitu naumanya bho namunkombola jhe nhwana gwino?
1CO 7:17 Kila mundo atame tela na kitoi chapekiwe na Bhambo, na ngita akemitwe na Chapanga. Lyenio ndi lilaghalikio lyango kwa bhando bhubhannyeketii Kilichitu.
1CO 7:18 Anda mundo akemitwe na Chapanga kongo jwangajhingii jando, bhahe akotoka kukikopokeya ajhingii jhe jando. Anda mundo pakemitwa ajhingii jhe jando, bhahe akotoka kujhingii jando.
1CO 7:19 Nhwalo kujhingii jando amu changajhingii jando kilebhenacho, kilebhe kikolongwa ndi kukamula lilaghalikilo lya Chapanga.
1CO 7:20 Bhahe, kila mundo na ahighilike ngita chakibha pakemitwa na Chapanga.
1CO 7:21 Bho, mwenga pukemitwa na Chapanga mukibha jhe mmanda? Tela, nkotoka kupwelela, nambo anda mpatite pwache nhenge.
1CO 7:22 Nhwalo jwenio jwakemitwa na Bhambo pakibha mmanda, jwenio jwalekekilwe na Bhambo. Helahela jwakemitwa kongo mmanda jhe, jwenio nabhaha mmanda jwa Kilichitu.
1CO 7:23 Chapanga aunhemile mangota kwa mbijha jhamahele, nkotoka kubhehe akabhanda bha bhando.
1CO 7:24 Makalongo bhango, kila mundo ajhendelele kutama na Chapanga, nhwalo Chapanga abhii pamonga na twenga.
1CO 7:25 Ngohe kwa malobhe gha bhala bhubhatolile na bhangatolelwa, ngwete jhe lilaghalikio kuhumii kwa Bhambo, nambo nenga nilonge ghanga kwa kiya jha Bhambo nitope kuhobholeka.
1CO 7:26 Chinilola nenga mang'ahiko ghughahika, mbaha ahighilike ngita chakibha.
1CO 7:27 Bho, ntolile? Bhahe, mangalogwa jhe kunneka. Bho, ntolii jhe? Mangalogwa jhe kutolela.
1CO 7:28 Nambo anda ntolile, naibhaha uhengite jhe uhakaho, anda nchikana atolilwe, ahengite jhe uhakaho, nambo bhala bhibhatola chibhapata mang'ahiko ghamahele mu ughome ghongo, na nenga nipala gheniya ghamambale mangota.
1CO 7:29 Nambo makalongo bhango, mbala kulonge naha, machiko ghahighilike ghandina. Kutumbula ngoheno bhala bhibhatolile na bhatame ngita bhala bhangatolela,
1CO 7:30 na bhubhalela bhabhehe anda bhangalela, na bhala bhibhaheka bhabhehe ngita bhangahangana. Na bhala bhibhahemela, ilebhe yenio ibhehe ngita yabhe jhe.
1CO 7:31 Na bhubhabhii mukukakalakana kupalaha ilebhe ya pannema pano bhabha ngita bhando bhangakakalakana. Nhwalo nnema ghongo anda tumanye utenda kupeta.
1CO 7:32 Nambo mbala mangota ntame changa kiholo. Mundo jwangatolela akakalakana lihengo lya Bhambo, kone ajhigha kunhalalicha Bhambo.
1CO 7:33 Nambo munalome jwatolile akakalakana mambu gha nnema, anhalaliche nhwana mundo,
1CO 7:34 ahutilwa na ilebhe ibhele. Mwikeghe jwangatolelwa ukakalakana na mambu gha Bhambo kupala abhehe nyahinyahi yegha na uhuke kwa Bhambo. Nambo jhola jwatolilwe ukakalakana na mambu gha nnema, kwa kunhalalila ungana mundo.
1CO 7:35 Nilonge naha nipala kuntangatila mangota, nipala jhe kuhibhilikiya kwa chochoha, nambo ntame ngita chiipalwa na kukibhoha mabhene mu mahengo gha Bhambo changahutilwa na mambu ghange.
1CO 7:36 Anda mundo alola ahenga mbone jhe kuntolela jhe mwikeghe jwannepii inyaghabhule, anda kuhimbilila chepa mbaha atole, anda antolile mwikeghe jwenio ahenga jhe uhakaho.
1CO 7:37 Anda munalome alola tela kutama changatolela na ahoto kuhimbalila, mmanya kubhehe ahenga mbone kutama changa tolela jwenio nchikana.
1CO 7:38 Jhola jwapala kutolela mwikeghe ahenga mbone, na jhola jwangatolela ahenga mbone hake.
1CO 7:39 Mwikeghe jwatolilwe apungitwe na ungana mundo anda abhii ughome. Nambo anda ungana mundo awile, bhahe mwikeghe jwenio ahoto kutolelwa na mwanalome jhonge jwampala, nambo abhehe jwanhobhelela Kilichitu.
1CO 7:40 Nambo panola nenga, mwikeghe jwenio nabhaha na luhangano hake anda ahighilike changatolelwa. Gheniya nilola nenga pange ngwete Uhuke gwa Chapanga.
1CO 8:1 Ngohe kwa nhwalo gwa yakulyegha ikatambikilwe mahoka. Tumanya kubhehe twenga twabhoha ilebhe henge, nambo kumanya kwenio kwabheka bhando kukiloka, nambo upalo uchenga.
1CO 8:2 Jwawacha kubhehe amanya kilebhe, chakaka amela amanyite jhe chochoha anda chiipala kumanya.
1CO 8:3 Nambo mundo jwampahi Chapanga, jwenio amanyikine na jwenio.
1CO 8:4 Kwa gheniya, panane jha kulyegha itambikilwe mahoka, tumanya chakaka kubhehe inyagho kilebhenacho pannema, tumanya Chapanga ndi jhumo tugha.
1CO 8:5 Ata bhakabhii bheniya bhibhakemwa inyagho pannema amu kunane kwa Chapanga, ata bhakabhii inyagho na akanahota bhamahele,
1CO 8:6 kwito abhii Chapanga jhumo tugha, Tate, jwapangine ilebhe yoha, kwa nhwalo gwake twenga tutama. Helahela abhii Bhambo jhumo tugha, jwenio ndi Yecho Kilichitu, kwa kupete kwa jwenio ilebhe yoha ipanginwe, na twenga tutama kwa kupete jwenio.
1CO 8:7 Nambo, chi kila mundo jwamanya uchakaka ghongo. Bhando bhange bhayobhalile hake mahoka, ade deleno pubhalyegha yakulyegha itambikilwe mahoka uhobholela njwe mumiojho jhabhe kubhehe ipihitwe yakula yenio ya mahoka. Kwa uhotolo gwa kuhaghu ghambone na ghanganandela ukwetii jhe likakala bhahola yakulye yenio yatenda bhakota kujheketelwa palonge jha Chapanga.
1CO 8:8 Nambo chakulye kihoto jhe kutubheka pahina na Chapanga. Anda tulekite kulyegha kibhii jhe chikipongoka, anda tulyegha kibhii jhe chikijhonjekeka.
1CO 8:9 Nambo mukilolekeye, pumulekekewa kuhenga ilebhe, nkoto kwatenda bhubhabhii na kihobholelo chandina bhatende uhakaho.
1CO 8:10 Nhwalo, mundo jwabhii na uhotolo gwandina gwa kuhaghula lyambone na libhoho, anda amwene mangota bhakwete kihobholelo kikolongwa mulyegha yakulya yenio nkate mwa nyumba jha inyagho, bho, chabhe jhe na mwojho gwa kulyegha yakulyegha itambikilwe mahoka?
1CO 8:11 Ngohe, jwenio nnongo gwino jwabhii na uhotolo gwandina gwa kumanya lyamaha na libhoho, jhojho jwenio Kilichitu akawile kwa nhwalo gwake chahobhelela ndeka kwa nhwalo gwa kumanya kwino.
1CO 8:12 Anda uhenga mambu gheniya kwa ajhino bhubhajheketii Kilichitu, na kuikocholana uhotolo ileghelike kwa kuhaghuu lyamaha na libhoho, mmanye uhenga uhakaho kwa Kilichitu.
1CO 8:13 Anda chakulye chinilyegha kintenda nnongo gwango ahenge uhakaho, nilyejhe nyama kabhele, ngoto kuntenda nnongo gwango agwe muhakaho.
1CO 9:1 Bho, ne nekekiwe jhe? Bho, ne natenga jhe? Bho, nenga nimwe jhe Yecho Bhambo gwito? Bho, mangota lihengo lyango jhe kwa kulombana na Bhambo?
1CO 9:2 Ata ikabhii kwa bhando bhange ne natenga jhe, nambo kwino mangota nenga ndi natenga. Mangota ndi mulangiya utenga gwango kwa nhwalo gwa kulombana kwino na Bhambo.
1CO 9:3 Naha chinikikengelela kwa bhando bhubhangonya,
1CO 9:4 bho, tupalwa ndeka kupelwa chakulye na chakunywegha kwa nhwalo gwa lihengo lito?
1CO 9:5 Bho, tukwete jhe ukindendeke gwa kutolela mwikeghe jwahobholela Kilichitu mukutyanga, ngita chibhahenga akatenga bhange, akalongo bhake Bhambo, na Kefa?
1CO 9:6 Amu ndi nenga na Banaba tugha tupalwa kupata ilebhe hito kwa kuhenga lihengo?
1CO 9:7 Bho, nkomana ngondo ghane jwalepa mbijha kwa lihengo lyake? Bho, nnema ghane jwangalyegha uhoe gwa nng'onda gwake gwa chambalau? Bho, nnucha ghane jwaikoleka jwanganywegha mabhele gha inyama yake?
1CO 9:8 Bho, nilonge malobhe ghanga kwa kimundo tugha? Bho, lilaghalikilo lya Mucha ilongela jhe naha?
1CO 9:9 Nhwalo ijhandikwe mu lilaghalikilo lya Mucha, “Nkotoka kuntabha nnomo ng'ombi pabula mponga.” Bho, ibhii na mana Chapanga ilongelela ng'ombi?
1CO 9:10 Bho, palongela gheniya alongii jhe panane jha malobhe ghito? Chakaka ghanga ghajhandikwe kwa nhwalo gwito, nhwalo jhola jwalema na jhola jwahuna, bhoha bhihobholela kupata mahuno.
1CO 9:11 Anda twenga tumichita mbejho jha kiuhuke pakate jhino, bho, kilebhe kikolongwa twenga kupata ghitupala kuhumii kwino?
1CO 9:12 Anda bhando bhange bhipalwa kupata gheniya kubhoke kwino, bho, twenga tupalwa jhe kupata kuliku bhene? Nambo, twenga tuntumii jhe ukindendeke gwenio. Tuhimbilila mu kila kilebhe kupala Lilobhe lya Mbone lya Kilichitu likotoka kubhujha unyuma.
1CO 9:13 Bho, umanyingine jhe kubhehe bhubhahenga lihengo mu Nyumba jha Chapanga bhipata yakulegha mwenio, na bhubhabheka litambiko pakichangwale bhipata kilebhe mwenio mu litambiko?
1CO 9:14 Helahela Bhambo akalaghalikiye naha, bhala bhibhatangachii bhando Lilobhe lya Mbone bhapate ilebhe yabhe ibhaipala kubhoke mwenio.
1CO 9:15 Nambo nikajhopite jhe hilu kilebhe chimo. Amu nikajhandike ndeka kupala undendele gheniya. Kwa nenga mbaha kuwegha kuliku kuntenda mundo anole anda nenga nikiloka jhajhe.
1CO 9:16 Anda nenga nitangacha Malobhe gha Mbone, chenie kilebhe jhe cha kukiloka. Lyenio ndi lihengo limpekiwe. Chanola choto anda natangachii jhe bhando Lilobhe lya Mbone!
1CO 9:17 Anda nihenga lihengo lende kwa kupala namwete, ngahobholile kulepwa, nambo anda nenga nipalwa kuhenga lihengo lende, ilangii kubhehe Chapanga ambekii nenga kuhenga lende.
1CO 9:18 Bho, malepo ghango kilebhe ghane? Panatangachii bhando nipala jhe kulepwa chochoha, nijhopa jhe malepo kwa lihengo lya kutangacha Lilobhe lya Mbone.
1CO 9:19 Nenga nabhanda jhe bha mundo jhojhoha. Nikibhekite nabhanda kwa kila mundo nhwalo kunnete Kilichitu bhando bha mahele.
1CO 9:20 Punikibha kwa Akayahude ndamita ngita Akayahude kupala kwapata Akayahude, pamonga na nenga kubhehe pahe jha lilaghalikilo lya Mucha, nambo nikibha ngita pahe jha lilaghalikilo lyenio, kupala kwapata bheniya bhubhabhii pahe jha lilaghalikilo lya Mucha.
1CO 9:21 Punikibha na bhando bhangalongochwa na lilaghalikilo lya Mucha, nikibha ngita bheniya ngita ngwetejhe lilaghalikilo, kupala kwapata bhala bhangabhehe na lilaghalikilo lya Mucha. Kulonge yenio nenga anda nikengama jhe lilaghalikilo lya Chapanga, nhwalo mbungwitwe na lilaghalikilo lya Kilichitu.
1CO 9:22 Punikibha na bhando bhala bhubhabhii leghele nikatamite helahela ngita chibhabhii bhene, kupala kwapata bhene bhubhabhii leghelike. Nikitehi kila kilebhe kwa bhando bhoha kupala kwakombola kwa ndela jhojhoha jhela.
1CO 9:23 Hengite ghanga ghoha kwa nhwalo gwa Lilobhe lya Mbone, na nenga mbate mota yake.
1CO 9:24 Bho, umanya jhe bhando pa bhabhutuka, bhoha bhabhutuka, nambo jhola jwabhalongolela bhajhake ndi jwapata hupo? Mmutuke yenio mpate hupo.
1CO 9:25 Mundo jhojhoha jwapala kwapeta bhajhake mukubhutuka, hote aghaleka ghoha, ahenga naha kupala apate hupo jhihangabhika! Nambo twenga tuhenga naha kwa nhwalo gwa kupata kilemba changahangabhika.
1CO 9:26 Yene nibhutuka ngita mundo jhumbala kwalongolela, nikomana jhe ngita mundo akomana na upepo.
1CO 9:27 Nambo ning'ahicha yegha jhango na kulongocha, nihenga yenio kupala pumbala kujhomolela kwatangachii bhando bhange ne namwete ngoto kukanilwa mukupoke hupo.
1CO 10:1 Makalongo bhango, nipala umanye kubhehe akahoko bhito bhatyangita kongo bhalongwichwa na lihunde, na bhoha bhajhakujhomboka njelembo mbwane ngele.
1CO 10:2 Bhoha bhakabatichwe bhabhehe bha Mucha mulihunde lela na mumbwane.
1CO 10:3 Bhoha bhalila chakulyegha chechelachela cha kiuhuke,
1CO 10:4 helahela bhanywila chela cha kiuhuke, nhwalo bhakanywile kubhoke mulindalabho lya kiuhuke lilyakengima, lindalabho lyenio likibha Kilichitu jwenio.
1CO 10:5 Nambo, bhando bhamahele bhahengita jhe ilebhe yaipala Chapanga, na mahele bhakawile na malelo ghabhe ghakapechingine kunjenga.
1CO 10:6 Ngohe, mambu gheniya ghoha ndi nnandanikiho tugha kwito, ghatukelebhuwa kuhenga mabhoho ngita bheniya chibhahengita.
1CO 10:7 Nkoto kuijhinamii inyagho ngita bhange chibhahengita, ngita Majhandiko chighalonge, “Bhando bhakatamite mukulye na kunywegha, bhajhakujhema na kukina kingongola.”
1CO 10:8 Mwangatenda jhe ngongola, ngita bhange chibhatenda bhando bhange, lichiko limo bhando elufo ichilini na tato bhajhakukomolekelwa.
1CO 10:9 Nkoto kunnyigha Bhambo Kilichitu ngita bhando bhange chibhanyighita, bhoha bhakawile kwa kulumwa na lijhoka!
1CO 10:10 Nkotoka kukokoleka ngita bhando bhange chibhatehila, na bhene bhakakomilikilwa na ntumiche jwa kunane kwa Chapanga jwakoma!
1CO 10:11 Bhahe, mambu gheniya ghakapitile kupala twenga tubholwe, ghakajhandikwe kwa nhwalo gwa kutukanikiya twenga kubhehe machiko ghabhandikii kujhomolela.
1CO 10:12 Jwahambuka ajhemite nganganga, akilolekiye akotoka kugwegha!
1CO 10:13 Majhighanikilo ghumpatite maghene jhe kwa bhando. Chapanga ndi jwahobholeka, jwenio anneka jhe mangota kupeta makakala ghino. Nambo pumujhighanikilwa, jwenio nampela makakala gha kuhimbalila na ndela jha kupitila.
1CO 10:14 Kwa nhwalo gwenio, makalongo bhango bhunimpala, ntame kutale na kujhinamila inyagho.
1CO 10:15 Nilonge na mangota ngita bhando bhina malango, uhwache mabhene gheniya ghinilongela.
1CO 10:16 Putunnomba Chapanga kwa kikombe chela cha mota, bho, tubhehe jhe pamonga mu miyahe jha Kilichitu? Na putumetula libumunda, bho, tubhehe jhe pamonga muyegha jha Kilichitu?
1CO 10:17 Nhwalo libumunda lyenio limo, na twenga bhitubhii twe ndi yegha jhimo, nhwalo bhoha tulye libumunda lyenio.
1CO 10:18 Dolekeya bhando bha ku Ichilahele bhene, bhala bhubhalila litambiko bhilombana na kachangwale kupete matambiko gheniya.
1CO 10:19 Ngohe nilonge nike? Kubhehe chakulyegha chikitambikilwe inyagho ndi kikolongwa kuliku chakulyegha? Bho, na inyagho yenio itangatila nike?
1CO 10:20 Ng'oo! Chinilongela ndi chenje, litambiko lya bhando bhangaumanya Chapanga bhahipikiya michuka, nambo Chapanga jhe. Ne mbahijhe mangota mme maghumba nde na michuka.
1CO 10:21 Mihotojhe kunywelekeya kikombi cha Bhambo na kongo mukinywelekeya kikombi cha michuka, mihoto ndeka kulye chakulyegha cha Bhambo na kongo mulye chakulya cha michuka.
1CO 10:22 Bho, tupala Bhambo abhehe na wiho? Bho, miwacha tubhii na makakala kuliku jwenio?
1CO 10:23 Bhando bhange bhilonge, “Ilebhe yoha ikanikiwa ndeka,” nambo ne nilonge yoha yamaha jhe. Peniya bhange bhalonge, “Ilebhe yoha ikanikiwa ndeka,” nambo ne nilonge ilebhe yoha jhe ichenga.
1CO 10:24 Mundo jhojhoha pakate jhino akotoka kupalaya ghambone gha kuntangatii jwenio, nambo apalaha gha mbone kwa nhwalo gwa ajhake.
1CO 10:25 Yoha ichuluchwa mulighuliho lya nyama mihoto kulye changakonyakonya nhwalo gwa kuhengeleka umiojho.
1CO 10:26 Nhwalo Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge, “Nnema na ilebhe yoha ibhii nkate ndi ya Bhambo.”
1CO 10:27 Anda mundo jwangannyeketela Kilichitu ankemangana mukalye kajhake, na mangota nnyeketile kujhenda. Nnyakile chochoha kichibhekitwe palonge jhino changakukonyakonya kwa nhwalo gwa mwojho ghino.
1CO 10:28 Nambo anda mundo jwannobholela mangota, “Chakulyegha chenje kitambikilwe inyagho,” mangalye jhe kwa nhwalo gwa jwenio jwannobholile na kwa nhwalo gwa mwojho.
1CO 10:29 Nilonge, Kwa nhwalo gwa mwojho gwa jhonge. Mundo jhonge anda ankonyite, “Nhwalo gwa nike kukombolelwa kwango kuhadabulwe na mwojho gwa mundo jhonge?
1CO 10:30 Anda ninchenguu Chapanga kwa chinilyegha, nhwalo gwa nike mundo jhonge alongele ghangana ndela kwa kilebhe chenie chinichenguu Chapanga?”
1CO 10:31 Bhahe, chochoha chimuhenga, kibhehe ndi kulye na kunywegha, ntende ghoha kwa ung'alicho gwa Chapanga.
1CO 10:32 Nkotoka kwatenda Akayahude amu kwa Akagilike amu kwa bhando bha Chapanga bhubhanyeketii Kilichitu bhakobondoke.
1CO 10:33 Mme ngita nenga, ne nipala kwahalalicha bhando bhoha kwa ghoha ghunihenga. Nhwalo nikipalakii jhe ghambone namwete tugha, nambo nipalaha kwa nhwalo gwa bhando bhoha bhakombolelwe.
1CO 11:1 Ungengame nenga ngita nenga chininkengama Kilichitu.
1CO 11:2 Ninumbalila nhwalo minngomboka kwa kila kilebhe na kughakamula malaghalikilo ghunipekii.
1CO 11:3 Nambo nipala kabhele mmanye kubhehe Kilichitu ndi muto gwa kila munalome, na munalome ndi muto gwa nhwana mundo, Chapanga ndi muto gwa Kilichitu.
1CO 11:4 Bhahe, kila munalome jwannyinamila Chapanga amu jwatangacha lilobhe lya Chapanga kongo apukite muto gwake jwampela hone Kilichitu.
1CO 11:5 Na mwikeghe jhojhoha pannyinamii Chapanga amu kutangacha malobhe gha Chapanga changapuka muto gwake, ampela hone munalome jwake, jwatehila naha tela tugha na mwikeghe jwachekwile majhunjo umuto.
1CO 11:6 Mwikeghe jwangapukita muto gwake, mbaha achekule majhunjo ghake. Nambo anda ibhii hone kwa mwikeghe kuchekula amu kupungucha majhunjo ghake, bhahe, mbaha apuke muto gwake.
1CO 11:7 Munalome yamaha jhe kupuka muto gwake, nhwalo jwenio ndi nnandanikiho gwa Chapanga na ung'alicho gwake Chapanga. Nambo mwikeghe ndi ung'alicho gwa munalome.
1CO 11:8 Munalome apitii jhe kwa mwikeghe, nambo mwikeghe apitii kwa munalome.
1CO 11:9 Munalome apanginwe jhe kwa nhwalo gwa mwikeghe, nambo mwikeghe apanganiwe kwa nhwalo gwa munalome.
1CO 11:10 Ndi nhwalo mwikeghe ipuka muto gwake kubhehe ukindendeke ghubhii panane jhake na kwa akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga.
1CO 11:11 Helahela, palonge jha Bhambo mwikeghe akihobholela ndeka changa munalome, na jwenio munalome akihobholela ndeka changa mwikeghe.
1CO 11:12 Anda hela mwikeghe chapitila kwa munalome, helahela munalome abhelwike na mwikeghe, nambo kila kilebhe kihuma kwa Chapanga.
1CO 11:13 Nnyomole mabhene, bho, chambone mwikeghe kunnyinamii Chapanga kongo apukite jhe kilebhe chochoha umuto gwake?
1CO 11:14 Chapanga papangina ilangii hotu munalome kubhehe na majhunjo mandandamaho ndi hone jhake,
1CO 11:15 nambo kwa mwikeghe anda abhii na majhunjo mandandamaho, chenie ndi kilebhe chamaha kwa jwenio. Nhwalo apekilwe majhunjo mandandamaho ghampuke.
1CO 11:16 Mundo anda ipala kutaungana pakate jha lijhambu lende, twenga tukwete jhe ghutuyobhalile ghange, hilu bhando bha Chapanga bhubhahobhalile Kilichitu bhakwete jhe ghabhayobhalila ghange.
1CO 11:17 Mu malaghalikilo ghanga ghughahika ninombangana jhe, nhwalo mu makonganiko ghino gha kunnyinamii Chapanga mughatenda ghanganandela kuliku ghambone.
1CO 11:18 Pukutumbulila, pumukonganika pamonga upitii mpechangano pakate jhino, na nenga pandina nilipala lijhambu lende.
1CO 11:19 Ipalwa pabhehe na mpechangano pakate jhino, kupala bhala bhibhanyeketela Chapanga bhamanyikane.
1CO 11:20 Pumukonganika pamonga, mihola miilye chakulya cha kunkomboka Bhambo kone nahi jhe!
1CO 11:21 Nhwalo pakulyegha, kila mundo alyegha changa lendelela bhange, ade bhange bhabhehe na njala kone bhange bhalobhile!
1CO 11:22 Bho, mihoto jhe kulye na kunywegha kajha kwino? Amu bho, mwapechelecha bhando bha Chapanga bhubhanyeketii Kilichitu na kwapeke hone bhene bhanga kilebhe? Ngohe ninobholele nike? Bho, ninombe? Ng'oo! Ninomba jhe kwa lijhambu lende.
1CO 11:23 Nhwalo nenga mbokii kuhumii kwa Bhambo malaghalikilo ghunimpekii, Bhambo Yecho pajhambilwa uhiko ghola, ajhakutola libumunda,
1CO 11:24 pajhomolila kunchenguu Chapanga, ajhakumetula, ajhakulonge, “Jhenjeno ndi yegha jhango jhunibhoha kwa nhwalo gwino mangota, ntende naha kwa kungomboka nenga.”
1CO 11:25 Helahela pubhajhomolila kulyegha, ajhakutola kibaba, ajhakulonge: “Chenjeno ndi kibaba cha lilaghano liyono lya miyahe jhango. Ntende naha kila pumunywegha kwa kungomboka nenga.”
1CO 11:26 Nhwalo kila mukulyegha libumunda na kunywela kibaba chenje, mutangacha kuwe kwa Bhambo, ade papalakuhika kabhele.
1CO 11:27 Yene, mundo jhojhoha jwalyegha libumunda hele amu kuinywela kibaba jha Bhambo changatopela, jwenio chabhehe atei uhakaho kwa yegha na miyahe jha Bhambo.
1CO 11:28 Bhahe, kila mundo akilolekiye jwenio, peniya ndi ahoto kulyegha libumunda lende na kunywela kibaba chenie.
1CO 11:29 Nhwalo mundo jhojhoha jwalyegha na kunywegha abhehe na uchakaka ndi yegha jha Bhambo, changatenda yenio akiletela luhadabulo jwenio.
1CO 11:30 Ndi mana bhando bhamahele pakate jhino bhaleghelike na bhange bhilwalwa, na bhange bhajhomwike.
1CO 11:31 Anda tukihingukiye mbone, ngatuhadabwilwe jhe na Chapanga.
1CO 11:32 Nambo putuhadabulwa na Bhambo, tubholwa kutama mbone, tukoto kuhadabulwa pamonga na bhando bhangaumanya Chapanga pannema.
1CO 11:33 Kwa ghanga, makalongo bhango, pumukukonganika kulye chakulya cha Bhambo, kila jhumo annendelela nnyake.
1CO 11:34 Mundo anda abhii na njala, alya kajhake, pumukonganika nkotoka kuhadabulwa na Chapanga. Nambo ghange, chinimmola pumbalakuhika.
1CO 12:1 Ngohe makalongo bhango, nipala umanye mbone kwa malobhe gha itoi kuhumii kwa Uhuke gwa Chapanga.
1CO 12:2 Mmanye kubhehe, mmanyite jhe Chapanga, mukalongwichwe mundela yanganandela kuijhinamii inyagho yanga bhehe na ughome.
1CO 12:3 Bhahe, nipala umanye kubhehe mundo jhojhoha jwalongochwa na Uhuke gwa Chapanga ahoto kulonge, “Yecho alapanikile!” Helahela, abhii jhe mundo jhojhoha jwahoto kulonge, “Yecho ndi Bhambo,” pangalongochwa na Uhuke gwa Chapanga.
1CO 12:4 Ibhii itoi yamahele, nambo Uhuke jwaibhoha ndi jhumo.
1CO 12:5 Ibhii ndela yamahele mukunhengela, nambo Bhambo jwatunhengela ndi jhumo.
1CO 12:6 Ibhii ndela yamahele mukuhenga lihengo, nambo Chapanga ndi jhumo jwenio jwahenga mahengo ghoha kwa bhando bhoha.
1CO 12:7 Chapanga iyekulila kila mundo kwa kwatangatila bhando bhoha.
1CO 12:8 Uhuke ampekii jhumo malobhe gha malango, na Uhuke jhojho ampekii jhonge uhotolo gwa kumanya ilebhe ngita champala jwenio Uhuke.
1CO 12:9 Uhuke jhojho ampekii mundo kihobholelo, na Uhuke jhojho ampekii kitoi cha kwalamicha bhibhalwalwa,
1CO 12:10 Uhuke gwa Chapanga ampekii jhonge uhotolo gwa kuhenga ikangacho, Uhuke jhojho ampekii jhonge uhotolo gwa kubhoha ulondole gwa Chapanga, na jhonge kulekanicha uhuke gwa Chapanga na yangabhehe ya Uhuke gwa Chapanga, jhonge alonge kwa lugha jhangamanyikana na jhonge kitoi cha kuchimulila chikilongelwa.
1CO 12:11 Lyenio lyoha ndi lihengo lya Uhuke jwenio jhumo, na jwenio imaghulila kila mundo kitoi ngita chapala jwenio.
1CO 12:12 Yegha ndi jhimo ipanginwe na ihungo yamahele, na pamonga ubhii na ilebhe yamahele, nambo ipangine yegha jhimo, yenio ndi chibhii kwa Kilichitu.
1CO 12:13 Nhwalo twenga tubatichwe kwa Uhuke ghumo tubhehe yegha jhimo, tubhehe Akayahude amu bhangabhehe Akayahude, tubhehe twakabhanda amu twakabhanda jhe, bhoha tunywelichwe Uhuke jhojho jhumo.
1CO 12:14 Yegha ipanginwe jhe na kihungo chimo, nambo ibhii ihungo yamahele.
1CO 12:15 Lukongono anda lulongela, “Nhwalo nenga nalubhoko jhe, bhahe nenga jwa yegha jhe,” bho, lukongono lubhehe lwa yegha jhe? Nahi jhe!
1CO 12:16 Anda lichikilo lilongile, “Nhwalo nenga jwa liho jhe, bhahe, nenga jwa yegha jhe,” bho, nhwalo lichikilo jwa yegha jhe? Nahi jhe!
1CO 12:17 Anda yegha jhoha ngaibhehe liho, nganyohine bho? Anda yegha jhoha ngaibhehe lichikilo, ngatunuite bho?
1CO 12:18 Nambo Chapanga abhekite kila ihungo kila chehemo mu yegha ngita chapahile.
1CO 12:19 Ngita ihungo yoha anda ngakibhehe kihungo chimo, bho, yegha ngaibhii koo?
1CO 12:20 Uchakaka ndi kubhehe, ibhii ihungo yamahele, nambo yegha ndi jhimo.
1CO 12:21 Bhahe, liho lihoto ndeka kunnobholela lubhoko, “Nimpahi jhe mwe.” Hilu muto uhoto jhe kughalobholela makongono, “Ngwete malola na magholo.”
1CO 12:22 Nambo kupeta gheniya, kubhehe ihungo yenio ya yegha ibhonekana kubhehe ileghelike, yenio ndi ipalwa hake.
1CO 12:23 Kabhele ihungo hela tulonge kubhehe yanganandela, ndi ibhekwa mbone hake, na ihungo ibhonekana yambone jhe tuighubikila mbone.
1CO 12:24 Nambo ihungo ibhonekana yambone hake, ipalwa jhe kulolekewa mbone. Chapanga jwenio abhekite yenio yegha, na chikipela utopaho chela chikiponokiwa,
1CO 12:25 kupala kwangabhehe jhe na mpechangano payegha, nambo ipagwa yoha itangatilane.
1CO 12:26 Anda kihungo chimo kilwalwa, bhahe, ipagwa yoha ilwalwa pamonga na chenie, anda kihungo chimo kilombwitwe, ihungo yoha ihangana pamonga na chenie.
1CO 12:27 Bhahe, mangota mabhoha ndi yegha jha Kilichitu, kila jhumo ndi kihungo cha yegha jhenie.
1CO 12:28 Mu lilongo lya bhando bhubhajheketii Kilichitu, hote Chapanga abhekite akatenga na jwa ubhele milondole bha Chapanga na jwa utato bhabhola na jwa ncheche bhala bhubhatenda ikangacho, bhala bhubhapekiwe makakala gha kwalamicha bhibhalwalwa, na bhubhahoto kwatangatii bhando bhange, peniya ilongoche na bhubhalonge lugha jhangamanyikana.
1CO 12:29 Bho, bhando bhoha ndi akatenga? Bho, bhando bhoha ndi milondole bha Chapanga? Bho, bhando bhoha ndi bhabhola? Bho, bhando bhoha bhakwete kitoi cha kuhenga ikangacho?
1CO 12:30 Bho, bhando bhoha bhakwete kitoi cha kulamicha bhando? Bho, bhando bhoha bhakwete kitoi cha kulonge lugha jhangamanyikana? Bho, bhoha bhichimulila lugha jhibhalongela?
1CO 12:31 Yene mwipale hake itoi ibhii ikolongwa. Na nenga ngohe chaninangiya ndela jha mbone hake kupeta yoha.
1CO 13:1 Pange nongele lugha jha bhando na lugha jha akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga, nambo anda ngwete jhe upalo, bhahe, nenga nanandana na lipenenga lililela jhajhe amu nalingengecha.
1CO 13:2 Pange nkwete kitoi chukutangacha lilobhe lya Chapanga, na kumanya chile yoha na kumanya kila kilebhe, anda ngwete kihobholelo cha kubhoha itombe, nambo anda ngwete jhe upalo ne kilebhe nacho.
1CO 13:3 Anda pange napekii akahocho ilebhe yango yoha nu kuibheka yegha jhango m umwotu itinike, nambo anda ngwete jhe upalo ne kilebhe nacho.
1CO 13:4 Mundo jwabhii na upalo uhimbilila, na ubhehe na kiya, akwete jhe wiho, akitondobhehe jhe hilu kuloka.
1CO 13:5 Mundo jhuna upalo utembekeya, akipalakii jhe yambone yake jwenio, hilu ajhojhoke jhe mulilaka, aghabheka jhe ghanganandela mumwojho,
1CO 13:6 mundo jhuna upalo ahanganii jhe ghangana ndela, nambo ahanganila gha ukwele.
1CO 13:7 Mundo jhuna upalo ahimbalila yoha, ujheketela ghoha, uhobholela ghoha na ulepelela jhe na lyolyoha.
1CO 13:8 Upalo ujhomoka jhe. Anda kibhii kitoi cha ulondole gwa Chapanga chakijhomokela, anda kibhii kitoi cha kulonge kwa lugha jhangamanyikana, chenio nakujhomokela, anda kibhii kitoi cha kumanya, na chenie nakipeta.
1CO 13:9 Nhwalo kumanya kwito na kupiya kwito ulondole gwa Chapanga kupongwike.
1CO 13:10 Nambo chela chikitwelile pikipala kuhika, chela kipengwa nakihobholela.
1CO 13:11 Punikibha mwana king'enya, nongila ngita mwana, nikamanyite ngita mwana, nikawachii ngita mwana. Nambo pungolita nikaghalekite ghoha ghauhwana.
1CO 13:12 Chitukibhona ngohe ndi ngita kulolekeya mu lindala lela changabhonekana maha, nambo palonge natulola miho kwa miho. Nambo ngohe nimanya pandina tugha, peniya palonge chamanya ghoha ngita chighapalwa, ngita Chapanga chamanya nenga.
1CO 13:13 Ngohe ghatamakii mambu ghanga matato, kihobholelo na lihobholelo na upalo, nambo kilebhe kikolongwa kupeta ghoha ndi upalo.
1CO 14:1 Nkengame upalo. Nambo jha kuchocha itoi ya kumwojho ya Uhuke gwa Chapanga, ngolongwa ndi kupiya ulondole gwa Chapanga.
1CO 14:2 Mundo jwalonge lugha yangamanyikana, jwenio alongii jhe na bhando nambo alonge na Chapanga, nhwalo abhii jhe mundo jwamanya chalongela, alonge mambu ghighahitwe kwa likakala lya Uhuke gwa Chapanga.
1CO 14:3 Nambo jhola jwapiya ulondole gwa Chapanga gwa kutangacha lilobhe lya Chapanga, ilonge na bhando na kwatangatila, kwa abhaleke na kwapepecha miojho.
1CO 14:4 Jwalongela lugha jhangamanyikana, akichenga jwenio, nambo jhola jwapiya ulondole gwa Chapanga, abhakangamalicha bhando bhubhanyeketii Kilichitu.
1CO 14:5 Bhahe, nenga ngambahi mangota mabhoha nnongele kwa lugha jhangamanyikana, nambo chikipala hake ndi kupiya ulondole gwa kutangacha lilobhe lya Chapanga. Nhwalo mundo jhola jwapiya ulondole gwa lilobhe lya Chapanga ihenga ghambone kuliku jhola jwapiya ulondole gwa kulonge lugha jhangamanyikana, nambo anda abhii mundo jhonge jwahoto kuchimulila lugha jhangamanyikana kwa bhando bhubhanyeketii Kilichitu ahoto kwatangatila.
1CO 14:6 Ngohe makalongo bhango, anda hikite kwino nu kulonge na mangota kwa lugha jhangamanyikana, bho, nanyambulila nike? Chakaka nanyambulila jhe kilebhe! Nanyambulila anda nilonge na mangota kwa uyekulilo gwa Chapanga amu kumanya amu Lilobhe lya ulondole gwa Chapanga amu mabholo.
1CO 14:7 Anda ilebhe yangabhehe na ughome na ibhoha lilobhe, ngita kitolilo na lilimba. Bho, mundo naumanya bhole nhwambo ghuhonwa anda yombo yenio ibhoha lilobhe lyangamanyikana?
1CO 14:8 Ngita lipenenga libhoha ndeka lilobhe lyamaha, ghane jwakilenganikiye kujhenda kungondo?
1CO 14:9 Helahela mangota, anda ghimulongela ghamanyikana ndeka, ghane nahotola bhole kumanya? Yene namma anda ilalama jhajhe.
1CO 14:10 Ibhii lugha mbwe pannema, nambo yoha ileta mana.
1CO 14:11 Nambo anda nenga nimanyite jhe chilonge mundo jhonge, nenga nibhehe naghene kwa mundo jwenio jhuilongela na nenga, na jwenio abhehe nng'ene kwa nenga.
1CO 14:12 Helahela mangota mabhoha, nhwalo mipala hake kupokela itoi ya Uhuke gwa Chapanga, nkangamale kujhonjekeya itoi itenda bhando bhubhanyeketii Kilichitu bhakangamale.
1CO 14:13 Mundo jhola jwalongela kwa lugha ngene, annyope Chapanga kitoi chakuhoto kwachimulila bhando chela chalongela.
1CO 14:14 Nhwalo, anda nyopite kwa lugha ngene, uhuke jhango ndi ghunyopa Chapanga, nambo malango ghango ghahenga ndeka kilebhe.
1CO 14:15 Ngohe ndenda bhole? Chanyopa kwa uhuke gwango, helahela chanyopa kwa malango ghango, chanyemba kwa uhuke gwango helehela chanyemba kwa malango ghango.
1CO 14:16 Anda munnombalila Chapanga gwino kwa uhuke gwino tugha, anda abhii pakate jhino mundo jwangamanya chimulongela, nahotola bhole kukung'ila “Amina,” pumunchenguu Chapanga anda amanyiti chimulongela?
1CO 14:17 Nahotola kunnomba Chapanga mbone, nambo jhola nakintangatila jhe kilebhe.
1CO 14:18 Ninnomba Chapanga nhwalo nenga nilongela lugha ngene kuliku mangota mabhoha.
1CO 14:19 Nambo kwa lilongo lya bhando bhubhajheketii Kilichitu ngambaii kulonge malobhe nhwano ghighamanyikana, kwabhola bhando bhange kuliku kulonge malobhe ghamahele kwa lugha ngene.
1CO 14:20 Makalongo bhango, nkotoka kuwacha ngita yana ichokombe nambo mubhoho mme anda yana ichokombe, pumuwacha mme ngita bhando akanahota.
1CO 14:21 Ijhandikwe mu Malaghalikilo, “Bhambo alonge naha, ‘Kwa ndela jha bhubhalonge lugha ngene, nanongela na bhando bhango alonge Bhambo, na kwa nnomo gwa akaghene, chanongela na bhando bheniya, pamonga yenio nabhajhoha jhe.’ ”
1CO 14:22 Ngohe bhahe, kulonge lugha ngene, ndi nginyililo kwa bhando bhangajheketela, nambo chi kwa bhala bhubhajheketela Kilichitu. Nambo kupiya ulondole gwa Chapanga kwa nhwalo gwa bhala bhubhajheketii nambo kwa bhala bhangajheketela.
1CO 14:23 Bhahe, lilongo lya bhando bhoha bhubhajheketii Kilichitu pubhakonganika pamonga, na kila jhumo kutumbuu kulonge kwa lugha ngene, bhala bhangajheketela na bhangamanya kilebhe anda bhahikite, bho, nabhahola jhe kulonge mangota nkwete ngholoka?
1CO 14:24 Nambo bhoha bhubhapiya ulondole gwa Chapanga, bhando bhangajheketela na bhangamanya kilebhe anda bhahikite, nabhajhoha ghoha ghumulongela nabhamanya uhakaho gwabhe, na nabhahadabulwa na bhoha.
1CO 14:25 Na ilebhe yoha ihibhililwe miyojho jhabhe naibhaha pakongoloho, na bhene chatama makilikite na kunnyinamila Chapanga kone nabhalongela, “Chakaka Chapanga abhii pamonga na mangota.”
1CO 14:26 Makalongo bhango, ngohe tulongele nike? Pumukonganika pamo kunnyinamii Chapanga, jhumo ajhemba nhwambo, na jhonge abhole, na jhonge abhehe na uloto kuhumii kwa Chapanga, na jhonge alongela lugha ngene na jhonge achimulila ghighalongelwa. Ghoha ghahengeke kwa nhwalo gwa kwatangatila lilongo lya bhando bhubhajheketii Kilichitu.
1CO 14:27 Anda bhabhii bhando bhakulonge lugha ngene, bhabhele amu bhatato bhalongela, nambo alonge jhumo jhumo, na kongo abhii mundo jhonge jwa kwachimulila chikilongelwa.
1CO 14:28 Nambo anda abhii jhe mundo jwa kwachimulila chikilongelwa, bhahe, mundo jhola jwalongela lugha ngene atame nuu mulilongo lya bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu, alonge mumwojho gwake na Chapanga.
1CO 14:29 Bhando bhabhele amu bhatato bhubhatangacha Malobhe gha Chapanga, bhahoto kulonge bhabhele amu bhatato, bhange bhakoto kuhadabula malobhe ghala ghighalongelwa.
1CO 14:30 Anda abhii mundo mulilongo lyenio jwapokii Malobhe gha Chapanga, bhahe, jhola jwalongela atame nuu.
1CO 14:31 Nhwalo mangota mabhoha mihoto kupiya ulondole gwa Chapanga jhumo jhumo, kila mundo akibhola na akangamalichwe mwojho.
1CO 14:32 Ihuke ya milondole bha Chapanga ijhoha milondole bha Chapanga.
1CO 14:33 Nhwalo Chapanga chi Chapanga jwakuhenga ilebhe ya bhulo, nambo jwenio ndi Chapanga jwa uteeke. Helahela anda mulilongo lya bhando lilinyeketii Kilichitu,
1CO 14:34 akakeghe bhatame nuu mu malilongo gha bhando ghighannyeketii Kilichitu, bhakotoka kulonge, hilu kulongocha anda lilaghalikilo chililongela.
1CO 14:35 Anda bhapala kunkonya, bhankonye akangana bhabhe kajhabhe, nhwalo hone kwa mwikeghe kulonge chochoha palilongo lya bhando lilinyeketii Kilichitu.
1CO 14:36 Bho, miwacha Lilobhe lya Chapanga lihumita kwino amu lihikite kwa mangota kanjika tugha?
1CO 14:37 Anda mundo jhojhoha awacha kubhehe apekiwe Malobhe gha Chapanga, amu kitoi chenge cha Uhuke gwa Chapanga, amanye kubhehe ghanga ghinijhandika ndi nhwilo gwa Bhambo.
1CO 14:38 Nambo mundo aghapucha ghanga, bhahe, nkoto kunholela mundo jwenio.
1CO 14:39 Bhahe, makalongo bhango, mme na unoghe hake kupiya ulondole gwa Chapanga, nambo nkotoka kwakanakiya bhando kulonge kwa lugha ngene.
1CO 14:40 Nambo ghoha ghahengeka mbone kila kilebhe ngita chiipalwa.
1CO 15:1 Ngohe makalongo bhango, mbala kunkombocha Malobhe gha Mbone ghunintangachila, ghimpokii na kubhehe nchinge gwa kuhobholela kwino, na kwa gheniya mangota nnyemite nganganga.
1CO 15:2 Lilobhe lyenio linintangachii ndi Lilobhe lya Mbone, mangota nang'ombokoka anda mughakamwii maha ghala ghunintangachila, anda nahi jhe bhahe, kuhobholela kwino jhajhe.
1CO 15:3 Nenga nikampekii mangota ghala ghimbokii nenga namwete, kubhehe Kilichitu awile kwa nhwalo gwa uhakaho gwito ngita chighalonge Majhandiko gha Chapanga,
1CO 15:4 kubhehe awile na kuyoka lichiko lya utato ngita chighalonge Majhandiko gha Chapanga.
1CO 15:5 Akatumbwii kumpitii Kefa, kabhele ajhakwapitila akatenga kome na bhabhele.
1CO 15:6 Helahela ajhakwapitila akalongo mamiya nhwano kwa mala jhimo, bhamahele bhabhii ghome, nambo bhange bhajhomwike.
1CO 15:7 Paligha ajhakumpitila Yakobu, na peniya ajhakwapitila akatenga bhoha.
1CO 15:8 Kujhomolela kwake ajhakumbitii nenga, ngita mundo jhumelwikwe changatimicha miyehe jhango.
1CO 15:9 Nhwalo nenga ndi natenga jwandina pakate jha akatenga bhoha, nitope jhe kukemwa natenga, nhwalo nakaghang'ahite makunde gha bhando ghighanyeketii Kilichitu.
1CO 15:10 Nambo, kwa umbone gwa Chapanga, undei mme ngita chimile, na umbone gwake ukibha jhajhe jhe. Nenga hengite lihengo kupete akatenga bhoha, ne jhe, nambo umbone gwa Chapanga uhengita lihengo pamonga na nenga.
1CO 15:11 Kwa nhwalo gwenio, ibhehe nenga amu bheniya bhubhatangacha Malobhe gha Mbone kilebhe jhe, chenje ndi twatangachila bhando na chenje ndi chitujheketela.
1CO 15:12 Ngohe, nhwalo itangachwa kubhehe Kilichitu ayokite kubhoke mu kuwegha, bho, nhwalo ghane bhange bhilonge kubhii jhe kuyoka?
1CO 15:13 Anda kubhii jhe kuyoka kwa bhando, bhahe, Kilichitu na jwenio ayokite jhe,
1CO 15:14 anda Kilichitu ayokite jhe, bhahe, chituntangacha kilebhe nacho, helahela kihobholelo chino kilebhe nacho.
1CO 15:15 Kupeta gheniya, helahela twenga tubhonekana tulongii uwange panane jha Chapanga, kwa nhwalo tulongii Chapanga akayokiche Kilichitu, chakaka akayokiche jhe, ngita hela bhubhawile bhahyokichwa jhe.
1CO 15:16 Nhwalo ikibha chakaka kubhehe bhubhawile kuyoka jhe, bhahe na jwenio Kilichitu ayokite jhe.
1CO 15:17 Anda Kilichitu ayokite jhe, bhahe, kihobholelo chino kilebhe nacho, na mwamela muhakaho gwino.
1CO 15:18 Helahela bhando bhubhawile kone bhannyeketii Kilichitu bhahobhalile.
1CO 15:19 Anda tuhobhalila Yecho Kilichitu muughome ghongo tugha, twenga tupalwa kubhonelwa kiya kuliku bhando bhoha pannema.
1CO 15:20 Nambo uchakaka ndi kubhehe Kilichitu ahyokichwe kuhumii muweghe, jwenio ndi jwatumbulila kuyoka pakate jha bhando bhubhagholwike mukuwegha.
1CO 15:21 Anda kuwegha kuletitwa na mundo jhumo, helahela kuyoka kubhoke muweghe na kwenie kuletitwa na mundo jhumo.
1CO 15:22 Kwa nhwalo bhando bhoha bhiwegha kwa kulombana na Adamo, helahela kwa kulombana na Kilichitu bhando bhoha bhabhehe ghome.
1CO 15:23 Nambo kila jhumo chayoka mu kipinde chake, kutumbulii Kilichitu, peniya bhala bhubhabhii bhake Kilichitu papakuhika.
1CO 15:24 Peniya, kujhomolela nakuhika, Kilichitu papakumpe Chapanga Tate unahota nkolongwa, pajhomolela kuhangabhana ulongoche na ukindendeke na makakala ghoha ghanganandela.
1CO 15:25 Nhwalo Kilichitu apalwa kulongocha ade Chapanga pahotola kwabula akamakoko bhoha na kwabheka pahe jha makongono ghake.
1CO 15:26 Likoko lya kujhomolela jwapala kukomolekelwa ndi kuwegha.
1CO 15:27 Nhwalo Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge, “Chapanga abhekite ilebhe yoha pahe jha makongono ghake.” Nambo, Majhandiko pighalonge, “Ilebhe yoha ibhekitwe pahe jha makongono gha ilongoche,” chakaka kubhehe Chapanga abhii jhe muilebhe yenio, nhwalo jwenio Chapanga ndi jwaibheka ilebhe yoha pahe jha ukindendeke gwa Kilichitu na ahoto jhe kubhehe pahe jha Kilichitu.
1CO 15:28 Nambo papala kubheka pahe jha ulongoche gwa Kilichitu, na jwenio Mwana chatama pahe jha ulongoche gwa Chapanga, jwabhekite yoha pahe jha ulongoche gwake, nhwalo Chapanga ilongocha yoha kila chehemo.
1CO 15:29 Ngohe anda kuyoka kubhii jhe, bho, bhando bhala bhubhatichwa kwa nhwalo gwa bhubhawile nabhatenda bho? Anda bhubhawile bhayokichwa jhe, nhwalo ghane bhando bhibatichwa kwa nhwalo gwabhe?
1CO 15:30 Nhwalo ghane na twenga tukibheka ngenyangenya jha ngondo kila lichaa?
1CO 15:31 Makalongo bhango, machiko naghabhaha mukuhandahanda jha ngondo jha kuwegha! Nikiloka kwa nhwalo gwino mu kulombana na Yecho Kilichitu Bhambo gwito, ghindenda nnonge ghanga.
1CO 15:32 Bho, nganyambulile kilebhe ghane pangomina na bhando bhubhalandine na inyama ijhoghowa kwenio ku Epecho? Nambo anda bhando bhubhawile nabhahyokichwa jhe bhahe, “Tulye na tunyweghe, nhwalo kilabho natuhwa.”
1CO 15:33 Nkotoka kukopokelwa, “Ukoche gwanganandela uhangabhana luhomo lwambone.”
1CO 15:34 Ngohe ung'ang'anuke! Nkoto kutenda uhakaho, nhwalo bhando bhange pakate jhino chakaka bhammanyite jhe Chapanga. Nilonge mambu ghanga nkola hone!
1CO 15:35 Nambo mundo ahotola kukonya, “Bho, bhubhawile bhayoka bhole? Bho, chibhabha na yegha ghane?”
1CO 15:36 Ngonyelo jhene jha kimbebhebhe! Mbejho yumichite imela jhe ade ihwe hote.
1CO 15:37 Paumichita, umicha mbejho tugha, ibhe ya ngano amu mbejho henge, umicha jhe mmea ghupitila.
1CO 15:38 Chapanga haipela mbejho liumbo lyalipala jwenio, kila mbejho libhehe na liumbo lya kanjika chake.
1CO 15:39 Yegha ihumbi yoha ilandine jhe. Bhando bhakwete yegha jhabhe na inyama ikwete yegha yabhe, ijhune ikwete yegha yabhe na helahela homba ikwete yegha yabhe.
1CO 15:40 Kabhele yegha ya kunane kwa Chapanga na yegha ya pannema, uwalanao gwa yegha ya kunane kwa Chapanga ilandinejhe na uwalanao yegha ya pannema.
1CO 15:41 Lyobha libhii lya mbone na lubhalamwehe lubhii lwa uwalanaho na ndondwa ibhii na uhwalanaho gwake, na ndondwa yenio ilandinejhe muhwalanao.
1CO 15:42 Yene ndi chipala kubhehe bhando pubhapala kuyokichwa kwa bhando bhubhawile. Yegha uchikwa kone ubholite, nambo uyoka changahangabhika.
1CO 15:43 Uchikwa muhone, uhyokechwa muukolo, uchikwa kone uleghelike, uyokichwa mumakakala.
1CO 15:44 Pauchikwa, uchikwa anda yegha jha umundo, peniya uyoka yegha jha kiuhuke. Anda ibhii yegha jha kiumundo, helahela ibhii yegha jha kiuhuke.
1CO 15:45 Nhwalo Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghalongela, “Mundo jwa kutumbula, Adamo, akibha mundo ghome,” nambo Adamo jwa kujhomolela ndi Uhuke gwa Chapanga jwabhapekea bhando ughome.
1CO 15:46 Yegha jha kiuhukejhe jhilongolile, nambo yegha jha kiumundo ndi ulongolile, peniya ijhakuhika yegha jha kiuhuke.
1CO 15:47 Mundo jwakutumbulila akapanginwe kuhumii mulutukunda lwa nnema, nambo mundo jhubhele abhokite kunane kwa Chapanga.
1CO 15:48 Bhando bha pannema bhalandine na bhala bhapanginwe kwa undope, na bhala bhahumita kunane kwa Chapanga ndibhahumite kunane kwa Chapanga.
1CO 15:49 Anda yenio chitulandine na jhola jwapanginwe kwa undope, helahela chatulandine na jhola jwahumita kunane kwa Chapanga.
1CO 15:50 Bhahe akalongo bhango chinilongela ndi chenje, chela chikipanginwe kwa yegha na miyahe kihotolajhe kubhujhila unahota nkolongwa gwa Chapanga, hilu chela chikihangabhika kihotolajhe kuleka kuhangabhika.
1CO 15:51 Nyokanikihe, ninobholele chile, bhoha natujhomoka ndeka, nambo bhoha natughalambulwa.
1CO 15:52 Chwechwele kuchichila na kuhumbula anda liho pulikopekopela. Nhwalo lipenenga la kujhomolela pilipala kulela, bhubhawile chibhayokichwe kone yegha jhabhe ibholitejhe, peniya na twenga natuwejhe, nambo natughalambulwa.
1CO 15:53 Nhwalo yegha jhihangabhika ipalwa ughalambuke kubhehe gwangahangabhika, yegha jhiwegha ighalambuke kubhehe jhangawegha.
1CO 15:54 Bhahe, yegha jhenje jhihangabhika puighalambuka ikoto kuhangabhika, na chela chikibhii mukuwegha pakighalambuka kikoto kuwegha, peniya ndi chilitimile Lilobhe lya Chapanga lililongela, “Kuwegha kukomalikilwe, kituhotojhe kabhele!”
1CO 15:55 “Mwe kuwegha, bho, kuhoto kwino kubhii ko? Mwe kuwegha bho, lipyanda lino libhii ko?”
1CO 15:56 Kuwegha kubhehe na likakala nhwalo gwa uhakaho, na uhakaho libhehe na makakala nhwalo gwa lilaghalikilo.
1CO 15:57 Nambo tunchenguu Chapanga jwatupekii likakala kupetela Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu.
1CO 15:58 Bhahe akalongo bhango, nnyemengane nganganga changa nyukunyuka. Machiko ghoha nnyendelele kuhenga lihengo lya Bhambo, nhwalo umanya kubhehe lihengo lino kwa kuntumikii Bhambo lya jhajhe jhe.
1CO 16:1 Ngohe, nilongele malobhe gha kwachangii bhando bha Chapanga, ntende chenie ngita chinililobholile kwa lilongo lya bhando lilinyeketii Kilichitu lya ku Galatiya.
1CO 16:2 Kila jumapile, kila mundo pakate jhino abheke mbijha yabhii nako, peniya abheke kihukilo nhwalo pambala kuhika kukoto kubhehe na nchango kabhele.
1CO 16:3 Peniya pumbala kuhika kwino, nanatuma bhala bhimahagwile pakate jhino bhapeleke nchango na baluwa ku Yeluchalemo.
1CO 16:4 Anda tela na nenga kujhenda kwenio, natulongohana pamonga.
1CO 16:5 Pumbala kupeta kujhenda ku Makedoniya, hote natumbula kuhika kwino, nhwalo mbala kujhenda ku Makedoniya.
1CO 16:6 Pange nihoto kutama na mangota pandina, amu kutama na mangota mu machiko ghoha gha malile, nhwalo undangatile mumwanja gwango kokoha kunijhenda.
1CO 16:7 Nipala ndeka kukongana na mangota kwa kupeta tugha, mbala ndame na mangota pandina anda Bhambo apahile.
1CO 16:8 Nambo chandama pamba ku Epecho ade lichiko lya Pendekochite,
1CO 16:9 nhwalo nnyango gwango ubhii gwampala kwa lihengo lyango likolongwa pamba, anda bhabhii bhando bhamahele bhubhakana ghunilongela.
1CO 16:10 Timocheyo anda ahika kwino, nkotoka kuntenda ajhoghope patama na mangota, nhwalo jwenio ahenga lihengo lya Bhambo ngita nenga.
1CO 16:11 Yene mundo jhojhoha nkotoka kupucha, nambo mutangatile ajhendelele tela na mwanja gwake kwa nhwalo ahotole kubhujha kabhele kwa nenga, nhwalo ninendelela abhujhe na bhando bhango.
1CO 16:12 Ngohe nongele malobhe gha nnongo gwito Apolu, nde kumpembelekeya ahike kwino pamonga na akalongo bhange, nambo apala jhe kuhika ngoheno, nambo chahika papata pwache.
1CO 16:13 Nkeluwe, ntamangane maha mu kihobholelo chino, nkangamale mme na makakala.
1CO 16:14 Kila kilebhe chimukihenga kihengwa kwa upalo.
1CO 16:15 Makalongo bhango mmanye Sitefano na bhando bha kajha jhake, bheniya ndi bhando bhubhakatumbwii kupokela kihobholelo cha Kilichitu ku kilambo cha ku Akaya, peniya bhakipihite bhene kwa kwahengela bhando bha Chapanga. Yene makalongo bhango nimpembelekeya,
1CO 16:16 mwajhokanikiye bhando ngita bheniya, na kila mundo ahenga lihengo pamonga nabho.
1CO 16:17 Nihanganila hake pubhahikita Sitefano na Fotunato na Akaiko, nhwalo pubhakibha pamba tela na mangota kubhehe pamba.
1CO 16:18 Nhwalo bhauhanganiche uhuke gwango ngita chinihanganiche mangota. Kwa nhwalo gwenio ipalwa kwakomboka bhando ngita bheniya.
1CO 16:19 Bhando bhoha bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu bha ku Asiya bhanyambucha. Akula na Pilisila pamonga na likunde lya bhando bhoha bhubhanyeketii Kilichitu bhubhakonganika kujhopa kajhango bhanyambucha kwa liina lya Bhambo.
1CO 16:20 Makalongo bhoha bhubhabhii pamba bhinyambucha. Na mangota nnyambuchane mabhene kwa mabhene kulangii upalo gwa Kilichitu.
1CO 16:21 Nenga Napauli ninyambucha, kongo ninyandikila ujhambucho ghongo kwa lubhoko lwango namwete.
1CO 16:22 Mundo jhojhoha jwangampala Bhambo. jwenio akilapanikii MARA NATHA. Bhambo gwito ahika!
1CO 16:23 Umbone gwa Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu ubhaha pamo na mangota.
1CO 16:24 Upalo gwango utame na mangota mabhoha bhunombine na Kilichitu Yecho.
2CO 1:1 Nenga Pauli, natenga jwa Kilichitu Yecho kwa kupala kwake Chapanga, na nnongo gwito Timocheyo. Tughajhandikila malongo gha bhando ghighannyeketii Kilichitu gha kwenio ku Kolintu, na bhando bhoha bha Chapanga bhubhabhii ku kilambo cha ku Akaya.
2CO 1:2 Ninyope umbone na uteeke kuhumii kwa Chapanga Tate gwito na Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu.
2CO 1:3 Tunnombe Chapanga, Tate Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu, Tate jwa kiya na Chapanga jwapepecha.
2CO 1:4 Chapanga jwatupepecha twenga mu malola ghito ghoha, na twenga twapepeche bhange mu malola ghabhe kwa mbepecho jhela jhitupokii kuhumii kwa Chapanga.
2CO 1:5 Anda mang'ahicho gha Kilichitu pighachocha nkate jhito, ndi pitujhendelela kupepechwa na Kilichitu.
2CO 1:6 Anda tung'ahika, tung'ahika tupala mangota tupepechwa kwa nhwalo gwa kukombolelwa kwino. Kupepechwa kongo nakuhenga lihengo kwa kuhimbililwa malagho ghaghala ghighatukolela twenga.
2CO 1:7 Helahela, lihobholelo litubhinagho ndi nganganga, nhwalo tumanye tung'ahika pamonga na helahela mupepechwa anda twenga putupepechwa.
2CO 1:8 Makalongo bhango, tupala mmanye malola tughapatite kola ku Asiya, malola gheniya ghakachochite makakala ghito, ade kuwacha tuhoto jhe kulama.
2CO 1:9 Tuhambwika tukibha ngita bhando bhubhahadabwilwe kuwegha, ipitila yenio tukotoka kukihobholela tabhete, tunhobholele Chapanga jwabhayokicha bhubhawile.
2CO 1:10 Chapanga atukombwile kuhumii mukuhandahanda jha ngondo jha kuwegha, na ajhendelila kutukombola. Na twenga tunhobhalela jwenio chatukombola kabhele,
2CO 1:11 mangota mututangatila kwa kutujhopela. Mambu twe ghambone tughapatite kwa nhwalo gwa bhando kutujhopela, ghatenda bhando bhamahele bhanchenguu Chapanga gwito.
2CO 1:12 Twenga tukilokela kilebhe chimo tugha: Miojho jhito ilangiya tukwete jhe ulemo ilangiya kubhehe tutamite pannema pano, na achwa pakate jhino, tukatamite kwa unyahinyahi na uhobholeko ghutupatite na Chapanga. Tulongwichwe jhe na malango gha bhando bha pannema nambo tutehi yenio kwa umbone gwa Chapanga.
2CO 1:13 Tunnyandikila mangota ilebhe muihotola kuchoma na kuimanya. Nihobholela naumanya njwe chakaka ghanga,
2CO 1:14 nhwalo ade ngohe mmanyite pandina tugha. Nihobholela nahumanya kwa uchakaka palonge kupala lichiko lya Bhambo Yecho ahotole kutulokela twenga ngita twenga chitupala kunnokela mangota.
2CO 1:15 Na nenga mmi mu kuhobholela gheniya, nikapahile kuntyangi mangota mpate mota kabhele.
2CO 1:16 Nikapahile kuntyangila punipeta mu mwanja kujhenda ku Makedoniya na lichiko lya kubhujha, nhwalo mangota mbala undangatile umwanja gwango gwa kujhenda ku Yudeya.
2CO 1:17 Bho, mangota miwacha nhengite gheniya ngita bhando bha pannema pibhalongela? Bho, miwacha kubhehe nihenga mipangu kwa malango jha kimundo na kubhehe nilonge “Chakaka” amu “Ng'oo,” kwa pamonga?
2CO 1:18 Anda hela Chapanga chahobholeka, malobhe ghito chi kulonge, “Chakaka” amu “Ng'oo,” kwa mala jhimo.
2CO 1:19 Nhwalo Kilichitu Yecho, Mwana gwa Chapanga, jhutuntangicha kwino, nenga na Silwano na Timocheyo, akibha jhe mundo jwakulonge “Chakaka” amu “Ng'oo,” nambo kwa jwenio kila lichiko ndi “Chakaka.”
2CO 1:20 Nhwalo malaghano ghoha gha Chapanga ndi kulonge Chakaka. Helahela kwa ndela jha Yecho Kilichitu tulonge “Amina” kwa kunnomba Chapanga.
2CO 1:21 Chapanga jwenio ndi jwatutenda kubhehe nganganga kwa kulombana na Yecho Kilichitu. Ndi Chapanga jwenio jwatuhaghwile twenga.
2CO 1:22 Helahela atubhekite unepo ghulangiya twenga ndi bhake na atupekiye Uhuke gwake umiojho jhito ibhehe chamana kwa ghala ghoha ghipala ghatubhekile.
2CO 1:23 Chapanga ndi jwamanya mambu ghoha, jwenio aumanya mwojho gwango! Nenga nhikite jhe kabhele ku Kolintu kwa nhwalo gwa kunkole kiya.
2CO 1:24 Tupalandeka kuchokolekeya mu kihobholelo chino, twenga tumanya nyemite nganganga mu kihobholelo chino, nambo tuhenga lihengo pamonga na mangota kwa nhwalo gwa kuhangana kwino.
2CO 2:1 Bhahe, nintyangii jhe kabhele na kumpeke ungolongondi.
2CO 2:2 Nhwalo anda ninkoliche ungolongondi mangota, ghane ngohe nanhanganicha nenga? Bho, bhabhalabhala jhe bhubhambii ungolongondi?
2CO 2:3 Ndi kwa nhwalo nikanyandikile, nikapahi jhe kuhika kwino na kukolechwa na ungolongondi na mangota bhimipalwa kuhanganichwa. Nimanya chakaka nenga anda nihanganile, helahela mangota mabhoha nauhangana.
2CO 2:4 Nikanyandikile pa kutumbula nikibha ngolongondi mumwojho gwango kongo mbihita mahole chwii, nikapahii jhe mme na ungolongondi nambo kuntenda mangota umanye chinimpahi hake.
2CO 2:5 Mundo jhojhoha ankolecha ungolongondi jhonge, ankolichii jhe ungolongondi nenga kanjika, kwa namuna ankoliche ungolongondi mabhoha, nilonge naha ikoto kubhonekena kubhehe ghanganandela hake.
2CO 2:6 Luhadabulo lwahadabwilwe mundo jwenio na bhando twe lwakolite.
2CO 2:7 Ngohe ipalwa mangota munnekeke ulemo gwake, na mumpepeche akoto kubhehe muungolongondi, na akoto kuhengeleka mwojho.
2CO 2:8 Yene nipembelekeya, munnangiye mundo jwenio kubhehe mupahile hake.
2CO 2:9 Nikannyandikile baluwa jhela kwa nhwalo gwa kumanya anda mihotola kunyokanikiya mukila kilebhe chinilongela.
2CO 2:10 Anda munnekekiye mundo jwenio uhakaho gwake, na nenga hele ninnekekeya uhakaho gwake. Nhwalo anda ninnekekiye mundo uhakaho gwake, ninnekekekiye palonge jha Kilichitu kwa nhwalo gwino,
2CO 2:11 kumpe jhe ndela Limbembela jha kutukolowa, nhwalo tumanye chapala kuhenga.
2CO 2:12 Ngohe puhikita ku Tiloya kwatangachii bhando Malobhe gha Mbone gha Kilichitu, Bhambo akambekii pwache jha kuhenga lihengo lyake.
2CO 2:13 Nambo nikibha ngolongondi hake kumwojho gwango nhwalo nikankolindeka nnongo gwango Titu. Yene nyakwatabhuka bhando na kujhenda ku Makedoniya.
2CO 2:14 Nambo tunchenguu Chapanga jwatutenda tuhululutile uhotolo machiko ghoha na Kilichitu. Jwenio atutenda tupechengane malobhe gha chakaka gha Kilichitu kila chehemo ngita luhumba lwa mbone.
2CO 2:15 Nhwalo twenga tulandana ngita luhumba lwambone lwa ubane lulupehitwe na Yecho Kilichitu kwa Chapanga, luhumba lwa mbone lulwahikila bhando bhoha bhibhakombolilwe na bhibhahobholela.
2CO 2:16 Kwa bhala bhubhahobholela, luhumba lono luleta kuwegha, nambo kwa bhala bhibhakombolilwe, luhumba lono ndi lwambone luleta ughome. Bho, ndi ghane jwahoto kuhenga lihengo lende?
2CO 2:17 Twenga ngita bhando bhange jhe bhibhachulucha Malobhe gha Chapanga kupata mbijha. Nambo kwa kulombana na Kilichitu twenga ndi bhando bhituhobholeka palonge jha Chapanga, anda bhando bhitutumitwe na Chapanga.
2CO 3:1 Bho, tutumbuu kabhele kukiloka uwabhete? Bho, mipala baluwa jhijhandikwe na mangota jha kutuhobholecha twenga, amu tunyandikile baluwa jha kutuhobholecha ngita chibhatenda bhando bhange?
2CO 3:2 Mangota mabhene ndi baluwa jhito, baluwa jhijhandikwe umiojho jhito, imanyikana na kuchomwa na kila mundo.
2CO 3:3 Chakaka kubhehe mangota ndi baluwa jha Kilichitu, jhihumilwe mu lihengo lito jhituletile kwa mabhoko ghito. Baluwa yenio ijhandikwe jhe kwa wino, nambo kwa Uhuke gwa Chapanga jwabhii ghome, baluwa jhene ikajhandikwe jhe pa lighanga, nambo ijhandikwe umiojho jha bhando.
2CO 3:4 Twenga tujhoghopa ndeka kulonge gheniya kwa nhwalo tunhobholela Chapanga kwa ndela jha Kilichitu.
2CO 3:5 Tuhotondeka kulonge twenga tuhoto jhe kuhenga chochoha kwa makakala ghito twabhete, nambo uhotolo gwito ubhokita kwa Chapanga.
2CO 3:6 Nhwalo Chapanga ndi jwatutehi kubhehe akatumiche bha Lilaghano Liyono, lilaghano lyangapiti mulilaghalikilo lilijhandikwe tugha, nambo lilaghano lya Uhuke gwa Chapanga. Nhwalo lilaghalikilo lilijhandikwe linneta kuwegha, nambo Uhuke gwa Chapanga uleta ughome.
2CO 3:7 Ngohe anda Lilaghalikio lilijhandikwe kwa kubhacha panane jha maghanga na ung'alo gwa Chapanga ubhonikine pala piiletitwa lilaghalikilo. Ata yenio ung'alo gwa pamiho jha ung'alita jhe mbone ukibha na makakala ade Akaichilahele bhakahotwi jhe kulolekeya pamiho jha Mucha, ngita lilaghalikilo chileta kuwe lilitumika likahikite na ung'alicho namuna jhene,
2CO 3:8 bho, lihengo lya Uhuke gwa Chapanga nauchoche jhe ung'alicho nkolongwa hake?
2CO 3:9 Anda lihengo lilihadabuu bhando bhubhabhii na ung'alicho nkolongwa, bho, lihengo lileta bhando kubhehe bhaumbone palonge jha Chapanga ichochite jhe ukolongwa?
2CO 3:10 Kwa nhwalo gwenio chela chichikibha na ung'alicho peniya makacho ngohe kikwetii jhe ung'alicho nhwalo gwa chela chikibhii na ung'alicho nkolongwa.
2CO 3:11 Nhwalo chela chikitamite kwa lichiko tugha kikibha na ung'alicho, kwa chakaka chela chikitamikii machiko ghoha ghangapeta kibhehe na ung'alicho nkolongwa hake!
2CO 3:12 Kwa nhwalo tuhobholela gheniya, tulonge changa bwaghaliya.
2CO 3:13 Twenga chi ngita Mucha, jwayekelila kumiho jhake kwa kitambala bhando bha ku Ichilahele bhako kulola kujhomolela kwa lung'alo lola.
2CO 3:14 Nambo malango ghabhe ghakapumbumwike. Nhwalo ade ngoheno Akaichilahele pubhachomita Lilaghano lya Makacho, kitambala chenie kiyekelii malango ghabhe. Kitambala chenie kikangilwa oko anda mundo alombine na Kilichitu.
2CO 3:15 Chakaka, ade deleno Akaichilahele pibhachoma Lilaghalikilo lya Mucha kitambala chenie kiyekelela malango ghabhe.
2CO 3:16 Nambo, kitambala chenie kikangilwa oko anda mundo ang'alambukile Bhambo.
2CO 3:17 Pamba Bhambo ndi Uhuke, na pala pubhii Uhuke gwa Bhambo, kubhii kulekekewa.
2CO 3:18 Nambo twenga twabhoha pamiho jhito payekelii jhe, tulola ngita mulindala ung'alicho gwamahele gwa Bhambo, na twenga atughalambula tulandane nako kwa kujhonjekeka kwa ung'alicho ghuhuma kwa Bhambo, ndi Uhuke.
2CO 4:1 Bhahe, Chapanga kwa kiya jhake, atupekiye lihengo lende, ngohe twangahengeleka mwojho.
2CO 4:2 Tughalekite mambu ghoha ghighaleta hone. Tutama jhe kabhele kwa kukolowa, ilu kwa kulonge uwange mu Lilobhe lya Chapanga, nambo kwa kulangiya uchakaka palonge jha Chapanga ndi bhando bhange bhamanye tuhobholeka.
2CO 4:3 Nhwalo anda Malobhe gha Mbone tughatangacha ghahihitwe, ihihitwe kwa bhala tugha kwa bhala bhubhahobholela.
2CO 4:4 Bhene bhajheketela jhe kwa nhwalo Limbembela, ichapanga ya pannema pano alekii lubhendo malango ghabhe bhakotoke kubhona lumule lwa Malobhe gha Mbone gha ung'alicho gwa Yecho Kilichitu, jwalandana njwee na Chapanga.
2CO 4:5 Nhwalo tukitangachii jhe twabhete, nambo tutangacha malobhe gha Yecho Kilichitu jwabhii Bhambo, na twenga twabhete ndi akatumiche bhino kwa nhwalo gwa Yecho.
2CO 4:6 Chapanga jhojhola jhola ndi jwalongile, “Lumule lumulike kubhoka mulubhendo,” ndi jwenio jwalangalila miojho jhito, na jwatupekiye lumule lwa kumanya ung'alicho gwa Chapanga lung'alicha pamiho jha Kilichitu Yecho.
2CO 4:7 Nambo twenga bhitubhii na kihukilo chenje tulandana na yombo ya undope, ibhonekane hotu kubhehe makakala gheniya makolongwa ghahuma kwa Chapanga hilu ghahuma kwa twenga jhe.
2CO 4:8 Machiko ghoha tubhii mumalagho, nambo tukomelekewajhe, putumanyajhe lyakuhenga, nambo tuhengelekajhe mwojho,
2CO 4:9 tung'ahika, nambo tutangatilwa, tutagwa pahe, nambo tukomelekewajhe.
2CO 4:10 Machiko ghoha tutola kuwe kwa Yecho payegha jhito, nhwalo ughome gwa Yecho helahela ubhonekane muyegha jhito.
2CO 4:11 Nhwalo twenga bhitubhii ghome, machiko ghoha tubhii mukuhandahanda jha ngondo jha kuwegha kwa nhwalo gwa Yecho, nhwalo ughome gwake Yecho ubhonekane muyegha jhito jhihwegha.
2CO 4:12 Yene kuwe kuhenga lihengo nkate jhito, nambo ughome uhenga lihengo nkate jhino.
2CO 4:13 Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghalongela, “Nikajheketile, ndi nhwalo nongile.” Na twenga kwa kihobholelo cheche, tujheketela na tulongela.
2CO 4:14 Nhwalo tumanye Chapanga jwayokiche Bhambo Yecho helahela chatuhyokicha twenga na Yecho, na kutubheka pamonga palonge jhake.
2CO 4:15 Ghanga ghoha ghatendika kwa nhwalo gwino, umbone gwa Chapanga ghugwahikila bhando bhamahele hake, gwatenda bhanchenguu Chapanga na bhannombe.
2CO 4:16 Kwa nhwalo gwenio tuhengeleka jhe mwojho, anda panja yegha itukutuke, nambo nkate miojho jhito ibhehe yono lichiko ade lichiko.
2CO 4:17 Nhwalo malagho ghutubhii nagho majhojhoho, na ghatamikii pandina tugha, nambo ghatuletela ung'alicho gwangapeta gwa machiko ghoha. Natupelwa ung'alicho gwa gwangajhomoka kuliku malola gheniya.
2CO 4:18 Yene tukotoka kulolela ilebhe ibhonekana, nambo tulolele ilebhe yela yangabonekana. Nhwalo ghala ghughabhonekana ghatamikii pandina, nambo ghala ghangabhonekana ghatamikii machiko ghoha ghangapeta. Tujhakutama miho nduu kulendela chi ilebhe ya kubhonekana, nambo yangabhonekana.
2CO 5:1 Nhwalo tumanya kubhehe mahema ghitutama pannema pamba yegha jhito, Chapanga chatupekiya nyumba jhenge jha kutama kunane kwa Chapanga, nyumba jha machiko ghoha ilenganikilwa jhe kwa mabhoko gha bhando.
2CO 5:2 Nambo ngohe itenda kubhobhola, kongo tulolela kwa unoghii kubhehe na yegha jha kunane kwa Chapanga.
2CO 5:3 Nhwalo tupata yegha jha kunane kwa Chapanga, natubhonekana jhe palonge jha Chapanga tubhii makengele.
2CO 5:4 Tukibha mu mahema ghanga gha pannema, tubhobhola na kutimbwa, itupala jhe yegha jhenje jha kuwegha, ndi tupalwa kuhwalichwa yegha yangahwegha ndi chela chikihwegha kimilwe kibhehe na ughome gwangapeta gwa machiko ghoha.
2CO 5:5 Chapanga jwenio ndi atulenganikiye twenga kwa nhwalo jha maghalambuko gheniya, na jwenio atupekiye Uhuke gwake abhehe chamana jha yoha yatubhekile.
2CO 5:6 Yene machiko ghoha tubhii na kihobholelo na tumanya kubhehe, anda tutama muyegha jhenje tugha, tutama kutale na nyumba jha kunane kwa Bhambo.
2CO 5:7 Nhwalo tutama kwa kihobholelo, na chi kwa ghala ghitubhona.
2CO 5:8 Nambo tukangamile na tupala kutama kutale na yegha jhenje na kujhenda kutama pamonga na Bhambo.
2CO 5:9 Nambo lijhambu lya mbone, tupala kunhalalicha Bhambo, ibhehe ngita tutama pamba pannema amu anda kunane kwa Chapanga.
2CO 5:10 Nhwalo twabhoha tupalwa kujhema palonge jha Kilichitu na tuhadabulwe na jwenio, na kila mundo chapokela malepo kwa ghala ghatehila pakibha atamita pannema, ghabhe ghambone amu ghanganandela.
2CO 5:11 Bhahe, tumanya mana jha kunnyoghopa Bhambo, helahela tughagha kwahuta bhando bhange. Chapanga atumanyi chakaka, na nenga nijheketela kubhehe mangota mutumanye mbone.
2CO 5:12 Tupala jhe kukiloka kabhele palonge jhino, nambo tumpala kwa nhwalo gwa kuloka kwa nhwalo gwito ndi mihoto kwajhanguu bhala bhubhakilokela ghighabhonekana kwa miho kuliku ghabhii kumwojho.
2CO 5:13 Anda tubhonekana tubhii na ngholoka yenio ndi kwa nhwalo gwa Chapanga, na anda tubhonekana tubhii na malango mbone yenio ndi kwa nhwalo gwino.
2CO 5:14 Nhwalo upalo gwake Kilichitu ututenda tukachane, nhwalo mundo jhumo akawile nhwalo gwa bhoha, bhoha bhawile pamonga na jwenio.
2CO 5:15 Ajhomwike kwa nhwalo gwa bhando bhoha, ndi bhubhabhii ghome bhakotoka kutama kwa nhwalo jha bhene, bhatama kwa nhwalo gwa jwenio jwakawile, na jwakayokichwe kwa nhwalo gwabhe.
2CO 5:16 Bhahe, kutumbuu ngohe, twenga tunhadabuu jhe mundo jhojhoha kwa kunnolekeya. Pamo na gheniya tukammanye Yecho Kilichitu kwa kunnolekeya, nambo ngohe tuhenga jhe kabhele.
2CO 5:17 Yene mundo jhojhoha anda ajhambatine na Kilichitu, nhyono na gha makacho ghapitite, na ngohe ghabhii mayono.
2CO 5:18 Ghoha ndi mahengo gha Chapanga jwatulombanicha na jwenio kwa kupete Kilichitu na atupekii lihengo lya kwajhelanicha bhando na Chapanga.
2CO 5:19 Yene Chapanga akibha nkate jha Kilichitu ajhelanicha bhando bha pannema na jwenio, changalolokeya uhakaho gwa bhando. Na jwenio atupekiye lihengo lya kwatangachii bhando bhajhelane nako.
2CO 5:20 Bhahe, twenga tuhenga lihengo ngita bhando bhitutumitwe na Kilichitu, tulonge ngita Chapanga jwenio chalonge kupete twenga. Yene twenga tunnyopa hake kwa liina lya Kilichitu, nnyelane na Chapanga.
2CO 5:21 Kilichitu akibha jhe na uhakaho, nambo Chapanga akantehi atole uhakaho gwito, yenio twenga kwa kulombana nako, tujheketelwe palonge jha Chapanga.
2CO 6:1 Bhahe, anda tuhenga mahengo pamonga na Chapanga, tumpembelekeya nkotoka kujheketela umbone ghola ghumpokii uhobholele jhajhe.
2CO 6:2 Chapanga alongela naha mu Majhandiko ghake, “Lichaa lilipalitwa nikannyokanikiye, lichiko lya kukombolwa nganintangatila.” Ninnobholela, ngohe ndi lichaa lilipalitwa kwa umbone gwa Chapanga, deleno ndi lichiko lya ughombokeko!
2CO 6:3 Tupala jhe kummeke mundo jhojhoha kihibhilikiho, yenio lihengo lito likoto kubhehe kilebhe nacho.
2CO 6:4 Nambo tupalwa kulangiya kwa uchakaka kilebhe chituhenga kubhehe akatumiche bha Chapanga kwa kuhimbilila putubhehe mu malagho manonoho na mu malola ghoha.
2CO 6:5 Tubulitwe na tutabhitwe mu kipungo na tukabulitwe na bhando, tuhengite lihengo linonoho ade kutotokela, tugholwika jhe na kutama changalye.
2CO 6:6 Tukalangii kubhehe akatumiche bha Chapanga kwa kutama kwa unyahinyahi kwa kumanya kwa luhimba kwa umbone mu Uhuke gwa Chapanga na kwa upalo gwa chakaka,
2CO 6:7 na kwa lilobhe lya chakaka na kwa makakala gha Chapanga. Tuhenga ghighanhalalicha Chapanga ndi chilaa jhito jha kukomanila na jha kukikengelela.
2CO 6:8 Tuichimika na kupuchwa, kukokolekewa na kulumbililwa. Anda bhando bhibhahobhecha bhange, nambo tulongela chakaka,
2CO 6:9 tubhonekana ngita twangamanyikana, nambo tubhii kumanyikana kwa bhoha, tukabhonike anda tuhwile, nambo twamela ghome ade ngohe. Tubulitwe nambo bhatukoma ndeka.
2CO 6:10 Pamonga na bhubhabhii ngolongondi machiko ghoha tuhangana, twakahocho nambo twatenda bhando bhabha na ilebhe twe, tubhonekana twanga kilebhe, tubhonekana anda akahocho nambo tukwete ilebhe yamahele, anda bhabhii jhe na kilebhe, nambo tukwete kila ilebhe.
2CO 6:11 Makalongo bhito Akakolintu, tukannobholile hotuhotu na mangota, na miojho jhito ikadindwike kwino.
2CO 6:12 Twenga tunhibhilikii jhe kumpala, nambo mangota mukihibhilikiye kutupala twenga.
2CO 6:13 Ngohe nilonge na mangota ngita yana yango, mutupale twenga ngita twenga chitumpala.
2CO 6:14 Mwangalombana na bhando bhala bhangammanya Chapanga, bho, ghaumbone na mabhoho ghahotola kubhehe pamonga? Bho, lumule na lubhendo bhahoto kutama pamonga?
2CO 6:15 Bho, Kilichitu na Limbembela bhajhokanikihana? Bho, mundo jwannyeketile Kilichitu na jwangannyeketela bhajhokanikihana?
2CO 6:16 Bho, Nyumba jha Chapanga na inyagho ihoto kubhehe pamonga? Nhwalo twenga ndi Nyumba jha Chapanga jwabhii ghome. Anda Chapanga jwenio akalongii, “Chandame nabho na kutyanga nkate jhabhe, Chamme Chapanga gwabhe, na bhene chabhabha bhando bhango.”
2CO 6:17 Peniya Bhambo akalongii kabhele, “Mmoke pakate jhabhe, ntame nabho kutale. Nkotoka kukamula kilebhe changanandela, na nenga nanimpokela.
2CO 6:18 Chamma Tate gwino, na mangota chamma yana yango inalome na ikeghe, ilonge Bhambo jhuna makakala.”
2CO 7:1 Bhahe, makakoche bhango, nhwalo tupilwe lilaghano lende, tukijhelebhule na chochoha, tubhehe bhanyahinyahi kwa kuntembekeya Chapanga.
2CO 7:2 Mtupele pwache miojho jhino! Tunemwiye jhe mundo jhojhoha, tukapalwa jhe kupata kubhoka kwa bhando bhange kupeta chela chitupalita kupata kubhoka kwino.
2CO 7:3 Nilonge jhe ghanga kwa kunhadabuu mangota, ngita punninobholila, mangota mmi nkate jha miojho jhito, anda tuhwe pamonga amu kutama pamonga.
2CO 7:4 Nenga nihobholela hake mangota na niloka kwa nhwalo gwino. Mu malagho ghango ghoha uneke mwojho na luhangano lutehi kuheluka.
2CO 7:5 Nhwalo putuhikita ku Makedoniya tukapomolii jhe, tukibha mu mang'ahiko kila chehemo, panja bhulo, na nkate jha miojho kujhoghopa.
2CO 7:6 Nambo Chapanga jwabhapepecha bhando bhubhabhii ngolongondi, akatupepiche pahikita Titu.
2CO 7:7 Na twenga tukapepichwe jhe kwa kuhika kwake Titu tugha, hilu akatulongalile chimpala kummona nenga chimmii na ungolongondi na chimipala kukikengelela, yenio nihangana hake.
2CO 7:8 Pamonga na kummeka ngolongondi mu baluwa jhela jhenge nenga nihwachi ndeka gheniya, nikahwachi gheniya pamanyita kubhehe baluwa jhela ikampi ungolongondi pandina tugha.
2CO 7:9 Nambo ngoheno nihangana, chi kwa nhwalo mme ngolongondi, nambo kwa nhwalo nng'alambuke na kuuleka uhakaho. Nhwalo mukibha ngolongondi ngita chapalita Chapanga, yenio twenga tukankocholine ndeka kwa chochoha.
2CO 7:10 Nhwalo ungolongondi ghuletwa na Chapanga kwatenda bhando bhauleke uhakaho na bhakombolelwe, yenio ipalwa jhe kubhehe na lipyanda kwa mambu gheniya. Nambo ungolongondi gwa mambu gha pannema uleta kuwegha.
2CO 7:11 Ngohe nnole chela chatehi Chapanga kwa ungolongondi kwa nhwalo gwino, mangota ndi bhando bhumighagha, mighagha mabhene kukilangii nkwetii jhe ulemo na uhyomite, ntehi kuchituka na kupwelela. Mukipiya na mmi tela kulola ulemo ghuhadabulwa! Mangota mabhene nnangiye nkwetii jhe ulemo mu mambu ghoha.
2CO 7:12 Pamonga nikajhandike baluwa jhela, nikajhandikii jhe kwa nhwalo jwa mundo jwalemwite. Nambo nikajhandike kupala ibhonekane hotu palonge jha Chapanga na nnole mangota mabhene chimughagha kukipiya kwa nhwalo gwito.
2CO 7:13 Yene tukahanganile hake. Kupepechwa tujhe, nambo Titu akatuhanganiche hake kwa luhangano lwa bhinagho chimukalamwicha.
2CO 7:14 Nenga nikiloka kwa jwenio kwa nhwalo gwino, na mangota mukangolichii jhe hone. Nambo kila kilebhe chitulobholila kikibha chakaka, na kukilokela mangota palonge jha Titu kikibha kilebhe cha uchakaka.
2CO 7:15 Yene upalo gwake kwino ujhojhikike hake, pakomboka pumughakamwile mabholo ghake na hele chimumpokii kwa mbwelelo nu kujhoghopa.
2CO 7:16 Ngohe nihangana hake nhwalo nihoto kuhobholela njwe mangota.
