2CO 8:1 Makalongo bhango, nipala kunnobholela umbone kwa Chapanga ghubhapatite bhando bhubhanyeketii Chapanga na bhubhannyeketii Kilichitu bha kwenio ku Makedoniya.
2CO 8:2 Bhando bheniya bhakang'ahike hake, nambo luhangano lwabhe lukibha lukolongwa na lwatehi bhabhe bhaumbone hake pamonga na bhakibha akahocho hake.
2CO 8:3 Chakaka ninnobholel bhakapihite hake na bhakapihite chibhahotwila. Bhapihita kupeta uhotolo gwabhe bhene,
2CO 8:4 Bhakatupembekii hake tulombine mu mota kwatangatila bhando bha Chapanga bhubhabhii ku Yudeya.
2CO 8:5 Bhakatei kuchocha chituhobholila! Hote bhakatumbwii kukipiya bhene kwa Bhambo, peniya bhajhakukipiya bhene kwa nhwalo gwito ngita Chapanga chapalita.
2CO 8:6 Kwa nhwalo gwenio, tukampembikiye hake Titu, jwatumbulicha lihengo lyenio ajhendelele kuntangatila mangota kujhomola kupiya kwa upalo.
2CO 8:7 Nambo mangota mmi na kila kilebhe, kihobholelo, na uhotolo gwa kulonge, na kumanya na kujhendelela kuhenga ghaumbone na upalo. Yene tunnyope mme na mwojho ghutwelii kiya mu lihengo lende lya upalo.
2CO 8:8 Nenga nimpekii jhe nhwilo, nambo nipala kunangiya kubhehe bhange chibhaghagha kutangatila ndi mbate kumanya upalo gwino chiubhii gwa chakaka.
2CO 8:9 Nhwalo, mangota mmanya umbone gwa Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu, Jwenio pamonga na kubhehe na kila kilebhe kunane kwa Chapanga, nambo ajhakukitenda nhocho kwa nhwalo gwino, kupete nhocho gwake mangota mme na ilebhe mbwe.
2CO 8:10 Ghanga ndi malobhe ghango ghighabhii mbone kwino, mbaha ngohe kuhenga ghala ghantumbwila makacho. Mangota mukatumbwii kuchangii tughajhe, nambo helahela kubhehe na mwojho gwa kupala kuchangii.
2CO 8:11 Ngohe nnyomole lihengo lyenio lya kuchangila, ngita hela chimpalita kuchangila, ngohe nchangile chela chimmi nacho.
2CO 8:12 Nhwalo anda mundo abhii na mwojho gwa kuchangila, Chapanga napokela chela chapiya kwa kulolekeya chabhii nacho, na chi kwa kulolekeya chela changabhehe nacho.
2CO 8:13 Mangota mipalwa jhe kung'ahika mwatangatila bhange, nambo mabhoha mme tela,
2CO 8:14 ilebhe yamahele immi nako, ngohe yatangatila bhajhino bhangakola, nambo bheniya bhubhantangatile mangota pangabhehe nacho, nambo bhoha mme tela.
2CO 8:15 Anda Majhandiko gha Chapanga chighalonge, “Jhola jwajholite yamahele akwete jhe yamahele, na jhola jwajholite kandina, akwete jhe kilebhe.”
2CO 8:16 Ninchenguu Chapanga jwampekiye Titu mwojho gwa kuntangatila ngita ghungwete nenga.
2CO 8:17 Chi nhwalo twenga tugha tukannobholile, nambo helahela Titu jwenio akapahi hake kuntangatila, kwa kupala jwenio kuhika kwino.
2CO 8:18 Pamonga na jwenio, tuntuma nnongo jhumo jwalumbililwe hake na bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu kwa lihengo lyake lya kutangachii bhando Malobhe gha Mbone.
2CO 8:19 Helahela, jwenio ahaghulilwe na bhando bhoha bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu alongohane na twenga mumwanja pitapelekela bhando michango jha upalo. Lihengo lituhenga nhwalo gwa ung'alicho gwa Bhambo na ilangiya tupala kwatangatila bhando.
2CO 8:20 Tupala jhe mundo jhojhoha akokoleke kwa namuna chitujhemelela michango jhenje jha umbone.
2CO 8:21 Nhwalo twenga tupala kuhenga ghambone, chi palonge jha Bhambo tugha, nambo helahela palonge jha bhando.
2CO 8:22 Yene tuntuma nnongo gwito pamonga na bheniya, papipi tunnyighite na tumwene abhii na mwojho hake gwa kwatangatii bhando, na ngohe abhii na kihobholelo na mangota.
2CO 8:23 Titu ndi nnyango, twenga tihenga lihengo kwa nhwalo gwino. Nambo makalongo bhito bhubhalongohana nako, bhene ndi bhando bhibhapalwa kwatangatila bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu, na bhene ndi ukolongwa gwa Kilichitu.
2CO 8:24 Ngohe mwalangiye bhando bheniya upalo gwino, na bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu bhamanye kwa uchakaka pitiloka kwa nhwalo gwino.
2CO 9:1 Nipala jhe kunnyandikila mangota malobhe gha kwatangatila bhando bha Chapanga bha ku Yudeya.
2CO 9:2 Nhwalo nimanye mmii na mwojho gwa kwatangatila bhando bha Chapanga, na nikilokela mangota kwa bhando bha ku Makedoniya. Nikalobholile bheniya bha ku Makedoniya kwa makalongo bhito bha ku Akaya bhakalenganikiye kuchangii kuhumii makacho. Yene mwojho gwino gwa kuchangii gwatehi bhando bhamahele bhachangile.
2CO 9:3 Yene nanintuma akalongo bheniya kwino kukiloka kwito kukota kubhehe jhajhe, nambo ngita chininobholile, mkilenganikiye kwatangatila.
2CO 9:4 Nhwalo bhando bha ku Makedoniya pubhapala kuhika pamonga na nenga na kunkolela mangota mukilenganikii jhe, natukola hone nhwalo tukalokite hake kwa nhwalo gwino, na mangota helahela nankola hone.
2CO 9:5 Yene mwe mbaha kwajhopa akalongo bhamba bhalongolele kuhika kwino, akalaghii hupo hino ngolongwa ghinnongela nampiya, peniya nailangiya kubhehe hupo jhene ipihitwe kwa kupala kwino mabhene na chi kwa kuchokolekewa.
2CO 9:6 Nkomboka malobhe ghala, “Jwamicha mbejho pandina nahuna pandina, jwamicha mbejho yamahele nahuna yamahele.”
2CO 9:7 Kila mundo apiya chikinkanga kumwojho gwake, chi kwa uchongo amu kuchokolekewa nhwalo Chapanga impala mundo jhola jwapiya kwa umbone.
2CO 9:8 Chapanga ahotola kumpela ilebhe yamahele imipala, machiko ghoha mmi nagho ghala ghumipala, nchoche kupata kwa kila lihengo lya mbone limuhenga.
2CO 9:9 Ngita Majhandiko gha Chapanga chighalongela, “Jwenio ampela twe kwa akahocho, na umbone gwake utama machiko ghoha ghangapeta.”
2CO 9:10 Chapanga umpela mbejho jhola jwaimicha na jwampela chakulyegha, helahela nampelangana mangota mbejho imipala na itenda imele na ikole na ipambike mahuno ghamahele gha umbone gwino.
2CO 9:11 Jwenio Chapanga champela ilebhe yamahele, mme na bhaumbone machiko ghoha bhanchenguu Chapanga nhwalo gwa hupo hito ibhapokile kwa twenga.
2CO 9:12 Nhwalo lihengo lende limuhenga lyatangatii jhe bhando bha Chapanga tugha, nambo helahela lyatenda bhando bhamahele bhanchenguu hake Chapanga.
2CO 9:13 Kwa kulangii umbone gwa lihengo lino mabhene, bhando bhannombe Chapanga kwa kujhokanikiya kwino na kujheketela Lilobhe lya Mbone lya Kilichitu. Helahala na miojho jhino jhaumbone kwa kupiya ilebhe hino kwa nhwalo gwabhe na kwa bhando bhange bhoha.
2CO 9:14 Yene bhanyope kwa mwojho gwabhe kwa nhwalo gwino mangota, nhwalo gwa umbone nkolongwa gwampekii Chapanga.
2CO 9:15 Tunchenguu Chapanga kwa nhwalo gwa hupo yake yangachimulika!
2CO 10:1 Nenga ndi Pauli jwenio jhumonekana ndokomile punibhehe kutale na mangota, nambo nibhehe na lilaka, puninnobholela kwa kiya na umbone gwa Kilichitu.
2CO 10:2 Punimpembekeya punihika kwino ungoto kuntenda mme na lilaka, nhwalo chakaka nihoto kubhehe na lilaka kwa bhando bhibhalongela twenga tutama ngita bhando bha nnema ghongo.
2CO 10:3 Chakaka tutama pannema, tukomana jhe ngondo ngita bhando bha pannema chibhakomana.
2CO 10:4 Nhwalo chilaa jhitukomanila chi chilaa jha pannema, nambo likakala lya Chapanga lihangabhana liboma lyoha. Tuhangabhana mambu ghoha ghuwange,
2CO 10:5 nu kutilulana kihibhilikilo chochoha chikiloka chikibhekitwe kwa kulihibhilikiya umanyo gwa Chapanga, na kughatabha malango ghoha, ghinyokanikiye Kilichitu.
2CO 10:6 Anda nkomii mukunyokanikiya kila kilebhe, twenga tukilenganikiye kunhadabula kila mundo jwangapala kujhokanikiya.
2CO 10:7 Mangota nnola ilebhe kwa panja tugha. Bho, abhii mundo jhojhoha jwawacha kubhehe jwenio ndi mundo jwa Kilichitu? Chakaka! Bhahe, helahela atubhone twenga ndi bhando bha Kilichitu anda jwenio chabhii mundo jwa Kilichitu.
2CO 10:8 Pamonga na kuloka hake kwa ukindendeke gwatupekii Bhambo gwa kwakangamalicha bhando mu kihobholelo na chi kwaleghelecha, nikola jhe hone.
2CO 10:9 Mbaijhe mwonekane ndenda kunnyoghowa mu baluwa jhango.
2CO 10:10 Mundo ahoto kulonge, “Baluwa jha Pauli ndi ngale na ibhii na malobhe matopao, nambo jwenio pabhehe pamonga na twenga abhehe leghele na chikilongela kibhehe kilebhe nacho.”
2CO 10:11 Mundo jwalongela gheniya amanye kubhehe ghala ghitujhandike tubhehe kutale ghihwanana na ghala ghituhenga putubhehe pamonga na mangota.
2CO 10:12 Twenga tupala jhe kukibheka amu kuhwanana na bhando bhala bhubhakikweya bhene, bhando bhubha kipema bhene kwa bhene na bhubhakihwananicha bhene kwa bhene, bhene ndi mandindilima.
2CO 10:13 Nambo twenga tupetelecha jhe kukiloka, kukiloka kwito nakuighalika mulihengo lyatupekii Chapanga, helahela lihengo lyenio ndi lituhenga kwino.
2CO 10:14 Twenga tupetelecha jhe kuhomba ngita hela tukahikite jhe kwino. Chakaka tukahikite kwino kunnetela Malobhe gha Mbone gha Kilichitu.
2CO 10:15 Yene twenga tulokite hake jhe kwa lihengo lilihengitwe na bhando bhange, nambo tunhobholela kwino Chapanga na kujhendelela kwa lihengo lito kwino, nalibha likolongwa kwa kukengama ghapala Chapanga.
2CO 10:16 Peniya tuhoto kwatangachii bhando Malobhe gha Mbone mu ilambo ibhii kutale na mangota, nhwalo tupahi jhe kukilokela lihengo lilihengitwa na mundo jwa ku kilambo chenge.
2CO 10:17 Nambo ngita chighalongila Majhandiko gha Chapanga, “Jwapala kukiloka na alokele lihengo lya Bhambo.”
2CO 10:18 Nhwalo jwajheketelwa chi jhola jwakikweya jwenio, nambo jhola jwalumbililwa na Bhambo.
2CO 11:1 Nipala nhimbalile kandina, pamonga nibhonekana nalindindilima. Nhwimbalile kachoko!
2CO 11:2 Nimone wiho, ngita Chapanga pamonela wiho, nhwalo mangota mmii ngita nchikana jwangakongana na munalome jwalepwe inyaghabhule kwa munalome jhumo tugha jwenio ndi Kilichitu.
2CO 11:3 Nambo nijhoghopa kubhehe malango ghino ghahotola kughalambulwa na mangota chimuleka kuhobholelwa kwino kwa Kilichitu ngita Hawa chakolwiwa na uwange gwa lijhoka.
2CO 11:4 Nhwalo mundo jhojhoha anda ahika kwino na kuntangacha Yecho jwangalandana na jhola tuntangacha twenga, mangota mupokela kwa mabhoko mabhele. Na mangota anda mkapokii Uhuke jhonge jwangalandana na hela jha Uhuke gwa Chapanga, na anda mukalipokile Lilobhe lya Chapanga lyangalandana na lela lituntangachila twenga mughahimbilile mambu agha kwa ujhojhoho!
2CO 11:5 Nihambuka jhe kubhehe nenga ndi jwandina kuliku bhene bhubhakikema, akatenga akakolongwa.
2CO 11:6 Pange nibhonekana nilonge jhe mbone, nambo ngwete uhotolo gwa kumanya ilebhe ya mahele, lijhambu lende litendike limanyikana kwino kila chehemo na kipinde choha.
2CO 11:7 Bho, ndehi uhakaho kwa kukihuluwa namwene na kunhobhowa mangota kwa kwatangachii jhajhe Lilobhe lya Mbone lya Chapanga?
2CO 11:8 Punikibha ninhengela mangota, ilebhe yoha ibhokite kwa lilongo lya bhando bhange bhubhanyeketii Kilichitu. Ndehila ngita kupoka bhange ilebhe yabhe mbate kunhengela mangota.
2CO 11:9 Punikibha na mangota nikantotwii jhe mundo jhojhoha pumbata kilebhe, nhwalo akalongo bhubhabhokite ku Makedoniya bhakambekii kila ilebhe imbalita. Nikapahi jhe kumponja kilebhe chochoha chela na nijhendelila kuhenga yenio.
2CO 11:10 Kwa uchakaka Kilichitu abhii nkate jhango, abhii jhe mundo jhojhoha jwabhii ku kilambo cha ku Akaya jwahoto kunhibhilila nenga kukiloka kwango.
2CO 11:11 Bho, punilonge naha mihambuka nimpala jhe? Chapanga amanya kubhehe nenga nimpala!
2CO 11:12 Nijhendelela kuhenga chela chinihenga ngohe, kupala kwahibhilila ndela bhala bhubhakikema akatenga akakolongwa, bhala bhubhapala kukiloka, ngita bhala bhubhakiloka bhahenga lihengo ngita lituhenga twenga.
2CO 11:13 Nhwalo bhando bheniya ndi akatenga bhuwange, bhahenga lihengo lyabhe kwa uwange bhubhakikopokeya akatenga bha Kilichitu.
2CO 11:14 Nkoto kukangacha, nhwalo Limbembela lihotola kukikopokeya kubhonekana ntumiche jwa kunane kwa Chapanga jwa lumule!
2CO 11:15 Yene tukangacha jhe anda akahenga lihengo bha Limbembela bhakikopokeya bhabhonekane akatumiche bhaumbone, nambo kujhomolela kwabhe nabhapokela chikipalwa.
2CO 11:16 Nenga nilonge kabhele, mundo jhojhoha akoto kummona nenga nalindindilima. Anda umwene nenga nalindindima, umbokela yenio anda nenga nalindindima mbate kuloka pandina.
2CO 11:17 Chinikilongela ngohe chi chela chalaghalikiye Bhambo nongele, nambo nhwalo gwa kukiloka, nenga nilongii ngita mundo nalindindima.
2CO 11:18 Nhwalo bhando bhamahele bhakiloka anda bhando bha pannema chibhaloka, nenga helahela nikiloka.
2CO 11:19 Mangota mabhene bhumii na malango hake, ndi nhwalo mahimbilila mandindilima kwa kuhangana!
2CO 11:20 Mangota munhimbalila mundo jwantenda makabhanda, mwahimbilila bhando bhubhapala ilebhe twe kuliku chibhapalwa kupata, jwakikweya na bhubhanimbilikiya na kumpucha, bhamata mbalamande kumiho.
2CO 11:21 Nikola hone kujheketela gheniya kwa twenga tukahotwiijhe kujheketela. Nambo nilonge anda mundo nalindindima, anda abhii mundo jhojhoha jwapala kukilokela kilebhe, na nenga nijhigha kukiloka.
2CO 11:22 Bho, bheniya ndi Akaebulaniya? Nenga helahela ndi Mwebulaniya. Bho, bheniya Akaichilahele? Nenga helahela Mwichilahele. Bho bheniya bhahumii mulukolo lwa Ulahimo? Nenga helahela nihumii mu lukolo lwa Ulahimo.
2CO 11:23 Bho, bheniya ndi akatumiche bha Kilichitu? Nilonge ngita nde kupombwa, nenga ndi natumiche jwa Kilichitu kupeta bheniya! Nenga hengite lihengo lyamahele kupeta bheniya, mbungitwe mukipungo kupeta bheniya, nikatyalitwe kwa limbendela lya ndomondo kupeta bheniya, nikibha mukuhandahanda jha ngondo jha kuwegha kupeta bheniya.
2CO 11:24 Nikatyalitwe mala nhwano na limbendela lya ndomondo yato makome matato na ticha na Akayahude.
2CO 11:25 Nikatyalitwe na limbendela lya ndomondo patato na Akaloma, nikakong'winde na maghanga mala jhimo, nikatenywikilwe na mele mulilabha mala patato, na mala jhimo nikapipiki totolo mumbwane muhe na kilo.
2CO 11:26 Mumwanja gwango nikibha mukuhandahanda jha ngondo jha kukokolwa na mache, nikibha mukuhandahanda jha ngondo jha kubulwa na akawiye, nikibha mukuhandahanda jha ngondo jha Akayahude ajhango na bhangabhehe Akayahude, nikibha mukuhandahanda jha ngondo pa bomane, nikibha mukuhandahanda jha ngondo kumanyahe, nikibha mukuhandahanda jha ngondo mumbwane, nikibha mukuhandahanda jha ngondo kwa akalongo bhuwange.
2CO 11:27 Nikahengite lihengo linonoho na kulagha, nikagholwike jhe, nikibha na njala na nyota, nikibha jhe na chukulyegha, nikapemite malile na nikibha jhe na ngobho.
2CO 11:28 Pamonga na gheniya ghoha, kila lichiko natangatila kwahengela makunde gha bhando bhubhanyeketii Kilichitu.
2CO 11:29 Anda abhii mundo jwaleghelike, na nenga helahela nibhehe leghele. Anda mundo jhonge antenda agweghe mu uhakaho, nenga helahela nibhona lipyanda hake.
2CO 11:30 Anda imbala kukiloka, nikilokela ghala ghighalangiya nenga neghelike.
2CO 11:31 Chapanga, Tate jwa Bhambo Yecho, ndi alumbalilwe machiko ghoha ghangapeta, jwenio amanya kubhehe chinilongela nilonge jhe uwange.
2CO 11:32 Punikibha ku Damasiko, nkolo jwa bomane, jwalongochwa na munahota nkolongwa Aleta, akabhekite akalonda pa bomane bhapata bhangamule.
2CO 11:33 Nambo nikabhekitwe mu kitandabhala, nyakuhuwa pa lidilicha lya lipamanda, nyakupokonyoka mu mabhoko ghake.
2CO 12:1 Nipala kukiloka, nambo kilebhe cha mahajhe. Nanongela ghala gha uloto na uyekulo kuhumii kwa Bhambo.
2CO 12:2 Nimmanya mundo jhumo jwajheketile Kilichitu, yaka kome na ncheche akatolitwe ade kunane kwa Chapanga. Nambo nimanya ndeka atamita kwenio kwa yegha amu kwa uhuke, nambo Chapanga amanya.
2CO 12:3 Nilonge kabhele, nimanya mundo jwenio akatolitwe ade paladicho ndi kunane kwa Chapanga. Nambo nimanya jhe atamita kwenio kwa yegha amu kwa uhuke, nambo Chapanga amanya.
2CO 12:4 Kwenio ku pepo jwenio ngajhoha mambu ghangachimulika, mambu gheniya mundo ipalwa jhe kuchimulila.
2CO 12:5 Chanikilokela mundo ngita jwenio, nambo nikiloka jhe namwete nambo chanikilokela ilebhe yela ilangii uleghele gwango.
2CO 12:6 Anda ngambala kuloka, ngamii jhe nalindindilima, nhwalo nganongi uchakaka tugha. Nambo nenga nikiloka jhe, kupala bhando bhangoto kumona nenga ndi nkolongwa kuliku ghala ghubhaghabhona na kujhoha kuhumii kwa nenga.
2CO 12:7 Nambo indenda nenga ngoto kuloka hake kwa nhwalo gwa ilebhe yamahele yayekulilwe Bhambo, nikajhohine lipyanda payegha jhango ngita nihomwa na mibha, ntumiche jwa Limbembela ang'ahiche nenga kupala ngoto kukiloka.
2CO 12:8 Nikampembelikii Bhambo pa tato kupala amokeye lipyanda lyenio.
2CO 12:9 Nambo Bhambo akanobholile, “Umbone gwango kwino ukwelite, nhwalo likakala lyango libhehe likolongwa pumibhehe legheleghe.” Yene nikilokela uleghele gwango kupala likakala lya Kilichitu litame nkate jhango.
2CO 12:10 Yene kwa nhwalo gwa Kilichitu, nijheketela punibhehe leghele, puniligwa, punilagha na puning'ahika, na mang'ahiko ghange nhwalo punibhehe leghele, peniya ndi punikangamala.
2CO 12:11 Mmii ngita nalindindilima, nambo mangota munjokolekeya kubhehe yenio, nhwalo mangota mpalitwa kungweya. Nhwalo anda nenga kilebhe nacho, nambo nenga natumiche jwandina jhe kuliku bhala bhubhakikema akatenga akakolongwa.
2CO 12:12 Ikangacho na nginyililo ilangii chakaka nenga ndi natenga, ghakapitile pakate jhino kwa uhimbililo.
2CO 12:13 Bho, kilebhe ghane chipongokilwe kuliku malongo ghange gha bhando ghighanyeketii Kilichitu, nambo nenga nikantotwii jhe kwa kumpala mangota utangatile mbijha? Chonde ninyopa unekeke kwa kunnemu yenio!
2CO 12:14 Dolekeya ngohe patato nenga kuntyangila, nanimponje jhe nhwalo nipala jhe ilebhe hino nambo nimpala mangota. Nhwalo yana bhabheke jhe kihukilo akatate bhabhe, nambo akatate bhabheke yana yabhe kihukilo.
2CO 12:15 Ngohe chahangana hake kutumila ilebhe yoha iminayo kwa nhwalo gwango, helahela kukibhowa namwete kwa nhwalo gwa kuntangatila mangota. Bho, chaumbala pandina nhwalo nenga nimpala hake mangota?
2CO 12:16 Yene channyeketela kubhehe nikampunjite jhe. Nambo mundo jhonge chalonge, “Nhwalo Pauli akalamwike, akampatite kwa kunkolowa.”
2CO 12:17 Bho, nikapatite ilebhe yamahele kuliku chimbalitwa kupata punintumita mundo jhojhoha kwino?
2CO 12:18 Nenga nikampembelekiye Titu, ahike kwino pamonga na nnongo jhonge. Bho, Titu akampokite ilebhe hino? Bho, nenga na jwenio tuhengita jhe lihengo kwa Uhuke gwa Chapanga gholaghola amu tukengama jhe ndela jhejhela jhela?
2CO 12:19 Pange mihoto kulonge twenga tukikengelela palonge jhino! Nambo twenga tulongela mambu ghanga palonge jha Chapanga, kongo tulombine na Kilichitu. Akakoche bhango, chochoha chituhenga, tuhenga kwa kukangamalicha mangota mu kihobholelo.
2CO 12:20 Nijhoghopa kuhika kwino, nihoto kukolela jhe ngita chinihobholela kunkolela, na mangota chaumone jhe ngita chimihobholela kumona. Nijhoghopa ngoto kwakolela bhando akakomana na bhikolelana wiho na bhinalilka na bhikikweya na bhina lung'enyo na kukopokehana na kukiloka, na kijhonga.
2CO 12:21 Nijhoghopa pange punihika mala jhu ubhele kwino, Chapanga chandenda ndokomale palonge jhino, chinalelela bhala bhubhahengita uhakaho makacho, nambo bhakajheketii jhe kuuleka uhakaho gwabhe, kupala ngongola na ngongola ibhatehila.
2CO 13:1 Jhenje ndi mala jhu utato kutyangii mangota. Ngita Majhandiko gha Chapanga chighalonge, “Kila litakalilo lihadabhulwe kongo bhabhaa bhando bhatato amu bhabhele bhubhalolite.”
2CO 13:2 Nikapwatalile pabhele punityangila mangota. Ngohe nilonge kabhele punibhehe kutale, pumbala kuhika nanabhonela jhe kiya bhala bhubhahengita uhakaho na bhala bhange bhoha.
2CO 13:3 Chahenga yenio nhwalo mabhene mipala kulola kubhehe Kilichitu alonge kupete nenga. Kwino Kilichitu aleghelike jhe mukuntendela ipalwa, nambo likakala lyake lihenga lihengo pakate jhino.
2CO 13:4 Nhwalo akabhambitwe panchalaba kongo aleghelike, nambo ngohe abhii ghome kwa likakala lya Chapanga. Helahela twenga tuleghelike kwa kulombana nako, nambo tutama nako kwa likakala lya Chapanga kwa kunnangiya mangota.
2CO 13:5 Mukilolekeye mabhene anda chakaka nkwete kihobholelo. Bho, umanya jhe kubhehe Kilichitu Yecho abhii nkate jhino? Anda Kilichitu abhii jhe nkate jhino nnepelile njwe.
2CO 13:6 Nambo nihobholela mangota umanya kubhehe twenga tukalepelii jhe.
2CO 13:7 Ngohe tunnyopa Chapanga nkoto kuhenga lyanganandela lyolyoha. Chi ngita tupala bhando bhalole tulepelii jhe, nambo mangota uhenga ghaumbone pamonga na twenga kubhonekana tulepelile.
2CO 13:8 Nhwalo twenga tuhoto jhe kukana uchakaka, nambo tujhendelecha uchakaka.
2CO 13:9 Tuhangana kubhehe twenga tuleghelike, nambo mangota nkangamile, tunyopa Chapanga mangota mme bhaumbone kwa kila kilebhe.
2CO 13:10 Yene nijhandika ghanga ghoha punibhehe kutale, nhwalo punihika kwino ngoto kupwata kwa ukindendeke ghumbatite na Bhambo, uhotolo gwa kwa kangamalicha changahegheleka mwojho.
2CO 13:11 Ngohe makalongo bhango nintabhuka, mme bhaumbone kwa kila kilebhe, nhwachila kilebhe chimo, ntamangane kwa uteeke, na jwenio Chapanga jwa upalo na uteeke chabhaha pamonga na mangota.
2CO 13:12 Nnyambuchane kwa kulangiya upalo gwa Kilichitu.
2CO 13:13 Bhando bhoha bha Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu bhinyambucha.
2CO 13:14 Umbone gwa Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu na upalo gwa Chapanga na mu kulombana na Uhuke gwa Chapanga, utama pamonga na mangota mabhoha.
GAL 1:1 Nenga Napauli, ngemitwe jhe hilu ndumitwe jhe na mundo kubhehe natenga, nambo ngemitwe na kutumwa na Yecho Kilichitu na Chapanga Tate gwito jwakayokiche Yecho Kilichitu kuhumii mu kuwegha,
GAL 1:2 nenga na akalongo bhoha bhibhabhii pamonga na nenga tunyandikila mangota makunde gha bhando ghighannyeketii Kilichitu gha ku Galatiya.
GAL 1:3 Ninyope umbone na uteeke kuhumii kwa Chapanga Tate gwito na Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu.
GAL 1:4 Yecho Kilichitu akajheketile kuwe jwenio kwa nhwalo jha uhakaho gwito twenga ngita chapalita Chapanga Tate gwito, atukombole kuhumii mu nnema ghongo gwanganandela gwa ngohe.
GAL 1:5 Chapanga abhii na ung'alicho machiko ghoha ghangapeta! Amina.
GAL 1:6 Nikangacha munneka Chapanga kajhombekajhombe, jwahaghuline mangota kwa umbone gwa Kilichitu, na nkengime lilobhe lenge lilibhonekana ngita Lilobhe lya Mbone.
GAL 1:7 Chakaka libhii jhe Lilobhe lenge lya Mbone. Nongi yenio, nhwalo bhabhii bhando bhibhamubhoghana, na bhapala kulighalambula Lilobhe lya Mbone lya Kilichitu.
GAL 1:8 Nambo anda mundo pakate jhito amu ntumiche jwa kunane kwa Chapanga, natangachila lilobhe lenge lya mbone chi ngita lituntangachii twenga, bhahe, jwenio abhaha na likoto!
GAL 1:9 Ngita chinongolile kulonge, na ngohe nibhujhii kabhele kulonge, anda mundo jhojhoha anobholile Lilobhe lya Mbone lenge na chi lela lipokile, jwenio abhaha na likoto lya Chapanga!
GAL 1:10 Bho, nipala kunhalalicha ghane? Bho, nipala kunhalalicha mundo amu Chapanga? Anda ngandenda yenio, ngangundike ng'o nenga kubhehe natumiche jwa Kilichitu.
GAL 1:11 Makalongo bhango, mbala umanye kubhehe Lilobhe lya Mbone lindangicha lela lihumii jhe kwa bhando.
GAL 1:12 Hilu nenga mbokii jhe kuhumii kwa mundo jhojhoha amu nikabholitwe jhe na mundo. Nambo Yecho Kilichitu jwenio ndi jwayekulile gheniya.
GAL 1:13 Mangota mukajhohine punikibha makacho pungamwila dine jhango jha Kiyahude, na chinang'ahita makunde gha bhando bhibhanyeketii Kilichitu nambata kwakomelekeya njwe.
GAL 1:14 Chakaka, nenga nikachochite hake mu dine jha Kiyahude kuliku Akayahude twe bhitulenganii yaka nhwalo ng'aghita hake kughakamula mabholo ghala gha akanahota bhito.
GAL 1:15 Nambo Chapanga, kwa umbone gwake akahagwii nakubhelukwa jhe, angemite niunhengele mahengo.
GAL 1:16 Pala tugha payekulila Mwana mundo nkate jhango, ndangache Lilobhe lya Mbone kwa bhando bha ilambo henge, nikabhutwiki jhe kunkonya mundo jhojhoha.
GAL 1:17 Helahela nikajhawii ndeka ku Yeluchalemo kwa bhala bhibhakalongalile kubhehe akatenga, nikatumbwii kujhenda ku Alabiya, peniya nyakukelebhuka kabhele ku Damasiko.
GAL 1:18 Puipetita yaka itato nyakuhobhoka ku Yeluchalemo kukongana na Petile, nyakutama nako kwa machiko kome na nhwano.
GAL 1:19 Nambo nikakonganike jhe na ntenga jhonge jhojhoha nga Yakobu, unung'una mundo Bhambo Yecho.
GAL 1:20 Chenje chinijhandika ndi chakaka, Chapanga amanye, nilonge uwange jhe.
GAL 1:21 Bhahe, machiko gha palongolo nyakujhenda ku kilambo chuku Siliya na ku Kilikiya.
GAL 1:22 Machiko gheniya, namwete bhanamona jhe makunde gha bhando ghighanyeketii Kilichitu gha ku kilambo chuku Yudeya kola.
GAL 1:23 Chibhakimanyite bheniya ndi chela chikilongelwa na bhando: “Mundo jhola jwatung'ahita makacho, ngohe atangachii bhando Lilobhe lya Mbone lelela lela lya kuhobholela Kilichitu lyapata kulikomelekeya!”
GAL 1:24 Yene, bhajhakunnomba Chapanga kwa nhwalo jha nenga.
GAL 2:1 Peniya, puipetita yaka kome na ncheche, nyakuhobhoka kabhele kujhenda ku Yeluchalemo pamonga na Banaba, helahela nyakulongohana pamonga na Titu.
GAL 2:2 Kujhenda kwango ngita chakayekulile Chapanga nyende. Pantemela kwenio ku Yeluchalemo nikakongine na ilongoche, nikalobholile Malobhe gha Mbone ghinatangachila bhando bha ilambo henge. Ndehila naha nipala lihengo lyango lindehila likoto kubhehe jhajhe.
GAL 2:3 Nambo Titu jwakalongohine pamonga na nenga, pamo na kubhehe Nghilike, akachokolikiwe jhe kujhingii jando,
GAL 2:4 pamonga na kupitii akalongo bhuwange bhibhapata ajhingii jando. Bhando bhamba bhajhakukiwininika kwa kuchenjela bhalingulile chitutama kwa uteeke mu kulombana na Kilichitu Yecho, bhatutende akabhanda,
GAL 2:5 nambo tukajheketii jhe kwa kupala hilu lichaa limo uchakaka gwa Lilobhe lya Mbone liighalike kwino mangota.
GAL 2:6 Nambo bhando bhamba bhibhamanyikana pange ilongoche, anda bhakibha ilongoche amu ilongochejhe, kwale bhene. Nhwalo gwa Chapanga ihadabuu jhe kwa kulolekeya ilebhe ya panja. Bhando bhamba bhakwete jhe mabholo gha kunyonjekeya nenga mu mabholo ghango.
GAL 2:7 Chibhakimanye, Chapanga angamwii lihengo lya kutangacha Lilobhe lya Mbone kwa bhando bha ilambo henge, anda jhe Petile chatumitwe kwatangachii Lilobhe lya Mbone kwa Akayahude.
GAL 2:8 Nhwalo jhola jwatangatila Petile kubhehe ntenga jwa Akayahude, ndi jhojho jwandangatii nenga helahela kubhehe natenga kwa bhando bha ilambo henge.
GAL 2:9 Yene, Yakobu na Kefa na Yohane ndi bhabhoneka kubhehe ilongoche ikolongwa, bhakaumanye Chapanga ambekiye umbone ghongo. Tujhakukamulana mabhoko na twenga, hote Banaba na nenga, kulangii nginyililo tubhii pamonga. Twenga tughakamwii mahengo pakate jha bhando bha ilambo henge na bhange bhajhende kwa Akayahude.
GAL 2:10 Nambo ngabhatujhopita kilebhe chimo, kwakomboka akahocho, na nenga ndi ng'aghita hake kilebhe chenie.
GAL 2:11 Nambo Petile pahikita ku Antiyokiya, ngatahungina nako hotuhotu palonge jha bhando, nhwalo akatei kulemwa.
GAL 2:12 Kabula jha kuhika bhando bhibhakatumitwe na Yakobu, Petile alila pamonga na bhando bha ilambo henge. Nambo pubhahikita bhando bheniya, ajhakuhila na akalii ng'o na bhando bha ilambo henge, nhwalo ajhogwipa bhando bhala bhibhachokolikiya kujhingii jando.
GAL 2:13 Akayahude bhange bhakibha ndela jhimo kwa Petile patehila kilebhe ngita chambone, na jwenio Banaba ujhakunhuta umbebhebhe gwenio.
GAL 2:14 Bhahe, punolita ndela yabhe ilandana jhe na uchakaka gwa Lilobhe lya Mbone, nyakunobholela Petile palonge jha bhando bhoha: “Pamonga mwenga ndi Mayahude, mitama ngita Mayahude, na kone chi Mayahude. Nhwalo gwa nike mwachokolekeya bhando bha ilambo henge bhakengame mabholo gha Kiyahude?”
GAL 2:15 Twenga ndi Akayahude njwe kwa kubhelukwa, na chi bhando bha ilambo henge bhibhabhii na uhakaho.
GAL 2:16 Nambo tumanya mundo ihotojhe kubhalangilwa jwaumbone palonge jha Chapanga nhwalo alijheketile Lilaghalikilo lya Mucha, nambo tugha kwa kunnyeketila Yecho Kilichitu. Na twenga hele tunyeketile Yecho Kilichitu tuteilwe tubhalangilwe na Chapanga twaumbone kwa ndela jha kujheketela kwito na Kilichitu, na chi kwa kuhenga chilipala Lilaghalikilo. Nhwalo abhii jhe mundo jwatendwa jwaumbone palonge jha Chapanga kwa kukamula Lilaghalikilo lya Mucha.
GAL 2:17 Nambo anda twenga tupala, kutendwa tubhonekana twaumbone palonge jha Chapanga kwa kulombana na Kilichitu, twenga twabhete tubhonekana tubhii na uhakaho. Bho, ngoheno kilebhe chenie kibhonekana Kilichitu abhatangatila bhando kuhenga uhakaho? Nahi jhe!
GAL 2:18 Nhwalo anda nichenga kabhele kwa lijhambu lela lilihobholela lilaghalikilo lihangabhine, bhahe, ilangii nenga nemwite.
GAL 2:19 Nhwalo gwa Lilaghalikilo lyenio nenga hwile, Lilaghalikilo lyenio lingomite na nandama ghome kwa nhwalo gwa Chapanga. Nenga mambitwe pamonga na Kilichitu panchalaba,
GAL 2:20 na ngoheno namite, ne jhe kabhele, nambo Kilichitu jwabhii nkate jhango. Ughome ghongo ghumii nako ngoheno nitama kwa ndela jha kunhobholela Mwana gwa Chapanga, jwenio jwambahile na jwakapihite ughome gwake kwa nhwalo gwango.
GAL 2:21 Nikana jhe umbone gwa Chapanga. Anda mundo atendwa jwaumbone palonge jha Chapanga kwa kujheketela Lilaghalikilo, yenio Kilichitu akahwii jhajhe!
GAL 3:1 Mangota bhando bhu ku Galatiya mandindililma! Bho, ghane jwannoghite mangota? Malobhe gha kubhambwa panchalaba kwa Yecho Kilichitu ghalongilwe hotuhotu palonge jha miho ghino!
GAL 3:2 Mbala manye kilebhe chimo. Bho, ngohe mukapokile Uhuke gwa Chapanga kwa nhwalo gwa kukamuu Lilaghalikilo lya Mucha amu kwa kuijhokanikiya na kulihobholela Lilobhe lya Mbone?
GAL 3:3 Bho, mangota mandindilima naha? Mangota mukalongolile kuhenga ghoha kwa Uhuke gwa Chapanga, bho, ngohe mipala kujhomolela kwa makakala ghino mabhene?
GAL 3:4 Bho, mang'ahiko ghing'ahika ghakibha jhajhe? Chakaka ghakibha jhajhe ndeka!
GAL 3:5 Bho, Chapanga akatwelii Uhuke gwake na kuhenga ikangacho pakate jhino nhwalo mujheketela Lilaghalikilo lya Mucha amu nhwalo mujhoha na kujheketela Lilobhe lya Mbone?
GAL 3:6 Mukibhole nnandanikiho gwa Ulahimo, ngita chighalonge Majhandiko gha Chapanga, “Jwenio akannyeketile Chapanga, na kwa nhwalo gwa kujheketela kwake akabhonike jwaumbone palonge jha Chapanga.”
GAL 3:7 Ngohe umanye kubhehe bhala bhoha bhibhanyeketela Chapanga, bheniya ndi yana ya Ulahimo.
GAL 3:8 Nhwalo Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghakalongolile kulonge kuhumii makacho bhando bha ilambo henge nabhabhalangilwa bhaumbone kwa ndela jha kihobholelo. Yene Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghakalongolile kuntangachii Ulahimo Lilobhe lya Mbone, “Kupete mwenga bhando bhoha nabhapokela mota.”
GAL 3:9 Yene, bhando bhoha bhibhanyeketela Chapanga bhapokii mota pamonga na Ulahimo, jwajheketile Chapanga.
GAL 3:10 Nhwalo bhoha bhibhahobholela kulenganikiya chilipala Lilaghalikilo, bhitama pahe jha likoto. Nhwalo Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge, “Abhii na likoto lya Chapanga mundo jhola jwangakamuu na kuhenga ghoha ghighajhandikwe mukitabo cha Lilaghalikilo!”
GAL 3:11 Ngohe makalongo bhango, abhii jhe mundo jwabhalangilwa jwaumbone palonge jha Chapanga kwa kukamuu Lilaghalikilo, nhwalo Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge, “Mundo jwaumbone kwa Chapanga natama kwa kihobholelo.”
GAL 3:12 Nambo Lilaghalikilo nalijhema jhe mu kihobholelo, ngita chighalonge Majhandiko gha Chapanga, “Mundo jhojhoha jwaikamuu Lilaghalikilo nabhaha ghome kwa kupete Lilaghalikilo lyenio.”
GAL 3:13 Kilichitu akatughombwii kuhumii mulikoto lya Lilaghalikilo, na jwenio ajhakutola likoto lyenio kwa nhwalo gwito, Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge, “Abhii na likoto mundo jhojhoha jwabhambitwe pa nchalaba.”
GAL 3:14 Kilebhe chenie kitendika naha mota jhela jwakapokii Ulahimo jhahikila bhando bha ilambo henge kwa ndela jha Kilichitu Yecho. Na kwa ndela jha kihobholelo, tupokii Uhuke gwa Chapanga jhola jwatulaghila Chapanga.
GAL 3:15 Makalongo bhango, nanimpela nnandanikiho kuhumii mughome gwito gwa machiko ghoha. Bhando bhabhele pibhajhomolela kulaghana na kujheketelana kwa kulapilana, abhii jhe mundo jwahoto kuhangabhana amu kujhonjekeya kilebhe mu majheketelano gheniya.
GAL 3:16 Ngohe, Chapanga akabhekite lilaghano kwa Ulahimo pamonga na ibheluko yake, Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge ndeka, “Na ibheluko yake,” yane bhando twe, ghilonge, “Ndi kibheluko chake ndo,” yane jhumo, na jwenio ndi Kilichitu.
GAL 3:17 Kilebhe chimbala kulonge ndi chenje, Chapanga akabhekite lilaghano lyake na Ulahimo na akalongile chahenga ngita chalaghine nako. Kuhumii muyaka miya ncheche na makome matato palonge lijhakuhika Lilaghalikilo, dola lihoto jhe kulighalambula lilaghano hilu kulitwekula lilaghano lyenio.
GAL 3:18 Nhwalo anda hupo ya Chapanga ihobholela Lilaghalikilo lya Mucha, bhahe, ihoto jhe kuhobholela kabhele lilaghano lya Chapanga. Nambo Chapanga kwa umbone gwake ajhakumpeke mota Ulahimo kupete lilaghano lyenio.
GAL 3:19 Bho, ngohe Lilaghalikilo libhii na lihengo ghane? Lilaghalikilo libhekitwe kulangiya malemo. Na lyenio likajhendelii ade pahikita jhola kichokolo cha Ulahimo mu lilaghano lyenio. Lilaghalikilo likaletitwe na ntumiche jwa kunane kwa Chapanga kwa lubhoko lwa nnyelanicha.
GAL 3:20 Nambo chakaka, jwajhelanicha nakemwa jhe anda kilebhe chenie kimpala mundo jhumo ndo, nambo Chapanga ndi jhumo.
GAL 3:21 Bho, Lilaghalikilo lijhenda uhenga mbopo na lilaghano lya Chapanga? Nahi jhe! Nhwalo Lilaghalikilo lilipihitwe ngalihotwii kwapeke bhando ughome, bhahe, bhando ngabhabhalangilwe bhaumbone palonge jha Chapanga kwa ndela jha Lilaghalikilo.
GAL 3:22 Nambo, Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghalongii bhando bhoha bha pannema ulongochwa na uhakaho, ndi bhala bhibhanyeketila bhalenganikilwe lilaghano lela lyapihita Chapanga, kwa kunyeketela Yecho Kilichitu.
GAL 3:23 Nambo pala kihobholelo na kuhika jhe, tukibha mukipungo cha Lilaghalikilo, kone tulendila kihobholelo chenie kiyekulilwe.
GAL 3:24 Bhahe, Lilaghalikilo litulongwicha ade pahikita Kilichitu, kwa ndela jha kihobholelo tubhalangilwe twaumbone palonge jha Chapanga.
GAL 3:25 Nhwalo gwa kihobholelo chito kihikite, tulongochwa jhe na Lilaghalikilo.
GAL 3:26 Kwa ndela jha kihobholelo, mangota mabhoha ndi mayana ya Chapanga kwa kulombana na Kilichitu Yecho.
GAL 3:27 Mangota bhubatichwe na kulombana na Kilichitu, muwalite Kilichitu jwenio.
GAL 3:28 Kwa gheniya, kibhii jhe chikilekine pakate jha Uyahude na Nghilike, pakate jha mmanda na mundo jwangabhehe mmanda, pakate jha munalome amu mwikeghe. Nhwalo mabhoha uyokite kilebhe chimo kwa kulombana na Kilichitu Yecho.
GAL 3:29 Anda mangota ndi mabhando bhake Kilichitu, ngohe mangota ndi kibheluko cha Ulahimo, mangota nampokela chela chalaghii Chapanga.
GAL 4:1 Nenga mbala kulonge naha, nniche pabhehe amela mwana, ilekenii jhe na mmanda kone ilebhe yoha yake.
GAL 4:2 Kipinde chenie choha ulongochwa na bhando bhibhannela na bhando bhiakalonda ilebhe yake ade kipinde chela chikibhekwite na tate mundo pukipala kuhika.
GAL 4:3 Na twenga helahela putukibha na kukomala jhe ki uhuke, tukibha twakabhanda bha uhuke ghulongocha nnema ghango.
GAL 4:4 Nambo pukihikite kipinde chamaha, Chapanga ajhakuntuma Mwana mundo jwapapitwe na mwikeghe, ngatamita pahe jha Lilaghalikilo lya Kiyahude,
GAL 4:5 abhakombole bhala bhando bhibhabhii pahe jha Lilaghalikilo, ndi twenga tubhehe yana ya Chapanga.
GAL 4:6 Nhwalo mangota ndi yana ya Chapanga, nhwalo mangota ndi mayana nhwalo akatumite Uhuke gwa Mwana Mundo mu miojho jhito, na Uhuke jwenio alelita, “Aba,” mana jhake, “Tate.”
GAL 4:7 Yene, mangota makabhanda jhe kabhele, nambo ndi mayana. Anda mmii mamwana, bhahe, nampokela yoha yalenganikiye Chapanga kwa yana mundo.
GAL 4:8 Makacho mukibha mumanyite jhe Chapanga, na yenio mukibha mubhanda kwa ihumbe yangabhehe ichapanga, nambo Chapanga jwa chakaka jhe.
GAL 4:9 Nambo ngohe mmanye Chapanga, anda jhe mmanyikana na Chapanga, nahotola bhole kughabhujhila kabhele mabholo ghighalongalile ghangabhehe na makakala na ghapengwa na mipala ghantende mme akabhanda bhake?
GAL 4:10 Dola mwamela mughakamwii machiko na miyehe na yaka!
GAL 4:11 Nipwelela pange lihengo lihengita kwino mangota ndi lihengo lya jhajhe!
GAL 4:12 Makalongo bhango, ninyopangana mme ngita nenga, ngita hela nenga mii ngita mangota. Utendii jhe kilebhe chochoha changanandela.
GAL 4:13 Mikomboka malwalo ghango pumbatita pwache jha kutumbuu kuntangachii Lilobhe lya Mbone mangota.
GAL 4:14 Pamonga na gheniya, machiko ghala mukambuchite jhe amu kungana nhwalo gwa kulegheleka kwango ikibha majhighanikilo kwino. Nambo ngaumbokila ngita natumiche jwa kunane kwa Chapanga amu ngita Kilichitu Yecho jwenio.
GAL 4:15 Mukibha ku mwojho jhojwa! Bho, ngoheno kipitii kilebhe ghane? Nilapii kwa machiko ghala ngahotwii kukotopola miho ghino na kumbeke nenga.
GAL 4:16 Bho, ngohe mindenda nalikoko kwa nhwalo gwa kunnongolela ukwele?
GAL 4:17 Bhando bheniya bhapalaha kunnyonja mangota, nambo mawacho ghabhe ghambone jhe. Bhapala kutulekanicha mangota na nenga, bhapala mangota makengame bheniya.
GAL 4:18 Chakaka kilebhe chambone machiko ghoha kwapata bhando bhange, na chi pumme pamonga na mangota tujhe.
GAL 4:19 Yana yango, ngita chilebhehe lipyanda lya majhe jhuna ndumbo papala kupapa, na nenga hele mii na lipyanda kabhele ade Kilichitu puipala kupanganwa nkate jhino.
GAL 4:20 Nikapahi kubhehe na mangota ngohe, nganongii na mangota kwa namuna jha umanye hotuhotu! Nhwalo nimpwelii hake mangota!
GAL 4:21 Ngohe unobholele mangota bhumipala kulongochwa na Lilaghalikilo lya Mucha, bho, mukajhohine jhe chililongila Lilaghalikilo?
GAL 4:22 Nhwalo ijhandikwe mu itabo ya Malaghalikilo, Ulahimo akapapite yana ibhele. Jhumo kwa mwikeghe mmanda na jhonge jwangabhehe mmanda.
GAL 4:23 Jhola mwana jwabhelwike kwa mwikeghe mmanda akabhelwike ngita bhando chibhabhelukwa, nambo mwana jhola jwa mwikeghe jwangabhehe mmanda akabhelwike kwa lilaghano lya Chapanga.
GAL 4:24 Mambu gheniya ghamanyikana ngita nnandanikiho, kwa akamajhe bheniya bhalangii malaghano mabhele. Lilaghano lya kutumbula ndi lya mwana jwa Hagale bhubhabhelwike mubhanda lilitendike pa kitombe chuku Sinae.
GAL 4:25 Hagale alenganichwa na kitombe cha Sinae chikibhii ku kilambo chuku Alabiya, na ndi ulandine na Yeluchalemo jha ngohe, jhibhii mubhanda pamonga na yana mundo.
GAL 4:26 Nambo Yeluchalemo jha kunane kwa Chapanga ndi muche gwangabhehe pahe jha ubhanda, na jwenio ndi majhe gwito.
GAL 4:27 Nhwalo ijhandikwe mu Majhandiko gha Chapanga, “Nhanganile mwe jhumii mantonga! Unonoye lilobhe kululuta mwe mangapapa mwana! Nhwalo yana ya mwikeghe jwalibhalilwe jhola ibhii twe kuliku mwikeghe jhola jwatolilwe.”
GAL 4:28 Ngohe makalongo bhango, mangota ndi ngita chalaghine na Chapanga ngita chabhii Isaka.
GAL 4:29 Nambo ngita hela kwa machiko ghala kwa mwana jhola jwakabhelwike ngita bhando chibhabhelukwa ajhakung'aha mwana jhola jwabhelwike kwa makakala gha Uhuke gwa Chapanga, na machiko ghanga ibhii hele.
GAL 4:30 Nambo Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge bho? Ghilonge, “Mumenge mwikeghe mmanda na mwana mundo, nhwalo mwana jha mmanda nabhujhii jhe na mwana jwa mwikeghe jwangabhehe mmanda.”
GAL 4:31 Yene makalongo bhango, twenga chi yana ya mwikeghe mmanda, nambo ndi yana ya mwikeghe jwangabhehe mmanda.
GAL 5:1 Bhahe, Kilichitu atutehi kubhehe akabhanda. Ngohe nnyeme nganganga, mangajheketela mu lingolengole lya ubhanda kabhele.
GAL 5:2 Unyokanikiye mbone! Ne Napauli jhunilonge na mangota anda nnyeketile kujhingii jando, Kilichitu kibhii jhe najhambulila kwino.
GAL 5:3 Nilonge hotuhotu kabhele, mundo jhojhoha jwajheketii kujhingii jando akamule Malaghalikilo ghoha.
GAL 5:4 Anda milolela kubhalangilwa maumbone palonge jha Chapanga kwa ndela jha Lilaghalikilo, bhahe, mmii kutale na Kilichitu, nambo mukanite umbone gwa Chapanga.
GAL 5:5 Nambo twenga, tulendelela kwa lihobholelo lito kwa likakala lya Uhuke gwa Chapanga, tutendwe twaumbone palonge jha Chapanga kwa kihobholelo.
GAL 5:6 Nhwalo tulombine na Kilichitu Yecho, kujhingii jando amu changajhingii jando kilebhe nacho, nambo kilebhe chambone ndi kihobholelo chikihenga lihengo kwa upalo.
GAL 5:7 Mukibha nteila maha! Bho, ngohe ghane jwahibhilikiye nkotoka kujheketela ukwele?
GAL 5:8 Jwatehi kilebhe chenie Chapanga ndeka jwakemita mangota.
GAL 5:9 “Amila jhandina jhihotwii kuumula ukobha ghoha!”
GAL 5:10 Nhwalo tulombine na Bhambo, nihobholela mangota namme jhe na mawacho ghighajhepana na nenga. Kabhele mundo jwenio jwamwoghana, abhe mundo jhojhoha jhola, chakaka nachwapulwa na Chapanga.
GAL 5:11 Makalongo bhango, ngita chinijhendelela kwatangachii bhando bhajhingii jando, bho, nhwalo ghane ngohe Akayahude bhang'aha naha? Anda ibhii yenio, kwatangachii kwango malobhe gha nchalaba gwa Kilichitu ngabhayomite Akayahude.
GAL 5:12 Ngaibhii mbone kwa bhando bheniya bhibhamoghana, mbaha bhakihekete bhene!
GAL 5:13 Mangota makalongo bhango, nkemitwe nkotoka kubhehe bhando bhangatabhwa. Nambo kilebhe chenie kikoto kubhehe kikopokeo cha kuhenga chochoha chimukipala, nambo mipalwa kuhengelana kwa upalano.
GAL 5:14 Nhwalo Lilaghalikilo lyoha litimile kwa nhwilo ghongo: “Mupale nnyino ngita chimukipala mabhene.”
GAL 5:15 Nambo milumana na kumemenana ngita inyama, mukilolokeye nkoto kukocholana mabhene kwa mabhene.
GAL 5:16 Ngohe nilonge naha: Ntamengane kwa kulongochwa na Uhuke gwa Chapanga, nambo mangota nankengama jhe kabhele mambu gha pannema ghighapala yegha.
GAL 5:17 Nhwalo mambu gha pannema ghijhelana jhe na Uhuke gwa Chapanga, helahela Uhuke gwa Chapanga ujhelena jhe na mambu gha payegha. Mambu ghanga mabhele ghitama jhe pamonga, yenio mihoto jhe kuhenga chochoha chimipala mabhene.
GAL 5:18 Ngohe mulongochwa na Uhuke gwa Chapanga, mujhendelela ng'o na Lilaghalikilo.
GAL 5:19 Bhahe, mambu ghighatendwa na yegha ghamanyikana njwe, ngongola na uhakata na kulongochwa na kupala kuhenga ilebhe twe,
GAL 5:20 kujhinamii inyagho na uhabhe na ulikoko na milomo na wiho na lilaka na chojho na lung'wenyo na mpechengano,
GAL 5:21 lingele na kulobhela na kuhutilwa kutenda ilebhe yakiteno na ilebhe henge iwanana ngita yenio. Ninobholela kabhele ngita chininongolila kunobholela, bhando bhibhatenda yenio nabhajhingii ng'o mu Unahota nkolongwa gwa Chapanga.
GAL 5:22 Nambo mundo jwalongochwa na Uhuke gwa Chapanga abhaha na upalo na luhangano na uteeke na luhimba na umbone na mwojho gwa kupiya na kuhobholeka,
GAL 5:23 utokomalo na kukilongocha jwenio. Libhii jhe Lilaghalikilo lilikana mambu ghanga.
GAL 5:24 Bhando bhoha bhibhalombine na Kilichitu Yecho bhaghakomite mawacho ghabhe na mambu ghanganandela ghughakibha nkate jhabhe.
GAL 5:25 Nhwalo tutama kwa kulongochwa gwa Uhuke gwa Chapanga, helahela tuneke alongoche ughome gwito.
GAL 5:26 Bhahe, tukotoka kukiloka na tukoto kubhehe na milomo amu kukolelana wiho.
GAL 6:1 Makalongo bhango, anda mundo alemwite chakiteno, mangota bhimulongochwa na Uhuke gwa Chapanga munkelebhuwa mundo jwenio kwa utokomalo. Nambo mukilolekeya mabhene nkotoka kujhingii mu majhighanikilo.
GAL 6:2 Ntangatana mu malagho ghino, kwa kuhenga yenio mutimicha Lilaghalikilo lya Kilichitu.
GAL 6:3 Anda mundo akibhona kilebhe, kone kilebhe nacho, mundo jwenio akikopokeya jwenio.
GAL 6:4 Nambo kila mundo akilingukiya jwenio chahenga. Anda chambone, bhahe, ahoto kukilokela nkate jhake changakilenganicha na chahenga mundo jhonge.
GAL 6:5 Nhwalo kila mundo nahadabulwa kwa chela chateile.
GAL 6:6 Mundo jwabhola Lilobhe lya Mbone lya Chapanga apalwa abhaghana ilebhe yoha yamaha na mmola gwake.
GAL 6:7 Mangakoloana, Chapanga mangantendela chanake. Chamichite mundo ndi chahuna.
GAL 6:8 Mundo jwamicha mambu ghanganandela ghighabhii nkate jhake, nahuna kuwegha, nambo jwamicha kwa kunhalalicha Uhuke gwa Chapanga, jwenio napata ughome gwa chakaka machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
GAL 6:9 Ngohe tuko kutotokela kuhenga ghambone, nhwalo anda tuhengelike jhe mwojho natuhuna mahuno kwa kipinde chake.
GAL 6:10 Ngohe kila putubhehe na pwache, twatendele ghambone bhando bhoha, ichocha kwa bhando bhibhabhii mu kihobholelo cha Kilichitu.
GAL 6:11 Nnolekeye chinyandike kwa nembo ngolongolo, kwa lubhoko lwango namwete!
GAL 6:12 Bhando bhoha bhibhapala bhabhonekane bhaumbone kwa ilebhe ya payegha ndi bhibhanchokolekeya mangota kujhingii jando. Bhahenga yenio kwa nhwalo bhakoto kulagha kwa nchalaba gwa Kilichitu.
GAL 6:13 Nhwalo ata bheniya bhibhajhingii jando bhalikamwii jhe Lilaghalikilo lya Mucha, nambo bhapala mangota nnyingii jando bhalolekele huna jhene jhibhii payegha jhino.
GAL 6:14 Nambo nenga kibhii ng'o chinikilokela, nambo nikilokela nga nchalaba gwa Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu, nhwalo kwa nchalaba nnema ukibha ngita uhwile kwa nhwalo jhango, na nenga ngita hela hwile panane jha nnema.
GAL 6:15 Kwa nhwalo kujhingii jando amu changajhingii jando kibhii jhe chikijhonjekeya, chikipalwa ndi kubhehe kihumbi kihyono.
GAL 6:16 Bhando bhoha bhibhahobholela gheniya Chapanga abhapeke uteeke na kiya, helahela kwa Akaichilahele na bhando bhoha bha Chapanga!
GAL 6:17 Kuhumii ngohe mundo jhojhoha angoto kundotowa kabhele, nhwalo mabhanga ghighabhii payegha jhango nhwalo nenga nabhanda jwa Yecho Kilichitu.
GAL 6:18 Makalongo bhango, umbone gwa Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu utame na mangota mabhoha. Amina.
EPH 1:1 Ne Pauli, natenga jwa Yecho Kilichitu kwa kupala Chapanga. Ninyandikila mangota mabhando bha Chapanga bhumii kwenio ku Epecho, bhinnyeketii njwe mu kulombana na Yecho Kilichitu.
EPH 1:2 Ninyope umbone na uteeke kuhumii kwa Chapanga Tate gwito na Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu.
EPH 1:3 Alombwe Chapanga, Tate jwa Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu! Nhwalo kwa kulombana na Kilichitu atupekii mota yoha ya ki Uhuke mu nnema gwa kihuke.
EPH 1:4 Kabula jha kupanganwa kwa nnema, Chapanga akatuhagwii njwe twenga tubhehe bhake kwa kulombana na Kilichitu kupala tubhehe nyahinyahi na twanga malemo palonge jhake. Kwa nhwalo gwa mapalo ghake,
EPH 1:5 Chapanga akahamwii na kutuhaghuu tubhehe twakayana yake kwa ndela jha Yecho Kilichitu. Yene ndi chahalilwa na chapalita.
EPH 1:6 Ngohe tunombe Chapanga nhwalo jha umbone gwake gwamaha gwatupekii jhajhe kupete Mwana mundo jwampahile!
EPH 1:7 Nhwalo gwa miyahe jha Kilichitu, twenga tukombolilwe, yane uhakaho gwito ulekekekiwe. Yene ndi chibhii kwa ukolongwa gwa umbone gwake,
EPH 1:8 atupekii mbwe mwenio, kwa malango na kumanya kwake koha.
EPH 1:9 Chapanga atuyekulile chile jhijhihitwe jhapalita kuitenda. Akahalalichwe na ajhakutuhenge lende kwa ndela jha Yecho Kilichitu.
EPH 1:10 Gheniya ghoha pukipala kuhika kipinde chapangite Chapanga, Kilichitu naleta ilebhe yoha ya kunane kwa Chapanga na ya pannema pamonga na ilongochwe na jwenio.
EPH 1:11 Chapanga akatei yoha ngita chapalita, Chapanga akatuhagwii twenga kwa kulombana na Kilichitu, tubhehe bhando bhake ngita chapalita, akahamwii naha kuhumii makacho.
EPH 1:12 Chapanga akatehi yenio, twenga bhitulongolile kunhobholela Kilichitu tuulumbulile ung'alicho gwa Chapanga!
EPH 1:13 Na mangota helahela punombikina na Kilichitu pala punyohina lilobhe lya chakaka ndi Lilobhe lya Mbone lilinetii ukomboche, mukanyeketii Kilichitu, na jwenio Chapanga kwa kulangii mangota ndi bhando bhake, amekite unepo kwa kumpelengana Uhuke gwa Chapanga jwatulaghii.
EPH 1:14 Uhuke gwenio gwa Chapanga ndi poni jha kupata ghala ghoha gha bhando bhake, kilebhe chenje ndi kitulangii kubhehe Chapanga nabhakombola bhando bhake bhoha. Tulumbilile ung'alicho gwake!
EPH 1:15 Yene, kubhoke punyohina chimuhobholela Bhambo Yecho na chimwapala bhando bhoha bha Chapanga,
EPH 1:16 ngotwike jhe kunchenguu Chapanga kwa nhwalo gwino. Nanikombokangana mu kunnyopa kwango Chapanga,
EPH 1:17 nijhendele kunnyopa Tate jwa ung'alicho, Chapanga jwa Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu, ampelengane Uhuke jwapala kuntenda mme na malango na kuyekulila mumanye Chapanga chamaha hake.
EPH 1:18 Ninyopa Chapanga haijhoghole miojho jhino mupokele lumule lwake, nhoto kulimanya lihobholelo lela lyankemile na ung'alicho nkolongwa gwa ghala lyabhabhekii bhando bhake,
EPH 1:19 na umanye likakala lyake chibhii likolongwa kwa twenga bhituhobholela. Likakala lyenio ndi lihenga lihengo nkate jhito lilandana na likakala lela likolongwa,
EPH 1:20 lyayokiche nako Kilichitu kuhumii kwa bhubhawile, ngamekita lubhoko lwalelo kwenio kunane kwa Chapanga.
EPH 1:21 Kwenio, Kilichitu ndi nkolongwa kuliku ilongoche yoha ya kunane kwa Chapanga na kila ukindendeke na kila likakala na akabhambo, na ilongocha ukindendeke ghoha gwa pannema ghongo na ghola ghupala kuhika.
EPH 1:22 Chapanga ampekii ukindendeke mu ilebhe yoha, ajhakumeka abhehe nkolongwa jwa makunde gha bhando bhibhanyeketii Kilichitu abhe nkolongwa kwa ilebhe yoha kwa nhwalo gwa bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu.
EPH 1:23 Bhando bheniya ndi yegha jha Kilichitu, na bhando ndi ukamilicho gwa jwenie jwalenganikiya ilebhe yoha kila chehemo.
EPH 2:1 Mangota mwe helahela makacho mukibha ngita nhwelingine nhwalo gwa malemo na uhakaho gwino.
EPH 2:2 Makacho ntamingina nkengima ndela mboho ya nnema ghongo, munyokaniya nkolo jwa michuka, gheniya makakala gha kunane kumahunde, michuka ndi jwalongocha bhando bhangannyokanikiya Chapanga.
EPH 2:3 Na twe twabhoha tukibha ngita bheniya, pututamita tukengima tama hito mboho ya yegha jhibhii nkate jhito, kuhenga ilebhe tela ipalita yegha jhito na malango ghito. Twenga helahela tukalandine ngita bheniya, tupalitwa kuhadabulwa na Chapanga ngita bhando bhange.
EPH 2:4 Nambo Chapanga abhii na kiya hake. Akatupalite kwa upalo nkolongwa,
EPH 2:5 pamo ngita tukawile kwa nhwalo jha uhakaho, atutei kubhehe twaghome pamonga na Kilichitu. Kwa umbone gwa Chapanga mangota nghombokwilwe.
EPH 2:6 Mu kulombana na Yecho Kilichitu, Chapanga atuyokiche pamonga na jwenio, ngatutamita pamonga kunane kwa Chapanga.
EPH 2:7 Ateila naha kupala kuilangiya ipinde ya lichiko lilihika muumbone gwake nkolongwa gwatupekii kwa kulombana kwito na Kilichitu Yecho.
EPH 2:8 Nhwalo, kwa umbone gwa Chapanga mangota nkombwilwe kwa ndela jha kihobholelo. Kilebhe chenie chi nhwalo gwa kughagha kwinojhe, nambo ndi hupo jha Chapanga.
EPH 2:9 Ihumii muitendwa hinojhe, kwa gheniya mundo jhojhoha angalokejhe kilebhe.
EPH 2:10 Nhwalo twenga ndi ihumbe ya Chapanga na kwa kulombana na Kilichitu Yecho. Ndi Chapanga atupangine tutame kwa kuhenga ghaumbone, ghatulenganikiye tuhenge.
EPH 2:11 Nkombokane pumukibha makacho mangota mabhando mangabhehe Akayahude kwa kubhelukwa, punkemitwa bhangajhingii jando, na Akayahude bhibhakikemita bhene bhajhingi jando, kwa nhwalo gwa chela chibhakitendii yegha kwa mabhoko ghabhe kwa kukilangiya ngita bhando bha Chapanga.
EPH 2:12 Helahela nkomboke machiko ghala mangota ntamingina changaumanya Kilichitu, mangota mukahaghulilwe na bhando bhu ku Ichilahele, peniya nnyakubhehe akaghene nhwalo mukibha panja jha lilaghano lyalongila Chapanga kwa nhwalo jha bhando bhake. Ntamita pannema ghongo kone nkwetejhe lihobholelo na ngita bhangaumanya Chapanga.
EPH 2:13 Nambo ngohe, mu kulombana na Yecho Kilichitu, mangota mukibha kutale makacho, mpelwikwe pahina na Chapanga kwa miyahe jha Kilichitu.
EPH 2:14 Nhwalo Kilichitu jwenio atuletii uteeke kwa kutenda Akayahude na bhando bha ilambo henge kubhehe kilebhe chimo. Kwa kupiya yegha jhake ngita litambiko, ngabhohita ulikoko ghulekanicha ngita lipamanda pakate jhabhe.
EPH 2:15 Ndi ngabhohita malaghalikilo gha Akayahude pamonga na mihilo jhake, kupala bhando bha ilambo henge na Akayahude bhabhehe kilebhe chimo mu kulombana na Kilichitu na kuhenga yenio aletite uteeke.
EPH 2:16 Mukuwe kwake, Kilichitu ngaukomilikiya ulikoko gwabhe, kwa nchalaba akatei bhando bheniya bhoha bhabhe ngita yegha jhimo kwajhelanicha na Chapanga.
EPH 2:17 Yene Kilichitu pahikita, ajhakuntangacha Lilobhe lya Mbone lya uteeke kwa mangota bhando mangabhehe Akayahude, bhumii kutale na Chapanga na Akayahude bhumii pahina na Chapanga.
EPH 2:18 Yene kwa chela chahengita Kilichitu, twenga twabhoha Akayahude na bhangabhehe Akayahude tuhoto kunyendele Tate kupete kwa jwenio Uhuke jwabhii jhumo.
EPH 2:19 Yene, mangota bhando bha ilambo henge makaghene jhe kabhele, hilu bhando mapeta ndela jhe. Nambo ngohe mangota ndi akolo kilambo pamonga na bhando bha Chapanga, na mangota ndi bhando bha nyumba jha Chapanga.
EPH 2:20 Nchengwitwe panane jha nchinge ghubhekwitwe na akatenga na akalondole bha Chapanga, kone Yecho Kilichitu jwenio ilandana na lighanga lilikamulii nyumba.
EPH 2:21 Jwenio ndi jwalombanicha nyumba jhoha na kuitenda itutumuke na kubhehe Nyumba jha Chapanga jha nyahinyahi kwa nhwalo jha Bhambo.
EPH 2:22 Mu kulombana na Kilichitu, na mangota helahela nchengwitwe pamonga na bhange bhoha, mme nyumba jhatama Chapanga kupete Uhuke gwake.
EPH 3:1 Nhwalo gha gheniya, ne Pauli ndabhitwe nhwalo gwa kunhenge Kilichitu Yecho na kwa nhwalo gwino gwa kuntangachii mangota mabhando bha ilambo henge, ninnyope kwa Chapanga.
EPH 3:2 Chakaka nnyohingine kubhehe kwa umbone gwambekii Chapanga, ngangamwiya lihengo lyake leno nilihenge kwa nhwalo gwino.
EPH 3:3 Chapanga ayekulile niimanye chile jhenje jhijhihihitwe. Ngita chindumbwila kujhandika kandina kilebhe chenje.
EPH 3:4 Mangota anda nchomite maha ghala kunyandike, ndi naumbula chiniimanya chile jhene jha Kilichitu.
EPH 3:5 Makacho Chapanga akabhatei bhando bhakoto kuimanya chile jhene, nambo ngohe Chapanga abhayekulii akatenga bhake na milondole bhake bha nyahinyahi bhaimanye chile jhenje kwa ndela jha Uhuke gwake.
EPH 3:6 Chile jhene ndi jhenje: Kupete Lilobhe lya Mbone lya Yecho kwa bhando bha ilambo henge bhene nabhapokela mota ya Chapanga ngita ibhapala kupoke Akayahude, bhene hele ihungo ya yegha jhejhe, nabhapokela lilaghano lelela lela lyalitei Chapanga kupete kwa Kilichitu Yecho.
EPH 3:7 Nenga ndeilwe kubhehe natumiche jwa Lilobhe lya umbone, kwa umbone gwambekii Chapanga na likakala lyake likolongwa.
EPH 3:8 Nenga nachokombe ndo kuliku bhando bhoha bha Chapanga, nambo Chapanga ambii umbone gwake, kupala natangachila bhando bha ilambo henge ulohe gwa Yecho Kilichitu nkolo,
EPH 3:9 kabhele natende bhando bhoha bhalole mpangu gwa Chapanga ghukiihite chiuhenga lihengo. Chapanga ndi jwapangina ilebhe yoha ajhakuhiya chile jhake jhenje kuhumii makacho,
EPH 3:10 ibhehe ngohe, kupete likunde lya bhando bhibhanyeketii Kilichitu, ilongoche ya nnema na bhubhabhii na ukindendeke bhamanye malango gha Chapanga mu ilebhe yoha.
EPH 3:11 Chapanga itenda lijhambu lyenio kupete Yecho Kilichitu Bhambo gwito ngita chapalita jwenio machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
EPH 3:12 Kwa kulombana na Kilichitu na kunhobholela jwenio, tuhoto kunnyendele Chapanga changabhoghohe.
EPH 3:13 Ngohe chonde mwangahengeleka mwojho nhwalo gwa malola ghango ghuning'ahikila kwa nhwalo gwino, nhwalo ghanga ghoha ndi kwa nhwalo jha ung'alicho gwino.
EPH 3:14 Kwa nhwalo gwenio, nitama makilikite ninnyopa palonge jha Tate,
EPH 3:15 jwabhii Tate jwa chakaka jwa kila nyumba yoha ya pannema na kunane kwa Chapanga.
EPH 3:16 Ninyopa Chapanga kwa ung'alicho gwake nkolongwa, kwa kupete Uhuke gwake ankangamaliche miojho jhino,
EPH 3:17 na jwenio Kilichitu atame kumiojho jhino ku kihobholelo. Ninnyope lyolyoha limuhenga lihume mu nchinge gwa lipalano,
EPH 3:18 kupala umanye pamo na bhando bhoha bha Chapanga upalano gwa Yecho Kilichitu chiubhii mpana na ntandamaho, na kimo na chiunyolike.
EPH 3:19 Mulimanye lipalano likolongwa lya Kilichitu chuupeta kumanya koha, na ntwelwele uchakaka ghoha kwa Chapanga.
EPH 3:20 Chapanga ihoto kuhenga mambu makolongwa kuliku chitujhopa ngita chighabhii makakala ghake chighahenga lihengo nkate jhito.
EPH 3:21 Jwenio abhii na ung'alicho kwa likunde lya bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu na kwa nhwalo jha Yecho Kilichitu jwenio, ibheluko yoha ya machiko ghoha ghangapeta! Amina.
EPH 4:1 Ne hele nakibha napungwa kwa nhwalo jha kunhenge Bhambo, nimpembekeya ntame ngita chinkemitwe na Chapanga ntame.
EPH 4:2 Machiko ghoha mmangana mabhando bha unyenyekeho na utokomalo na luhimba, nhimbililane mabhene kwa mabhene kwa upalano.
EPH 4:3 Nghagha kujhendele kukamwu kulombana kwino kukuletwa na Uhuke gwa Chapanga kupete uteeke ghughumeka pamonga.
EPH 4:4 Ibhii yegha jhimo jha Kilichitu na Uhuke gwa nyahinyahi ghumo, ngita chilibhii lihobholelo limo lyankemii Chapanga chilibhii limo.
EPH 4:5 Abhii Bhambo jhumo na kihobholelo chimo na ubaticho ghumo.
EPH 4:6 Abhii Chapanga jhumo jwabhii Tate jwa bhoha, jwenio ndi Bhambo jwa bhoha na ihenga lihengo kupete bhoha na abhii mu ghoha.
EPH 4:7 Nambo kila mundo apokii hupo ngita Kilichitu champekii.
EPH 4:8 Ngita chighalonge Majhandiko gha Chapanga, “Pajhawila kunane kwa Chapanga kunane hake, ajhakwatola bhando bhabhakamwii, helahela ajhakwape bhando hupo.”
EPH 4:9 Bho, puilonge, “Ijhenda kunane kwa Chapanga,” mana jhake nike? Mana jhake hote akatumbwii kuhika pahe hake jha nnema.
EPH 4:10 Yene jhojho ndi jwahulwika pannema pano na jhojho ngajhawila kunane kwa Chapanga hake ahutweleye nnema ghoha.
EPH 4:11 Jwenio jwabhatehila bhando bhange bhabhe akatenga na bhange milondole bha Chapanga na bhange kubhehe akatangacha Malobhe gha Chapanga na bhange bhibhalongocha bhando bha Chapanga na bhange bhabhe akabhola.
EPH 4:12 Atehila naha kupala kulenganikii bhando bha Chapanga kwa lihengo lya kunhenge Kilichitu lya kuichenga yegha jhake.
EPH 4:13 Yene twe twabhoha tulombikane tubhehe kilebhe chimo mukihobholelo na kummanya Mwana gwa Chapanga, tubhehe bhando bhitukomile mukihobholelo nakuhikii ukangamalo ngita gwa Kilichitu jwenio.
EPH 4:14 Yene tubhejhe kabhele ngita yana ichokombe, bhibhahoto kukangwa kongo na kongo na kujhembeluwa na kila upepo gwa mabholo gha bhando bha uwange kupala kuhobhecha bhando.
EPH 4:15 Anda tulongii uchakaka kwa upalo, natukola ade kunhikii Kilichitu jwabhii muto.
EPH 4:16 Mulongoche gwake, ihungo yoha ya yegha ikamulana nde kwa ncheketa, na yegha jhoha ukamulichwa nde kwa kutangatilwa ihungo yake. Yene, kila kihungo anda kihenga lihengo lyake maha, yegha jhoha ukola na kukichenga mulipalano.
EPH 4:17 Ngohe kwa liina lya Bhambo, ninkelebhuwa mangajhendele kabhele ngita bhando bhangaumanya Chapanga, bhibhawacha ghachawana,
EPH 4:18 na malango ghabhe ghabhii mulubhendo tyoo. Bhabhii kutale na ughome gwa Chapanga nhwalo gwa undindilima ghubhii nkate jhabhe na mitaho jhabhe.
EPH 4:19 Bhando bheniya bhakwetejhe hone, na bhakijhingii mu ilebhe yanganandela na bhipala kuhenga ilebhe ya hone na kupala kubhehe na ilebhe mbwe hake.
EPH 4:20 Nambo mangota mwe mukamanyitejhe kwa namuna Kilichitu yenio.
EPH 4:21 Ndi mukaumanye uchakaka malobhe gha Yecho, mukibha bhabholwa bhake ndi ngamolitwa chakaka jhibhii nkate jhake.
EPH 4:22 Mmolitwe muuleke ghola ghanganandela ghuteila makacho, ngita mundo chaula ngobho yake, nhwalo itendwa hino ya makacho inongwicha mukomelekeho kwa tama hino ikopokiya.
EPH 4:23 Miojho jhino na malango ghino ghaghalambuke na ghabhehe mahyono.
EPH 4:24 Uhwale umundo nhyono ghupanginwe kwa kulandana na Chapanga, ntame mughome ghujheketelwa palonge jha Chapanga na unyahinyahi gwa chakaka.
EPH 4:25 Kwa gheniya, muleka uwange. Kila mundo ipalwa kunnobholela nnyake uchakaka, nhwalo twenga twabhoha ndi kihungo cha yegha jha Kilichitu.
EPH 4:26 Anda nchimwite, mangajheketela jhe lilaka lino linongoche kuhenga uhakaho, hilu nkoto kubhehe na lilaka ade lyobha litipike tipi,
EPH 4:27 kupala mangampe jhe Limbembela pwache.
EPH 4:28 Jwakibha ajhibhita, akoto kujhibha kabhele, nambo ahenge lihengo lyambone kwa mabhoko ghake, ankola na kilebhe cha kuntangatii mundo jwanga kilebhe.
EPH 4:29 Malobhe gha uwenje ghakoto kupita munnomo gwino, nambo nnongele malobhe ghambone ghatangatile kwachenga bhando bhibhannyokanikiya.
EPH 4:30 Nkoto kuneke uchongo Uhuke gwa Chapanga jwa nyahinyahi, nhwalo jwenio ndi unepo gwa Chapanga kwino kubhehe mangota ndi bhando bhake, nhwalo ilangii kubhehe lichiko lya kunkombola lihika kwino.
EPH 4:31 Ngohe nkoto kubhehe na uchongo amu nkoto kubhehe na lilaka na nkoto kuyoma na njobhelo na maligho. Muleke gwanganandela ghoghoha!
EPH 4:32 Nambo mme na mwojho gwambone na kukolelana kiya, kila mundo annekekeya malemo nnyake ngita Chapanga chanekekiye uhakaho mangota kwa ndela jha Kilichitu.
EPH 5:1 Kuyene, munyighe Chapanga, nhwalo mangota ndi yana yake yaipala.
EPH 5:2 Ntame kwa kupalana ngita Kilichitu chatupahile na kupiya ughome gwake, ngita litambiko lilinungila petelele na litambiko lilinhalalicha Chapanga.
EPH 5:3 Nhwalo, mangota ndi yana ya Chapanga, ngongola na uhako ghoghoha ghola amu uloho ukotoka kujhokanikika pakate jhino ngita chiipalwa kwa bhando bha Chapanga.
EPH 5:4 Kabhele malobhe gha hone amu uwenje na malobhe ghanganandela, gheniya ghoha ghamaha jhe kwino kulonge. Ndi mbone nnongele malobhe gha kunchenguu Chapanga.
EPH 5:5 Umanyengane hotu ngongola jhojhoha amu jwahenga mambu gha hone anda jhe uloho ilenganile tela na kuijhinamila inyagho, amu mundo jhojhoha jwalandana na yenio najhingii ng'o munahota nkolongwa gwa Kilichitu na gwa Chapanga.
EPH 5:6 Mwangalogwa jhe kunnyeketela mundo jhojhoha kwa malobhe ghanganandela, kwa nhwalo gwa ilebhe ngita yenio lilaka lya Chapanga nalyahikila bhando bhangannyeketela.
EPH 5:7 Bhahe, nkotoka kubhehe maghumba nde na bheniya kwa kilebhe chochoha.
EPH 5:8 Makacho mangota mukibha mulubhendo tyoo, nambo ngoheno mangota mmii mulumule kwa kulombana na Bhambo. Ngohe ntamangane ngita yana ibhii mulumule,
EPH 5:9 nhwalo lumule luleta kuhenga ghaumbone na kujheketelwa na Chapanga na uchakaka.
EPH 5:10 Nghaghe kumanya ghala ghighanhalalicha Bhambo.
EPH 5:11 Mwangalombana mukuhenga ghanganandela ghighahuma mulubhendo nambo mughabheke pakongoloo.
EPH 5:12 Nhwalo ilebhe ibhahenga ajhito kwa chile hone kuichimulila.
EPH 5:13 Nambo ilebhe ihengeka mulumule, ubhonekana hotu,
EPH 5:14 nhwalo lumule lutenda kila kilebhe kibhonekane. Ndi nhwalo Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge, “Nnyimuke mwenga bhingholwike, uyoke kuhumii kubhawile, na jwenio Kilichitu namulikila kupala umanye.”
EPH 5:15 Ngohe, mukilolekeye chimitama. Pimitama nkotoka kubhehe ngita mandindilima, nambo ntame ngita bhando bhina malango.
EPH 5:16 Nkachane kutumii mbone kila pwache jhiminajho, nhwalo machiko ghanga ghamboni jhe.
EPH 5:17 Kwa nhwalo gwenio nkotoka kubhehe malindilima, nambo mughamanye ghala ghapala Bhambo.
EPH 5:18 Nkotoka kulobhela ughembe, nhwalo kulobhela kunnongocha kuhenga ghanganandela, nambo ntwelehenganwe Uhuke gwa Chapanga.
EPH 5:19 Nnongela malobhe gha Zabule na mihambo jha kunomba Chapanga. Munnyembele Bhambo, munhanganile kumiojho jhino.
EPH 5:20 Munombe Chapanga Tate machiko ghoha ghangapeta kwa nhwalo gwa ilebhe yoha, kwa liina lya Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu.
EPH 5:21 Kila mundo annyokanikiya nnyake kwa kuntembekeya Kilichitu.
EPH 5:22 Na mangota akakeghe majhokanikiya akangana bhino ngita chimunnnyekete Bhambo,
EPH 5:23 nhwalo akanalome ndi muto gwa nhwana mundo ngita Kilichitu chabhii muto gwa makunde gha bhando ghighanyeketii Kilichitu, na jwenio Kilichitu ndi nkomboche kwa bhando bhibhannyeketii yane yegha jhake.
EPH 5:24 Ngita makunde gha bhando ghighannyeketii Kilichitu chibhanyokanikiya Kilichitu, hele akakeghe bhajhokanikiya akangana bhabhe mughoha.
EPH 5:25 Na mangota akanalome, mapale akahana bhino ngita Kilichitu chalipala likunde lya bhando bhibhannyeketii jwenio, ade ngabhohita ughome gwake kwa nhwalo gwabhe.
EPH 5:26 Atehila yenio kulijhelebhula likunde lya bhando lilinyeketii Kilichitu palonge jha Chapanga, pajhomolila kwajhoha kwa lilobhe lyake ngita mundo jwaghololwa kwa mache.
EPH 5:27 Atehila naha akiletele jwenio likunde lya bhando lilinnyeketii jwenio lilibhii maha hake, lyangabhehe na mabaka amu ngenja amu ubhoho ghoghoha ghola, bhahe, nyahinyahi lyangabhehe na malemo.
EPH 5:28 Helahela kila munalome ampale nhwana mundo ngita chiipala yegha jhabhe bhene. Mundo jwampala nhwana mundo akipala jwenio.
EPH 5:29 Abhii jhe mundo jhojhoha jwaichimwa yegha jhake, nambo aupela chakulyegha na kukilonda. Ngita Kilichitu chalihengela likunde lya bhando lilinnyeketii Kilichitu jwenio,
EPH 5:30 nhwalo twenga ndi ihungo ya yegha yake.
EPH 5:31 Ngita hela Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge, “Kwa nhwalo gwenio, munalome nabhaleka akanyongo mundo, na kulombana na nhwana mundo na bhabhele bheniya nabhabha yegha jhimo nde.”
EPH 5:32 Ubhii uchakaka ghuhiitwe kwa malobhe ghanga, nambo nenga nilonge malobhe ghanga kulangii malobhe gha Kilichitu na likunde lyake lilinnyeketile.
EPH 5:33 Nambo helahela kila munalome ipalwa ampale nhwana mundo ngita chakipala jwenio, na mwikeghe ipalwa hele annyokanikiya unganamundo.
EPH 6:1 Na mangota akayana majhokanikiye akatate bhino, nhwalo munnyeketela Bhambo, chenie ndi kilebhe chamaha hake.
EPH 6:2 Ngita Majhandiko gha Chapanga chighalonge, “Munyokanikiye tate na majhe gwino.” Ghono ndi nhilo gwa kutumbula mu mihilo, nhilo gwene ulonge,
EPH 6:3 “Mme na ughome na ntame yaka twe pannema.”
EPH 6:4 Na mangota akatate mangabhehe na milomojhe kwa yana hino, nambo mwalele ngita chapala Bhambo, na kwa kwabhola mambu gheniya chibhipalwa kutama mbone.
EPH 6:5 Mangota akabhanda, majhokanikiye akanahota bhino bha pannema pano kwa mwojho ghoha na kujhoghopa, ntende gheniya kwa kuhangana mwojho ngita munhenge Kilichitu.
EPH 6:6 Pimuhenga yenio chi pibhanoleke tuu jhe kupala mmonekane bhamaha, nambo unhenga kwa mwojho gwino ngita chapala Chapanga nhwalo mangotamwe ndi makabhanda bha Kilichitu.
EPH 6:7 Pimuhenga mahengo, nhenge lihengo kwa kuhanganila ngita munhenge Bhambo na kwahenge bhando.
EPH 6:8 Nkomboka kubhehe Bhambo nampela ndweko mundo jhojhoha jwahenga ghambone, abhehe mmanda amu jwangabhehe mmanda.
EPH 6:9 Na akanahota mwahengela hele ngita akabhanda bhino, nkotoka kwatenda bhanyoghope. Nkomboka mangota hele ngita bhene, nkwete Bhambo jhojho kunane kwa Chapanga, na jwenio ihengajhe kwa kuhaghula.
EPH 6:10 Bhahe, nimpalangana mme nganganga mu kulombana nde na Bhambo na kutangatilwa kwa makakala ghake makolongwa.
EPH 6:11 Uwalangane chilaha ya ngondo yampekengine Chapanga kupala ndi nhoto kujhema na kukenga makakala gha Limbembela.
EPH 6:12 Nhwalo kukomana kwito tukomana jhe na bhando, nambo tukomana na lilongo lya akakomana ngondo gwa michuka kunane ku mahunde bhina ulongoche na akanahota bhina ukindendeke bhibhalongocha nnema gwa lubhendo.
EPH 6:13 nhwalo gwenio, uhwale chilaha yampekiye Chapanga ndi muhimbilile ade puipala kujhomoka ngondo, pukujhomolela nahotola kujhema nganganga.
EPH 6:14 Bhahe, nnyeme nganganga, chakaka mme ngita luhunga mu kibhuno chino, na mu kuhenga ghapala Chapanga ngita kikopa chikihibhilikiya panganga jhino,
EPH 6:15 kilolo chu kutangacha Lilobhe lya Mbone lya uteeke libhehe ngita maghubache mu makongono ghino.
EPH 6:16 Panane jha gheniya, kihobholelo chino machiko ghoha kibhaha ngita ngao mu mabhoko ghino, jhihoto kuhibhilikiya mahonga ghina mwotu gha Limbembela.
EPH 6:17 Mupokele ughombokeko ngita kofiya jhino jha choma, lilobhe lya Chapanga ngita upanga ghumpatite na Uhuke gwa Chapanga.
EPH 6:18 Nhenge gheniya ghoha kwa kunnyopa Chapanga antangatile. Munyopengane Chapanga machiko ghoha ngita Uhuke gwa Chapanga chanongocha. Nkeluangana changatotokela mu kunnyopa Chapanga kwa bhando bha Chapanga bhoha.
EPH 6:19 Helahela unnyopela na nenga, hele punilonge na bhando, Chapanga ambela chukulonge, nhoto kwatangachila bhando chile jha Lilobhe lya Mbone lya Yecho Kilichitu changapwelela.
EPH 6:20 Nenga ndi majhumba kome jwa Lilobhe lya Mbone lyenio pamo na kubhehe mukipungo. Unyope ngotoka kubhehe na kiholo mu kutangacha ngita chiipalwa.
EPH 6:21 Tikiko, nnongo gwito jhutumpahile na ntumiche jwahobholeka mukulombana na Bhambo, nannobholela mambu ghango ghoha kupala mmanyengane chinihenga.
EPH 6:22 Nintuma kwino nhwalo gwa lilobhe lende na anobholele malobhe ghito kupala ankangamalicha mwojho.
EPH 6:23 Ninyopelangana akalongo bhango uteeke na upalano na kihobholelo kubhoka kwa Chapanga Tate na kubhoka kwa Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu.
EPH 6:24 Ninyopelangana umbone gwa Chapanga ubhaha kwa bhando bhoha bhibhampala Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu kwa upalo gwangapehekeya.
PHI 1:1 Nenga Pauli na Timocheyo, akatumiche bha Yecho Kilichitu. Tunnyandikila mangota bhando bha Chapanga kwenio ku Filipu mangota bhinombine na Kilichitu Yecho, pamonga na ilongoche na bhibhatangatila likunde lya bhando bhubhannyeketii Kilichitu.
PHI 1:2 Tunnyope umbone na uteeke ghihuma kwa Chapanga Tate gwito na Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu.
PHI 1:3 Ninchenguu Chapanga gwango kila pininkomboka,
PHI 1:4 na kila pininyopela mangota mabhoha, ninyope kwa kuhangana,
PHI 1:5 nhwalo chiundangatila mukuhenga lihengo lya kutangacha Lilobhe lya Mbone, kuhumii mukutumbula ade deleno.
PHI 1:6 Nenga nimanya kwa uchakaka kubhehe ndi Chapanga jwatumbulicha lihengo lende, nalijhendelecha ade piipala kujhomolela lichiko lela lya Kilichitu Yecho.
PHI 1:7 Ndi kilebhe cha mbone nenga kunkomboka naha, nhwalo mmii mu mwojho gwango. Ata pamonga ndabhitwe amu nekekiwe, mangota mabhoha mukalombine na nenga mu umbone gwambekii Bhambo gwa kulikengelela Lilobhe lya Mbone na kulangiya uchakaka gwake kwa bhando.
PHI 1:8 Chapanga amanya ngita chinilongela chakaka, kubhehe noghilwe hake kummona kwa upalo ghogholaghola gwa Yecho Kilichitu.
PHI 1:9 Ninyopa Chapanga upalo gwino uchocha kujhonjekeka na mme umanye hake na malango ghoha,
PHI 1:10 kupala nhoto kuhaghula ghughabhii ghambone. Peniya ndi namma na mwojho gwambone na nankolajhe ulemo mulichiko lela lya Kilichitu.
PHI 1:11 Ughome gwino na utwelele mambu ghoha ghaumbone ghala tugha Yecho Kilichitu ihoto kumpela, ndi bhando bhoha bhannombe na kumpe ulombo Chapanga.
PHI 1:12 Makalongo bhango, nipala umanye kubhehe mambu ghala ghughambitile ghatangatii hake kupechengana Lilobhe lya Mbone.
PHI 1:13 Nhwalo gwenio, akalonda bhoha bha nyumba jha nduna pamonga na bhando bhange bhoha bhamanya kubhehe mmi mukipungo nhwalo nenga ninhengela Kilichitu.
PHI 1:14 Na kongo kubhehe kwango mukipungo kwatei akalongo bhamahele bhannyeketele hake Bhambo, na bhakangamalichwe mukutangacha Lilobhe lya Chapanga changa ubhoghohe.
PHI 1:15 Chakaka bhando bhange bhintangacha Kilichitu nhwalo bhabhii na wiho na bhando bhubhabhii na milomo, nambo bhando bhange bhintangacha Kilichitu kwa mwojho gwambone.
PHI 1:16 Bhando bhamba bhitangacha mbone kwa upalo, bheniya bhimanya ngita Chapanga ambekiye lihengo lende lya kulikengelela Lilobhe lya Mbone.
PHI 1:17 Nambo bhando bhange bhintangacha Kilichitu kwa nginyika hilu kwa mwojho gwa mbonejhe, bhihwacha kwa kuhenga yenio nabhajhonjekeya malagho ghango mukipungo.
PHI 1:18 Nambo gheniya ghoha kwa nenga kilebhe nacho! Nenga nihangana tugha anda bhando bhintangacha Kilichitu kwa kila ndela, ibhaha kuhola kwa chakaka amu kwa mawacho ghanganandela. Nenga nijhendelela kuhangana,
PHI 1:19 nhwalo nimanya kwa kunnyopa kwino Chapanga na kwa utangatilo gwa Uhuke gwa Yecho Kilichitu, nanekekewa kubhoka mukipungo.
PHI 1:20 Chinikipala na chinikihobholela nenga ngoto kukola hone, nambo ngangamalichwa machiko ghoha na achwa ngohe ndi Kilichitu alombwe muughome gwango, punibhe ghome amu punihwegha.
PHI 1:21 Kwa nenga kutama kubhehe na Kilichitu nkate jha mwojho gwango, nambo kuwe ndi ninomenekeya.
PHI 1:22 Anda najhendelela kutama muyegha jhenje, lihengo lyango nalijhonjekeka hake, kwale aghuu nike!
PHI 1:23 Nihutwa na mambu ghanga. Mbala kuleka utamo ghongo, nyende nakatame na Kilichitu ndi lijhambu lya mbone hake,
PHI 1:24 nambo ndi lijhambu lyamaha hake kwino anda nijhendelela kutama pannema.
PHI 1:25 Mmii na uchakaka nanama, na nanyendelela kutama pamonga na mangota mabhoha, ndi kihobholelo chino na luhangano lwino lujhonjekeke,
PHI 1:26 kupala punibhehe na mangota maka Filipe kabhele, nankola kilebhe cha kukilokela kwa nenga mukulombana na Yecho Kilichitu.
PHI 1:27 Yene kilebhe chikipalwa ndi ughome ghino ulengane ngita chikipalwa na Lilobhe lya Mbone lya Kilichitu, na anda hotwi kuhika kwino amu ngoto kuhika, nyohe nnyemite nganganga kwa mwojho ghumo na mukomana ngondo kwa mwojho ghumo kwa nhwalo gwa kihobholelo cha Lilobhe lya Mbone.
PHI 1:28 Nkoto kwajhoghopa akamakoko bhino, machiko ghoha nkangamalichwe, chenje nachalangiya kubhehe bhene bhahobhite na mangota nkombolilwe. Chapanga ndi jwabhakombola.
PHI 1:29 Nhwalo mangota mpatite umbone kwa nhwalo gwa Kilichitu chi kwa kunhobholela tugha helahela na kung'ahika kwa nhwalo gwake.
PHI 1:30 Ngohe mihoto kubhehe pamonga na nenga mubhulo. Na bhulo ghola ghumujhohina kuhumii makacho ade ngohe nnyohine namela mubhulo.
PHI 2:1 Bho, ughome gwino mu kulombana na Kilichitu kumpela likakala? Bho, upalo gwake ghumpepecha? Bho, nnombine na Uhuke gwa Chapanga? Bho, mukolelana kiya na kubhehe na ungolongondi mabhene kwa mabhene?
PHI 2:2 Bhahe, nnenganikiye kuhangana kwango kwa kubhehe na liwacho limo, upalo ghumo, mwojho ghumo na uhwachi kilebhe chimo.
PHI 2:3 Nkoto kuhenga chochoha kwa mwojho gwa nginyika amu kwa kuloka, mme na unyenyekeho mabhene kwa mabhene, na kila mundo annola nnyake jwamaha kuliku jwenio.
PHI 2:4 Kila mundo akoto kukipalakiya ilebhe yake jwenio tugha, nambo helahela alolekeye na ilebhe ibhapala bhange.
PHI 2:5 Mme na mwojho ghogholaghola gwabhii nako Kilichitu Yecho.
PHI 2:6 Kilichitu kwa chakaka akibha Chapanga, nambo akawejhe kubhehe lenga na Chapanga ndi kilebhe cha kuchokolekeya.
PHI 2:7 Nambo kwa kupala jwenio, ajhakulekekeya gheniya ghoha ghughabhii ghake, ajhakubhehe ngita chabhehe mmanda, akalelilwe ngita bhando bhange chibhalelilwe, akabhonikine ngita mundo.
PHI 2:8 Ajhakukinyenyekeya na kunnyokanikiya Chapanga ade kuwe, yenio ade kuwe pa nchalaba.
PHI 2:9 Nhwalo gwenio Chapanga ajhakunhobhowa ade kunane hake, peniya ajhakuntina liina likolongwa kuliku mahina ghoha.
PHI 2:10 Ndi kwa ukolongwa gwa liina lya Yecho, ilebhe yoha ya kunane, na ya pannema na ya ku kilambo cha bhando bhubhawile, yoha itame makilikite palonge jhake,
PHI 2:11 na kila mundo ajheketele kubhehe Yecho Kilichitu ndi Bhambo, kwa unga'licho gwa Chapanga Tate.
PHI 2:12 Yene akakoche bhango, ngita chiunyokanikiya kila machiko punikibha na mangota, ngohe mangota ndi mbone kujhendelela kunyokanikiya pamonga na kubhehe kutale na mangota. Uhenge mahengo kwa kujhoghopa na kwa kulendema nhwalo gwa ughombokeko gwino,
PHI 2:13 nhwalo machiko ghoha Chapanga ihenga mahengo nkate jhino, na antenda uhenge kwa kupala kuhenga ghala ghapai jwenio.
PHI 2:14 Uhenge kila kilebhe changakokoleka na changa mitaho,
PHI 2:15 ndi mme yana ya Chapanga mmii bha mbone na bhangabhehe na ulemo, bhibhitama pannema gwanganandela na bhando bhubhabhii na ulemo. Mangota mitama pakate jhabhe ngita ndondwa jhilangala kunane,
PHI 2:16 kongo mulikamulii mbone Lilobhe lilileta ughome. Anda ntei yenio nangola kilebhe cha kukilokela mulichiko lela la Kilichitu, nhwalo nalangiya likakala lyango na lihengo lyango likibha lya jhajhe jhe.
PHI 2:17 Nambo ata ngita mohitwe kubhehe litambiko anda chakunywegha pamonga na kihobholelo chino libhii litambiko kwa Chapanga, nenga nihangana, helahela nihangana pamonga na mangota mabhoha.
PHI 2:18 Helahela na mangota uhangane na peniya uhangane pamonga na nenga.
PHI 2:19 Anda Bhambo Yecho apahile nihobholela nanintuma Timocheyo kwino ankangamalichwa mwojho kwa kujhoha malobhe ghino.
PHI 2:20 Ngweti ndeka mundo jhonge ngita jwenio, jwakakalakana mambu ghino kwa mwojho.
PHI 2:21 Nhwalo bhando bhange bhikukulukana na mambu ghabhe tugha, nambo bhakukulukana jhe na mambu gha Yecho Kilichitu.
PHI 2:22 Nambo mangota mabhene mimanya Timocheyo pahengita lihengo na nenga, ngita mwana na tate gwake, kwa nhwalo gwa Lilobhe lya Mbone.
PHI 2:23 Yene nihobholela kuntuma kwino kajhombe kwa ghala ghunimanya ghighapala kupitila.
PHI 2:24 Na nenga nihobholela kwa kulombana na Bhambo na nenga namwete mmi pahina kuhika kwino.
PHI 2:25 Nambo nibhona mbone kuntuma Epafilodito, nnongo gwango na uhenga lihengo nnyango jwaikengalile pamonga na nenga, helahela ndi ntumiche gwino jhumbekiwe andangatile.
PHI 2:26 Nhwalo anogwi hake kukongana na mangota mabhoha, na nibhona lipyanda nhwalo mukajhohine atenda kulwalwa.
PHI 2:27 Akibha tepekatepeka abhandikila kuwegha. Nambo Chapanga ajhakumone kiya, ankolii jhe kiya kanjika helahela akangoli kiya na nenga, ngota kubhehe ngolongondi hake.
PHI 2:28 Yene nipala hake kunntuma kwino, ndi pimipala kummona kabhele uhangane kabhele.
PHI 2:29 Mupokele kwa luhangano ngita nnongo gwino kwa kulombana na Bhambo. Mipalwa kwajhokanikiya bhando ngita jhonjo.
PHI 2:30 Nhwalo jwenio akabhandikii kuwegha kwa nhwalo gwa lihengo lya Kilichitu, na jwenio akibha mukuhandahanda jha kuwegha kwa kundangatila nenga pala mabhene mukahotwii jhe kundangatila.
PHI 3:1 Yene makalongo bhango, uhangane mukulombana na Bhambo. Nitotokelajhe kubhujhila ghala ghunyandike pandumbwila, nhwalo ghanga naghantenda mangota ntame kwa uteeke.
PHI 3:2 Mukilolekeye na bheniya bhubhabhii ngita ghimbwa, bhala bhubhahenga ghanganandela, bhando bhibhachokolekeya kubhehe mbende.
PHI 3:3 Bhando bhibhajhingii jando chakaka ndi twenga, na chi bheniya, nhwalo twenga tunyinamila Chapanga kwa kupete Uhuke gwake, na tukiloka kwa kulombana na Kilichitu Yecho hilu tuhobholela jhe yegha.
PHI 3:4 Nenga namwete ngahoto kuhobholela yegha. Anda abhii mundo jwakilokela ilebhe ya panja jwenio ambeta jhe nenga.
PHI 3:5 Nenga punikibha na machiko nane kubhoka mu kubhelukwa kwango, nikajhingii jando. Nenga ndi Mwichilahele kubhoka mu likabila lya Benjamine. Nenga ndi Mwebulaniya jwa chakaka, kwa nhwalo gwa kulikamula Lilaghalikilo lya Mucha, na nikibha Napwalichayo,
PHI 3:6 na nikanogwi hake kwang'ahicha makunde gha bhando bhubhanyeketii Kilichitu. Kwa nhwalo kutendwa bhaumbone palonge jha Chapanga kwa kukamuu Lilaghalikilo, ne nikalemwi jhe.
PHI 3:7 Nambo ghala ghoha ghunikamwene kubhehe ndi ghambone, ngohe kilebhe nacho, kwa nhwalo gwa Kilichitu.
PHI 3:8 Gheniya tujhe, ghoha nibhona kilebhe nacho kwa nhwalo gwa upalo nkolongwa kwa kummanya Yecho Kilichitu Bhambo gwango. Kwa nhwalo gwake nekite kila kilebhe, nibhona gheniya ghoha ngita mahe, kupala nimpate Kilichitu,
PHI 3:9 na monekane nnombine njwe. Nipala ndeka kabhele kujheketelwa palonge jha Chapanga kwa kukamuu Lilaghalikilo, nambo mbala nyeketelwe kwa kunyeketela Kilichitu, kujheketelwa kukuhumii kwa Chapanga kupete kwa kihobholelo.
PHI 3:10 Chimbala tugha ndi kummanya Kilichitu na likakala lya kuyokechwa kwake, mbala kung'ahika pamonga na jwenio na kuwanana nako mukuwe kwake,
PHI 3:11 kone na nenga nihobholela kuyokechwa.
PHI 3:12 Nilonge jhe ngita ikite amu mmii ngita hele Chapanga chapahile hikile, nahijhe! Nambo nijhendelela kughagha mbate hupo jhela, kupete hupo jhene Yecho Kilichitu jwenio akambatite nenga.
PHI 3:13 Makalongo bhango, nilonge jhe ngita mbatite hupo jhene, nambo nihenga kilebhe chimo tugha nighaleka ghala gha makacho nighalolekeya ghala ghannonge.
PHI 3:14 Bhahe, nighagha ade mbate hupo jhangemile Chapanga kupete Yecho Kilichitu, na hupo jhene mbate ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
PHI 3:15 Twenga twabhoha bhutukomile mu kihobholelo, tuhwachii lelele. Pamonga na nihwachi henge, Chapanga nanangiya hotuhotu.
PHI 3:16 Nambo peniya pituhikile na tujhendelele kuhenga ghagha gheniya.
PHI 3:17 Makalongo bhango, nnkengame ghundeila nenga. Mwalolekeye bhala bhubhakengama nnandanikiho ghitumpii mangota.
PHI 3:18 Kwa nhwalo machiko ghoha nikannobholile na ngohe ninnobholela kabhele kwa mahole chwii. Bhando bhamahele bhitama ngita akamakoko kwa chela chatei Yecho pa nchalaba gwa Kilichitu.
PHI 3:19 Kujhomolela kwabhe ndi kukomolekelwa, chapanga gwabhe ndi matumbo ghabhe, bhikilokela mambu ghabhe ghighapalitwa bhaghakolele hone, bhihwachila mambu gha pannema tugha.
PHI 3:20 Nambo twenga ndi akolo muche bha kunane kwa Chapanga, kubhoka kwenio tunnendela hake Nkomboche gwito, Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu ahike.
PHI 3:21 Jwenio naghalambuwa yegha hito jhihangabhika na kuitenda ihwanane na yegha yake jha ung'alicho, atenda yenio kwa kubheka ilebhe yoha pahe jha ukindendeke gwake.
PHI 4:1 Bhahe, makalongo bhango, mangota mumindenda hangane na nenga nikiloka kwa nhwalo gwino! Yene makalongo bhango nnyemengane nganganga kwa kulombana na Bhambo.
PHI 4:2 Nimpembekeya mwe Euodiya na Sunitike ntame kwa kujhokanikihana kwa kulombana na Bhambo.
PHI 4:3 Na mwenga nnongo gwango jhumuhobholeka nimpembekeya mwatangatile akakeghe bheniya, nhwalo bhakahengite lihengo na nenga kwa kughagha lya kwatangachila bhando Lilobhe lya Mbone, pamonga na Kelemesi na bhala bhoha bhubhahengita lihengo pamonga na nenga, bhala bhubhajhandikwe mahina ghabhe mukitabo cha ughome.
PHI 4:4 Yene machiko ghoha uhangane kwa mukulombana na Bhambo. Nilonge kabhele, uhangane!
PHI 4:5 Mme manuu kwa bhando bhoha, Bhambo abhii pahina kuhika.
PHI 4:6 Nkoto kubhehe na bhoghohe kwa kilebhe chochoha, nambo kwa kila kilebhe munnobholele Chapanga kwa kunnyopa ghala mughapala na kunchengula.
PHI 4:7 Na uteeke gwa Chapanga ghapeta malango ghoha gha bhando, na ilonda miojho jhino na malango ghino kwa kulombana na Kilichitu Yecho.
PHI 4:8 Bhahe, makalongo bhango nijhomolela kukulonge, mughawachila mambu ghoha ghughabhii ghambone na ghighapala kulombwa, ghala ghighatopela, ghala gha uchakaka, ghala ghijheketelwa na Chapanga, ghala ghughahalalicha, na ghala gha kujhokanikiya.
PHI 4:9 Uhenge ghala ghumikibholite na kupokela kuhumii kwa nenga, ghoha ghunyohine na kughabhona kuhumii kwa nenga. Na Chapanga jwaileta uteeke nabhaha pamonga na mangota.
PHI 4:10 Nihangana hake kwa kulombana na Bhambo, nhwalo ungombwike kabhele. Kulonge chakaka mingomboka machiko ghoha, nambo mukapatite jhe pwache jha kulangiya mingomboka.
PHI 4:11 Nilonge jhe gheniya kwa nhwalo nipala ilebhe, nhwalo nikibholite nikwela na ilebhe yoha imii nayo.
PHI 4:12 Nimanya kutama changabhehe na ilebhe na kubhehe na ilebhe yamahena. Nikibholite mambu mabhele kubhehe njala amu kujhukuta, kuhelukilwa kwa ilebhe amu kupongokelwa.
PHI 4:13 Nighahoto mambu ghoha kupete Kilichitu jwambela makakala.
