PHI 4:14 Nambo mkatehi ghambone kwa kundangatila nenga mumalagho ghango.
PHI 4:15 Mangota Akafilipe umanye mbone kubhehe puhumita ku Makedoniya machiko ghala gha kutumbula kwatangachii bhando Lilobhe lya Mbone, mangota ndo lilongo lya bhando lilinyeketile Kilichitu lilindangatila na bhubhatehila lihengo pamonga na nenga mu malobhe gha kupokela na kwapekeya bhando bhange.
PHI 4:16 Punikibha ku Tesolonike pumbalita kundangatilwa, mangota mukandangatile mala jhimo amu pabhele.
PHI 4:17 Chi anda nipala kupokela hupo, nambo mbala kulola mangota mambu ghajhonjekewe kwa upande gwino
PHI 4:18 Bhahe, mbokile ilebhe yoha yumbekiye, kabhele umbekii yamahele kupeta imbalita. Ngohe ngwete kila kilebhe nhwalo Epafilodito anetii ilebhe ihumita kwino. Ilebhe yenio ngita litambiko lilinungila mbone, litambiko lilijheketelwa na kunhalalila Chapanga.
PHI 4:19 Bhahe, Chapanga gwango jwahelwike na ilebhe mu ukolongwa kwa kupete kwa Yecho Kilichitu nampela yoha imuipala.
PHI 4:20 Ngohe alombwe Chapanga, Tate gwito, machiko ghoha ghangapeta. Amina.
PHI 4:21 Majhambuche bhando bhoha bhubhalombine na Kilichitu Yecho. Helahela makalongo bhoha bhubhabhii pamonga na nenga bhanyambucha.
PHI 4:22 Bhando bhoha bha Chapanga bhubhabhii pamba bhanyambucha, achwa bhando bhubhabhii muliboma lya munahota nkolongwa jwa ku Loma, bhinyambucha.
PHI 4:23 Ninyope mabhoha umbone gwa Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu utama pamonga na mangota. Amina.
COL 1:1 Nenga Napauli, natenga jwa Yecho Kilichitu kwa kupala Chapanga, pamonga na Timocheyo nnongo gwito.
COL 1:2 Punnyandikila mangota mabhando bha Chapanga bhumitama ku Kolochahe, makolongo bhito bhumuhobholeka kwa kulombana na Kilichitu. Tunnyopela umbone na uteeke kuhumii kwa Chapanga Tate gwito.
COL 1:3 Machiko ghoha putunnyopela tunchenguu Chapanga, Tate gwa Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu,
COL 1:4 nhwalo tujhohine chimunhobholela Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu, na chimwapala bhando bhoha bha Chapanga.
COL 1:5 Nhwalo gwa kihobholelo chino na upalo gwino lihobholelo lela limekwii kunane kwa Chapanga, ndi lela linyohina kuhumii makacho kwa lilobhe lya chakaka lya Lilobhe lya Mbone.
COL 1:6 Lilobhe lya Mbone lyenio linhikilii mangota na kujhenela pannema ghoha na kuleta ghambone, ngita chiliteila kwino mangota kuhumii lichiko lela punyohina umbone gwa Chapanga na kumanya uteeke chiubhile.
COL 1:7 Mukibholite umbone gwa Chapanga kuhumii kwa Epafula, nhenga lihengo nnyito jhutumpahii, ntumiche jwahobholeka jwa Kilichitu kunhwalo ghito.
COL 1:8 Jwenio ndi jwatuchimulila malobhe gha upalo gwino ghupekiwe na Uhuke gwa Chapanga.
COL 1:9 Kunhwalo gwenio kubhoke putujhohina malobhe ghino, tujhendelela kunyopela. Tunnyopa Chapanga ampelengane kumanya ghoha ghaghapala kwa malango ghoha na kumanya kutupatite na Uhuke gwa Chapanga.
COL 1:10 Tujhopa yenio kupala nhoto kutama ngita chapala Bhambo, na nnyendelela kuhenga ghighanhalalicha jwenio. Na nnyendelela kuhenga ghughabhii ghambone na nchocha kukola mukumanya Chapanga.
COL 1:11 Chapanga ampela makakala kwa uhotolo gwake mu ng'alicho nkolongwa nhoto kuhimbilila ghoha changatotokela.
COL 1:12 Na kwa luheko muchengula Tate jwantehi mme chehemo jha mambu ghabhabhekii akanyahinyahi bhake mu unahota nkolongwa gwa lumule.
COL 1:13 Jwenie ndi jwatughombwila kubhoke mu makakala gha lubhendo, na kutujhingiya munahota nkolongwa gwa Mwana mundo jwampala,
COL 1:14 kupete kwa jwenio tughombokoka na kulekekewa uhakaho gwito.
COL 1:15 Kilichitu jhumumwene alandine njwe na Chapanga jwangabhonekana. Jwenio akibha kabula jha ihumbi yoha kupanganwa.
COL 1:16 Nhwalo kupete jwenie, Chapanga akapangine ilebhe yoha, ibhii kunane kwa Chapanga na ibhii pannema, ibhonekana na yangabhoneka, ibhehe ihumbi ya kihuke ibhii na makakala na, akanahota na bhibhalongocha na bhubhabhii na ukindendeke. Yoha ikapanginwe kupete jwenio na kwa nhwalo gwake.
COL 1:17 Kilichitu akibha kabula jha ilebhe yoha, ilebhe yoha ikamulana nde pamonga kwa jwenio.
COL 1:18 Jwenio ndi muto gwa yegha, yegha jhene ndi lilongo lya bhando bhibhanyeketii jwenio. Kilichitu ndi lihembuko lya ughome gwa yegha jhene. Jwenio ndi jwayokichwa abhehe jwakutumbula kwa ilebhe yoha.
COL 1:19 Nhwalo Chapanga jwenio akahalalichwe ukamilicho gwake ghoha ubhehe nkate jha Kilichitu.
COL 1:20 Kupete Mwana mundo, ilebhe yoha ijhelanichwe na Chapanga jwenio, na kwa miyahe jhake jhijhitike pa nchalaba aleta uteeke na ilebhe yoha ibhii pannema na ibhii kunane kwa Chapanga.
COL 1:21 Peniya makacho mangota mukibha kutale na Chapanga na helahela mukibha akamakoko bhake nhwalo gwa malango ghino ghanganandela na matendwa ghino ghanganandela.
COL 1:22 Nambo ngohe, Chapanga antei mangota akakoche mundo kupetele kuwe kwa yegha jha Mwana mundo, ndi ampeleke palonge jhake kongo mmii nyahinyahi na bhamaha changalemwa.
COL 1:23 Nambo chimupalwa, nnyendelela kukikamulii kihobholelo chino kone nchengwitwe mu chinge nganganga, hilu nkotoka kujheketela kunyuanyua kubhoke mu lihobholelo lela lipilwe pala punyohina Lilobhe lya Mbone. Ne Pauli ndeilwe natumiche jwa Lilobhe lya Mbone ndi lilitangichwe kwa bhando bhoha bha pannema.
COL 1:24 Ngohe nihanganila kung'ahika kwa nhwalo gwino mangota, mitweleya jhegha jhango kwa ghala ghighapongwii mumang'ahiko gha Kilichitu kwa nhwalo jha yegha jhake ndi lilongo lya bhando bhubhanyeketii Kilichitu.
COL 1:25 Na nenga mekwite na Chapanga mme natumiche jwa lilongo lya bhando bhubhanyeketii Kilichitu. Ambii lihengo lya kutangacha Lilobhe lya umbone gwake gwamaha,
COL 1:26 lijhambu lyenio ndi chile jhela jhikahihitwe kuhumii kwa bhando machiko ghoha ghangapeta, nambo ngohe iyekulilwe kwa bhando bhake.
COL 1:27 Chapanga akapahile kwatenda bhando bhake bhamanye ulohe na ukolongwa gwa chile jhenje nkate jha nnema ghoha, na jhene ndi jhenje, Kilichitu abhii nkate jhino na nhwalo gwenio ulangiya mangota natujhingila mung'alicho gwa Chapanga ghuuhobholeka.
COL 1:28 Ndi mana tutangacha Kilichitu kwa bhando bhoha na kwa malango ghoha, tunkelebhuwa na kubhola mundo jhojhoha kupala tuhoto kunneta kila mundo palonge jha Chapanga kone abhii akomile mu kolombana na Kilichitu.
COL 1:29 Kutangacha lilobhe lyenio, nenga ndenda kughagha kone nitumii likakala lya Kilichitu lilihenga lihengo nkate jhango.
COL 2:1 Mbala umanyengane chinighagha kuhenga lihengo kwa nhwalo gwino mangota, kwa mabhando bha ku kilambo chu ku Laodikiya na bhando bhala bhangakongana na nenga.
COL 2:2 Ndenda yenio nipala kwaleke mwojho na bhakilombe mulipalano kupala bhamanye kwa chakaka, nabhamanye njwe chile jha Chapanga, bhihoto kuimanya chile jhene ndi Kilichitu jwenio.
COL 2:3 Nkate jhake ihihitwe ihukilo yoha ya malango nu kumanya.
COL 2:4 Ninobholela mangannyekete jhe mundo jhojhoha ankolowe kwa malobhe ghuwange ata ghahalalila bhole.
COL 2:5 Pamonga nenga kubhehe kutale na mangota, nambo mwojho ubhii peniya pamonga na mangota, na nihangana punimmona chimuhenga mahengo ghino kwa ndela jha mbone chimuhobholela Kilichitu kwa uchakaka.
COL 2:6 Ngohe ngita chimunnyeketila Yecho Kilichitu kubhehe Bhambo, ndi nnyendelela hele kulombana nako.
COL 2:7 Mme na ngegha nkate jhake, na ughome gwino uchengwike panane jhake na mukikamwii kihobholelo ngita chimolitwe, na mangota nchengule.
COL 2:8 Mukilolekeye na mundo jhojhoha akotoka kunkolowa mangota kwa mabholo ghake gha jhajhe na ghuwange chika, ghighahobholela mapokelo gha bhando na michuka jhilongocha nnema, nambo ghahumajhe kwa Kilichitu jwenio!
COL 2:9 Nhwalo nkate jha Kilichitu, muyegha jhake utama ukamilicho ghoha gwa Chapanga,
COL 2:10 na mangota nkwete ughome telatela mu kulombana na jwenio. Jwenio abhii panane jha makakala ghoha gha kihuke na ukindendeke.
COL 2:11 Kwa kulombana na Kilichitu mangota nnyingi jando kuhengwa jhe na bhando na kuileka yegha jha makacho jha uhakaho, nambo chi ngita chibhahenga bhando. Kukutendwa na Kilichitu jwenio kwa kukombolwa kuhumii muyegha jha uhakaho.
COL 2:12 Nhwalo pubatichwa, mukachikitwe pamonga na Kilichitu, na muubaticho mangota helahela mukayokichwe pamonga na jwenio kuhumii mubaticho pala pumaghahobholila makakala gha Chapanga, ndi jwayokicha Yecho kuhumii muweghe
COL 2:13 Mangota mwe helahela makacho mukibha ngita nhwelingine kwa nhwalo gwa uhakaho gwino na nhwalo gwa umundo gwino gwanganandela ghubhii na uhakaho. Nambo ngohe Chapanga antei mangota mme maghome pamonga na Kilichitu. Chapanga atulekekiye uhakaho gwito ghoha,
COL 2:14 pajhomolila kuputa matakalilo ghito ghighajhandikwe na malaghilo gha kutuhadabuu twenga, ngakangila kutale, na ngakong'ondila pa nchalaba.
COL 2:15 Panchalaba gwenio Kilichitu ndi pabhapokita makakala ghabhe bheniya ilongoche ya michuka na akanahota, ajhakwaleke hone palonge jha bhando kwatalaha ngita bhando bhibhapukilwe kungondo kwa langii kubhehe abhalepelii jhe.
COL 2:16 Ngohe mangalogwa jhe mundo amekila nhwilo muchakulya amu muinywegho amu munyagho amu unyagho gwa kuhembukii mwehe amu mu Lichiko lya Kupomolela.
COL 2:17 Ilebhe yenio ndi kiyeka tu cha ilebhe ipala kuhika, nambo uchakaka gwenie ubhii nkate jha Kilichitu.
COL 2:18 Mangajhekete jhe kuhadabulwa na mundo jhojhoha jwakitenda jwamaha kwa nhwalo gwa uloto gwake na ndi aghaghalila unyenyekeho kwangachakaka kwa kwajhinamii akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga, mundo ngita jwenio akiloka kwa nhwalo gwa ilebhe yaihwene na kwa nhwalo gwa malango ghake,
COL 2:19 akilekite kukikamulii pamonga na Kilichitu, ndi jwabhii muto gwa yegha. Kupetele Kilichitu yegha jhoha ukamulana na kulombana pamonga kwa ihungo na micheketa jhake, na ukola ngita chapala Chapanga.
COL 2:20 Mangota nhwile pamonga na Kilichitu na nkombolilwe kuhumii mu makakala gha ilongoche bhibhalongocha nnema. Nhwalo gwa nike ngohe mitama ngita bhando bha nnema ghongone? Kabhele nhwalo gwa nike mukamuu malaghilo ngita ghenagha,
COL 2:21 “Mangakamu jhe chenje amu nkotoka kupaha chenje amu nkotoka kupapaya chela!”
COL 2:22 Ilebhe yenio yoha ukomelekeya pitumika, gheniya malaghilo na mabholo gha bhando tu.
COL 2:23 Chakaka malaghilo gheniya ghibhonekana ghina malango mu kunyinamila ghabhatungite bhene, na unyenyekeho kwangabhehe na uchakaka mukuilongocha yegha kwa ukale, nambo ghakwetejhe makakala gha kuhibhilikiya tama jha yegha.
COL 3:1 Ngohe anda uyokichwe pamonga na Kilichitu, uwachila mambu gha kunane kwa Chapanga, kwabhii Kilichitu, kwenio itama chehemo jha ulongoche jha lubhoko lwalelo lwa Chapanga.
COL 3:2 Uwachila mambu gha kunane kwa Chapanga, yenio chi mambu gha pannema pano.
COL 3:3 Nhwalo mangota uwilingine, na ughome gwino uhiitwe pamonga na Kilichitu nkate jha Chapanga.
COL 3:4 Ughome gwino gwa chakaka ndi Kilichitu, na papala kupitila kabhele na mangota nampitila pamonga na jwenie mung'alicho!
COL 3:5 Bhahe, nkome kila kilebhe changanandela chikibhii nkate jhino, ngongola na kuhenga ghanganandela na tama ya kubhehe na ilebhe ndii na mawacho ghanganandela na kijhaka chikilandana na kuijhinamii inyagho.
COL 3:6 Kwa nhwalo gwa gheniya ghoha Chapanga nabhabhekela lilaka bhando bhoha bhangampala kunnyokanikiya.
COL 3:7 Makacho mangota ntamita hele, punongwichwa na gheniya ghanganandela.
COL 3:8 Nambo ngoheno mughaleke gheniya ghoha, lilaka na njoghololo na maligho na manganigha jhe Chapanga na mangalonge jhe malobhe ghanganandela pannomo gwino.
COL 3:9 Mangakoloyana jhe, nhwalo mangota mulekite umundo gwa makacho pamonga na matendwa ghake ghoha ghanganandela,
COL 3:10 na muhwalite umundo nhyono. Ghutendwa nhyono mumanye Chapanga kwa uchakaka, na kulandana na jwenio jwapangana umundo nhyono.
COL 3:11 Peniya palekine jhe pakate jha mundo jwa kilambo chenge na Uyahude, jwajhingii jando na jwangajhingii jando, akaghene amu jwangachoma na mmanda amu jwangabhehe mmanda. Nambo Kilichitu ndi ghoha, na jwenio abhii mughoha.
COL 3:12 Kwa nhwalo mangota ndi bhando bha Chapanga, jwenio akampahile na ahagwile mme bhando bhake, ngohe nkola kiya na umbone na unyenyekeho na utokomalo na luhimba.
COL 3:13 Nhimbililane na kulekekehana anda mundo pakate jhino ankokolekeya nnyake. Mupalwa kulekekehana malemo ngita Bhambo chanenekekeya mangota.
COL 3:14 Kuchocha kwa gheniya, nnyonjekeye kupalana, nhwalo upalo ulombikana ghoha nde kwa uchakaka.
COL 3:15 Na uteeke gwa Kilichitu ulongoche umwojho gwino, nhwalo Chapanga ankemite mangota mme yegha jhimo. Kabhele mma na luchengulo!
COL 3:16 Lilobhe lya Kilichitu litwelela twe mwenio nkate jhino. Mmolane na kukelebhuhana kwa malango ghoha. Kone nnyemba Zabule na mihambo jha kunnomba Chapanga na nnyembengane mihambo jha kunchenguu Chapanga kumiojho jhino.
COL 3:17 Kila chimuhenga amu kukilongela, ntendengane yoha kwa liina lya Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu kone muchengula Chapanga Tate kupete jwenio.
COL 3:18 Na mangota akakeghe, majhokanikiya akangana bhino, yenio ndi chapala Bhambo.
COL 3:19 Na mangota akanalome, mapale akahana bhino na nkotoka kwalakalila bheniya.
COL 3:20 Na mangota akayana mwajhokanikiya akatate bhino machiko ghoha, yenio ndi chinhalalila Bhambo.
COL 3:21 Na mangota akatate, nkotoka kwachimwa yana hino, anda nahajhe nabhahengeleka mwojho.
COL 3:22 Na mangota akabhanda majhokanikiya akanahota bhino mughoha. Chi pibhannolokeya tugha kupala mmonekane bhambone, nambo ntenda gheniya kwa mwojho gwambone nhwalo gwa kunnyeketela Bhambo Yecho.
COL 3:23 Chochoha chimuhenga, nhenge kwa mwojho ghoha, anda muntende Bhambo Yecho na chi nhwalo gwa mundo.
COL 3:24 Nkomboka kubhehe Bhambo nampelengana ndweko yabhekite kwa bhando bhake. Chakaka Kilichitu ndi Bhambo jhumutumikila!
COL 3:25 Nhwalo kila mundo jwatenda ghanganandela, napokela malepo ghanganandela ghake, nhwalo Chapanga abaghuu jhe bhando.
COL 4:1 Na mangota akanahota, mwatendelengana akabhanda bhino ghambone na ngita chapala Chapanga, kone nkombokela na mangota helahela nkwete Bhambo kunane kwa Chapanga.
COL 4:2 Munnyope Chapanga changatotokela, na pumunyopa Chapanga mukilolekeya na kunchenguu Chapanga.
COL 4:3 Helahela mutujhopela na twenga kupala Chapanga atujhoghojolele nnyango gwa kutangacha Lilobhe tutangache chile jha Kilichitu. Kwa nhwalo gwa Lilobhe lya Mbone nenga ngohe mmi mu kipungo.
COL 4:4 Ngohe unyopele nhoto kulongele ngita chiipala chile kulongelwa meke mbegha chile jhene.
COL 4:5 Mme na malango palonge jha bhando bhangannyeketele Kilichitu, nkachane kutumii mbone kila pwache jhiminajho.
COL 4:6 Machiko ghoha nnongela ghaumbone na gha kwajhangatii bhando, na umanye kwajhanguu mbone bhando machiko ghoha.
COL 4:7 Tikiko nnongo gwito jhutumpahile, na ntumiche jwahobholeka na ntumiche nnyito mulihengo lya Bhambo, nanobholela mihalo jhango jhoha.
COL 4:8 Ndi nhwalo nintuma kwino ankangamalicha mwojho gwino kwa kunnobholela malobhe ghito.
COL 4:9 Ahika kwenio pamonga na Onechimo, nnongo gwito jhutumpala na jwahobholeka jweniojho ndi nnyino. Jwenio ndi nnyino nanongolela mihalo jha ilebhe itendika pambano.
COL 4:10 Alisitako, jwatabhitwe pamonga na nenga, inyambucha pamonga na Maluku nnongo mundo Banaba helahela inyambucha. Mukajhohine njwe malaghilo ghake. Papala kuhika kwino mupokele.
COL 4:11 Na jwenio Yochuwa helahela jwakemitwa Yusito, jhunyohina mihalo jhake inyambucha. Pakate jha Akayahude bhibhapokii kihobholelo njwe, bhamba tu kanjika bhibhahenga lihengo pamonga na nenga kwa nhwalo gwa Unahota nkolongwa gwa Chapanga, bhene ndi bhingangamalicha hake nenga.
COL 4:12 Epafula, mundo jwa kilambo chino, ntumiche jwa Yecho Kilichitu inyambucha. Machiko ghoha jwenio ighagha kunyopela kwa Chapanga nnyemangane nganganga, nkomale na nnyendelela kuhobholela na kuhenga ghighanhalalicha Chapanga.
COL 4:13 Nihoto kulonge ahenga lihengo kwa nhwalo gwino mangota na kwa nhwalo gwa bhando bha ku Laodikiya na bhala bhubhabhii ku Hilapole.
COL 4:14 Luka, jhola nng'anga gwito jhutumpala na Dema bhinyambucha.
COL 4:15 Mwajhambuche akalongo bhito bhubhabhii ku Laodikiya na nnombo gwito Nifa pamonga na lilongo lyoha lya bhando lilinyeketii Kilichitu lilikongana kajhake.
COL 4:16 Anda nnyomolela kuchoma baluwa jhenje, mwapela bhajhino bhibhanyeketii Kilichitu bhu ku Laodikeya na bhene bhaichome, na baluwa jhinajhandikile bhando bhu ku Laodikiya na mangota bhampele nchome.
COL 4:17 Na munobholele Alukipo, “Nyomole lihengo lyapokii kuhumii kwa Bhambo.”
COL 4:18 Ne Pauli nyandike ghanga kwa lubhoko lwango namwete, ninyambucha. Nkomboka nenga mmii mukipungo! Naninyopela umbone kubhoke kwa Chapanga.
1TH 1:1 Ne Pauli, Silwano na Timocheyo. Tunnyandikila mangota lilongo lya bhando bha kwenio ku Tesolonike, bhubhabhii bhando bhake Chapanga Tate, na bha Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu. Tunnyopa Chapanga ampeke umbone na uteeke.
1TH 1:2 Ninchenguu Chapanga machiko ghoha kwa nhwalo gwino, na machiko ghoha putujhopa tunkomboka mangota.
1TH 1:3 Nhwalo palonge jha Chapanga Tate gwito, tukomboka mahengo ghino ghihuma mu kihobholelo chino na ghilangii upalo gwino, pumuhobhalela Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu kwa uhimbililo.
1TH 1:4 Makalongo bhito, twenga tumanye Chapanga ampahii na ahagwi kubhehe bhando bhake,
1TH 1:5 nhwalo Malobhe gha Mbone pughahikilila, ghakahikitii jhe kwa lilobhe tugha nambo helahela ikahikite kwa makakala gha Uhuke gwa Chapanga, kongo umanye njwe kubhehe lilobhe lyenio ndi lya uchakaka. Umanye kubhehe chitutamita pamonga na mangota, tukatamite mbone kuntangatii mangota.
1TH 1:6 Mangota mukatujhighe twenga na Bhambo. Pamonga na kung'ahichwa hake, mukapokii lilobhe lya kuhangana kuhumii kwa Uhuke gwa Chapanga.
1TH 1:7 Nhwalo mangota ndi nnandanikiho gwa kujhigwa kwa lilongo lya bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu lyoha lya ku Makedoniya nuku Akaya.
1TH 1:8 Nhwalo gwa kughagha kwino lilobhe lya Bhambo likajhenile chi kwenio ku Makedoniya nuku Akaya tugha, nambo kihobholelo chiminacho kwa Chapanga kijhenile poha. Yene kibhii jhe chukujhonjekeya.
1TH 1:9 Bhando bheniya bhilonge nhwalo gwa mwanja gwito putuntyangila, na chimpokila, na chimuilekita inyagho, na kunhengela Chapanga jwabhii chakaka na ghome,
1TH 1:10 ngoheno tunnendelela Mwana gwake ahuluke kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga, ndi Yecho, Chapanga akayokiche kuhumii kwa bhando bhubhawile, na jwenio atughombole mu lilaka lya Chapanga lilihika.
1TH 2:1 Makalongo bhango mabhene umanye kubhehe kuntyangii kwito kukibha jhajhe jhe.
1TH 2:2 Nhwalo umanye chitulighitwa na kukanwa kwenio ku muche gwa ku Filipu kabula jha kuhika kwino ku Tesolonike. Pamonga na kubhehe ulikoko hake, Chapanga gwito akatutehi twatangachile bhando Malobhe gha Mbone changa ubhoghohe.
1TH 2:3 Kilebhe chitunchokolekeya kwino chi kilebhe chuwange amu mipangu jhanganandela, hilu nginyika kwa mundo jhojhoha.
1TH 2:4 Twenga tulonge ngita chapala Chapanga nhwalo jwenio atuhwene kubhehe twambone, akatupekiye lihengo lyenio lya kwatangachila Lilobhe lya Mbone. Yene tupai jhe kwahanganicha bhando, nambo tupala kunhalalicha Chapanga jwamanya miojho jhito ade nkate.
1TH 2:5 Chapanga gwito amanya lilobhe lende ndi lya uchakaka! Twenga tutumii jhe malobhe gha kupembelekeya hilu tutumii jhe malobhe gha kuchenjela hilu kupata ilebhe hino kwa kukihiya.
1TH 2:6 Tupaii jhe kutukwewa na bhando, amu na mangota, amu mundo jhojhoha,
1TH 2:7 pamonga na twenga kubhehe akatenga bha Kilichitu, tukapahii jhe kilebhe kuhumii kwino. Nambo twenga tukibha bhanuu pakate jhino ngita majhe pailela yana yake.
1TH 2:8 Tukampahi hake chi tu kunnete Malobhe gha Mbone kuhumii kwa Chapanga, nambo helahela kubhoha ughome gwito kwa nhwalo gwino mangota. Naha ndi upalo gwito chiubhii kwino!
1TH 2:9 Makalongo bhango, mangota mikomboka putukibha tuhengita mahengo na kung'ahika kilo na muhe nhwalo tukoto kubhehe nhwigho kwa mundo jhojhoha pakate jhino putuntangachila Malobhe gha Mbone kuhumii kwa Chapanga.
1TH 2:10 Chakaka mangota umanye, na Chapanga helahela chakaka amanye, tutamita nyahinyahi na tutamita kwa kujheketelwa na Chapanga na changaulemo pakate jhino.
1TH 2:11 Umanye kubhehe twenga tukantendii kila jhumo gwino ngita tate paitendela yana mundo jwenio.
1TH 2:12 Tukankangamaliche mwojho, tukampepiche na kumpwatalila, ntame ngita chapala Chapanga, jwankemita mme munahota nkolongwa jwa Chapanga na ung'alicho gwake.
1TH 2:13 Kabhele tubhii na nhwalo gwa kunnomba Chapanga machiko ghoha, putunneti Malobhe gha Mbone gha Chapanga, mangota mukajhohine na chi ngita malobhe gha bhando na yenio ndi chiibhile. Nhwalo Chapanga ahenga lihengo nkate jhino mangota bhunnyeketile.
1TH 2:14 Makalongo bhango, mangota ghughapitii kwa lilongo lya bhando bhubhannyeketii Kilichitu bha kola ku Yudeya, mambu ghighapiti bhando bhake Kilichitu Yecho. Mangota mukang'ahichwe na bhando bha kilambo chino anda bhene hele bhakang'ahitwe na Akayahude ajhabhe,
1TH 2:15 bhene ndi bhakankomite Bhambo Yecho na milondole bha Chapanga, na twenga bhakatung'ahite helahela. Bhando bhene bhajhakunchimwa Chapanga, kabhele likoko kwa kila mundo!
1TH 2:16 Bhapalita kutuhibhilikiya kwatangachila bhando bha ilambo henge, malobhe gha ughombokeko. Naha ndi chibhalundika uhakaho gwabhe ade utwelele ghubhatehila machiko ghoha. Nambo ngohe lilaka lya Chapanga lyahulukile.
1TH 2:17 Makalongo bhango, tukalekine kwa machiko ghandina tugha, kabhele kulekana kwenio kukibha kwa yegha tugha na chi kwa uhuke. Machiko ghandina ghighahika, tukankombwike hake na tukaghaghite kumonengana kabhele!
1TH 2:18 Yene tukalaghine kuntyangii kabhele. Ne Pauli, nikapahi kuhika kwino kabhele, nambo Limbembela ajhakutuhibhilikiya.
1TH 2:19 Bho, putupala kujhema palonge jha Bhambo Yecho papala kuhika, ndweko jha kuhoto kwito naibhaha nike? Mangota ndi lihobholelo lito na uhanganilo gwito.
1TH 2:20 Chakaka, mangota ndi ung'alicho gwito na luhanganilo lwito.
1TH 3:1 Kujhomolela tukahotwii jhe kuhimbilila. Yene tukahighilike kutama kanjika jhito ku Atene,
1TH 3:2 na kuntuma kwino nnongo gwito Timocheyo, jwakibha nhenga lihengo nnyito mulihengo lya Chapanga mukutangacha Malobhe gha Mbone gha Kilichitu. Tukantumite ankangamaliche na kunneke mwojho,
1TH 3:3 kupala kihobholelo cha mundo jhojhoha pakate jhino kikoto kutundangalila kwa nhwalo gwa malagho gheniya. Mangota umanye kubhehe tupalwa kung'ahika.
1TH 3:4 Putukibha pamonga na mangota, tukannobholile kubhehe naung'ahichwa, na anda chiumanye, yenio ndi chiipitile.
1TH 3:5 Ghono ndi nhwalo gwa kuntuma Timocheyo kwino. Nikahotwii jhe kuhimbilila kabhele, nintumite kupala manye malobhe gha kihobholelo chino. Nyogwipa Jwanganandela kunyigha na lihengo lituhengita pakate jhino lihobhole jhajhe!
1TH 3:6 Nambo ngohe Timocheyo abhujhite kuhumii kwino, jwenio atulobholile malobhe gha kuhanganila gha kihobholelo chino na upalo gwino. Atulobholile kubhehe mutukomboka machiko ghoha, na mipala kukongana na twenga na twenga hele tubhii nakilolo chukukongana na mangota.
1TH 3:7 Bhahe, malobhe gha kihobholelo chino ghatukangamaliche mwojho mu malagho na mang'ahiko ghito ghoha,
1TH 3:8 nhwalo ngohe tutama chakaka, anda mangota nnyema nganganga mu kulombana na Bhambo.
1TH 3:9 Ngohe tuhoto kunnomba Chapanga gwito kwa nhwalo gwino. Tunnomba kwa luhanganilo lutubhinako palonge jhake kwa nhwalo gwino mangota.
1TH 3:10 Tujhendelela kunnyopa Chapanga kilo na muhe kwa mwojho gwito ghoha tupala atupekeye pwache jha kukongana kabhele na tunnyyonjekeye chochoha chikipongwiye mu kihobholelo chino.
1TH 3:11 Tunnyopa Chapanga, Tate gwito, na Bhambo gwito Yecho, atulengenikii ndela jha kukongana na mangota.
1TH 3:12 Bhambo anyonjekeye mapalano gha bhene kwa bhene na kwapala bhando bhoha, ngita twenga chitumpala mangota.
1TH 3:13 Yene naikangamalicha miojho jhino, mangota namma manga malemo namma manyahinyahi palonge jha Chapanga na Tate gwito, peniya Bhambo gwito Yecho papakuhika pamonga na bhando bhake bhoha.
1TH 4:1 Bhahe, makalongo bhango, mukibholite kubhoke kwito chimupalwa kutama kwa kunhalalicha Chapanga. Chakaka yenio ndi chimitama. Na ngohe tumpembelekeya kwa liina lya Bhambo Yecho nnyendelela kuhenga ghaumbone.
1TH 4:2 Nhwalo umanya ghala malaghalikilo ghitumpekii, tukampekiye kwa uhotolo gwa Bhambo Yecho.
1TH 4:3 Chapanga apala mangota mme bhanyahinyahi na muileka kolwa ngongola.
1TH 4:4 Kila munalome amanye chapalwa kutama na nhwana mundo kwa unyahinyahi na ichima,
1TH 4:5 na chi kilanga ngita bhando bhange bhangammanya Chapanga.
1TH 4:6 Bhahe, mundo jhojhoha akoto kunnemuu jhonge amu angamponja jhe nnyake kupete lilobhe lende. Nhwalo Bhambo ndi jwahadabula bhando bhoha ngita chatulobholila na kunkelebhuya hake.
1TH 4:7 Nhwalo Chapanga atukemite jhe kuhenga ngongola, nambo tutame kwa unyahinyahi.
1TH 4:8 Yene mundo jhojhoha jwakana mabholo ghanga, ankana jhe mundo, nambo ankana Chapanga jwampekeya Uhuke gwake.
1TH 4:9 Kwa malobhe gha kupalana, tupala jhe kunnyandikila. Nhwalo mangota mabhene mmolitwe na Chapanga kupalana.
1TH 4:10 Nhwalo yenio ndi chimwatendela akalongo bhoha bhubhabhii kwenio ku Makedoniya jhoha. Nambo tumpembekeya hake nnyendelela kuhenga kuchocha peniya.
1TH 4:11 Ntamengane kwa kuhengwa, kila jhumo ahenga ilebhe yake jwenio, na ahenga lihengo kwa mabhoko ghake jwenio ngita chitunaghalikiye.
1TH 4:12 Kwa kuhenga yenio nanhobholeka na bhando bhangaumanya Kilichitu, na muhobhole jhe mundo jhojhoha nhwalo gwa ghala ghumipala.
1TH 4:13 Makalongo bhito, tupala umanye uchakaka kwa lilobhe lya bhala bhubhawile, nkoto kubhehe na ungolongondi ngita bhando bhange bhangabhehe na lihobholelo.
1TH 4:14 Twenga tujheketela Yecho akawile na kuyoka, tujheketela Chapanga chabhaleta pamonga na Yecho kwa jwenio bhala bhoha bhubhawile kongo bhannyeketile Yecho.
1TH 4:15 Ghanga ghutunnobholile ndi mabholo gha Bhambo, twenga bhitubhii ghome, bhituhighilike ade papala kuhika Bhambo, chakaka natwalongolela jhe bhala bhubhahwii njwe.
1TH 4:16 Nhwalo Bhambo jwenio nahuluka kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga, abhii na nhwilo na lilobhe lya nhenga mahengo nkolongwa jwa Chapanga na lilobhe lya lipenenga lya Chapanga, na bhando bhubhawile kongo bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu nabhatumbula kuyoka.
1TH 4:17 Peniya twenga tubhii na ughome, bhituhighilike natutolwa pamonga nabho mu lihunde kukongana na Bhambo. Yene natutama na Bhambo machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
1TH 4:18 Ngohe, mpepechane kwa malobhe ghanga.
1TH 5:1 Ngohe makalongo, tukibhona jhe chukunyandikila kwa malobhe gha kipinde na nchimo pighapa kupitila.
1TH 5:2 Nhwalo mangota umanye kubhehe lichiko papa kuhika Bhambo naibhaha ngita mwihe pahika kilo.
1TH 5:3 Bhando bhubhapala kulonge, “Kila kilebhe kibhii njelembo na uteeke,” papa kuhangabhana na kupwitikilila papala kwahikilila ngita lipyanda lya kupapa mwana na bhando nabhahoto jhe kubhambala.
1TH 5:4 Nambo makalongo, mangota mmii jhe mulubhendo, na lichiko lyenio limpwitikilila ngita mwihe.
1TH 5:5 Mangota mabhoha ndi yana ya lumule na yana ya muhe. Twenga twabhando bha kilo jhe amu mulubhendo.
1TH 5:6 Bhahe, tukoto kugholoka ngita bhange, nambo tukeluwe na tukilongoche twabhete.
1TH 5:7 Nhwalo bhando bhubhagholoka, bhigholoka kilo, na bhala bhubhalobhela, bhilobhe kilo.
1TH 5:8 Nambo twenga bhitubhii bhando bha muhe tukilongoche twabhete. Tuhwale kihobholelo na upalo ngita ngobho jha choma jha kukikengelela munganga hito, na lihobholelo lya ughombokeko libhaha ngita kofiya jha choma jha kukikengelela mimuto jhito.
1TH 5:9 Nhwalo Chapanga akatuhagwii jhe tukomolekelwe na lilaka lyake, nambo tughombolelwe kupete Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu.
1TH 5:10 Jwenio akahwii kwa nhwalo gwito, tutame nako pamonga na jwenio, tubhehe tuhwi amu ghome.
1TH 5:11 Ngohe nkangamalichane mwojho na kutangatilana, ngita chimuhenga ngohe.
1TH 5:12 Ngohe tumpembelekeya makalongo mwajheketele bhala bhubhahenga lihengo pakate jhino, bhunnongocha na bhibhannyemelela mu kulombana na Yecho Kilichitu.
1TH 5:13 Mwajhokanikiya hake na kwapala nhwalo gwa lihengo libhihenga. Ntame kwa uteeke.
1TH 5:14 Makalongo tumpembelekeya, mwakanikiye bhala bhubhabhii akatotoho, mwakangamaliche mwojho bhala bhibhajhoghopa, mwatangatile bhando bhibhaleghelike, mwahimbilile bhando bhoha.
1TH 5:15 Mukilolekehe mundo jhojhoha akoto kunepechela nnyake libhoho kwa libhoho, nambo machiko ghoha ntendelane ghamaha na helahela mwatendele bhando bhoha ghambone.
1TH 5:16 Uhangane machiko ghoha,
1TH 5:17 munnyope Chapanga changatotokela,
1TH 5:18 muchengule Chapanga kwa kila kilebhe, nhwalo yenio ndi chaipala Chapanga nhenge kwa kulombana kwino na Kilichitu Yecho.
1TH 5:19 Nkoto kuhibhilikiha lihengo lya Uhuke gwa Chapanga,
1TH 5:20 nkoto kulipucha lilobhe lilihuma kwa Chapanga,
1TH 5:21 nambo mughalingukihe mambu ghoha na mughakamule ghighabhii ghamaha.
1TH 5:22 Ntamangane kutale na ghanganandela ghoha.
1TH 5:23 Chapanga jwenio jwatupela uteeke ajhelebhule na ankengelele mangota mu uhuke na miojho jhino, na yegha jhino ibhonekana ikwetii jhe ulemo ghoghoha papakuhika Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu.
1TH 5:24 Chapanga jwankemita mangota nahenga yenio nhwalo kwa uchakaka.
1TH 5:25 Makalongo, mutujhopela na twenga.
1TH 5:26 Mwajhambuche akalongo bhoha kwa upalo.
1TH 5:27 Ninaghalikiya kwa uhotolo gwa Bhambo, mwachomele akalongo bhito bhoha baluwa jhenje.
1TH 5:28 Umbone gwa Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu utama pamonga na mangota.
2TH 1:1 Ne Pauli na Silwano na Timocheyo. Tulijhandikila lilongo lya bhando lilinnyeketii Kilichitu lya kwenio ku Tesolonike, ndi bhando bhake Chapanga Tate gwito na Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu.
2TH 1:2 Ninyope umbone na uteeke kuhumii kwa Chapanga Tate gwito na Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu.
2TH 1:3 Makalongo bhango, tupalwa kunchenguu Chapanga machiko ghoha kwa nhwalo gwino mangota. Tupalwa kuhenga gheniya nhwalo gwa kihobholelo chino nakikola hake na kupalana kwino na kujhonjekeka hake.
2TH 1:4 Ndi nhwalo twenga tukiloke mangota pakate jha makunde gha bhando bhibhannyeketii Chapanga. Tukiloke ndela jhimujhendelela mangota kunnyeketela nu kuhimbilila mang'ahiko na malagho ghumikongana nako.
2TH 1:5 Gheniya ghoha ghilangii ngita luhadabulo lwa Chapanga lwa uchakaka, mitopela kujhingii mu unahota nkolongwa gwa Chapanga ghumung'ahikiya.
2TH 1:6 Chapanga nahenga lijhambu lilibhi tela, nalepechela malagho ghala ghubhang'ahita mangota,
2TH 1:7 na kuntenda mangota bhung'ahitwa ibhehe mbaa pamonga na twenga helahela. Nahenga naha Bhambo Yecho papala kupitila kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga pamonga na akatumiche bha Chapanga jwa kunane bhubhabhii na makakala,
2TH 1:8 na ndentelekana ya mwotu, kwahadabula bhala bhubhankana Chapanga na bhala bhubhakana kujheketela Malobhe gha Mbone gha Bhambo gwito Yecho.
2TH 1:9 Nabhahadabulwa kwa kukomelekelwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta kubhehe kutale na Bhambo na ung'alicho gha makakala ghake,
2TH 1:10 papala kuhika lichiko lyenio kulombwa na bhando bhake na kuhanganilwa na bhando bhoha bhubhannyeketile. Mangota helahela namma pakate jhabhe, nnyeketile lilobhe lela litunnongolile.
2TH 1:11 Yene machiko ghoha tunnyopela kwa Chapanga gwito antende mangota nhoto kutama ngita chakemita ntame. Tunnyopa kwa makakala ghake ahenge kila kilebhe chambone chimipala kuhenga na kila lihengo lya kihobholelo.
2TH 1:12 Tujhopa naha, tupala liina lya Bhambo gwito Yecho lilombwe nkate jhino na mangota nnombwe kwa kulombana nako kwa umbone gwa Chapanga gwito na gwa Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu.
2TH 2:1 Ngohe tunnyandikila lilobhe lya kuhika kwa Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu na tupala kukonganika palonge jhake. Makalongo bhito tumpembelekeya hake,
2TH 2:2 mundo akoto kummoghana kajhombe chikibhii umuto gwino, amu nkoto kuhechuka na ujumbi amu lilobhe amu baluwa jhilongelwa ihumite kwito, baluwa jhilongela lichiko lya Bhambo lihikiti njwe.
2TH 2:3 Mundo jhojhoha akoto kunkolowa na kilebhe chochoha, nhwalo lichiko lela lihika jhe ade mundo jhola jwankana Chapanga na uchakaka abhonekane, kujhomolela kwake kukomolekelwa.
2TH 2:4 Jwenio nakikana kila kilebhe na chakitenda jwenio ndi nkolongwa jwa kila kilebhe chikikemwa kichapanga, amu chibhikijhinamila, yenio ata nakujhingii nkate jha Nyumba jha Chapanga nakiloka kubhehe ndi Chapanga.
2TH 2:5 Bho, mikombokajhe nakannobholile ghanga ghoha punikibha pamonga na mangota?
2TH 2:6 Nambo kibhii kilebhe chikinhibhilikiya ngohe, na mangota mu kimanya kilebhe chenie. Nambo lichiko lyake anda lihikite, jwankema Jwanganandela Mundo nabhonekana.
2TH 2:7 Nambo ngohe likakala lya Mundo Jwanganandela lihenga lihengo kwa kuyepela, nambo nabhonekana jhe ade jhola jwanhibhilikiye abhowe.
2TH 2:8 Ndi Mundo Jwanganandela nabhonekana, nambo papakuhika Bhambo Yecho nankoma kwa uhuke gwa nnomo gwake na kunkomelekeya kwa lung'anye lwake lukolongwa.
2TH 2:9 Jwenio Mundo Jwanganandela chahika na likakala lya Limbembela na kuhenga kila ikangacho na nginyililo yu uwange,
2TH 2:10 na kuntumii ghoha ghu uwange kwa bhala bhubhabhii mu kuhobholela. Bheniya nabhahobholela nhwalo bhaupokii jhe na kupala uchakaka bhaghombokoke.
2TH 2:11 Nhwalo Chapanga bhabhekite bhando bheniya pahe jha makakala gha kuhobholela, bhaujheketele uwange.
2TH 2:12 Yene bhoha bhangajheketela uchakaka, nambo bhihanganila uhakaho, nabhahadabulwa.
2TH 2:13 Nambo tupalwa kunnomba Chapanga machiko ghoha nhwalo gwino mangota, mangota mupailwe na Bhambo, nhwalo kuhumii makacho Chapanga abhahagwile nghombokoke kwa likakala lya Uhuke gwake, na kuntenda mme bhando bhake bhanyahinyahi kwa kihobholelo chino mu uchakaka.
2TH 2:14 Chapanga ankemita mangota kupete Lilobhe lya Mbone lituntangachila mme pamonga mung'alicho gwa Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu.
2TH 2:15 Ngohe makalongo bhango, nnyemengane nganganga na kukamuu mabholo ghutummolite anda kuntangachii amu kunyandikila.
2TH 2:16 Tunnyopa Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu jwenio na Chapanga Tate gwito jwatupahile, na kwa umbone gwake atupekii uteeke gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta na lihobholelo lya umbone,
2TH 2:17 apepeche miojho na ankangamaliche nhoto kuhenga nu kulonge ghambone.
2TH 3:1 Pukujhomolela, makalongo bhito, mutujhope kupala lilobhe lya Bhambo lichoche kujhenela kajhombe na kupokelwa mbone ngita chiibhii pakate jhino mangota.
2TH 3:2 Mutujhope kwa Chapanga atukombole kuhumii kwa bhando bhanganandela, nhwalo chi bhoha bhubhajhekete Lilobhe lya Mbone lende.
2TH 3:3 Nambo Bhambo ndi jwa jwahobholeka. Jwenio nambela makakala na kunnonda njelembo na Jwanganandela.
2TH 3:4 Na twenga tunhobholela Bhambo kubhehe nhenga na nnyendelela kuhenga kwa ghala ghitunnongalile.
2TH 3:5 Bhambo ailongoche miojho jhino mukumanya upalo nkolongwa gwa Chapanga na kuhimbilila ghutupilwe na Kilichitu.
2TH 3:6 Makalongo bhito, tunnaghalikiya kwa liina lya Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu, ntame kutale na akalongo bhoha akatotoho na bhala bhubhakana kukengama malaghilo ghitumpekiye.
2TH 3:7 Mangota umanye ngita mipalwa kukengama ghituhengita. Putukibha na mangota tukibha jhe akatotoho,
2TH 3:8 tukalii jhe jhajhe chakulya cha mundo jhojhoha. Nambo tuhengita mahengo hake muhe na kilo kwa malagho tukoto kubhehe nhwigho kwa mundo jhojhoha pakate jhino mangota.
2TH 3:9 Tuhengita gheniya chi kwa nhwalo tupaii jhe kutangatilwa na mangota, nambo tupalitwa kunangii chimipalwa kuhenga.
2TH 3:10 Putukibha pamonga na mangota tukannongolile, “Mundo jhojhoha jwangapala kuhenga lihengo, akoto kulyegha.”
2TH 3:11 Tujhoha pakate jhino bhabhii bhando akatotoho bhangapala kuhenga chochoha, nambo bhakijhingii mu ilebhe ya bhando bhange.
2TH 3:12 Kwa liina lya Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu twalaghalikiya na kwakelebhuha bhando bheniya bhabha akahenga lihengo kwa kukilongocha bhene na bhapata chakulya chabhe.
2TH 3:13 Nambo mangota makalongo, nkoto kutotokelela kuhenga ghambone.
2TH 3:14 Anda abhii mundo kwino jwangajhokanikiya lilobhe lende lya mubaluwa jhenje, mwangalombana nako mundo jwenio akola hone.
2TH 3:15 Nambo nkoto kuntenda mundo jwenio ngita likoko, munkelebhuwe ngita nnongo gwino.
2TH 3:16 Bhambo jwenio ndi jwapiya uteeke, ampelangane uteeke machiko ghoha na ndela yoha. Bhambo atame na mangota mabhoha.
2TH 3:17 Nenga Pauli, ninyambucha kwa kunnyandikila kwa lubhoko lwango namwete. Jhenje ndi huna mu kila baluwa, naha ndi chinijhandika.
2TH 3:18 Umbone gwa Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu utama na mangota mabhoha.
1TI 1:1 Ne Pauli, natenga jwa Yecho Kilichitu kwa nhwilo gwa Chapanga ndi Nkomboche gwito na Yecho Kilichitu ndi lihobholelo lito.
1TI 1:2 Ninnyandikila Timocheyo mwanango jwa chakaka mu kihobholelo. Ninnyope umbone na kiya na uteeke kuhumii kwa Chapanga Tate gwito na Yecho Kilichitu Bhambo gwito.
1TI 1:3 Mbala ntame kwenio ku Epecho, ngita punipembelikiya punikibha nikajhenda ku Makedoniya. Bhabhii bhando bhange kwenio bhibhola mabholo ghuwange, makanakiye bhando bheniya.
1TI 1:4 Mwalobholela bhaleka kulingukiya kwamahele mu ibheluko pamonga na malobhe gha akahoko, gheniya ghileta kutaungana tu, ghichenga jhe lihengo lya Chapanga mu kihobholelo.
1TI 1:5 Kilebhe kikolongwa cha malaghalikilo ghango ndi upalo, ghuubhoka mumwojho gwambone, na kuhaghuu na kuhenga ghambone na kihobholelo cha uchakaka.
1TI 1:6 Bhando bhange bhahobhalile na kughalambukila mu malongocho gha kimbebhebhe.
1TI 1:7 Bhipala kubhehe bhabhola bha malaghalikilo gha Mucha, nambo bhimanya ndeka chibhalongela amu malobhe ghabhe bhene amu mambu ghibhajhoha.
1TI 1:8 Tumanya Malaghalikilo ndi ghambone, anda ghatumike chiipalwa.
1TI 1:9 Helahela tumanya kubhehe Lilaghalikilo liletitwe kwa nhwalo gwa bhando bhambone jhe, nambo kwa bhando bhangakamuu lilaghalikilo, bhangajhokanikiya, bhangannyopa Chapanga na akahako, bhando bhibhakengama gha nnema na bhangamanya ndela jha Chapanga, bhando bhibhakoma akatate bhabhe na akama jhe bhabhe, amu bhibhakoma bhando.
1TI 1:10 Lilaghalikilo liletitwe kunhwalo gwa bhibhahenga ngongola, bhibhagholoka na akanalome ajhabhe, bhibhakwatuu bhando, akawange na bhilapii kuwange amu bhihenga kilebhe chochoha chikibhii kuyeto na mabholo gha uchakaka.
1TI 1:11 Mabholo gheniya ghabhii mu Lilobhe lya Mbone lya Chapanga jhuna ung'alicho ndi lilobhe limbekiwe nenga natangachila bhando.
1TI 1:12 Ninchenguu Yecho Kilichitu Bhambo gwito jwambekii makakala kunhwalo amwene ne ndi nihobholeka, ngahagwila nintumikila,
1TI 1:13 pamonga na makacho ninighita na kwang'aha na kwatende chanake bhando bhinnyeketeketii Kilichitu. Nambo Chapanga ngamonila kiya, kwa nhwalo nakibha nalindindilima kabhele nanga kihobholelo.
1TI 1:14 Nambo Bhambo gwito ngandweleya twe umbone, ngambekiya kihobholelo na upalo mu kulombana na Kilichitu Yecho.
1TI 1:15 Lilobhe lende ndi lya chakaka, kabhele ipalwa kujheketelwa na kuhobholeka: Kilichitu Yecho pahikita pannema pano kwakombola bhando bhubhabhii na uhakaho. Na nenga nnemwite hake kupeta bhando bhoha,
1TI 1:16 nambo Chapanga ngamonila kiya ndi kupala Kilichitu Yecho alangiye luhimbililo lwoha kwa nenga mii nauhakaho kupeta bhoha, ngita nnandanikiho kwa bhala bhoha bhibhapala kunnyeketela na kupokela ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
1TI 1:17 Kwa Munahota Nkolongwa jwangawegha machiko ghoha ghangapeta, jwangahwe, jwanga bhonekana, ndi Chapanga kanjika ndo, kwa jwenio kubhii na ichima na ung'alicho gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta! Amina.
1TI 1:18 Timocheyo ndi mwanango mu kihobholelo, ninkamuwa nhwilo ghongo, kwa malobhe gha ulondole ghighalongilwa panane jhino makacho mughakengame ndi uhoto kuikengelela ngondo jha Malobhe gha Mbone,
1TI 1:19 na mukikamulile kihobholelo chino na kupala mme na mwojho gwa kuhaghula ghakuhenga ghighabhii ghambone. Bhando bhange bhakanite gheniya, yenio bhakihangabhine kihobholelo chabhe.
1TI 1:20 Pakate jhabhe ndi Humeneyo na Alekichanda, bheniya ninkamwii Limbembela, abhabhole kupala bhakoto kunnigha Chapanga.
1TI 2:1 Kilebhe chukutumbula, nipala munnyope Chapanga ilebhe imupala, munnyinamila Chapanga, na mwajhopele bhando bhange na munnombe Chapanga kwa nhwalo gwa bhando bhoha.
1TI 2:2 Munnyope Chapanga kwa nhwalo gwa akanahota na bhando bhibhalongocha, ndi kupala ntame maha na kwa uteeke, kuhenga ghambone na kunnyinamii Chapanga.
1TI 2:3 Ilebhe henge yambone na inhalalicha Chapanga, jwabhii Nkomboche gwito,
1TI 2:4 jwenio ndi apala bhando bhoha bhaghombolelwe na bhaumanye uchakaka.
1TI 2:5 Nhwalo abhii Chapanga jhumo, na hele abhii jhumo jwajhelanicha bhando na Chapanga, mundo jwenio ndi Kilichitu Yecho,
1TI 2:6 jwenio ngangipihita ngita litambiko kwakombola bhando bhoha. Ughombokeko ghongo ubhoneka mu kipinde chake.
1TI 2:7 Kwa nhwalo gwa gheniya nenga ndumitwe ngita natenga nabhola bhando bhangaumanya Chapanga, ndangache lilobhe lya kihobholelo na lya uchakaka. Nenga nilonge jhe uwange, nilonge uchakaka!
1TI 2:8 Bhahe, popoha pala pimikongana kunnyopa Chapanga, nipala bhando bhibhabhii na mwojho gwamaha, bheniya bhahoto kutondobheya mabhoko ghabhe na kunnyopa Chapanga changabhehe na lilaka hilu mitaho.
1TI 2:9 Kabhele nipala akakeghe bhawale ngobho yambone na ya ichima, na chi kwa kukilemba kwa kutibha mangongo gha chaabo na lulo, andajhe kwa maghanga ghighachuluchwa kwa bei ngolongwa,
1TI 2:10 nambo bhabha na itendwa yambone ngita chiipalwa kwa akakeghe bhibhannyopa Chapanga.
1TI 2:11 Akakeghe bhipalwa kutama nuu na kubhehe na utembekelo pibhakibhola Lilobhe lya Chapanga.
1TI 2:12 Ne nipala jhe mwikeghe ammola amu kuntamila munalome, mwikeghe ipalwa atama nuu.
1TI 2:13 Nhwalo Adamo jwakalongolile kupanganwa, kubhoke peniya ngapanginwa Hawa.
1TI 2:14 Hilu Adamo jhe jwakakolwiwe, nambo mwikeghe ndi jwakakolwiwe, ngalemwiya Lilaghalikilo lya Chapanga.
1TI 2:15 Nambo mwikeghe nalondwa papapa yana, anda bhajhendelii mu kihobholelo na upalo na unyahinyahi na matyangilo ghamaha.
1TI 3:1 Lilobhe lende ndi lya chakaka, mundo jwapala kubhehe kilongoche jwa bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu, jwenio ighana lihengo lyambone.
1TI 3:2 Bhahe, kilongoche jwa bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu ipalwa abhaha mundo jwantemulana ilebhe maha, abhaha na mwikeghe jhumo, abhaha jwahoto kukilongocha jwenio, jwajhokanikilwa na jwapokela akaghene na jwahoto kubhola bhando,
1TI 3:3 jwangalobhela amu mundo jwanga kijhonga, nambo abhaha jwanuu jwapala uteeke na angabhehe jhe jwakupala mbijha.
1TI 3:4 Ipalwa abhaha mundo jwahoto kwalongocha bhando bha pakajhake maha na aitenda yana yake bhannyokonikiye changa nkanila na ichima hake.
1TI 3:5 Anda mundo ahoto jhe kwalongocha maha bhando bha ukajhake, nahotolabho kulilongocha likunde lya bhando lilinnyeketii Chapanga?
1TI 3:6 Apalwa jhe kubhehe mundo jwannyeketii Kilichitu ngohengohe nhwalo ahoto kuloka na kuhadabulwa ngita chahadabwilwe Limbembela.
1TI 3:7 Ipalwa atopele na bhando bhangannyekete Kilichitu, kupala akoto kugwelele muhone na muntambo gwa Limbembela.
1TI 3:8 Bhakujhangatii mu lilongo lya bhando lilinnyeketii Kilichitu bhipalwa bhabha na matyangilo ghamaha, bhina kuhobholeka na bhilonge chakaka chika bhangalobhela divaye na bhando bhakupala tama jha kupata mbijha kwa ndela mboho,
1TI 3:9 bhipalwa bhaikamula kwa mwojho gwambone uchakaka mu kihobholelo chikiyekulilwe na Chapanga.
1TI 3:10 Hote bhipalwa bhajhigwa, anda bhabhonikine bhakwetii jhe malemo, mwaleke bhabha akajhangatii mu lilongo lya bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu.
1TI 3:11 Akahana bhabhe hele bhipalwa bhabha na matyangilo ghambone, bhangang'wenya bhando, bhitemulana ilebhe maha na bhihobholeka mu ilebhe yoha.
1TI 3:12 Jwantangatii lihengo pa bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu ipalwa abhaha na mwikeghe jhumo tu, na jwahoto kulongocha maha yana mundo na nyumba jhake.
1TI 3:13 Nhwalo jwantangatii lihengo maha ahoto kujhema nganganga nu kulonge lilobhe lya kihobholelo chake mu kulombana na Kilichitu Yecho changajhoghopa.
1TI 3:14 Ninyandikii ghanga na kongo nihobholela kuhika kajhino machiko ghighabhandakii.
1TI 3:15 Nambo anda njeliwe, bhahe, ghanga ghininnyandikile itenda umanye chimitama munyumba jha Chapanga, ndi lilongo lya bhando lilinnyeketiii Kilichitu ndi Chapanga jwabhii ghome, jwenio ndi luheke na nchinge gwa uchakaka.
1TI 3:16 Ubhii jhe bwoghohe gwogwoha panane jha uyekulilo gwa lupwepo lwa kihobholelo chito chikibhii kikolongwa, Akabhonakine muyegha jha kimundo, jwakalangiwe na Uhuke gwa Chapanga kubhehe ndi jwambone, akabhonikine na ntumiche jwa kunane kwa Chapanga. Akatangichwe mu ilambo yoha, akahobholike munnema gwoha, akatolitwe kujhenda kunane kwa Chapanga mu ung'alicho.
1TI 4:1 Uhuke gwa Chapanga ulonge hotuhotu kubhehe machiko ghighahika bhando bhange nabhakikana kihobholelo, ndi nabhaijhokaniya ihuke yuuwange na kukengama mabholo gha michuka.
1TI 4:2 Mabholo ngita gheniya ghitangachwa na bhando bhuuwange na bhibhakitenda bhaumbone, bheniya miojho jhabhe jhukumanya lyambone amu lyanganandela ihwile ngita ijhochwite na choma cha mwotu.
1TI 4:3 Bhando bheniya ubhola kulemwa kutolela na kulyegha yakulya henge. Nambo Chapanga jwapangina yenie, kupala bhibhannyeketii bhalyeghe na bhaumanye uchakaka kwa kuchengula.
1TI 4:4 Kila kilebhe chapangine Chapanga ndi chambone, kibhii jhe chikipalwa kukanwa, nambo yoha ipokelelwa kukunchenguu Chapanga,
1TI 4:5 nhwalo lilobhe lya Chapanga na kunnyopa kukiteii kilebhe chenie kijheketelwe na Chapanga.
1TI 4:6 Anda mapekii akalongo bhoha malaghilo ghanga, namma matumiche bhambone bha Kilichitu Yecho, anda ntei gheniya mabhene nanyendelela kukola mu uhuke kwa malobhe gha kihobholelo na mabholo ghamaha ghamikengama.
1TI 4:7 Nambo mwe ma Timacheyo mikane omo yangabhehe ya Chapanga na yanganandela. Mukibhole kutama kukunhalalicha Chapanga.
1TI 4:8 Kutenda machoechi gha yegha ndi kilebhe chamaha, nambo kutama kukuhalalicha Chapanga ndi kwambone hake mu kila kilebhe, nhwalo atulaghii ughome nhyono na ughome ghupakuhika.
1TI 4:9 Lilobhe lende ndi lya chakaka hake na lipalwa lijheketelwa.
1TI 4:10 Twenga tung'ahika nu kuhenga mahengo kwa kughagha hake, nhwalo hote tummekii lihobholelo lito Chapanga jwabhii ghome kabhele ndi Nkomboche jwa bhando bhoha, achwa bhala bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu.
1TI 4:11 Yene mapele malaghilo ghanga na mabhole ilebhe henge.
1TI 4:12 Mangajheketela mundo jhojhoha ampucha nhwalo mwe makangombo, nambo nkachane mme nnandanikiho kwa bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu, mu kulonge kwino na kutama kwino na mu kihobholelo chino na mupalo gwino na unyahinyahi gwino.
1TI 4:13 Machiko ghoha nnyendelela kwachome bhando pakongoloho Majhandiko gha Chapanga, kutangacha na kubhola ade pambakuhika.
1TI 4:14 Mangaleka jhe kutumii kitoi chimpokii kuhumii kwa Uhuke gwa Chapanga chikibhii nkate jhino, chimpatite kupete kwa malobhe gha akalondole bha Chapanga na kummeke mabhoko na kwajhopela bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu.
1TI 4:15 Nhwachila hake gheniya ghoha na mughahengela lihengo na kila mundo alola chimujhendele kukola.
1TI 4:16 Mukilolekeya mwe mabhene na mabholo ghino. Nnyendelela kughakamuu gheniya, nhwalo anda ntei yenie, namikighombola mabhene na bhando bhibhannyokanikiya.
1TI 5:1 Mangampwatalila jhe mundo munahota, nambo nnonge nako ngita tate gwino. Nnongele na achikangombo ngita akalongo bhino.
1TI 5:2 Nnonge nabho akakeghe imbujha ngita akamajhe bhino, na achikabhale nnonge nabho ngita akalombo bhino, kwa unyahinyahi gwoha.
1TI 5:3 Mwatendele ghambone akakeghe akanawela bhangabhehe na kilebhe chochoha.
1TI 5:4 Nambo nawela jwabhii na yana amu ichokolo, yenie ipalwa bhakibhole ghapala Chapanga, bhabhujhichila mabhoko akatate bhabhe na akahoko bhabhe, nhwalo ghihalalicha Chapanga.
1TI 5:5 Mwikeghe jwabhii nawela chakaka, jwanga mundo jwa kuntangatila, jwenio abhii na lihobholelo na ajhendelele kunnyopa Chapanga atangatila kilo na muhe.
1TI 5:6 Nambo nawela jwaitama kwa kukipala jwenio, jwenio abhii ngita awile, pamo nukubhehe ghome.
1TI 5:7 Malobholela bhando bhahenga ilebhe yenie, kupala angapitii jhe jwa kukokoleka.
1TI 5:8 Anda mundo abhahwachii jhe akalongo mundo, mundo jwenio akwete jhe kihobholelo, ndi jwanganandela kuliku jwanganyeketela Chapanga.
1TI 5:9 Manganyandika jhe mu kitabo cha akanawela mundo jwangahikicha yaka makome chita. Kabhele abha jwatolilwe mala jhimo,
1TI 5:10 na abhaha jwamanyikine kwa mahengo ghake ghambone, jwalelite yana yake maha na jwabhalendekeya akaghene kajhake na jwabhapoke bhando bha Chapanga na kwagholola magholo na kwatangatii bhando bhina malola, jwakitabhite kukamuu ghambone.
1TI 5:11 Nambo mangajhandika jhe akanawela ichikana, nhwalo tama yabhe yakupalwa kutolelwa nakanalome kabhele bhihoto kughalambuka na bhihoto kunneka Kilichitu.
1TI 5:12 Yene nabhabha na malemo gha kuleka lilaghano lyabhe lya makacho.
1TI 5:13 Akanawela ngita bheniya bhikibhola utotoho na kutumbuu kubheghe nyumba na nyumba, chi utotoho tu, nambo helahela kibhoho bhitumbukana kwang'enya ajhabhe na kujhingilii mu ilebhe ya bhando bhange na kone bhilonge malobhe ghangapalwa kulonge.
1TI 5:14 Kwa yenio, nipala akanawela ichikana bhatolelwe na akanalome, bhapapa yana na kuilejhemelela nyumba yabhe kupala likoko lino likoto kulonge lijhambu lyanganandela pakate jhino.
1TI 5:15 Nhwalo akanawela bhange bhahobhalile na kunkengama Limbembela.
1TI 5:16 Nambo anda majhe jwanyeketii Kilichitu akwete akanawela munyumba jhake, bheniya bhipalwa kujhemelelwa na chi kulileke nhwigho lilongo lya bhando lilinnyeketii Kilichitu. Kupala lilongo lilinnyeketii kilichitu lihoto kwajhemelela akanawela bhala bhangabhehe na kilebhe chochoha.
1TI 5:17 Ilongoche bhibhajhemele maha bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu, ipalwa atopelwa hake, achwa jhola jwahenga lihengo lya kwatangachii bhando na kwabhola.
1TI 5:18 Nhwalo Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge, “Nkotoka kuntabha nnomo ng'ombi piihuna,” na helahela, “Nhenga lihengo ipalwa alepwa malepo ghake.”
1TI 5:19 Mangapoke jhe litakalilo lya munahota lyangajheketelwa na lilongo lya bhando lilinnyeketii Kilichitu, bhando bhabhele amu bhatato.
1TI 5:20 Bhibhajhendelela kuhenga uhakaho makanikiya pa bhando twe, kupala bhando bhange bhajhoghope.
1TI 5:21 Ninaghalikiya palonge jha Chapanga na palonge jha Kilichitu Yecho na palonge jha akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga, nkoto kuhadabuu kajhombe, mangahaghuu jhe mundo kwa kunnolekeya kumiho.
1TI 5:22 Mangajhomboteka kummeke mundo mabhoko. Nkoto kujhingii mu uhakaho gwa bhando bhange. Ntame kwa kunhalalicha Chapanga.
1TI 5:23 Manganywe mache tu, nambo unywa divaye kandina kunhwalo jha lutumbo lwino, nhwalo gwa ulwalo ghumilwalwa pipipi.
1TI 5:24 Uhakaho gwa bhando bhange ubhonekana hotuhotu, kabula jha kuhadabulwa, bhando bhange uhakaho gwabhe ubhonekana jhe ade pibhahadabulwa.
1TI 5:25 Helahela lihengo lyamaha libhonekana hotuhotu na ata yangabhonekana hotuhotu hele ihoto jhe kukihiya.
1TI 6:1 Akabhanda bhoha bhipalwa bhanyenyekeya akanahota bhabhe kupala bhando bhakoto kuliligha liina lya Chapanga andajhe mabholo ghito.
1TI 6:2 Akabhanda bhubhabhii na akanahota bhabhe bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu bhangapucha jhe akanahota kwa bhikihwananicha ngita Akakilichitu ajhabhe. Nambo bhipalwa kwatumikila maha hake, nhwalo bheniya ndi bhibhajhambulila kuhumii mu mahengo ghabhe, bhibhahobholeka na bhibhapalwa. Yene ndi chimipalwa kubhola na kutangacha malobhe gheniya.
1TI 6:3 Mundo jhojhoha jwaibhola mabholo ghange ghangabhehe tela na ghanga, na jwangajheketela malobhe gha chakaka gha Bhambo gwito Kilichitu Yecho na kutama ngita chapala Chapanga,
1TI 6:4 jwenio atwelii kulokaloka na amanyite jhe kilebhe chochoha. Mundo jwatamii mitaho na bhulo na maligho na kuwachii bhange ghanganandela,
1TI 6:5 na mitaho jhangajhomoka kubhoka kwa bhando bheniya, malango ghabhe ghapoghanike kabhele nabhangabhehe na uchakaka. Bheniya bhihwacha kuntumikii Chapanga ndi ndela jha kichumo cha mbijha.
1TI 6:6 Chakaka kuntumikii Chapanga kummeka mundo abhaha na ulohe, anda ajheketela kubhehe atochike na ilebhe yakwete.
1TI 6:7 Nhwalo tuhikite jhe na kilebhe chochoha pannema pano, hilu natughegha jhe kilebhe chochoha pitujhenda kunane kwa Chapanga.
1TI 6:8 Yene, anda tukwete yakulyegha na ngobho, tupalwa tutocheka kubhehe na yenio.
1TI 6:9 Nambo bhala bhibhapala kubhehe na kichumo ugwegha mu majhighinikilo na mu ntambo gwa tama jha ghanganandela na undindilima ghighapeleka kuhobha na mukomelekelo.
1TI 6:10 Nhwalo kupala hake mbijha ndi kihokola cha mahakaho ghoha. Bhando bhange bhiloke hake kubhehe na mbijha ade kukileka kutale kihobholelo na kuijhocha miojho jhabhe kwa lipyanda kwa ghala ghibhahenga.
1TI 6:11 Nambo mwe, mamundo bha Chapanga, muibhambale ilebhe yenio. Nnyendelela kubhehe mambone palonge jha Chapanga, mtembekeya Chapanga na mme na kihobholelo na mme na upalo na mma naluhimba na mma manuu.
1TI 6:12 Nkachane hake kukomana ngondo jha kihobholelo nkamule ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta, ughome Chapanga gwankemii pala pinnyeketila mabhene kihobholelo chino palonge jha bhando twe bhubhakibha peniya.
1TI 6:13 Ninaghila palonge jha Chapanga jwaipe ughome ilebhe yoha, na palonge jha Kilichitu Yecho jwalongela uchakaka palonge jha Pontiyo Pilatu,
1TI 6:14 nkamule malaghilo ghanga na kughajhokanikiya na ntende kwa kuhobholeka ade lichiko lela lyapala kubhujha Bhambo gwito Kilichitu Yecho.
1TI 6:15 Kubhujha kwakwe Yecho nakuhengeka machiko ghighabhekwitwe na Chapanga, jwenio jwabhii na ung'alicho, jwabhii Kilongoche kanjika ndo, jwenio jwabhii Bhambo jwa Mabhambo.
1TI 6:16 Jwenie kajhika ndo itama machiko ghoha ghangapeta mu lumule lwangahoto kuheghelelwa na mundo. Abhii jhe mundo jwahotwii kummona hilu jwahoto kummona. Ndi jhuna ichima na uhotolo gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta! Amina.
1TI 6:17 Mwalaghalikiye bhando bhubhabhii na kichumo munnema ghongo gwa ngohe, bhangalokajhe, peniya bhaleke kuhobholela ulohe gwangahoto kuyobholeka nambo bhanhobholela Chapanga jwatupeke ghoha kwa umbone tuhangane.
1TI 6:18 Mwalaghalikiye bhahenga ghambone, bhabha na itendwa twe yambone na bhabha bhaumbone na bhajheketela kwabhaghulii bhange ilebhe yabhe.
1TI 6:19 Kwa kuhenga gheniya nakwatangatila kubhehe na kihukilo kibhehe nchinge nganganga na peniya nabhahotola kukipatii ughome gwa chakaka.
1TI 6:20 Mwe ma Timocheyo, mughalolekeye ghala ghoha ghinkamwiwe. Mmambale malobhe ghangabhehe gha Chapanga na ghanganandela na mataungano gha undindilima ndi bhando kwa uwange bhighakema, “Kumanya.”
1TI 6:21 Nhwalo bhando bhange bhakilokita kumanya kwenio kupeta undindilima, na kuhenga yenio bhahobhii kihobholelo. Umbone gwa Chapanga utama na mangota!
2TI 1:1 Ne Napauli natenga jwa Kilichitu Yecho kwa kupala Chapanga. Ndumitwe ndangache ughome gwatulaghila Chapanga mu kulombana na Kilichitu Yecho.
2TI 1:2 Ninnyandikii mwe ma Timocheyo ma mwanango jhunimpahii hake. Ninnyope kwa Chapanga Tate gwito na Kilichitu Yecho Bhambo gwito ampele umbone na kiya na uteeke.
2TI 1:3 Ninchenguu Chapanga jhunintumikila kwa mwojho gwambone ngita chibhatehila akahoko bhango, ninchenguu kila pininkomboka machiko ghoha mu kunnyopa kwango kilo na muhe.
2TI 1:4 Pinikomboka maholi ghino mmi na kilolo hake kummona, kupala ndwele luhangano kumwojho.
2TI 1:5 Ndi punikomboka kihobholelo chino cha uchakaka, kihobholelo chakibhanacho mbujha gwino Loisi na hele majhe gwino Eunike. Manye kubhehe helahela namwe nkwete kihobholelo chenie.
2TI 1:6 Nhwalo gwa gheniya nanikombocha nnyedelele kukihenge lihengo likitoi champii Chapanga machiko ghanimekila mabhoko gwango.
2TI 1:7 Nhwalo Chapanga atupii jhe Uhuke gwake jwatutenda tujhoghope, nambo atupekiye Uhuke jwatupekeye makakala na mapalano na mwojho gwa kukilongocha tabhete.
2TI 1:8 Yene, mangakola jhe hone kwatangachii Bhambo gwito, kabhele mangakola jhe hone nhwalo gwango nenga jhundabhitwe mu kipungo kwa nhwalo gwake. Nambo uhimbilile mu malagho pamonga na nenga kwa nhwalo jha Lilobhe lya Mbone kwa kutangatilwa na makakala gha Chapanga.
2TI 1:9 Chapanga atukombwii, atukemite tutame utamo gwa unyahinyahi, chi nhwalo gwa itendwa hito yambone, nambo ngita chapahii jwenio Chapanga na kwa umbone gwake. Ngatupila umbone gwenio kupete Kilichitu Yecho kabula nnema nakupanganwa jhe.
2TI 1:10 Nambo umbone uyekulilwe hotuhotu kwito ngohe kwa kuhika kwa Nkomboche gwito, ndi Kilichitu Yecho. Jwenie ahangabhine makakala gha kuwegha na kwa ndela jha Lilobhe lya Mbone ngayekwila ndaa ughome gwa machiko ghoha gwangapeta.
2TI 1:11 Chapanga ngahagwila ne mme natenga na mmola kwa nhwalo jwa kwatangachii bhando Lilobhe lya Mbone,
2TI 1:12 gheniya ndi ghighameka naghe ngoheno. Nambo ne nipwele jhe nhwalo chakaka niumanye hotuhotu jhunihobholela, kabhele manye jwenie nambekeya ulonda, ade lichiko lela.
2TI 1:13 Nkamuu mbone mabholo gha uchakaka ghinimmolite ngita kilandanikiho kwino. Nnyendelele mu kihobholelo na mapalano ghabhii mu kulombana na Kilichitu Yecho.
2TI 1:14 Kilebhe chela chamaha mukilonde kwa makakala gha Uhuke gwa Chapanga jwaitama nkate jhito.
2TI 1:15 Ngita chiumanye, bhando bhoha bhubhabhii ku kilambo cha ku Asiya bhannekite, pakate jhabhe abhii Fugelo na Helimogene.
2TI 1:16 Ninnyopa Bhambo aikole kiya nyumba jha Onesifolo, kwa nhwalo akauhanganiche mwojho gwango pipipi. Ngolite jhe hone nhwalo gwa kutabhwa kwango,
2TI 1:17 pahikita tu ku kilambo chuku Loma, ngambaliya hake ade ngatukongina.
2TI 1:18 Ninyopa Bhambo ankole kiya kwa lichiko lela luhadabulo pulupa kuhika! Na mwenga umanye twe ghamaha ghantendii kwenio ku Epecho.
2TI 2:1 Bhahe, mwe ma mwanango Timocheyo, mma na makakala mu umbone ghitupatite mu kulombana na Kilichitu Yecho.
2TI 2:2 Na mabholo ghunyohina nikatangacha palonge jha bhando twe, gheniya mabhola bhando bhibhahobholeka na bheniya bhihoto kwabhola bhando bhange.
2TI 2:3 Mwe nhimbilila malagho pamonga na nenga ngita nkomana ngondo jwaumbone jwa Kilichitu Yecho.
2TI 2:4 Nkomana ngondo jwabhii kungondo ihenga jhe mahengo gha ughome gwa kila lichiko nambo ihenga mahengo gha kungondo, kupala kunhalalicha nkolongwa jwa akakomana ngondo.
2TI 2:5 Helahela kwa mundo jhojhoha jwailongocha pumubhutuka mbelo ihoto jhe kupata hupo jha kubhutuka changakengama malaghalikilo ghighabhekwitwe.
2TI 2:6 Jwalema hake ipalwa atumbula kupata mahuno.
2TI 2:7 Mughabheka umwojho gheniya ghinilonge, nhwalo Bhambo nantenda umanya ghanga ghoha.
2TI 2:8 Munkomboka Kilichitu Yecho, jwayokichwe kuhumii mukuwegha, jwahumi mulukolo lwa Daude, ngita chililonge Lilobhe lya Mbone linitangacha.
2TI 2:9 Kwa nhwalo gwenio ne ning'ahika na ndabhitwe minyololo ngita namwiye. Nambo Lilobhe lya Mbone lya Chapanga litabhwa jhe minyololo.
2TI 2:10 Kwa yenio nihimbilii kila kilebhe ku nhwalo gwa bhando bhibhahaghulilwe na Chapanga, na bheniya hele bhapata ukomboche ghubhii nkate jha Kilichitu Yecho na kuleta ung'alicho gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
2TI 2:11 Lilobhe lende ndi la uchakaka, “Anda tuhwii nako, helahela natutama nako pamonga.
2TI 2:12 Anda tujhendilile kuhimbilila, natulongocha pamonga na jwenio. Anda tunkanite, na jwenio helahela natukana twenga.
2TI 2:13 Anda tuhobholeka jhe, jwenie najhendelela kuhobholeka, nhwalo jwenie ihoto jhe kukolowa.”
2TI 2:14 Bhahe, makombocha bhando bhino mihalo jhenje na kwakelebhuya palonge jha Chapanga bhakotoka kung'aulana kwa malobhe ghanganandela. Mitaho jhene ihalalii jhe, nhwalo kilebhe chenie chahobhecha bhibhajhokanikiya.
2TI 2:15 Nkachane kuhenga ilebhe ihalalii Chapanga, mme maunhenga mahengo mambone jwangaikole hone lihengo lyake na kone abhola telatela malobhe gheniya gha chakaka gwa Chapanga.
2TI 2:16 Mme kutale na mihalo jha undindilima na jhangahalalii Chapanga, nhwalo jhene ujhendelele kwabheka bhando bhabhehe kutale na Chapanga.
2TI 2:17 Mabholo ngita gheniya ghiwanana ngita mabhanga ndela ghangalama lililye yegha. Pakate jha bhando jwabholita ilebhe yenio ndi Humeneyo na Fileto.
2TI 2:18 Bheniya bhailekite kutale ndela jha uchakaka, na ndi bhihangabhana kihobholelo cha bhando bhange kukulonge uyokecho kwa bhando bhoha upetite.
2TI 2:19 Nambo nchinge ghuchengwitwe na Chapanga ujhemite nganganga. Na panane jhake ghajhandikwe ghanga, “Bhambo abhamanya bhando bhake,” na “Kila mundo jwalonge jwenie ndi jwa Bhambo, ndi alekane na uhakaho.”
2TI 2:20 Munyumba ngolongwa ibhii jhe yombo ya madine gha feza na chaabo tugha nambo ibhii yombo ya mikongo na undope henge itopela na yangatopela.
2TI 2:21 Anda mundo akijhelehwiye na kubhehe kutale na yombo yenio yangatopela nabhaha chombu cha kuhenge mahengo gha kanjika, nhwalo akipihite na kutumika na Bhambo na akilenganikiye kuhenga kila lihengo lilibhii lyambone.
2TI 2:22 Mukibhambaye na tama mboho ya ungombo na ntame tela ngita chapala Chapanga, na mme kihobholelo na upalo na uteeke pamonga na bhando bhoha bhibhannyopa Bhambo kwa mwojho gwamaha.
2TI 2:23 Mukibhambaye na mitau jhanganandela na jha umbebhebhe, mabhene umanya kuhenga yenio kwileta bhulo.
2TI 2:24 Ntumiche jwa Bhambo akomana jhe, ipalwa abhaha jwanuu kwa bhando bhoha, jwahoto kubhola na kuhimbilila,
2TI 2:25 jwanuu pakelebhuya bhando bhibhakomana, nhwalo bheniya Chapanga ahoto kwaghalambula na kuuleka uhakaho gwabhe na kuumanya uchakaka.
2TI 2:26 Peniya, malango ghabhe ghabhujhii kabhele, na kupokonyoka muntambo gwa Jwanganandela jwabhajhonjite na kwatenda bhatende chapala jwenio.
2TI 3:1 Nkomboka kubhehe mu machiko gha ghukupehekela ghapakubhehe ndi machiko gha malagho.
2TI 3:2 Bhando nabhakipala bhene, nabhapala mbijha na bhibhakikweya na bhina ngandango nabhannigha Chapanga, na bhangajhokanikiya akatate bhabhe, na bhangaluchenguu na bhangannyinamii Chapanga.
2TI 3:3 Bhando bheniya nabhabha bhanga mapalano na bhangapala kujhelana na bhina uwange na bhahoto jhe kukilongocha na bhina ukale na bhangapala ghambone.
2TI 3:4 Bhando bheniya nabhabha bhibhajhambii bhajhabhe na bhihenga changaholelela na bhibhakiloka na bhibhakipala bhene kuliku kumpala Chapanga.
2TI 3:5 Kwa panja nabhabhonekana ngita bhando bhibhannomba Chapanga, nambo bhikana makakala ghake. Mkibhambahe hake na bhando ngita bheniya.
2TI 3:6 Pakate jha bhando bhange bhijhenda munyumba jha bhando na kwakolowa akakeghe mandindilima bhibhatopilwilwe na mihigho jha uhakaho na bhibhalongochwa na tama mboho jha kila kilebhe.
2TI 3:7 Akakeghe bheniya bhijhigha kukibhola kila lichiko nambo bhihoto jhe kuhikii kuumanya uchakaka.
2TI 3:8 Bhando bheniya bhikana uchakaka ngita Yane na Yambule chibhankanila Mucha. Bheniya ndi bhando bhibhahobhite mu malango ghabhe na bhakanilwe mu ilebhe ya kihobholelo.
2TI 3:9 Nambo nabhahoto ng'o kujhendele hake nhwalo undindilima gwabhe naubhonekana hotuhotu kwa bhando bhoha, ngita chikibha kwa Yane na Yambule.
2TI 3:10 Nambo mwenga ma Timocheyo, maghakengime mabholo ghango na matyangilo ghango na chimbala mu kutama kwango. Na hele mukikengime kihobholelo chango na kuhimbilila kwango na mapalano ghango na kulendele kwango,
2TI 3:11 kubulwa kwango na kulagha kwango. Kabhele mughamanye ghighangolile kwenio ku Antiyokiya na ku Ikonilo na ku Lusita. Ngaimbilila kulagha kwenio kukolongwa muno! Nambo Bhambo ngang'ombwila mugheniya ghoha.
2TI 3:12 Kila mundo jwaipala kutama kwa kunhalalii Chapanga mu kulombana na Kilichitu Yecho nalagha.
2TI 3:13 Bhando bhanganandela na bhibhakoloya nabhajhendelela kubhehe bhanganandela hake, na bhibhakoloya bhange na kongo bhene bhikopokewa.
2TI 3:14 Nambo mwenga nnyendelele kutama mu uchakaka ghola ghumolitwe punyeketila. Nhwalo mamanye bhala bhibhamolita,
2TI 3:15 na nkomboka kuhumii uhwana gwino mughamanye Majhandiko gha Chapanga gheniya ghahotwii kunete malango ghinnongocha mu ughombokeko kwa kuhobholela Kilichitu Yecho.
2TI 3:16 Majhandiko ghoha gha Chapanga ghabhii na Uhuke gwa Chapanga na ghahoto kunyangatii kubhola chakaka na kukelebhuya na kulangii malemo na kwalongocha bhando bhatame maha palonge jha Chapanga,
2TI 3:17 mundo jwantumikii Chapanga abhaha na kila kilebhe chakipala mukuntumikii Chapanga na ahoto kuhenga mahengo ghoha ghambone.
2TI 4:1 Ninaghalikii palonge jha Chapanga na palonge jha Kilichitu Yecho jwapakwahadabuu bhando bhubhabhii ghome na bhubhawile, nhwalo ihika kulongocha abhii Munahota Nkolongwa.
2TI 4:2 Mwatangachila bhando lilobhe lya Chapanga, mpanganike kutangacha kwa kipinde chambone amu kipinde chambone jhe na mwapwatalila na mwakelebhuwe na kwaleke bhando mwojho makabhola kukuhimbilila kwoha.
2TI 4:3 Nalihika lichiko bhando nabhajhokonikiya jhe mabholo gha uchakaka, nambo nabhakengama chibhakipala bhene na kukipalakiya akabhola twe nabhalongolela ghala ghighapala kujhoha mu machikilo ghabhe.
2TI 4:4 Nabhakana kujhokanikiya uchakaka, nabhaighalambukila omo yuwange.
2TI 4:5 Nambo mwenga mukichunge mu kila kilebhe, nhimbalila malagho nhwenge lihengo lya kwatangachii bhando Lilobhe lya Mbone na nnenganikiya maha lihengo lino.
2TI 4:6 Nhwalo nenga mmii pahina na kupiwa ngita litambiko lya kujhakana na kipinde chango chukuwe kibhandikile.
2TI 4:7 Ngomine ngondo maha, nnyomwii mwanja gwango na kihobholelo nikikamulii njelembo.
2TI 4:8 Ngohe nilende kupata ndweko jha kubhehe naumbone palonge jha Chapanga. Bhambo jwahadabula chiipalwa nambela ndweko jhene lichiko lyenie, ne tujhe nambo bhala bhoha bhibhalole kwa kilolo kubhujha kwake.
2TI 4:9 Nkangamale kuhika kwa ne kajhombe.
2TI 4:10 Nhwalo Dema apahi ilebhe ya pannema pano nganekita nu kujhenda ku Tesolonike, ku Kelesike ajhahwii ku Galatiya na Titu ajhahwii ku Dalematiya.
2TI 4:11 Luka tugha ndi jwabhii pamba pamo na nenga. Muntole Maluku uhike nako pamba, kwa nhwalo nahotola kundangatila mu lihengo lyango.
2TI 4:12 Tikiko nintumite ku kilambo chuku Epecho.
2TI 4:13 Pampala kuhika ung'eghela likote lyango linekita kwa Kipulo ku kilambo chuku Tiloya, helahela unnetela itabo, achwa hela itengenichwe kwa limbendela.
2TI 4:14 Jhola punde kuyana Alekichanda andendi ghanganandela twe, Bhambo nannepa kwa ghala ghandendile.
2TI 4:15 Na mwe mukichunge na jwenio nhwalo akakanite lilobhe lito.
2TI 4:16 Pundumbwila kukengelela akibha jhe mundo jwajhemite upande gwango, bhoha ngabhanekita. Chapanga akoto kwabhalangila ulemo gwenio!
2TI 4:17 Nambo Bhambo ngatamita pamonga na nenga, ngambila makakala, ade nganhotwila kwatangachila bhando bhoha, kwa bhando bha ilambo henge bhajhohe, kabhele ngangombolilwa mu luhadabulo lwa kuwe ngita kunkombola munnomo gwa lihimba.
2TI 4:18 Bhambo nang'ombola na ghanganandela ghoha na kumbeleka njelembo ade munahota nkolongwa gwake jwa kunane kwa Chapanga. Ung'alicho ubhaha kwa jwenio kwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta! Amina.
2TI 4:19 Majhambuche Pilichila na Akula, pamonga na bhando bhubhabhii ukajha kwa Onesifolo.
2TI 4:20 Elasito ngahighalika ku Kolintu, na jwenio Tilofimo nganinekita ku Mileto, nhwalo atehila kulwalwa.
2TI 4:21 Nnyombihane kuhika kabula jha kipepo kinahika jhe. Ebulo na Pude na Lino na Kilaudiyo na akalongo bhange bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu bhinnyambucha.
2TI 4:22 Bhambo atame na mwenga. Ninnyope mabhoha umbone gwa Chapanga.
TIT 1:1 Ne Napauli natumiche jwa Chapanga na ntenga jwa Kilichitu Yecho. Nenga aghulilwe na ndumitwe kwalongocha bhando bha Chapanga bhabhehe na kihobholelo na bhaumanye uchakaka na kutama ngita chapala Chapanga,
TIT 1:2 uchakaka gwenio utupela lihobholelo lyakubhehe na ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta. Chapanga jwangalonge uwange ngatulaghila ughome gwenio kabula jha kutumbuu kwa ipinde,
TIT 1:3 kipinde chamaha, ndi ngauyekwila uchakaka mu lilobhe lyake. Na nenga mbatite lilobhe lyenio, ndangache kwa kulaghilwa na Chapanga, Nkomboche gwito.
TIT 1:4 Ninnyandikii mwenga ma Titu, ma mwanango jwa uchakaka mu kihobholelo tubhii pamonga mwenio. Umbone na uteeke kuhumii kwa Chapanga Tate na Yecho Kilichitu, Nkomboche gwito ubhaha pamonga na mwenga.
TIT 1:5 Nikannekite ku Kelete mbata nnyomolele mahengo kwenio na kwahaghuu akanahota ilongoche ya bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu kuhumii mu kila muche. Mighakomboka malaghilo ghango,
TIT 1:6 munahota jwa bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu ipalwa akoto kukokolekewa kwa kilebhe chochoha, jwabhii na mwikeghe jhumo tugha na yana mundo ipalwa ibhaha inhobholela Kilichitu na jwangabhehe na milomo amu ngandango.
TIT 1:7 Nhwalo kilongoche jwa bhando bhibhannnyeketii Kilichitu ndi nnyemelela lihengo lya Chapanga, ipalwa abhaha mundo jwangamalemo. Jwangaloka, jwangabhehe na lilaka kajhombe na jwangalobhela na jwangamilomo na jwangapala mbijha kwa ndela mboho.
TIT 1:8 Nambo ipalwa kubhehe mundo jwabhapoke akaghene mbone na mundo jwapala ghambone. Ipalwa abhaha mundo jwakilongocha jwenio, jwabhii jwaumbone palonge jha Chapanga na jwa nyahinyahi na jwakilongocha.
TIT 1:9 Ipalwa aghakamulikiya pyee mabholo ghakuhobholeka ngita chimolitwa. Peniya ndi nahotola kwangamalicha mwojho bhando bhange kwa mabholo gha chakaka na kughayekula malemwa gha bhando bhala bhibhakana mabholo gheniya.
TIT 1:10 Nhwalo bhabhii bhando bhamahele achwa bhahumii mu dine jha Kiyahude bheniya bhikana kujhokanikiya na bhilonge ghanganandela na bhabhoghine bhando bhange.
TIT 1:11 Bhando bhamba bhipalwa bhakoto kujhangula, nhwalo bhatindighana bhando bhoha munyumba jhoha kwa kwabhola malobhe ghangapalwa kubholwa, bhihenga naha kupala bhapata mbijha.
TIT 1:12 Helahela nnondole jwabhe jhumo, ngalongila, “Akakelete bhilonge uwange machiko ghoha, bhabhii ngita inyama yakujhoghoha, kujhima na kunyela na utotoho!”
TIT 1:13 Na jwenio akalongii hotuhotu, yenio mwalakalila hake, kupala bhajheme nganganga mu kihobholelo.
TIT 1:14 Bhangajhendelela kukengama omo yuwange ya Akayahude amu mabholo ghibhapiya bhando bhibhakana uchakaka.
TIT 1:15 Yene, kila kilebhe chamaha kwa bhando bhibhabhii na mwojho gwamaha palonge jha Chapanga, nambo kibhii jhe kilebhe chamaha kwa bhala bhangahobholela Chapanga, nhwalo uhotolo gwabhe gwa kuhaghuu kuhenga lyambone amu lyanganandela malango ghabhe ghatundangalile.
TIT 1:16 Bhando bheniya bhilonge bhaumanye Chapanga, nambo kwa itendwa yabhe ilangii bhinkana. Bhando bheniya bhanganandela na bhajhokanikii jhe, bhambone jhe kwa lihengo lyolyoha lyambone.
TIT 2:1 Nambo kwa mwenga mipalwa kubhola mabholo gha uchakaka.
TIT 2:2 Malobholela akanalome ighogholo bhatemulana maha ilebhe na bhando bhibhatopela na bhikilongocha bhene, na kubhehe telatela mu kihobholelo cha uchakaka. Bhabha na upalo gwa uchakaka nu uhimbililo gwa uchakaka.
TIT 2:3 Helahela mabhole imbujha bhabhaha na matyangilo ghighanhalalicha Chapanga, bhangabhe bhibhing'wenyana amu bhakoto kulobhela. Nambo bhipalwa kubhola malobhe ghambone palonge jha Chapanga,
TIT 2:4 kwabhola achikabhale bhapale akangana bhabhe na yana yabhe,
TIT 2:5 bhahoto kukilongocha bhene na kuhenga lyambone palonge jha Chapanga, bhajhemelele maha nyumba yabhe bhabhehe bhaumbone na kwajhokanikiya akangana bhabhe, kupala Lilobhe lya Chapanga likoto kupuchwa.
TIT 2:6 Helahela mwaleke mwojho achikangombo bhahoto kukilongocha.
TIT 2:7 Mu ilebhe yoha mipalwa mme nnandanikiho kwa kuhenga ghambone. Mmole kwa uchakaka na mabholo ghino mughakamula mbone.
TIT 2:8 Mmole uchakaka kupala mabholo ghino ghakoto kukanwa na akamakoko bhino bhakola hone, nhwalo kibhii jhe kilebhe chakulonge changanandela panane jhino.
TIT 2:9 Mabhola akabhanda bhipalwa kwajhokanikiya akanahota bhabhe na kwahalalicha mu ilebhe yoha. Bhangataungana nabho jhe,
TIT 2:10 amu kwajhibhila ilebhe yabhe. Nambo bhipalwa kwalangiya kubhehe bhaumbone na kuhobholeka mu mahengo ghabhe ghoha, kupala mabholo gha Chapanga Nkomboche gwito ghalumbililwe na bhando.
TIT 2:11 Nhwalo kwa umbone gwa Chapanga ghuleta ughombokeko kwa bhando bhoha uyekulilwe.
TIT 2:12 Umbone gwenio gwa Chapanga ghututenda tukoto kutama mu utamo gwanganhalalicha Chapanga, na tubhehe bhando bhitikilongocha, tutama mbone na tutame kwa kunhalalicha Chapanga mu nnema ghongo gwa ngohe,
TIT 2:13 kongo tulendelela lichiko lya kuhangana lituhobholela, peniya naupitila ung'alicho gwa Chapanga Nkolongwa na gwa Nkomboche gwito Yecho Kilichitu.
TIT 2:14 Yecho akakipihite jwenio kwa nhwalo gwa kupala atukombole kubhoka mugwanganandela ghoha na kutubheka mu nyahinyahi bhutubhii bhando bhake jwenio, bhando bhibhabhii na kilolo chakuhenga ghambone.
TIT 2:15 Bhahe, mmole mambu gheniya, kwa ukindendeke gwino ghoha na kwaleke mwojho na kwakelebhuya bhando bhibhannyokanikiya. Mundo jhojhoha angampucha jhe.
TIT 3:1 Mwakombocha bhando bhakitembekeya kwa ilongoche na bhando bhibhabhii na ukindendeke, kwajhokanikiya na kulenganikiya kuhenga ghambone.
TIT 3:2 Mwalongolela bhangang'wenya jhe mundo jhojhoha, nambo bhatama kwa uteeke na kupalana, bhawachila bhando bhange na bhabhaha bhanuu kwa bhando bhoha.
TIT 3:3 Nhwalo makacho twenga tukibha jhe na malango, bhina lighoho na twanganandela. Tukibha akabhanda bha tama mbajha na kupala kila kilebhe. Tutamita mubhoho na wiho na bhando ngabhatuchimwita na twabhete helahela ngatuchimwina.
TIT 3:4 Nambo umbone na upalo gwa Chapanga, Nkomboche gwito puyekulilwa kwito,
TIT 3:5 ngatughombwila twenga chi kwa kilebhe chambone chituteila, nambo nhwalo akatukolii kiya. Kwa ndela jha Uhuke gwa Chapanga jwatutenda tubhelekwe uhyono na kutupe ughome nhyono kwa kutugholola kwa mache.
TIT 3:6 Chapanga ngatupila Uhuke gwa Chapanga lombilombi kwa ndela jha Yecho Kilichitu, Nkomboche gwito,
TIT 3:7 kupala kwa umbone gwake tujheketilwe palonge jha Chapanga kubhehe twaumbone kwa kutupeke ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta ghutuhobholela.
TIT 3:8 Kilebhe chinilongela ndi uchakaka. Mbala nnongele kilebhe chenje kwa makakala bhala bhibhahobholela Chapanga bhabha na kilolo machiko ghoha kuhenga ghambone. Ilebhe yenio maha na ghatangatii bhando.
TIT 3:9 Nambo mibhambale mitaho jha undindilima na omo ya mahina gha akahoko kutaungana kwa nhwalo gwa Lilaghalikilo. Ilebhe yenio kibhii jhe chukujhambulila na kitangatii jhe mundo.
TIT 3:10 Mundo jwaileta mpechengano mukelebhuwa patumbula na mala jhuubhele, na kubhoke peniya muneke.
TIT 3:11 Umanye kubhehe mundo ngita jwenio atei kubhoghanwa na uhakaho gwake ulangii abhii na malemo.
TIT 3:12 Pinituma kwino mwenga Atemii amu Tikiko, nkachane kuhika kwa nenga kongo ku kilambo cha Nikapole, nhwalo amwii kutama kwenio machiko gha kipupwe.
TIT 3:13 Nghaghe kuntangatila Zena mundo jwalimanyii lilaghalikilo na Apolu kupala bhahotolo kutumbula mwanja gwabhe na nnole kila kilebhe bhakwete.
TIT 3:14 Bhando bhito bhipalwa bhakibhole kila kipinde kuhenga ghambone kupala kwatangatii bhando bhibhapalwa kutangatilwa, na kutama kwino kukoto kubhonekana kwanganandela.
TIT 3:15 Bhando bhoha bhibhabhii pamo na nenga bhinyambucha. Mwajhambuche bhando bhibhannyeketii Yecho. Mabhoha ninnyope umbone gwa Chapanga.
PHM 1:1 Ne Napauli, napungwa ku nhwalo gwa kunhenge Kilichitu Yecho. Mmii pamba pamonga na nnongo gwito Timocheyo. Tunnyandikii mwe makoche bhito ma Filimone, nhenga lihengo nnyito,
PHM 1:2 na lilongo lya bhando lilinyeketii Kilichitu lilikongina kajhino na mwenga nnombo gwito Afiya na kwa nkomana ngondo nnyito Alukipo.
PHM 1:3 Ninyope umbone nu uteeke kuhumii kwa Chapanga Tate gwito na Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu.
PHM 1:4 Machiko ghoha puninnyopa Chapanga ninkomboka mwe ma Filimone nu kunchenguu Chapanga gwango,
PHM 1:5 nhwalo nnyohine chimuhobholela Bhambo Yecho na chimapala bhando bha Chapanga bhoha.
PHM 1:6 Ninnyope kwa Chapanga kupala kihobholelo chino chenie chimihenga pamonga na twenga kwa Chapanga, kijhingii nkate hake na nhoto kubhehe na uhotolo gwa kumanya hake na mota yoha itupata kwa kulombana na Kilichitu.
PHM 1:7 Nnongo gwango, lipalano lino linhalalii hake na linneki mwojho! Mwenga mihanganiche miojho jha bhando bhoha bha Chapanga.
PHM 1:8 Ku nhwalo gwenio, na nenga nalongo gwino kwa kulombana na Kilichitu, ngahotwi kunnaghalikiya changajhoghopa nhenge chimipala kuhenga.
PHM 1:9 Nambo nhwalo nimpala, mbaha ninnyope, ndenda naha ihoto kubhehe ne Pauli ng'oime, na ngohe napungwa ku nhwalo gwa kunhenge Kilichitu Yecho.
PHM 1:10 Yenie ninnyopa muntangatile Onechimo, jwakibha mwanango kwa kulombona na Kilichitu putukibha mu kipungo.
PHM 1:11 Makacho akibha kilebhenacho, nambo ngohe abhii na lihengo kwa nenga na kwino mwenga hele.
PHM 1:12 Ngohe nimujhicha kabhele kwino, jwenio ngita mwojho gwango.
PHM 1:13 Nikapahi atame na nenga, antendele lihengo lende lyu kuntangatii mwe kone mmii mombo mu kipungo, ku nhwalo gwa kwatangachii bhando Lilobhe lya Mbone.
PHM 1:14 Nambo mbahijhe kunchokolekeya undangatile, nambo nipala nhenge chimipala, yenio nihenga jhe chochoha ade mabhene nnyeketele.
PHM 1:15 Pange Onechimo natama na mwenga kwa machiko ghandina tugha, abhujha kabhele kwino ntame nako machiko ghoha.
PHM 1:16 Ngohe jwenio mmanda kabhe jhe, nambo jwenio jwaumbone kuliku mmanda, jwenio ngohe nnongo gwito mu kulombana na Kilichitu. Ambahi nenga na impala mwenga hake, nhwalo jwenio ngita nnyito na nnongo mu kulombana na Bhambo.
PHM 1:17 Bhahe, anda umona ne kubhehe nalongo bhino ku kulombana na Bhambo, mumpokela Onechimo ngita hela ngaumbokii nenga.
PHM 1:18 Anda antendi chochoha changanandela, amu abhii na lighambo kwino, nanepa nenga.
PHM 1:19 Ne Pauli nijhandika namwete kwa lubhoko lwango, naninepa! Mbaijhe nikomboche unnepe ughome gwino.
PHM 1:20 Bhahe, nnongo gwango, undendela yenio ku kundangatii nenga ku nhwalo gwa Bhambo, ngohe mwe malongo bhango mu kulombana na Kilichitu muhanganiche mwojho gwango.
PHM 1:21 Nhwalo chakaka ninhobholela, ninnyandikii ghanga, manye nanhenga kupeta ghanga ghuninnobholile.
PHM 1:22 Pamonga na gheniya, unenganikiye chumbi chukugholoka nhwalo ghu kujhopa kwino ninhobholela Chapanga najhangula, na nenga nanintyangila kwenio.
PHM 1:23 Epafula, mpungwa nnyango ku nhwalo gwa kunhenge Kilichitu Yecho, innyambucha.
PHM 1:24 Helahela akahenga mahengo bhajhango Maluku na Alichitako na Dema na Luka, na bhene bhinnyambucha.
PHM 1:25 Umbone gwa Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu utame pamonga umiojho jhino.
HEB 1:1 Makcho, Chapanga akalongii na akahoko bhito mala twe na kwa ndela twe kupete milondole bhake,
HEB 1:2 nambo machiko ghanga gha kupehekeya ghano, alonge na twenga kwa ndela jha Mwana gwake. Kupete jwenio Kilichitu, Chapanga ngapangine kunane na nnema na ngahagwila kupala ilebhe yoha ibhehe yakwe.
HEB 1:3 Jwenio ndi lung'alo lwa ung'alicho gwa Chapanga, na nnandanikiho telatela na Chapanga, aukamwii pamonga nnema kwa lilobhe lyake lilibhii na makakala. Pajhomolila kujhelebhula uhakaho, atamite kunane kwa Chapanga, lubhoko lwalelo lwa Ukolo kwenio kunane.
HEB 1:4 Mwana ndi nkolongwa kuliku akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga, ngita hela liina lyatinitwe na Chapanga ndi likolongwa kupeta maina ghabhe.
HEB 1:5 Nhwalo Chapanga akannobholii jhe hilu jhumo jwa akatumiche bhake, “Mwenga ndi ma Mwanango, ne deleno nonge kubhehe ndi Tate gwino.” Kabhele Chapanga alongii jhe kwa ntumiche jwa kunane jhojhoha, “Ne pamba namma Tate mundo, na jwenio namma ma Mwanango.”
HEB 1:6 Nambo Chapanga pantumita Mwana mundo, jwalongolile kubhelukwa pannema, akalongii, “Akatumiche bhoha bha Chapanga bhannyinamile.”
HEB 1:7 Kwa akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga ngalongila, “Chapanga akatehi akatumiche bhake kubhehe upepo, na akatumiche bhake akabhatehi kubhehe ndetelekena ya mwotu.”
HEB 1:8 Nambo kwa Mwana mundo: Chapanga ngalongila, “Unahota gwino nkolongwa, mwe ma Chapanga utamikii machiko ghoha ghangapeta! Mwe ndi bhilongocha bhando changalola kumiho.
HEB 1:9 Mwe mighapala ghighanhalalii Chapanga na mighachimwa ghanganandela. Yene ndi nhwalo Chapanga, jwabhii Chapanga gwino, ngahagwila, antehi nchoche kuhangana, kuliku chabhatendi bhajhino.”
HEB 1:10 Na kabhele Chapanga ngalongila: “Bhambo, mwenga peniya mukatumbwile kupangana nnema, kwa mabhoko ghino mukapangine kunane.
HEB 1:11 Yene naipeta, nambo mwe nauhighilika machiko ghoha ghangapeta, yoha naitundangalila ngita ngobho.
HEB 1:12 Naibhilingwabhilingwa ngita ngholole, na yenio naighalambulwa ngita ngobho. Nambo mwe ndi nauhughilika hele machiko ghoha ghangapeta, na ughome gwino naupehekejhe.”
HEB 1:13 Chapanga akannongali ng'o hilu jhumo jwa ntumiche jwake: “Ntame lubhoko lwango lwalelo, ade nabheke akamakoko bhino, pahe jha magholo ghino.”
HEB 1:14 Ngohe akahenga mahengo bha kunane kwa Chapanga ndi kina ghane? Bheniya ndi uhuke ihengela Chapanga na bhatumitwe na jwenio kwatangatii bhando bhala bhibhapa kupoke ughombokoka.
HEB 2:1 Ngohe tupalwa kughachokolekeya ghoha ghutujhohine, ghakoto kutupeta.
HEB 2:2 Lilobhe lela libhapilwa akahoko bhito na akatumiche lilongilwe kubhehe ndi lya uchakaka njwe, mundo jhojhoha jwangakengama amu kujhokanikiya, nahadabulwa ngita chiipalwa.
HEB 2:3 Bhahe, ngohe twenga natughombokoka bho, anda tuhenge jhe lihengo lya ughombokeko nkolongwa ngita ghongo? Pakutumbula Bhambo jwenio akatangiche ughombokeko ghongo.
HEB 2:4 Helahela Chapanga jwenie akakilangiye kwa bhando bhala bhibhakajhohine palangiya kubhehe ndi chakaka kwa kuhenga ikangacho na nginyililo, na kwapela bhando itoi ya Uhuke gwa Chapanga ngita chaipala jwenio.
HEB 2:5 Chapanga akabhabhekitii jhe akatumiche bha kunane kulongocha munnema ghuhika, nnema gwenio ndi ngohe ghutulongela malobhe ghake.
HEB 2:6 Nambo Majhandiko gha Chapanga pange ghilonge, “Mundo ndi kilebhe ghane, ata munhwachii? Mwana gwa mundo ndi kilebhe ghane ade mupwelele?
HEB 2:7 Mukantehi kubhehe mundo jwandina tugha kubhehe pahe jha akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga, mukahwaliche hingo jha ung'alicho na ichima,
HEB 2:8 mukantehi kubhehe kilongoche jwa ilebhe yoha.” Ilongelwa Chapanga ajhakummeka mundo kubhehe kilongoche jwa ilebhe yoha, yane changakuleka hilu chimo. Yene, tulola jhe ilongocha ilebhe yoha ngohe.
