HEB 2:9 Nambo tummona Yecho jwateilwe kubhehe nchokombe kupeta akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga kwa kipinde kichokombe, kwa umbone gwa Chapanga kwito, Yecho ngawila kwa nhwalo gwa bhando bhoha, ngohe tummona bhawaliche hingo jha ung'alicho na ichima nhwalo gwa kulagha kwake ade kuwegha.
HEB 2:10 Ikibha tela Chapanga, jwapangana na jwakamulila ilebhe yoha, antende Yecho kubhehe yenio chabhile kwa ndela jha malagho, ndi kwaleta yana twe mu ung'alicho gwake. Nhwalo Yecho ndi jwabhalongocha mu ughombokeko.
HEB 2:11 Yecho abhajhelebhula bhando mu uhakaho gwabhe, jwenio pamonga na bhala bhibhajhelewike, bhoha bhakwete Tate jhumo. Ndi nhwalo Yecho akola jhe hone kwakema yana yenio, akalongo bhake,
HEB 2:12 akalongii na Chapanga: “Nanachimulila akalongo bhango itendwa hino. Naninnyembela mihambo jha kunnomba pakate jha lilongo lyabhe.”
HEB 2:13 Ilonge kabhele: “Nanimmekela Chapanga lihobholelo lyango.” Na kabhele ilonge: “Ne mii pamba pamonga na yana yambekiye Chapanga.”
HEB 2:14 Ngohe nhwalo yana yenio ibhii na yegha na miyahe ngita akatate bhabhe, Yecho jwenie hele akibha ngita bheniya na akakilombite na umundo gwabhe. Ateila yenio kupala kwa ndela ya kuwe kwake, ankomelekeye Jwanganandela jwabhii na makakala gha mukuwegha,
HEB 2:15 na yenio abhalekekeye bhala bhubhakibha akabhanda muiholo ya kuwe na bhabha muughome gwabhe gwoha.
HEB 2:16 Chakaka Yecho akahikite jhe nhwalo jwa kwatangatii akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga, nambo akahikite kuitangatii ibhelukwa ya Ulahimo.
HEB 2:17 Ndi mana apalitwa kulandana na akalongo mundo kwa ilebhe yoha, kupala abha Mpiya litambiko Nkolongwa gwabhe jwahobholeka na jhuna kiya mu kunhenge Chapanga, kupala kujhelanicha na uhakaho gwa bhando.
HEB 2:18 Nhwalo jwenio akang'ahichwe pala pajhighanikiwa, ihoto kwatangatila bhala bhibhajhighanikilwa.
HEB 3:1 Makalongo bhango, bhando bha Chapanga nkemitwe na Chapanga, nhwachile panane jha Yecho ntenga na Mpiya Litambiko Nkolongwa jwa kihobholelo chitutangacha pakongoloho.
HEB 3:2 Jwenio ndi akibha jhuna kuhobholeka na Chapanga jwanhagwile kuhenga lihengo lyake ngita Mucha chakibha anhobholika kwahengela bhando bhoha bha ku Ichilahele bhubhakemitwa nyumba yoha ya Chapanga.
HEB 3:3 Jwachenga ilombwa kupeta nkolo nyumba, ngohe Yecho ilombwa kuliku Mucha.
HEB 3:4 Nyumba ichengwa na mundo, nambo Chapanga ndi nchenga jwa ilebhe yoha.
HEB 3:5 Mucha akibha ahobholika munyumba jhoha jha Bhambo ngita ntumiche, na akalongii mambu ghala Chapanga ngalongila palongoloho.
HEB 3:6 Nambo Kilichitu ndi jwa kuhobholela ngita Mwana jwajhemelela nyumba jha Chapanga. Twenga twabhete ndi nyumba jhake anda natujhendelela kubhehe nganganga hake na kukihobholela mu chela chitulokela.
HEB 3:7 Kwa yenio, bhahe, ngita chalonge Uhuke gwa Chapanga, “Anda nnyokweniokiye lilobhe lya Chapanga deleno,
HEB 3:8 Nkoto kujhundupa miojho jhino, ngita chibhahengita akahoko bhino pibhakanita kunnyokonikiya, machiko ghala pininnyighita kola kunjenga.
HEB 3:9 Kwenio akahoko bhino bhajhakunnyigha na kunningukiya, bhakalolite mahengo ghango ghihengita kwa yaka makome ncheche!
HEB 3:10 Kwa nhwalo gwenio nganayomila bhando bheniya nganongila. Machiko ghoha kibheluko chela kihobholela, na kimanya jhe kihobhalile, na bhaimanye jhe ndela jhango.
HEB 3:11 Bhahe, nganapila kwa lilaka nganongila: ‘Nabhajhingila ng'o chehemo jhango jha kupomolela.’ ”
HEB 3:12 Ngohe akalongo bhango, mu kichunge akoto kubhehe mundo jhojhoha pakate jhino jhuna mwojho mmoho na jwangahobholela na kubhehe kutale na Chapanga jwabhii ghome.
HEB 3:13 Anda yenio, “Deleno,” chighalonge Majhandiko ghitupala twenga, tupalwa kutangatilana machiko ghoha, angapitii jhe mundo pakate jhino jwakunkolowa na uhakaho na kubhehe jhuna ngandango.
HEB 3:14 Nhwalo twenga twabhoha tubhii pamonga mu kulombana na Kilichitu, natukamulila kwa makakala lihobholelo lito litupokila pilitumbwila.
HEB 3:15 Majhandiko ghilonge naha: “Anda nnyohine deleno lilobhe lya Chapanga, nkoto kuitenda miojho jhino kujhundupa, ngita chibhahengita akahoko bhino pibhankanita Chapanga.”
HEB 3:16 Ndi akina ghane bhubhajhohina lilobhe lya Chapanga na kulikana? Bho, chi bhala bhoha bhibhalongichwa na Mucha kuhumii ku Michile?
HEB 3:17 Bho, akina ghane Chapanga kwakole lilaka kwa yaka makome ncheche? Akakolii lilaka bhala bhubhatehila uhakaho, malelo ghabhe ghakapechingine kunjenga kola.
HEB 3:18 Bho, Chapanga palapila: “Nabhajhingila ng'o chehemo jhene jha kupomolela jhango,” akibha abhalongila akina ghane? Abhalongila bhala bhubhakanita kunnyokonikiya.
HEB 3:19 Ngohe, tulola bhakahotwii jhe kujhingii kwenio nhwalo bhakajheketii jhe.
HEB 4:1 Kwa nhwalo lilaghilo lyu kujhingii chehemo jhake jha kupomolela lyamela, na tukilolokeye mundo jhojhoha akotokulepela kujhingii chehemo jhene jha kupomolela.
HEB 4:2 Nhwalo Lilobhe lya Mbone litangichwa kwito ngita chilitangichwa kwa bheniya bhando bha makacho. Nambo lilobhe lyenio lyakatangatii jhe kilebhe, nhwalo bhakajhohine nambo bhakaupokii jhe kwa kihobholelo.
HEB 4:3 Bhahe, twenga bhituhobholile natujhingila chehemo jhene jha pa kupomolela ngita chalaghila Chapanga: “Nakayomite na nganalapila, ‘Nabhajhingila ng'o chehemo jhango jha kupomolela.’ ” Chapanga alongila gheniya pamonga na kubhehe lihengo lyake lya kupanganwa nnema lijhomwike.
HEB 4:4 Nhwalo Majhandiko gha Chapanga pange ghilonge lilobhe lya lichiko lya chaba: “Chapanga akapomolile lichiko lya chaba, akaghalekite mahengo ghake ghoha.”
HEB 4:5 Kabhele lijhambu lende lilongelwa hele: “Nabhajhingila ng'o chehemo jhango jha kupomolela.”
HEB 4:6 Yene, lilaghilo lya kupomolela lyamela libhile, na bhando bhala bhibhatangichilwe Lilobhe lya Mbone kuhumii makacho bhakajhii ng'o mwonio nhwalo gwangajhokanikiya.
HEB 4:7 Chapanga akabhekite lichiko lenge lilikemitwa, “Deleno.” Yaka twe ipetite akalongii kupete kwa Daude ngita Majhandiko gha Chapanga chighalonge: “Anda deleno nnyohine lilobhe lya Chapanga, nkoto kubhehe na mwojho gwa kujhundupa.”
HEB 4:8 Anda Yochuwa ngabhatenda bhando bhapomolele ngita chalongila Chapanga, Chapanga ngalongiijhe lilobhe lya lichiko lenge.
HEB 4:9 Kwa yenio, kupomolela kwa bhando bha Chapanga kwamela kubhile ngita Chapanga chapomolila lichiko lya chaba.
HEB 4:10 Nhwalo mundo jhojhoha jwajhingii chehemo jha kupomolela ngita chalaghila Chapanga, jwenio naleka lihengo lyake na kupomolela ngita Chapanga chalekita lihengo lyake nu kupomolela.
HEB 4:11 Ngohe tukangamale kujhingii chehemo jhenio jha kupomolela, ndi akoto kubhehe mundo jhojhoha pakate jhito jwapala kugwegha kwa kukana kujhokanikiya ngita chibhatehila bheniya.
HEB 4:12 Lilobhe lya Chapanga ndi ghome na libhii na makakala, litema kuliku kihembe chikitema kone na kone. Peniya kitema ade puukongana mwojho na uhuke ngita kihembe chikitema ade nkate ya ihungo ya yegha na uhombeombe. Na lilobhe lyenio uwacha na chiipala miojho jha bhando.
HEB 4:13 Kibhii jhe kilebhe chochoha chikihihitwe palonge jha Chapanga, kila kilebhe kiyekulilwe hotuhotu palonge jha miho ghake, tupala tunnobholele mahengo ghito.
HEB 4:14 Tubhii na Yecho, Mwana gwa Chapanga ndi Mpiya litambiko Nkolo jwajhingii ade kunane kwa Chapanga, yenio tujhemelele nganganga kwa kihobholelo jhitukengama.
HEB 4:15 Mpiya litambiko gwito Nkolo atubhone kiya muleghele gwito, nhwalo jwenio akajhighanikilwe kwa kila kilebhe ngita twenga nambo ateijhe uhakaho.
HEB 4:16 Ngohe tukijhendele kigoda cha unahota nkolongwa gwa Chapanga jhuna umbone changabhoghohe, tupokele kiya na umbone na kitutangatila mu kipinde chitupala.
HEB 5:1 Kila mpiya litambiko Nkolongwa jhojhoha uhaghulilwa na Chapanga kuhumii pakate jha bhando bhake na uhenga lihengo lya Chapanga kwa nhwalo gwabhe. Upiya hupo na matambiko kwa nhwalo gwa uhakaho gwa bhando.
HEB 5:2 Nhwalo jwenio ndi jwaleghele, ihoto kwakole kiya bhala bhangamanya kilebhe na bhibhahobholela na bhibhahenga uhakaho.
HEB 5:3 Na nhwalo jwenio ndi leghele, ipalwa kupiya Litambiko chi kwa nhwalo gwa bhando, nambo hele kwa uhakaho gwake jwenio.
HEB 5:4 Abhii jhe mundo jwahotola kukitenda jwenio abhabha Mpiya litambiko Nkolongwa. Kila jhumo ihaghulilwa na Chapanga kubhehe mpiya litambiko Nkolongwa ngita chakibha Halune.
HEB 5:5 Jwenio Kilichitu, helahela akakitehi jwenio kubhehe Mpiya litambiko Nkolongwa, nambo Chapanga nganobholila: “Mwenga ndi ma Mwanango, deleno jheno nilonge bhando bhoha bhamanye ne na Tate gwino.”
HEB 5:6 Helahela chehemo jhenge jha majhandiko ilonge, “Mwenga ndi mpiya litambiko nkolongwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta, ngita chakibha Melikichedeki.”
HEB 5:7 Yecho patamita pamba pannema, ampembikiya na kunelela hake Chapanga kwa maholi chwii, jwahoto kughombola kubhoka mu kuwegha. Nhwalo akibha jwanuu na kunnyoghopa Chapanga, yenio ngannyinamila Chapanga.
HEB 5:8 Pamonga na kubhehe Mwana gwa Chapanga, akakibholite kujhokanikiya kupete malagho ghake.
HEB 5:9 Na pateilwa kubhehe ajhomwila lihengo lyakamwiwe na Chapanga, ajhakubhehe chembo cha ughombokeko gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta kwa bhala bhibhannyokanikiya,
HEB 5:10 na Chapanga ngahagwila kubhehe Mpiya litambiko Nkolongwa ngita chakibha Melikichedeki.
HEB 5:11 Peniya, Tukwete twe gha kulonge mambu ghanga, nambo ndi unonopu kwalobholela, nhwalo mangota ndi akatotoho bha kukibhola.
HEB 5:12 Ngohe mipalwa kubhehe akabhola, nambo mangota mipala kabhele mundo ammola mabholo ghakutumbuu gha lilobhe lya Chapanga. Ngohe nhengelike mwojho mipala kujhonga na chi chakulyegha kijhundupaho.
HEB 5:13 Kila jwapalwa kujhonga mabhele ahoto jhe kuholela ghighanhalalii Chapanga, nhwalo jwenio amela mwana jwandina ko.
HEB 5:14 Nambo chakulya kijhundupaho kwa nhwalo gwa bhando bhibhakomile, bhubhabhii na malango ghu kumanya ghambone na ghanganandela.
HEB 6:1 Bhahe, tughaleke unyuma mabholo ghakutumbula gha Kilichitu, tujhendelele kulongela kwa mabholo ghighakomii, chi kujhendelela kubheka nchinge gwa kulekana na mahengo ghanganandela na kwa kunnyeketela Chapanga,
HEB 6:2 mabholo gha ubaticho na kubhekelwa mabhoko, kuyokechwa ku bhubhawile na luhadabulo lwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
HEB 6:3 Natuhenga yenio anda apahi Chapanga.
HEB 6:4 Nhwalo bhando bhubhayekulilwe uchakaka gwa Chapanga na kupaha hupo jha kunane na kulombana na Uhuke gwa Chapanga,
HEB 6:5 na kupaha umbone gwa Lilobhe lya Chapanga na makakala gha machiko ghoha ghighahika,
HEB 6:6 peniya, bhakilekite kihobholelo chabhe, bhahoto jhe kujheketele uhakaho gwabhe kabhele na kuuleka. Bheniya bhimmamba kabhele Mwana gwa Chapanga muchalaba nu kumpe hone palonge jha bhando.
HEB 6:7 Nghonda ghupoke hula machiko ghoha na umelecha mimeya kwa kichumo kwa jwailema ibhii na mota kwa Chapanga.
HEB 6:8 Nambo nn'gonda anda umelite mikongo jha mibha na maghogho, kibhii jhe chakujhambulila, libhii pahina kulapilwa na Chapanga na kujhomolela kwake ndi kujhochwa mwotu.
HEB 6:9 Nambo akakoche bhango, pamonga na kulonge naha, tubhii na kilebhe cha uchakaka mu chenie ndi ughombokeko.
HEB 6:10 Machiko ghoha Chapanga ihadabuu mbone, jwenio najhewa jhe lihengo lino na upalo gwino ghunangii kwa jwenio kwatangatii bhando bhake na ngohe chimujhendelela kwatangatila.
HEB 6:11 Twenga tupala kila mundo pakate jhino alangiye ukangamalo ade pakujhomolela, kupala lihobholelo lino libhehe chakaka.
HEB 6:12 Tupala jhe mangota mme akatotoho, nambo mme ngita bhala bhubhajheketile na bhubhabhii na luhimba, peniya, nabhapokela ghala ghalaghii Chapanga.
HEB 6:13 Chapanga pampila Ulahimo lilaghilo, akalapii kwa liina lyake jwenio, nhwalo abhii jhe nkolongwa kuliku Chapanga kwa jwenio ngahotwi kukilapi.
HEB 6:14 Chapanga akalongii: “Chakaka nanimpela mota na kumpela ibheluko mbwe.”
HEB 6:15 Ulahimo akalendelile kwa kuhimbilila, na peniya, akapokii chela chalaghilwa na Chapanga.
HEB 6:16 Bhando pibhilapa, bhilapa kwa jhola jwabhii nkolongwa kuliku bhene, na kukilapa kulangii kubhehe chela chikilongilwe ndi uchakaka, na kukilapa kujhomo mataungano ghoha.
HEB 6:17 Na jwenio Chapanga akangamalicha lilaghano lyake kwa kulapila, kwa kutenda yenio abhalangii bhala bhabhalaghii naghalambu jhe chela chakipala.
HEB 6:18 Bhahe, ibhii ilebhe ibhele. Lilaghilo na kilapo, yenio ihoto jhe kughalambuka hilu Chapanga ihotojhe kulonge uwange. Ngohe twenga bhitubhutukile chehemo jha njelembo tulekwe mwojho gwa kukamulila njwe lihobholelo lilibhekitwe palonge jhito.
HEB 6:19 Tukwete lihobholelo lende ngita nanga jha ughome gwito. Lihobholelo lyenio lijhemite nganganga na libhii mbone lijhingii ade nkate jha panjiya na ade chehemo jha nyahinyahi kunane kwa Chapanga.
HEB 6:20 Yecho jwenio alongolile kujhingii mwenio kwa nhwalo gwito na abhile Mpiya litambiko Nkolongwa jwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta kwa nnandanikiho gwa Melikichedeki.
HEB 7:1 Jhonjo Melikichedeki akibha munahota nkolongwa jwa ku Chelemu na mpiya litambiko jwa Chapanga jwabhii Nkolongwa hake. Ulahimo pakelewika kuhumii kungondo kwenio akabhakomite akanahota akakolongwa, Melikichedeki akakonganike nako nu kumpeke mota,
HEB 7:2 na jwenio Ulahimo akampehi lipungu lya kome lya ilebhe yoha jwabhii nayo, nhwalo jha kutumbula kwa liina lya Melikicheki ndi “Munahota nkolongwa jwaumbone palonge jha Chapanga,” na helahela jwenio akibha munahota nkolongwa jwa ku Chelemu, mana jhake ndi, “Munahota nkolongwa jwa uteeke.”
HEB 7:3 Akibha akwete jhe tate hilu majhe na akibha jhe na lukolo, ahwii ligha, akibha jhe mundo jwamanyita abhelwikwe ligha. Ihwanana na Mwana gwa Chapanga, na ijhendelela kubhehe Mpiya litambiko machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
HEB 7:4 Ngohe mnolokeye mundo jhonjo chabhii nkolongwa. Hoko gwito Ulahimo akampeki lipungu lya kome lya ilebhe yoha yapokita kungondo.
HEB 7:5 Na lola lukolo lwa Lawe lulukibha akapiya matambiko lulaghalikilwe na lilaghalikilo lya Mucha bhapokele lipungu lya kome lya ilebhe kuhumii kwa bhando akalongo bhabhe Akaichilahele, pamo na kubhehe kibheluko cha Ulahimo.
HEB 7:6 Melikichedeki ahumi jhe mu lukolo lwa Lawe, nambo akapokii lipungu lya kome kuhumii kwa Ulahimo, peniya ajhakumpeke mota jwenio jwapokii lilaghano lya Chapanga.
HEB 7:7 Ibhii jhe mbwelelo kubhehe jwandina ndi jwapekewa mota na nkolongwa.
HEB 7:8 Kabhele, bheniya akapiya matambiko bhibhapoke lipungu lya kome, ndi bhando bhibhahwegha, nambo pamba jwapokela lipungu lya kome Melikichedeki, jwalongelwa jwabhii ghome ngita chighalonge Majhandiko gha Chapanga.
HEB 7:9 Bhahe, tuhoto kulonge, Ulahimo pabhohita lipungu lya kome lya ilebhe yake, Lawe helahela kibhelukwa chake kipokela lipungu lya kome apihita lipungu lya kome hele kupete jwenio.
HEB 7:10 Melikichedeki pakonganika na Ulahimo, Lawe akibha abhelwikiijhe, akibha amela nkate jha mu yegha jha tate mundo Ulahimo.
HEB 7:11 Anda uchakaka ngaubhehe upatikana kwa ndela jha Upiya litambiko lya Akalawe, kwa nchinge gwenio kwa bhando, nhwalo gwa nike ngohe apalwa ahike mpiya litambiko jhonge, kwa nnandanikilo gwa Melikichedeki na chi kwa nnandanikilo gwa Halune?
HEB 7:12 Anda upiya litambiko ughalambwike, na lilaghalikilo lipalwa hele lighalambuke.
HEB 7:13 Na jwenio Bhambo gwito jwalongelwa malobhe ghake, ahumi mu likabila lenge, na abhii jhe mundo jwa lukolo lono jwatumikila pa kachangwale pakupihikiya katambiko.
HEB 7:14 Kwa mana tumanye chakaka kubhehe jwenio ahumii mu likabila lya Yuda, na Mucha akalongii jhe kilebhe kwa lukolo lundo kwa malobhe gha upiya matambiko.
HEB 7:15 Kabhele lijhambu lende libhii mbegha hake kunhwalo mpiya litambiko jhonge jwalandine na Melikichedeki apitile.
HEB 7:16 Jwenie akatehi jhe kubhehe mpiya litambiko kwa lilaghalikilo lya bhando, nambo akatei kubhehe mpiya litambiko kwa likakala lya ughome gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
HEB 7:17 Nhwalo Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge, “Mwe ndi mapiya litambiko bha machiko ghoha kwa nnandanikiho gwa Melikichedeki.”
HEB 7:18 Bhahe, lilaghalikilo lela lya makacho likabhekitwe paupele nhwalo ikibha leghele na kilebhe nacho.
HEB 7:19 Nhwalo lilaghalikilo lya Mucha likahotwii jhe kulenganikiya kilebhe chochoha. Nambo ngohe, tupatite lihobholelo lyambone, na kupete lihobholelo lyenio tuhoto kunheghelela Chapanga.
HEB 7:20 Bhahe, pamba Chapanga akakilapi. Nambo bhala bhange bhibhateilwa kubhehe akapiya matambiko Chapanga akalapii jhe.
HEB 7:21 Nambo Yecho akibha mpiya litambiko kupete kukilapi pala Chapanga pannobholila: “Bhambo akalapile, naghalambula ndeka chela chakipala: ‘Mwenga ndi mpiya litambiko gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.’ ”
HEB 7:22 Bhahe, kwa kulapila kwenio, Yecho ajhakubhehe nnyemelela lilaghano lilibhii lyamaha hake kuliku lela lya makacho.
HEB 7:23 Kabhele, bhala akapiya matambiko bhange bhakibha twe nhwalo bhatehila kuwegha na ngabhahotwii jhe kujhendelela na mahengo ghabhe.
HEB 7:24 Nambo nhwalo Yecho itamakii machiko ghoha ghangapeta, upiya litambiko gwake upehekeya jhe.
HEB 7:25 Yene, jwenio ahotola kwaghombola njwe bhala bhibhannyendelela Chapanga kwa ndela jhake, nhwalo jwenio atamikii machiko ghoha ghangapeta, ndi jwabhajhopela kwa Chapanga.
HEB 7:26 Bhahe, Yecho ndi mpiya litambiko Nkolongwa jwamaha kwa nhwalo gwito, jwanyahinyahi, jwanga ulemo amu uhakaho, jwabhii kutale na bhibhabhii na uhakaho, na jwajhinulilwe kunane hake kwa Chapanga.
HEB 7:27 Jwenio alandana jhe na akapiya matambiko bhange, ipalwa jhe apiya litambiko kila lichiko, hote kwa uhakaho gwake jwenio, na peniya kwa nhwalo gwa uhakaho gwa bhando. Jwenio akapihite litambiko mala jhimo tugha lilitamikii machiko ghoha ghangapeta pala pakipihita jwenio.
HEB 7:28 Lilaghalikilo lya Mucha lyahaghuu bhando bhibhabhii leghele bhabha akapiya matambiko bhakolongwa, nambo lilaghilo lya Chapanga likateilwe kwa kulapila na jhene ikahikite bada jha lilaghalikilo na likanhagwii Mwana jwakamilika machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
HEB 8:1 Bhahe, lilobhe likolongwa mu ghanga ghutulonge ndi lende: Twenga tukwete mpiya litambiko nkolongwa jwabhii ngita jhonjo, jwatama lubhoko lwalelo lwa kigoda cha Unahota Nkolongwa cha Ukolongwa kwenio kunane kwa Chapanga.
HEB 8:2 Jwenie ahenga lihengo ngita Mpiya Litambiko chehemo jha unyahinyahi, pupachengwite lihema lela lya uchakaka na Bhambo, na chi na bhando.
HEB 8:3 Kila Mpiya Litambiko Nkolongwa ahaghulilwe ampihikiye Chapanga hupo na litambiko, ngohe tubhii na Mpiya Litambiko Nkolongwa gwito ndi Yecho Kilichitu hele abhaha na kilebhe cha kumpihikiya Chapanga.
HEB 8:4 Anda jwenio ngabhehe jwapamba pannema, ngabhii ng'o mpiya litambiko, nhwalo bhabhii bhapiya matambiko bhange bhibhapiya matambiko ngita chililaghalikilwe mu lilaghalikilo lya Mucha.
HEB 8:5 Mahengo ghabhe gha upiya litambiko ndi nnandanikiho tugha na kiyeka cha ghala ghughabhii kunane kwa Chapanga. Nhwalo Mucha pakibha pahina nu kutengenecha lihema lela, Chapanga akannaghalikiye: “Dolekeya, ntendekeye kila kilebhe kibhaha ngita nnandanikiho ghola ghunikanangiye ku kitombe.”
HEB 8:6 Nambo ngohe Yecho apekiwe mahengo gha upiya litambiko lilibhii lyambone kupeta lyabhe, ngita chabhii nnyemelela jwa lilaghalikilo lilibhekitwe pakate jha bhando bha Chapanga ndi lyambone hake, nhwalo lijhemite mu lilobhe lya mbone lyalaghii Chapanga.
HEB 8:7 Nhwalo ngita lilaghilo lela lilongolila likibha jhe na ulemo, lipalwa jhe na lilaghano lya ubhele.
HEB 8:8 Nambo Chapanga ngabhakokolikiya bhando bhake pubhalongila: “Bhambo alonge machiko ghahika, pumbala kubheka lilaghano liyono na bhando bha ku Ichilahele na bha ku Yuda.
HEB 8:9 Lilaghano lende nalilandanajhe na lela limekita na akahoko bhabhe, lichiko lela panakamula lubhoko na kwabhoha kuhumii ku kilambo chuku Michile. Nhwalo bhalikamwiijhe lilaghano lyango, na nenga nganakanita.
HEB 8:10 Lende ndi lilaghano limbala kuhenga na bhando bha ku Ichilahele: machiko ghughahika, ilonge Bhambo: Nameka lilaghalikilo lyango mu malango ghabhe, nanyandika mumiojho jhabhe. Nenga namma Chapanga gwabhe, na bheniya nabhabha bhando bhango.
HEB 8:11 Abhii jhe jwapala kummola nnyake, amu kunnobholela nnongo mundo, ‘Mummanye Bhambo.’ Nhwalo bhando bhoha, yana na ata akanahota, nabhamanya.
HEB 8:12 Nanekekeya ulemo gwabhe, na uhakaho gwabhe nakombokela jhe kabhele.”
HEB 8:13 Kwa kulonge lilaghano lende liyono, Chapanga akalitehi lela lililongalile litundangalile na kilebhe chochoha chikitundangalila kibhandikii kutukutuka.
HEB 9:1 Lilaghano lililongalile likibha na ndela jhake jha kunnyinamii Chapanga na hele chehemo jhake jha nyahinyahi pannema.
HEB 9:2 Bhakalenganikiye lihema lya Chapanga na chumbi chake chikilongolile kikemitwe Mahale Panyahinyahi. Mwenio mukibha na kinala chukubheke kolobohi, kachangwale na mabumunda ghighapihitwa palonge jha Chapanga.
HEB 9:3 kuyeto jha lipanjiya lyuubhele, kukibha na chumbi chikikemitwa Panyahinyahi Hake.
HEB 9:4 Mwenio mukibha na kachangwale kanyahinyahi ka chaabo ka kututukiya ubane, na Lichanduko lya Lilaghano, likibha likilimwe lyoha na chaabo, na nkate jhake mukibha na kibhegha cha chaabo chichikibha na chakulya chikikemitwa mana, nkongocho gwa Halune ukibha lutundwila mahamba, na majhola mabhele ghajhandikwe lilaghalikilo.
HEB 9:5 Panane jha Lichanduko lyenio kukibha na ihumbi ibhele ibhii na mapapanilo ikemitwa makelube, makelube ndi ihumbi ibhii na ukolo gwa Chapanga, na mapapanilo ghabhe ghakayekelii chehemo jha kulekekewa uhakaho gwa bhando. Nambo ngohe tuhotojhe kulonge hotuhotu malobhe gha ilebhe henge.
HEB 9:6 Bhahe, naha ndi chiibhile, kila machiko bhapiya matambiko bhakajhingii mu chumbi chela chikilongalile na kuhenga mahengo ghabhe gha kupiya matambiko.
HEB 9:7 Nambo mpiya litambiko kanjika ndi ipalwa kujhingii mu chumbi chuubhele, na jwenio itenda yenio mala jhimo tugha kwa chaka, na jwenio apalitwa atole miyahe kumpihikiya Chapanga nhwalo gwa jwenio na nhwalo gwa uhakaho gwa bhando ghubhatehila changamanya.
HEB 9:8 Uhuke gwa Chapanga ibhola hotuhotu kupete mambu ghanga kubhehe ndela jha kujhingii Panyahinyahi pa Nyahinyahi Hake kunane kwa Chapanga pamela panajhogholelwa jhe, nhwalo chumbi chela chikilongalile chamela kibhile.
HEB 9:9 Kilebhe chenje kihwanana na machiko ghanga gha ngohe, hupo na litambiko ipihiwa nambo ihotojhe kuitenda miojho jha bhando bhibhannyinamii Chapanga ikoto kubhehe na malemo.
HEB 9:10 Ilebhe henge yoha itendika nhwalo gwa chakulya na kunywe na chituhobhalii kukijhelebhuha. Ghanga ghoha kwa nhwalo gwa yegha tugha, na makakala ghake naghajhomokela Chapanga papakutenda ilebhe yoha kubhehe iyono.
HEB 9:11 Nambo Kilichitu ahikite, ngita Mpiya litambiko Nkolongwa gwa mambu gha umbone ghughabhii pamba, mambu ghighahikite. Jwenio akajhingii mu lihema lyamaha na likolongwa hake, lichengwitejhe na bhando, yenio lihumiijhe mu nnema ghongo ghupanginwe.
HEB 9:12 Jwenio akajhingii Panyahinyahi pa Nyahinyahi mala jhimo tugha, jwenio akajhingiijhe na miyahe jha mbuhe amu ng'ombi, nambo akajheghite miyahe jhake jwenio, kwa ndela jhene atuletii ukomboche gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
HEB 9:13 Nhwalo kwa miyahe jha mbuhe na jha lipongo lya ng'ombi na lihu lya litohe lya ng'ombi bhamichilwa bhando bhubhabhii bhanganandela na bhando bheniya bhajhelewike yegha jhabhe palonge jha Chapanga.
HEB 9:14 Kilebhe chenje ndi chakaka, bho, ngohe miyahe jha Kilichitu chi jhambone hake? Nambo Kilichitu akakipihite jwenio kwa Chapanga ngita litambiko kwa makakala gha Uhuke gwa machiko ghoha ghangapeta. Yene miyahe jhake itujhelebhula miojho jhito kuhumii mu itendwa hito itulete kuwegha, ndi tutumikila Chapanga jwabhii ghome.
HEB 9:15 Yene Kilichitu ndi jwajhelanicha lilaghano liyono ndi bhala bhibhakemitwa na Chapanga bhapokela mota jha machiko ghoha ghangapeta ibhalaghilwe. Nhwalo jwenio akawile kughombola bhando kuhumii muhakaho ghubhatehila mu lilaghano lya makacho.
HEB 9:16 Kwa nhwalo gwa wochiya ujheketelwa anda jhola jwalongila awile.
HEB 9:17 Kwa nhwalo wochiya ubhehe na likakala anda jwalongila awile, wochiya ubhehe jhe na likakala anda jwalongila amela ghome.
HEB 9:18 Kwa nhwalo ata lilaghano lilitumbwila lihengita jhe lihengo changa miyahe.
HEB 9:19 Hote Mucha akatangachii bhando malaghalikilo ghoha ngita chighalongila, peniya ajhakutola miyahe jha litohe lya ng'ombi na mbuhe ajhakuhangalana na mache, na mahamba gha nkongo gwa hichopo na mangoma gha limbelele lilikelimwa lange ngele, ngamichila kitabo cha lilaghalikilo na bhando bhoha.
HEB 9:20 Mucha akalongii: “Jhenje ndi miyahe jha lilaghilo lililangii uchakaka yalaghalikii Chapanga mulikamule.”
HEB 9:21 Helahela Mucha ngamichii miyahe mu lihema lela lya nyahinyahi na yombo yoha itumika kunnyinamii Chapanga.
HEB 9:22 Na mu lilaghalikilo lya Mucha ilebhe yoha ibhandikii kujhelebhulwa kwa miyahe, na uhakaho ulekekewa tugha kwa miyahe kujhitika.
HEB 9:23 Ilebhe henge ya pamba ndi nnandanikiho tugha gwa ilebhe ya uchakaka ya kunane kwa Chapanga, na yenio ipalwa ijhelebhulwe kwa miyahe. Nambo ilebhe ya kunane kwa Chapanga ipala litambiko lilibhii maha hake.
HEB 9:24 Nhwalo Kilichitu akajhingii jhe Panyahinyahi Hake pipachengwite kwa mabhoko gha bhando, chehemo jhene ndi nnandanikiho gwa chela chikibhii cha uchakaka cha kola kunane kwa Chapanga Jwenie. Jwenie akajhingii kunane kwa Chapanga jwenio, ngohe ajhemite palonge jha Chapanga kutukengelela twenga.
HEB 9:25 Kila chaka Mpiya litambiko Nkolongwa jwa Akayahude akajhingii Panyahinyahi Hake kwa miyahe jha inyama, nambo Kilichitu akajhingii jhe mwenio mala twe kukipiya jwenio,
HEB 9:26 nhwalo ngaibhehe yenio, Kilichitu apalitwa kung'ahichwa mala twe kuhumii puupanginwa nnema. Nambo ngohe, machiko ghighabhandikii kupehekeya nnema, jwenio apitile mala jhimo tugha kulekekeya uhakaho kwa kubhoa yegha jhake kubhehe litambiko.
HEB 9:27 Ngita hela, kila mundo paihwe mala jhimo, peniya ihadabulwa na Chapanga,
HEB 9:28 hele naha Kilichitu na jwenie akakipihite litambiko mala jhimo kupala aulekekeye uhakaho gwa bhando twe. Papakupitila kabhele, ahikii jhe kukenyangenya na uhakaho, nambo ahika kwakombola bhala bhibhannendelela kwa kilolo.
HEB 10:1 Kwa yenio lilaghalikilo lya Mucha ndi kiyeka tugha cha ilebhe yambone ihika palongoloho, na chi ilebhe ya uchakaka. Matambiko ghanga gha Mucha ghapihitwa kwa kubhujhila bhujhila kila chaka changalekwa yatenda jhe ng'o bhala bhibhamandikii Chapanga kubhehe akakamilipo!
HEB 10:2 Anda bhando bheniya bhibhanyinamila Chapanga bhakabhii bhajhelehwilwe uhakaho gwabhe chakaka, miojho jhabhe ngaibhinitii jhe kulangiya ibhii na uhakaho, nabhajhendelela jhe kupiya kabhele lyenio litambiko.
HEB 10:3 Nambo matambiko ghala ghibhabhujhii kila chaka kwakombocha bhando uhakaho gwabhe.
HEB 10:4 Kwa nhwalo miyahe jha lipongo lya ng'ombi na mbuhe ihoto jhe kubhoha uhakaho.
HEB 10:5 Nhwalo Kilichitu pahikita pannema pano, akannobhalile Chapanga: “Mukapahii jhe bhapiye litambiko hilu hupo henge, nambo mwenga unganenganikiye yegha.
HEB 10:6 Litambiko lya kukomelekewa kwa mwotu, amu litambiko lya kubhoha uhakaho kwangahalalicha.
HEB 10:7 Peniya nganongila, ‘Mii pamba, mwe ma Chapanga, kuhenga ghala ghimipala, ngita chinyandikilwe mu Majhandiko gha Chapanga.’ ”
HEB 10:8 Hote akalongi, “Mihalalichwa jhe na litambiko lyukutiniwa kwa mwotu, litambiko lya kukomelekelwa kwa inyama na litambiko lya kubhoha uhakaho.” Akalongii naha ata ngita matambiko ghala ghoha ghighapihitwe kwa kukengama lilaghalikilo lya Mucha.
HEB 10:9 Peniya akalongi: “Mii pamba, mwe ma Chapanga, kuhenga ghimipala mwenga.” Yene Chapanga ajhakulibhoha litambiko lya makacho na kummeka Kilichitu jwenie ngita litambiko.
HEB 10:10 Kwa mana Yecho Kilichitu akatehi ghala ghapala Chapanga, twenga tujhelewike uhakaho gwito kwa litambiko lya yegha jhake jwenio jhapihite mala jhimo tugha kwa nhwalo gwa bhando bhoha.
HEB 10:11 Kila mpiya litambiko jwa Akayahude ihenga lihengo lya kupiya litambiko kila lichiko na ipiya matambiko ghagha mala jhamahele, matambiko gheniya ghahoto ng'o kubhoha uhakaho.
HEB 10:12 Nambo Kilichitu apihita litambiko limo tugha nhwalo gwa kubhoha uhakaho, litambiko lilibhii lyamaha machiko ghoha ghangapeta, peniya atamite lubhoko lwalelo lwa Chapanga,
HEB 10:13 na ngohe ilendelela akamakoko bhake bhabhekwe pahe jha magholo ghake.
HEB 10:14 Bhahe, kwa litambiko lyake limo, abhatei kubhehe akakamilipo machiko ghoha ghangapeta bhala bhibhajhelehwike.
HEB 10:15 Uhuke gwa Chapanga helahela itulongelela twenga malobhe gha ilebhe henge. Hote alonge,
HEB 10:16 “Lende ndi lilaghano limbala kuhenga nako, palonge jha machiko ghighahika, ilonge Bhambo, nameka lilaghalikilo lyango mu mumiojho jhabhe, nanyandika mu malango ghabhe.”
HEB 10:17 Kabhele ngalongila: “Nakombokela jhe kabhele uhakaho gwabhe na mahengo ghanganandela.”
HEB 10:18 Anda ngohe uhakaho ulekekiwe, nakubhe jhe kabhele kupiya litambiko lya kulekekeya uhakaho.
HEB 10:19 Ngohe akalongo bhango, kwa miyahe jha Yecho tuhoto njwe kujhingii Panyahinyahi Hake changakiholo.
HEB 10:20 Jwenio atujhogholii ndela yono, ndela jhitulongocha mu ughome, kupete panjiya jhela, atehila yenio kwa kubhowa yegha jhake.
HEB 10:21 Ngohe tukwete Mpiya litambiko Nkolongwa jwabhii na ukindendeke mu Nyumba jha Chapanga.
HEB 10:22 Kwa yenio tumandikile Chapanga kongo tubhii na uchakaka na kihobholelo cha uchakaka kwa miojho jhijhelehwike jhilangiya kubhehe nkwetii jhe ulemo, tuuleke ubhoho na yegha jhito ichukwe kwa mache ghamaha.
HEB 10:23 Tukamule hake lihobhalelo lito litulonge twabhete, nhwalo Chapanga jwateile lilaghano lyake ndi jwahobholeka.
HEB 10:24 Tuwachilana twenga kwa twenga, tulekelane mwojho, tughaghe mu kupalana na kuhenga ghamaha.
HEB 10:25 Tukoto kukotoka kukongana pamonga, ngita bhange chibhihenga. Bhahe, nambo tukangamaliche mwojho na tujhendelele kuhenga yenio, ngita chimulola machiko gha Bhambo ghabhandikile.
HEB 10:26 Kwa nhwalo, anda tujhendelii kuhenga uhakaho kwa kupala kone anda tujhomolee kuumanya uchakaka, libhii jhe litambiko lilihoto kupiwa kabhele kwa nhwalo gwa kubhoha uhakaho.
HEB 10:27 Chikihighilike ndi kulendela tugha kwa ubhoghohe luhadabulo lwa Chapanga na mwotu nkale ghuupala kwakomelekeya bhala bhoha bhibhankana Chapanga.
HEB 10:28 Mundo jhojhoha jwangakamula lilaghalikilo lya Mucha, akakomitwe changa kiya anda bhabhii bhando bhabhele amu bhatato bhalolite na kulonge kilebhe chenie.
HEB 10:29 Ngohe mihola bhole? Bho, ipalwa ahadabulwa pakolongwa bhole mundo jhola jwampucha Mwana gwa Chapanga nakulola kilebhe nacho miyahe jha lilaghano lya Chapanga lilinyelewile na mundo jwanigha Uhuke gwa Chapanga jwatulangiya kiya?
HEB 10:30 Kwa nhwalo tummanye chalongila jhola: “Nenga naninepa jhe ghanganandela, nenga nanepechela bheniya,” na helahela alongela: “Bhambo nabhahadabula bhando bhake.”
HEB 10:31 Kilebhe cha kujhoghopa kugwelela mu mabhoko gha Chapanga jwabhii ghome!
HEB 10:32 Nambo nkomboka machiko ghala gha kutumbula pala puyekulilwa uchakaka gwa Chapanga. Pamonga na mangota mukang'ahike hake, mangota mkahimbilile.
HEB 10:33 Pipipi mkaligwite na kutendelwa ghanganandela na kumpe hone pa bhando, pipipi mu kulombana na bhala bhubhang'ahichwa hele.
HEB 10:34 Helahela mukang'ahike pamonga na bhala bhubhabhii mu kipungo na pumpokitwa ilebhe hino mukajheketile kwa kuhangana, nhwalo mkamanye nkwete kilebhe chambone hake na kitamikii machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
HEB 10:35 Ngohe, nkoto kuhobheya lihobhalelo lino, nhwalo nalimpela hupo ngolongwa.
HEB 10:36 Mipalwa kubhehe na luhimbililo ndi mihoto kuhenga ghala ghapala Chapanga na kupokela chela chalaghile.
HEB 10:37 Ngita chilonge Majhandiko gha Chapanga: “Pamela kandina tugha, na jhola jwahika, nahika, nachelewa jhe.
HEB 10:38 Nambo jhola jwahenga ghighahalalila nenga natama kwa kihobholela, nambo anda abhujhii unyuma, nenga nahalalilwa jhe.”
HEB 10:39 Nambo, twe twabhando bhukubhujha unyuma jhe nu kuwegha mu kihobholelo, nambo twenga tubhii na kihobholelo na kughombolelwa.
HEB 11:1 Kubhehe na kihobholelo ndi kubhehe na uchakaka gha mambu ghituhobholela, kuhobholela hake ilebhe yangabhonekana.
HEB 11:2 Kwa kihobholelo chabhe akahoko bhito bha makacho bhakajheketilwe na Chapanga.
HEB 11:3 Kwa kihobholelo twenga tumanya ngita nnema ukapanginwe kwa Lilobhe lya Chapanga, kwa yenio ilebhe ibhonekana ikapanginwe jhe kuhumii mu ilebhe ibhonekana.
HEB 11:4 Kwa kihobholelo Abele akapihite litambiko kwa Chapanga likibha lyambone kuliku lela lya Kaine. Kwa kihobholelo chake akajheketilwe na Chapanga kubhehe jwaumbone, Chapanga jwenie akajheketile litambiko lyake. Kwa kihobholelo chake pamonga na kuwegha, ghala ghatehila ghakibha ghamela ghatubholita.
HEB 11:5 Kwa kihobholelo Henoke akatoilwe kujhenda kunane kwa Chapanga, akoto kuwegha. Abhonikine jhe kabhele nhwalo antoii Chapanga. Kabula jwakutolwa kujhenda kunane kwa Chapanga, jwenio akibha anhalalicha Chapanga.
HEB 11:6 Bhahe, changa kihobholelo, abhii jhe mundo jwahoto kunhalalicha Chapanga, kwa nhwalo kila mundo jwannyendelela Chapanga ahobholela kubhehe ndi chakaka Chapanga abhii, na abhahupa bhala bhibhampalaha.
HEB 11:7 Kwa kihobholelo Nuho akapwatalilwe na Chapanga kwa ilebhe ipala kuhika palonge yangabhonekana. Akannyokanikiye Chapanga, ajhakuchenga chapina mwono jwenio na nyumba jhake bhakakombolilwe. Kwa kihobholelo chake Nuho akabhonikine jwaumbone palonge jha Chapanga nambo bhando bhoha bha pannema bhakahadabwilwe.
HEB 11:8 Kwa kihobholelo Ulahimo akannyokanikiye Chapanga, pakemitwa ajhende ku kilambo chanaghila Chapanga champela kibhehe chake. Yene Ulahimo ajhakubhoka mu kilambo chake changamanya kojhe kwajhingilila.
HEB 11:9 Kwa kihobholelo Ulahimo akatamite ngita nng'ene mu kilambo chanaghila Chapanga. Akatamite kwenio mu mahema ngita chatamita Isaka na Yakobu, na bhene bhakapokii ghaghalaghala ghalaghila Chapanga.
HEB 11:10 Kwa yenio Ulahimo akibha alendila muche gwa nchinge nganganga, muche gwenio ghutumbulichwe na kuchengwa na Chapanga jwenio.
HEB 11:11 Kwa kihobholelo Sala akajheketilwe kubhehe kwa Chapanga ilenganikii lilaghilo lyake, yenio Sala akibha na ajhakubhehe na ndumbo pamonga na kubhehe aghohime. Pamonga na kipinde chake cha kujhegha ndumbo kipetite.
HEB 11:12 Yene Ulahimo akibha ngita mundo jwawile, kuhumii kwa mundo jwenio jhumo bhakapitile bhando bhamahele bhangabhalangika ngita ndondwa ya kunane na micheke jha kumbwane.
HEB 11:13 Bhando bheniya bhoha bhakawii kongo bhakibha na kihobholelo. Bhakahwii changapokela ilebhe yalaghii Chapanga, nambo cha kutale bhakakihwene na kuhanganila, bhakajheketile hotuhotu ngita bheniya ndi akaghene na bhapeta ndela pannema.
HEB 11:14 Bhando bhibhalongela ilebhe ngita yenio, bhilangii hotu bhipalaha kilambo chabhe bhene.
HEB 11:15 Anda bhahwachila kilambo chela chimahumila, ngabhahotwii kubhujha kwenio.
HEB 11:16 Nambo ngohe bhipala kilambo chikibhii chambone, kilambo cha kunane kwa Chapanga. Kwa yenio Chapanga ikola jhe hone kukemwa Chapanga gwabhe, kunhwalo jwenio abhalenganikiye muche gwabhe.
HEB 11:17 Kwa kihobholelo Ulahimo akampihite mwana mundo Isaka ngita litambiko pala Chapanga pannyighita. Ulahimo ndi jwakibha apokile lilaghano lya Chapanga, nambo akajheketile kumpiya mwana mundo jwakanjika abhehe litambiko,
HEB 11:18 ata anda Chapanga akannobholile: “Kupete kwa Isaka ndi nampata ibheluko ininnaghile.”
HEB 11:19 Ulahimo ngahobholila kubhehe Chapanga ihoto kwayokecha bhubhawile, kwa kulonge yenio Ulahimo ngampatita Isaka kuhumii kubhawile.
HEB 11:20 Kwa kihobholelo Isaka akapekii mota Yakobu na Echau kwa ghala ghighahika palongolo.
HEB 11:21 Kwa kihobholelo Yakobu pabhandikila kuwe, akaipekii mota yana ya Uchupo, akannyinamile Chapanga kongo ajheghemii mu kongocho gwake.
HEB 11:22 Kwa kihobholelo Uchupo pabhandikila kuwe, akalongii malobhe gha Akaichilahele kubhoka mu kilambo cha ku Michile, na akabhalaghile ihupa yake bha itende bhole.
HEB 11:23 Kwa kihobholelo akatate bha Mucha ngabhaihita Mucha kwa miyehe mitato kuhumii mu kubhelukwa kwake. Bhakamwene akibha mwana jwambone, bhakajhogwipe jhe nhwilo gwa munahota nkolongwa jwa ku Michile.
HEB 11:24 Kwa kihobholelo Mucha pakibha nkolongwa, akakanite kukemwa mwana jwa bite Falao munahota nkolongwa jwa ku Michile.
HEB 11:25 Ngalolita mbaha kung'ahika pamonga na bhando bha Chapanga kuliku kunomenekeya ilebhe ya uhakaho kwa machiko ghandina tugha.
HEB 11:26 Akaumbwile kubhehe kulagha kwa kuligwa nhwalo gwa Kilichitu ndi kilebhe chambone kuliku kubhehe na ilebhe mbwe ya ku Michile, nhwalo akibha alolila hupo jhipala kuhika.
HEB 11:27 Kwa kihobholelo Mucha akabhokite ku kilambo cha ku Michile changa kujhoghopa lilaka lya munahota nkolongwa, na hilu akabhujhitii jhe unyuma, akibha ngita mundo jwamweii Chapanga jwangabhonekana.
HEB 11:28 Kwa kihobholelo Mucha akatehi unyagho gwa Pachaka, akalaghile miyahe imichilwe panane jha nnyango, kupala nhenga lihengo jhola jwa kunane jwaleta kuwegha akoto kwakoma yana inalome yalitibho yuku Ichilahele.
HEB 11:29 Kwa kihobholelo bhando bha ku Ichilahele bhakajhombwike Mbwane jha Chamo ngita bhatyanga pajhomo, nambo Akamichile pibhapata kujhomboka ngabhawelila mwenio umache.
HEB 11:30 Kwa kihobholelo mapamanda gha muche gha ku Yeliko ghakatilwike Akaichilahele pibhatindila kwa machiko chaba.
HEB 11:31 Kwa kihobholelo Laabo akibha atehila ngongola akahwii jhe pamonga na bhala bhanganyokanikiya Chapanga, nhwalo akabhapokii maha bhala bhando bhibhapalaha ilebhe kwa kukihiya bha ku Ichilahele.
HEB 11:32 Ngohe nongila nike kabhele? Ngwete jhe pwache jha kulonge kwa Gideone na kwa Balake na kwa Samusone na Yefita na kwa Daude na kwa Chamwele na kwa milondole bha Chapanga.
HEB 11:33 Kwa kihobholelo bheniya bhoha bhakakomine ngondo na akanahota akakolongwa na bhakakunite. Bhajhakughagha kuhenga kupala ilebhe ipalwa ibheghe. Bhajhakutabha milomo jha mahimba,
HEB 11:34 bhakahimite lipela lya mwotu, bhakaholwite kukomwa kwa upanga, pubhakibha leghele nambo bhakalekwii makalala. Bhakibha na makakala kungondo, bhajhakwabhenga akakomana ngondo akaghene.
HEB 11:35 Kwa kihobholelo akakeghe bhakabhujhichilwe bhando bhabhe bhibhawile. Bhange pakate jhabhe bhakakanite kulekekelwa. Bhakang'aichwe ade kuwe kupala bhayoke na kujhingii muughome gwambone hake.
HEB 11:36 Bhange bhakapuchwe na kubulwa kwa limbendela lya ndomondo, na bhange bhakatabhitwe minyololo na kwataghii mu kipungo.
HEB 11:37 Bhange bhakakomitwe kwa maghanga, bhange bhakahekitwe ipande kwa nchumeno, bhange bhakakomitwe kwa upanga. Bhakatindile kongo na kongo kone bhahwalite mambendela gha limbelele na mambendela gha mbuhe, bhakibha bhando akahocho, bhakang'ahichwe na kwatendela ghanganandela.
HEB 11:38 Ikapalwa jhe bhando bha nnema bhatame na bhando ngita bheniya! Bhakatindi tindi kulundwanga na ku itombe, bhatamita mu mikwembe na mu milenda.
HEB 11:39 Bhando bheniya bhoha bhabhonikina kubhehe nganganga nhwalo gwa kihobholelo chabhe. Nambo bhakapokii jhe ghala ghalaghila Chapanga,
HEB 11:40 nhwalo Chapanga atulenganikiye twenga ilebhe yambone kukamilichwa changa twenga.
HEB 12:1 Twenga tutindilwe na lilongo likolongwa lya bhala bhubhatamita mu kihobholelo cha uchakaka palonge jhito, yenio tubhohe kila chikituhibhilikiya, na uhakaho jhitunyembelela. Mbelo ibhekwite palonge jhito, tubhutuka kwa kuhimbilila.
HEB 12:2 Tumpihikiye miho ghito Yecho ndi jwatumbulicha kihobholelo chito na jwenio ndi najhomolela. Nhwalo gwa luhangano lulukibha palonge jhake, akahimbilile kuwe pa nchalaba, changakola hone, na ngohe itama lubhoko lwalelo lwa kigoda cha unahota nkolongwa gwa Chapanga.
HEB 12:3 Mughaholele mambu ghighankolii Yecho, pahimbilila kuchimwa na bhibhabhii na uhakaho. Ngohe nkoto kutotokela na kuhengela mwojho.
HEB 12:4 Nhwalo mu kukomana na uhakaho, mangota nnyemite jhe nganganga ade kuhikii mukujhita miyahe.
HEB 12:5 Bho, nnyehwite malobhe ghala gha kuleke mwojho, Chapanga pankemita mangota yana mundo? “Mwanango, nkoto kunpucha Bhambo pwapwatalila, peniya panchwapula nkoto kuwe mwojho
HEB 12:6 Nhwalo Bhambo inkelebhuya kila mundo jwampala, inchwapula jwajheketela kubhehe mwana mundo.”
HEB 12:7 Nhimbilile pibhankelebhuya, nhwalo Chapanga itenda mangota kubhehe ngita yana yake. Bho, mwana ghane jwangachapulwa na tate mundo?
HEB 12:8 Nambo anda muchwapuj he ngita chimwiichwapu yana henge, chakaka mangota chi yana mundo, mangota ndi yana ya pa kituto.
HEB 12:9 Pamonga na gheniya, twenga tubhii na akatate bhito bheniya bhituchwapuu na twenga twajhokanikiya. Yene tupalwa kunnyokanikiya hake Tate gwito jwa ki Uhuke tubhehe na ughome.
HEB 12:10 Akatate bhito bhibhatupapite bhakatuchwapile kwa kipinde chandina tugha, ngita chibhalolita bheniya ikwela, nambo Chapanga atuchwapuu kwa kututangatila twenga, ndi tubhehe mu unyahinyahi gwake.
HEB 12:11 Nambo kuchwapula chi kilebhe chukuhanganila nambo ndi kilebhe chikileta ungolongondi. Nambo bhala bhibhachwapwilwe nabhapata ndweko jha uteeke kwa kutama kwa kunhalalicha Chapanga.
HEB 12:12 Bhahe, nnyinule mabhoko ghino ghighatotokile na kukangamalicha majhugwa ghino ghighabhii leghele!
HEB 12:13 Nnyendelele kutyanga mundela jhinyokite, kupala lugholo lululemile lukoto kuteghuka nambo lubhehe ughome.
HEB 12:14 Nghaghe kutama kwa uteeke na bhando bhoha kwa unyahinyahi. Nhwalo abhii jhe mundo jwaipala kummona Bhambo jwangabhehe nyahinyahi.
HEB 12:15 Mukichunge hake mundo jhojhoha akoto kuhobheya umbone gwa Chapanga. Mundo jhojhoha jwangajheketela kulandana na nkongo ghuna uchongo ghuukola na kwalete bhando mang'ahe kwa uchongo gwake.
HEB 12:16 Mukichunge pakate jhino akoto kubhehe mundo jwahenga ngongola amu mundo jwanganhalalicha Chapanga, ngita Echau jwachulwiche uliche gwake kwa kiheneko chimo tu.
HEB 12:17 Nhwalo mimanya papata apelwa mota na tate mundo, ngakanilwa nhwalo yamaha jhe kughalambula chateile, pamonga na kupalaha kwa maholi chwii.
HEB 12:18 Mangota mukakihikii jhe kitombe cha ku Chinae ngita bhando bha ku Ichilahele chibhauhikila, kitombe changahoto kukamulwa kone kijhaka mwotu na lihunde lipile tyoo, lubhendo na upepo nkolongwa,
HEB 12:19 mpogho gwa lipenenga na lilobhe lililonge malobhe. Bhando bhala pibhajhoina lilobhe lyenio bhakapembikii bhakoto kujhoha,
HEB 12:20 nhwalo bhakahotwii jhe kulipokela lilaghilo lililongilwe: “Ata kinyama jwapala kupapaha kitombe chenje akong'ondwe maghanga ade aweghe.”
HEB 12:21 Ghanga ghoha ghatehila bhajhoghope hake, ade Mucha ngalongila: “Nilendema na kujhoghopa!”
HEB 12:22 Nambo mangota mukahukile kitombe cha ku Chayune, ku muche gwa Chapanga jwabhii ghome, Yeluchalemo jha kunane, kwenio bhabhii akatumiche bhangabhalangika bha kunane kwa Chapanga.
HEB 12:23 Mangota nhwikite pangonganikila jha bhando bha Chapanga, bhibhakemwa bhibhatumbwile kubhelukwa bha Chapanga, na mahina ghabhe ghajhandikwe kunane kwa Chapanga. Nhwikite palonge jha Chapanga, jwabhahadabula bhando bhoha na miojho jha bhibhahalalicha Chapanga bhakamilichwe.
HEB 12:24 Mangota mukahikite kwa Yecho ndi jwajhelanicha lilaghano Liyono na miyahe jhake jhimichilwe ilonge yambone kuliku miyahe jha Abele.
HEB 12:25 Bhahe, mukichunge nkoto kukana kunnyokanikiya jwenio jwalongela na mangota. Anda bhala bhibhakanita kunnyokonikiya lilobhe kuhumii kwa Chapanga jwabhakelewiya pannema pano na bhene bhakalamitii jhe, twenga natuhotola bho kulama anda tukanite kunyokanikiya jhola jwatukelebhuya kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga?
HEB 12:26 Machiko ghala lilobhe lyake ikalendimiche nnema, nambo ngohe alaghile alongii: “Nanendemecha kabhele kilambo, nambo chi kilambo tugha na helahela kunane kwa Chapanga.”
HEB 12:27 Lilobhe lende, “Kabhele,” litulangiya kubhehe ilebhe yoha ipangwinwe nainyukanyuka na kukangilwa oko na kuighalika hela yanganyukanyuka.
HEB 12:28 Nhwalo ngohe tupokii Unahota gwanganyukanyuka na tunchenguu na yenio tunnyinamii Chapanga kwa ndela jhinhalalii, kwa ichima na bhoghohe.
HEB 12:29 nhwalo chakaka Chapanga gwito, ngita mwotu nkale ghukomelekeya njwenjwe.
HEB 13:1 Nnyendelela kupalana ngita chiipalwa kwa bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu.
HEB 13:2 Nkoto kujhewa kwapokela akaghene ukajha kwino, kwa nhwalo kuhenga yenio bhando bhange bhakapokii akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga changamanya.
HEB 13:3 Makomboka bhala bhibhabhii mu kipungo ngita hela mangota ntabhitwe pamonga na bheniya, makomboka bhala bhibhang'ahika ngita hela na mangota ming'ahika ngita bheniya.
HEB 13:4 Ipalwa bhando bhibhatoline bhahechimimwa na bhando bhoha, bhipalwa jhe kutenda ngongola na mundo jhonge. Chapanga nabhahadabula bhibhakena na ngongola.
HEB 13:5 Nkoto kubhehe bhando bhimipala hake mbijha, nambo ntocheka na ilebhe iminayo. Chapanga ilonge: “Naninneka ng'o, hilu nanintagha ng'o.”
HEB 13:6 Ndi nhwalo tuhoto kulonge changajhoghopa: “Bhambo ndi jwanyangatila, najhoghopajhe. Mundo natenda nike?”
HEB 13:7 Makomboka ilongoche hino, bhibhatangachila Lilobhe lya Mbone lya Chapanga. Nkomboka chibhatamita na chibhajhomolila utamo gwabhe, mukikengame kihobholelo chabhe.
HEB 13:8 Yecho Kilichitu ndi jhojhola jhola, dicho, deleno na machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
HEB 13:9 Nkoto kujhembeluwa na mabholo ghoghoha gha kighene ghighantenda mpoghele kone na kone. Umbone gwa Chapanga ndi ukangamalicha miojho jhito hilu chi lilaghalikilo lya chakulyegha, nhwalo malaghalikillo gheniya ghatangatii jhe bhando bhala bhibhakengima.
HEB 13:10 Twenga tukwete kichangwale, bhala bhibhahenga lihengo mwenio mu lihema lela cha Akayahude, bhipalwa jhe kulye ilebhe ya peniya pa kachangwale.
HEB 13:11 Mpiya litambiko Nkolongwa jwa Akayahude ileta miyahe jha kinyama mu Unyahinyahi Hake na kubhoha litambiko nhwalo gwa uhakaho, nambo yegha jha kinyama ujhochwa panja jha kigwenio.
HEB 13:12 Ndi nhwalo Yecho jwenio, kupala abhajhelebhule bhando kwa miyahe jhake, akang'ahike na kuwe panja jha muche.
HEB 13:13 Bhahe, tunnyendelela kwenio panja jha kigwenio tukabhehe na hone ngita chapatita hone.
HEB 13:14 Nhwalo pamba pannema tukwetii jhe muche ghutamikii machiko ghoha, nambo tulolekeya muche ghola ghuhika.
HEB 13:15 Ngohe kwa ndela ya Yecho, tumpele Chapanga litambiko lya kunumbilila machiko ghoha. Ghono lumbililo ghupita munnomo gwito putulonge kubhehe Yecho ndi Bhambo.
HEB 13:16 Nkoto kujhewa kutendelana ghambone na kutangatilana, nhwalo gheniya ndi matambiko ghighanhalalicha Chapanga.
HEB 13:17 Majhokanikiye ilongoche hino na kukengama malaghilo ghabhe. Bheniya bhilolekeya mangota changatotokela, bhipalwa bhanongelela Chapanga chibhantumikile. Anda majhokanikiye nabhahenga lihengo lyabhe kwa kuhangana, anda majhokanikiye jhe nabhahenga lihengo kwa kukokoleka, na kilebhe chenie nakitangatila jhe mangota.
HEB 13:18 Mutujhopelela kwa Chapanga. Chakaka tumanya tubhii na miojho itulangii tukwetii jhe malemo, nhwalo tupalwa kuhenga lyambone kwa kila kilebhe.
HEB 13:19 Nimpembekeya hake unyopelela kupala Chapanga ammujhiche kajhombe kwino.
HEB 13:20 Ngohe Chapanga jwayokiche Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu, ndi nnucha Nkolongwa jwa Mambelele kwa miyahe jhake. Kwa miyahe jhene alilangii kubhehe Lilaghano lya machiko ghoha ghangapeta ndi uchakaka.
HEB 13:21 Ninyopa Chapanga jwa uteeke ampela kila kilebhe chambone chimipala, kupala ntende ghapala jwenio, na kupete Kilichitu antende ghala ghaghapala nkate jhito. Ung'alicho ubhehe kwa Yecho Kilichitu, machiko ghoha ghangapeta! Amina.
HEB 13:22 Bhahe, akalongo bhango, nipembelekeya hake mpokele malobhe ghanga ghakuleke mwojho kwa kuhimbilila. Jhenje ndi baluwa nyipe ndo jhininyandikile.
HEB 13:23 Mbala umanye kubhehe nnongo gwito Timocheyo alekekiwe mu kipungo. Anda ahikite ngohe, nahika nako kutyangila kwenio.
HEB 13:24 Majhambuche ilongoche bhino bhoha pamonga na bhando bhoha bha Chapanga! Makalongo bha kilambo cha ku Italiya bhinyambucha.
HEB 13:25 Umbone gwa Chapanga ubhaha na mangota mabhoha. Amina!
JAM 1:1 Ne Yakobu, natumiche jwa Chapanga na jwa Bhambo Yecho Kilichitu. Ninyambucha mangota, bhumii makabila kome na mabhele ghighajhenii mu nnema ghoha.
JAM 1:2 Makalongo bhango, pimukongana na majhighanikilo gha kila namuna nhwanganila hake,
JAM 1:3 mmanye kubhehe kujhighanikilwa kwa kihobholelo chino kumpe uhotolo gwa kuhimbilila.
JAM 1:4 Mmanye kubhehe kuhimbilila kwino nakunkangamalicha ade kupehekela, kupala nkomale na ntimile pangapokewa na kilebhe chochoha.
JAM 1:5 Nambo anda mundo jhumo pakate jhino apongokilwe malango ghukumanya, bhahe, ipalwa annyopa Chapanga nampela kwa umbone nhwalo Chapanga ndi jwabhapela bhoha kwa umahele na kwa umbone.
JAM 1:6 Nambo ipalwa ajhopa kwa kihobholelo changapwelela. Nhwalo mundo jwabhii na mbwelelo abhehe ngita lituhe lya umbwane lilipogwite nu upepo na kutagwa kongo na oko.
JAM 1:7 Nhwalo mundo jwawachii ilebhe na jwangakitamo na matyangilo ghake, angawachii jhe napata kilebhe kubhoke kwa Bhambo.
JAM 1:8 Mundo jwabhii na ndela ibhele upapalakana mundela yenio yoha.
JAM 1:9 Anda nnongo jwabhii nhocho ipalwa ahangana nhwalo Chapanga anyinwile,
JAM 1:10 na jwabhii na ilebhe mbwe ahangana pahuluchwa. Nhwalo jhuna ilebhe nahobhelela ngita lilobha lya kwanyahe.
JAM 1:11 Nhwalo lyobha pilipita na kubhehe ngilii ujhomecha imelite, na malobha ghake uponekee pahe na kuhalala kwake koha unhobhelela. Ndi chiibhile kwa jwabhii na ilebhe mbwe nakomelekewa mu mahengo ghake.
JAM 1:12 Mbaha mundo jhola jwahimbilila pajhighanikilwa, nhwalo anda ahimbilile ade kupehekela, napelwa ndweko jha ughome gwalaghii Chapanga kwapela bhibhampala.
JAM 1:13 Anda mundo ajhighanikilwe, angalonge jhe, “Anyigha Chapanga.” Nhwalo Chapanga ahoto jhe kujhighanikilwa na uhakaho, annyigha jhe mundo jhojhoha.
JAM 1:14 Nambo kila mundo ujhighanikilwe pautilwa na kujhonjeka mitama yake yanganandela.
JAM 1:15 Kabhele tama jhene mboho anda ikomile ileta uhakaho na uhakaho anda ukomii uleta kuwegha.
JAM 1:16 Makalongo bhango bhinimpala, bhangankolowa jhe!
JAM 1:17 Kila kitohe chambone na kila hupo yoha itimile ibhoka kunane kwa Chapanga, ibhoka kwa Tate jwapangine mule imulika kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga, jwangabadilika hilu kughalambuka ghalambuka ngita nhwile.
JAM 1:18 Kwa kupala kwake ngatupapita kwa uhyono kwa ndela jha lilobhe lyake lya chakaka, kupala tubhehe bhakutumbuu pakate ya ihumbe yoha yapangine.
JAM 1:19 Makalongo bhango bhunimpala, nkomboka kilebhe chenje: Kila mundo abhaha na kipyao cha kujhoha nambo angabhehe jhe na kipyao cha kulonge amu angabhehe jhe na kipyao cha kuyoma.
JAM 1:20 Nhwalo lilaka lya mundo lihoto jhe kuhenga ghamaha ghapala Chapanga.
JAM 1:21 Yene, maghataghii kutale uhakaho ghoha na ghanganandela ghighabhii ghamahele hake, mupokele kwa kunyenyekeya lilobhe lyamichite umiojho jhino, lihoto kughombola uhuke gwino.
JAM 1:22 Mangakikoloya jhe mabhene kwa kulijhokanikii tugha lilobhe lyake nambo mipalwa kulikamuu na kulihenge lihengo.
JAM 1:23 Nhwalo anda mundo jhojhoha jwajhokanikii lilobhe nambo alihenge jhe lihengo, jwenio anda mundo jwakilolekeya chula jhake mu lindala.
JAM 1:24 Anda ajhomwii kukilolekeya jwenio ubhoka, na ajhewite chula jhake chiibhile.
JAM 1:25 Nambo mundo jwalolekeya kwa miho mabhele mihilo jhitimile jhijhabheka bhando changatabha, na ajhendelee kuhenga gheniya na chi kwa kujhokanikiya tugha na palonge alibhilila, nambo kwa kughahenge lihengo, mundo jwenio napata mota mu kila kilebhe chahenga.
JAM 1:26 Mundo anda akibhona ndi jwa dine kone aluhibhiijhe lulime lwake dine jhake akikolowa jwenio, itangatii jhe kilebhe chochoha.
JAM 1:27 Dine jhibhii jhamaha jhanga malemwa palonge jha Chapanga Tate ndi jhenje: Kwatangatii akakebha na akanawela mu malola ghabhe, kukilonda mabhene muluku lwa nnema ghongo.
JAM 2:1 Makalongo bhango, nhwalo munnyeketela Yecho Kilichitu, Bhambo jwa ung'alicho, bhahe, mangabaghu jhe bhando bhange.
JAM 2:2 Kwa nnandanikiho tulonge mundo jhumo awalite lupete lwa chaabo na ngobho ya bei ngolongwa pajhingii munyumba jhino jhakukonganikii, na lichaa lele ajhingii mundo jhonge jwawalite ngobho hakanaho,
JAM 2:3 na mangota mukampokii kwa kutopela jhola jwawalite ngobho ya bei ngolongwa na kunobholela: “Ntame pamba pamaha,” na kunongolela jwawalite ngobho hakanaho, “Mwe jhema ntame pala,” anda jhe kunongolela, “Ntame pahe mbwenda palonge jha magholo ghango,”
JAM 2:4 bho, gwenio ubaghuche jhe pakate jhino? Bho, limuhenga lihumiijhe mu luhadabulo lwanganandela?
JAM 2:5 Makalongo bhango bhunimpala, unyokanikiye! Chapanga abhahagwii bhando akahocho, mu nnema ghongo bhabhe bhina ilebhe mbwe mu kihobholelo na bhapokele unahota nkolongwa gwabhalaghii kwa bhando bhala bhabhapahile?
JAM 2:6 Nambo mangotamwe mapucha bhando akahocho! Bho, bhando bhina ilebhe mbwe ndi bhibhabhonela mangota na kuntalahana pibhampeleka pa nyumba jha mihalo?
JAM 2:7 Bho, bheniya jhe ndi bhibhaliligha liina lyamaha lya Kilichitu linkemilwe?
JAM 2:8 Anda nnenganikiye Lilaghalikilo lya unahota nkolongwa gwa Chapanga ngita chilijhandikwe mu Majhandiko gha Chapanga, “Mupale nnyino ngita chimkipala mabhene,” umanya chimuhenga chamaha.
JAM 2:9 Nambo anda mabagwii bhando muhenga uhakaho, na Lilaghalikilo linhadabula mabhene kubhehe ntei kulemwa changalolekeya mmii mu lilaghalikilo.
JAM 2:10 Jwatwekula Lilaghalikilo limo, mmanya ndi nabhaha malemo mu malaghalikilo ghoha.
JAM 2:11 Nhwalo Chapanga jhola jwalongela mangahenga: “Ngongola jhe,” ndi jhojho jwalongila, “Mangakoma jhe.” Kwa gheniya ata ikabhii ntei jhe ngongola amu ntei kukoma, mangota mughatwekwii malaghalikilo ghoha.
JAM 2:12 Bhahe, nnongela na kuhenga ngita bhando bhibhapala kuhadabulwa kwa Lilaghalikilo lyangantabha.
JAM 2:13 Nhwalo Chapanga nabhe jhe na kiya papala kunhadabula mundo jwangabhehe na kiya. Jhuna kiya najhoghope jhe kujhema palonge jha luhadabulo.
JAM 2:14 Makalongo bhango, nakitangatila nike anda mundo alonge akwete kihobholelo nambo ailangii jhe kwa itendwa? Bho, kihobholelo chenie nakihotola bho kukombola?
JAM 2:15 Tulonge anda abhii nhwacha gwino amu nnombo akweti jhe ngobho amu chakulya.
JAM 2:16 Bho, najhambulila nike kwalobholela bheniya: “Nnyabhule kwa uteeke mukajhote mwotu na kujhukuta,” changapela chela chakwatangatii mu ughome gwake?
JAM 2:17 Yene kihobholelo ndo changa itendwa kiwile.
JAM 2:18 Nambo mundo ahoto kulonge, “Mwenga nkwete kihobholelo na nenga ngwete itendwa. Tela, unangiye mundo jwabhii na kihobholelo jwanga itendwa na nenga nanangiya kihobholelo chango kwa itendwa yango!”
JAM 2:19 Bho, mwe mijheketela kubhehe Chapanga abhii jhumo tugha! Tela na michuka ijhekete hele, na kabhele ulendemela kwa kiholo.
JAM 2:20 Mwe malangojhe. Bho, mwipala kunangii kubhehe kihobholelo changa itendwa kiwile?
JAM 2:21 Bho, tate gwito Ulahimo akajheketilwe jhe kubhehe jwaumbone palonge jha Chapanga? Kwa itendwa yake pala pampihita mwana mundo Isaka pakachangwale abhehe litambiko.
JAM 2:22 Mmi kulola kihobholelo chake na itendwa yakwe ikalongohine pamonga, kihobholelo chake kikamilika na itendwa yakwe.
JAM 2:23 Yene ghalenganile na Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghighalonge, “Ulahimo akannyeketile Chapanga, na kwa kihobholelo chake, Chapanga ngamalangila kubhehe jwaumbone.” Peniya Ulahimo ndi pakemitwa nkoche jwa Chapanga.
JAM 2:24 Mmi kulola, chikintenda mundo ajheketelwe kubhehe jwaumbone palonge jha Chapanga ndi itendwa yakwe, chi kihobholelo kanjika tugha.
JAM 2:25 Ikibha hele naha kwa mwikeghe Laabo jwakibha ngongola. Jwenio ngajheketilwa kubhehe jwambone palonge jha Chapanga nhwalo gwa itendwa yake, pala pabhapokila bhando bhala bhibhatumitwa kulingukiya na kwatangatila bhajhabhule kupete ndela jhenge.
JAM 2:26 Yene ngita yegha changa uhuke mmanya iwile, helahela kihobholelo changa itendwa kiwile.
JAM 3:1 Makalongo bhango, nkoto kubhehe akabhola bhamahele pakate jhino. Ngita chiumanya twenga twakabhola natupata luhadabulo lukolongwa kuliku bhange.
JAM 3:2 Nhwalo twabhoha twenga tulemwa kwa ilebhe twe, anda mundo nakulemwa jhe mu kulonge kwake, mmanya mundo jwenio akamilike, na ahotwii kuilongocha yegha jhake jhoha.
JAM 3:3 Twenga twakonga lingolengole lya choma falache mu milomo jhabhe kupala bhajheketele kwalongocha kokoha kutupala kujhenda.
JAM 3:4 Nnolekeya mele, pamonga na kubhehe ngolongwa hake upogwa na upepo nkolongwa, nambo ughalambuya nchukene gwandina tugha, na kuilongoa kokoha kwapala jwajhendecha.
JAM 3:5 Yene, lulime pamonga na kubhehe kiungo kichokombe cha yegha, ukilowa kwa ilebhe ikolongwa hake. Dolekeya hele ndetelekana ya mwotu gwandina chiutiniya litogholo likolongwa.
JAM 3:6 Lulime na lwene ndi mwotu. Lutwelii ghanganandela twe, ndi kiungo kichokombe cha payegha jhito nambo uhakaya yegha jhoha. Lulime uhakaha uhundo ghoha gwa mundo na gwenio ujhochwa na mwotu gwa ku jahanamu.
JAM 3:7 Mundo ahoto kukoleka inyama, na ahotwi kukoleka ihumbi yoha ngita inyama ya kumanyahe, ndi ijhune na majhoka na ihumbi yoha ikwabha, na ya umbwane, na yenio ihotolike kukolekwa na bhando.
JAM 3:8 Nambo abhii jhe mundo jwahotwi kukoleka lulime. Lulime ndi kilebhe changanandela, lutawalika jhe, kabhele lutwelii uchongo ghuukoma bhando.
JAM 3:9 Kupete lulime twenga tunnomba Bhambo na Tate gwito. Kwa lulime lolo twalapanikii bhando bhibhapanginwe kwa nnandanikiho gwa Chapanga.
JAM 3:10 Malobhe ghampeke mundo mota na ghammeka mundo mulikoto lyoha ghahuma mu nnomo ghumo. Makalongo bhango, ilebhe henge ipalwa jhe kubhehe yenio.
JAM 3:11 Bho, chembwe chimo kihoto kupiya mache maihimo na mache ghina mwinyo pamonga?
JAM 3:12 Makalongo bhango bho, nkongo gwa ntine uhoto kupambika chabibo? Amu chabibo ihoto kupambika tine? Chembwe cha mache ghina mwinyo kihotojhe kupiya mache ghina mahihimo.
JAM 3:13 Bho, ghane pakate jhino jhuna kumanya na malango? Bhahe, alangii kilebhe chenie kwa matyangilo ghake ghambone na itendwa yakwe yamaha yahenga kwa kukunyenyepeya na kwa malango.
JAM 3:14 Nambo anda miojho jhino itwelii wiho na luchimo, mangaloka kwa nhwalo gwa gheniya hilu mangalonge uwange chehemo jhibhii na uchakaka na kukitenda mangota mina malango.
JAM 3:15 Malango ngita gheniya ghabhoka jhe kunane kwa Chapanga, nambo gha pannema na chi ya uhuke gwa Chapanga nambo ndi ihuma kwa Limbembela.
JAM 3:16 Nhwalo popoha pubhii wiho na kukiloka, peniya pabhii na kijhonga na kila gwanganandela.
JAM 3:17 Nambo malango ghighahuma kunane kwa Chapanga, hote gha chwapi, ghipala uteeke na jwanuu na kwapala bhando, ghatwelii kiya na itendwa yambone na kubaghulana jhe hilu mukitenda mundo jwaumbone.
JAM 3:18 Mahuno ghighajheketelwa palonge jha bhando umichwa mbejho mu teeke na kwa bhala bhibhahenga uteeke.
JAM 4:1 Kubulana na mpechangano pakate jhino ghahuma kojhe? Ibhoka mitama hino mboho ikomana nkate jhino?
JAM 4:2 Mmii na tama jha kupala ilebhe nambo mukipata jhe chela chimukipala kwa gheniya mwipala kukoma, mipala hake kupata ilebhe nambo mupata jhe yenio mikomana na kupechengana. Nhwalo mukipata jhe chimukipala nhwalo mangota minyopa jhe Chapanga.
JAM 4:3 Pumunnyopa Chapanga mipatajhe: Nhwalo nnyopa changanandela mujhopa kupala mitumile kwa tama jhino.
JAM 4:4 Mangotamwe ndi mabhando bhangahobholeka ngita akangongola. Bho, umanyite jhe kuipala ilebhe ya pannema kubhehe likoko lya Chapanga? Nhwalo mundo jhojhoha jwabhehe nkoche jwa pannema abhehe likoko lya Chapanga.
JAM 4:5 Mangahola jhe kubhehe Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghalonge malobhe gha jhajhe, pughalonge, “Uhuke jwabhekwitwe na Chapanga nkate jhito abhii na wiho nkolongwa.”
JAM 4:6 Nambo umbone gwatupii Chapanga ghuna makakala hake, ngita Majhandiko chighalonge, “Chapanga ubhakana bhando bhibhakikweya nambo bhapela bhando bhina uteeke na utembekelo.”
JAM 4:7 Bhahe, mu kitembekeye kwa Chapanga. Muntile Limbembela na jwenio nantilangana,
JAM 4:8 mu mandikile Chapanga na jwenio namandikila. Mangota bhummiii na uhakaho nnyelebhule mabhoko ghino na nnyelebhuhe miojho jhino mangota bhimmii na miojho mibhele!
JAM 4:9 Mma ngolongondi na kujhemba mihambo jha malelo nu kulela. Kuheka kwino kughalambuka na kubhehe mihambo jha malelo na kuhangana kwino kubhaha ungolongondi nkolongwa!
JAM 4:10 Mma na utembekelo palonge jha Bhambo na jwenio ndi nantondobheya.
JAM 4:11 Nkoto kulonge ghanganandela kwa nnyino anda munongolii ghanganandela nnyino, peniya ndi mihadabula lilaghalikilo na anda milihadabula lilaghalikilo, peniya mwenga nabhijhokanikiya jhe nambo mihadabula lilaghalikilo.
JAM 4:12 Chapanga kanjika ndi jwahotwii kubheka malaghalikilo na kuhadabula. Jwenio kanjika ndi jwahoto kunkombola amu kukomelekela. Mihola mwe maghane ade nhoto kwahadabula majhii bhando?
JAM 4:13 Ngohe unyokanikiye mangota bhimilonge: “Deleno anda jhe kilabho nijhenda ku muche gwakiteno nu kutama kwenio kwa chaka choha kwa kuchulucha ilebhe nu kupata ulohe ngoo.”
JAM 4:14 Mangota mwe mmanyite jhe ughome gwino chiupala kubhehe kilabho! Ughome gwino kilebhe ghane, mangota mmii ngita ngongobhe ipitila na kwa kipinde kijhipe kuhobhalela.
JAM 4:15 Ngampalitwa kulonge: “Bhambo anda apahile natutama na kuhenga chenje na chela.”
JAM 4:16 Nambo ngohe mwitenda kuloka na kukikweya. Kuloka kwa namuna jhene kwamaha jhe.
JAM 4:17 Bhahe, mundo ihengajhe lela lyalimanye lilibhii lyambone lyapalwa kuhenga, itenda uhakaho.
JAM 5:1 Ngohe unnyokanikiye mangota bhimii akalohe akakolongwa! Nnelengane nu kulela malelo nhwalo gwa malagho ghighapala kunkolela.
JAM 5:2 Ulohe gwino ubholite na ngobho hino nahiangabhika na kuhobheya chamane jhake.
JAM 5:3 Chaabo jhino na feza hino imelite ukongwa nu ukongwa gwenie ndi ghughupala kuntakalila mangota, na jhene najhimemena yegha jhino ngita mwotu. Mangota mikilundikii ulohe mu machiko ghanga ghu kujhomolela.
JAM 5:4 Malepite jhe malepo bhubhahengita mahengo kumighonda jhino. Nnyokanikiye chibhakokoleka! Na kulela kwabheka bheniya bhibhahuna mu mighonda jhino kihikite kwa Bhambo jwa akakomana ngondo.
JAM 5:5 Ntamingine pannema kwa kuhanganila na kwa kunomenekeya. Nkendite yegha jhino tayale mu lichiko lya kuchinjwa.
JAM 5:6 Muhadabwile na kwakoma bhando bhangalemwa, ata ataungine jhe na mangota.
JAM 5:7 Yene, makalongo bhango, nhimbilile mu kunendekeya Bhambo ade papala kuhika. Munolekeye jwailema chailendelela mahuno ade puipala kukomala maha. Jwenio ujhelendele kuhimbilila kipinde choha cha kulema kubhoka hula jha kutumbula ade hula jhu kujhomolela.
JAM 5:8 Na mangota mwe hele mipalwa kuhimbilila na kujhema ngii ku mwojho, nhwalo lichiko lya kuhika Bhambo libhandikile.
JAM 5:9 Makalongo bhango, mangakokolekehana jhe mabhene chika nkoto kuhadabulwa na Chapanga. Nnolekehe jwakutuhadabula abhandikile.
JAM 5:10 Makalongo anda mupai ku kilandanikii kuhimbilila mu mang'ahe, mujhighe nnandanikilo gwa akalondole bha Chapanga bhibhatangicha Lilobhe lya Chapanga kwa liina lya Bhambo.
JAM 5:11 Majhito twakemita bhina mota nhwalo gwa kuhimbilila. Bho, nnyohine malobhe gha kuhimbilila kwa Ayubo, na umanyingine chantendila Bhambo kujhomolela kwake. Nhwalo Bhambo atwelii umbone na kiya.
JAM 5:12 Kupeta kwa gheniya, makalongo mwangalapanikii ng'o kunane kwa Chapanga amu kulapa kwa nnema amu kwa kilebhe chochoha. Nnongela, “Chakaka,” pipatopi kulonge chakaka, na nnongela, “Nahi jhe,” pipatope kulonge nahi jhe, nkoto kuhadabulwa na Chapanga.
JAM 5:13 Bho, ngohe abhii mundo pakate jhino jhuna malola? Jwenio ipalwa annyopa Chapanga. Na bho, abhii jwahangana mwojho? Na jwenio ipalwa kujhemba mihambo jha kunnomba.
JAM 5:14 Bho, abhii mundo jwailwalwa pakate jhino? Jwenio abhakema akanahota bha bhando bhibhannyeketii Kilichitu, na bhene nabhannyopela nu kumpakaya mahuta kwa liina lya Bhambo.
JAM 5:15 Nhwalo anda bhajhopite kwa kihobholelo jwalwalwa nalama, Bhambo nampepula jwenio. Ata abhehe na uhakaho nalekekewa.
JAM 5:16 Yene nnongelane uhakaho gwino na nnyopelane kupala nnamangane. Kujhopa kwa mundo jwajheketelwa palonge jha Chapanga jhuna makakala kwamaha hake anda ajhopite kwa kughagha.
JAM 5:17 Eliya akibha mundo ngita twenga. Ngannyopeta kwa kughagha hula ikomite jhe pannema, na hula ikakomite jhe mu kilambo kwa yaka itato na miyehe chita.
JAM 5:18 Peniya, ngajhopa kabhele, hula ngahikomita kuhumii kunane kwa Chapanga ade pannema na mimeya ngaimelita na kupachika.
JAM 5:19 Makalongo bhango, anda mundo abhii kinyume na uchakaka pakate jhino na jhonge ngamujhicha,
JAM 5:20 jwankelebhuha jwenio jhuna uhakaho kubhoke mundela jhake jha kuhobholela naughombola uhuke gwa jwenio jwabhii na uhakaho mu kuwe, na uhakaho twe nabhokewa.
1PE 1:1 Ne Petile, natenga jwa Yecho Kilichitu. Ninyandikila mangota bhuhaghulilwe na Chapanga, bhumpechengine na kubhehe ngita makaghene kwenio ku kilambo chuku Ponto na ku kilambo chuku Galatiya na ku kilambo chuku Kapadokiya na kilambo chuku Asiya na ku Betaniya.
1PE 1:2 Chapanga Tate akaumanye mangota kuhumii makacho na ngahagwila, atendingine manyahinyahi kwa Uhuke gwake, nhotole kunyokanikiya Yecho Kilichitu na kuchukwa kwa miyahe jhake. Tunnyopelangana umbone na uteeke gwamahele kubhoka kwa Chapanga.
1PE 1:3 Tunnombe Chapanga, Tate jwa Bhambo gwito Yecho Kilichitu! Kwa kiya jhake ngolongwa ngabhatupila ughome nhyono mu lihobholelo kwa kuyokecha Yecho kuhumii kubhawile,
1PE 1:4 bhahe, tulole kupata mota twe ya Chapanga yabhabhekii bhando bhake. Mota yenio ibhola jhe amu ihangabhika jhe amu itundingii jhe, ibhii kunane kwa Chapanga kwa nhwalo gwino.
1PE 1:5 Na mangotamwe mulondwa na makakala gha Chapanga kwa ndela jha kihobholelo, kupala mpatangane ughombokeko ghupakubhonekana kipinde cha kupehekeya.
1PE 1:6 Nhwanganile kwa kilebhe chenie bhahe, ata anda ngohe kwa kipinde kichokombe mmi ngolongonde na kulagha kwa majhighanikilo ndii.
1PE 1:7 Kujhighanikilwa kwenioko kupala kumanya kihobholelo chino kibhii bhole. Ata chaabo ndi kilebhe cha kuhangabhika nambo ade ijhighanikilwe pamwotu. Helahela kihobholelo chino kilebhe chambone kuliku chaabo, ade nnyighanikilwe kupala nkwime. Ndi pumpa kupoke chipwa na ung'alicho na ichima mu lichiko Yecho Kilichitu papakubhonekana.
1PE 1:8 Pamonga jwenio manamona jhe mipala, kabhele pamonga mumwona jhe, minnyeketela na kubhehe na kiheko changachimulika chikibhii na ung'alicho twe,
1PE 1:9 nhwalo mipoke ughombokeko gwa uhuke gwino ndi nhwalo gwa kihobholelo chino kwake.
1PE 1:10 Akalondole bha Chapanga bhakalingukiye na kulingukiya ughombokeko gwenio na ngabhalondwila kubhehe umbone gwa Chapanga ngampekiya mangota.
1PE 1:11 Ngabhajhighita kumanya kipinde ghane chiipa kubhehe kilebhe chenie chikipa kupitila. Yane kipinde chapwepwita Uhuke gwa Kilichitu jwakibha nkate jhabhe ngalondwila malagho ghighapa kunkolela Kilichitu na ung'alicho ghupa kukengama.
1PE 1:12 Chapanga akayekulile akalondole bhake kubhehe lihengo likibha jhe kwa nhwalo gwabhe bhene, nambo kwa nhwalo gwino ngita chililonge Lilobhe lya Mbone kwa makakala gha Uhuke gwa Chapanga kubhoka kunane. Ilebhe yenio ata akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga bhakapahi kuilolekeya.
1PE 1:13 Ngohe bhahe, nkoto kukihibhuka. Bhahe, milibheke lihobholelo lino lyoha mu umbone ghola ghupakupelwa kipinde Yecho Kilichitu papakubhonekana!
1PE 1:14 Anda yana innyokanikii Chapanga, mangalogwa jhe kabhele kukengama tama mbajha ngita kipinde chimikibha mandindilima.
1PE 1:15 Nambo ngita Chapanga jwakemengine chabhii hela jwanyahinyahi na mangota mipalwa kubhehe nyahinyahi mu matyangii ghino ghoha.
1PE 1:16 Nhwalo Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge, “Mmangana manyahinyahi, nhwalo nenga nanyahinyahi.”
1PE 1:17 Mangota pumunnyopa Tate, jhola jwahadabuu kila mundo kulengana na itendwa yake changannoleke kumiho, bhahe, ntamangane pannema ngita makaghene mu kuntembekeya Chapanga.
1PE 1:18 Na mangota mmanye kubhehe nkombolilwe chi kwa ilebhe ihangabhika kwa feza amu chaabo na nhoto kubhoka mu matyangilo ghino ghanganandela ghumpokii kuhumii kwa tate gwino,
1PE 1:19 nambo nkombolilwe kwa miyahe jha chamane hake jha Kilichitu, jwakibha ngita mwana limbelele jwangalemala amu libaka.
1PE 1:20 Jwenio akahagwulilwe na Chapanga nnema nakupanganwa jhe, na ngayekulilwa machiko ghakujhomolela ghano kwa nhwalo gwino mangota.
1PE 1:21 Kwa ndela jhake, mangota muhobholela Chapanga jwayokicha kubhoka kubhawile na kumpeke ung'alicho, yenio kuhobholela kwino na lihobholelo libhaha kwa Chapanga.
1PE 1:22 Nhwalo ngohe nnyelewike kumwojho kwa kujhokanikiya chakaka, kupala mapale akajhino changabhonekana nambone, bhahe, mupalane kwa mwojho ghoha.
1PE 1:23 Nhwalo kwa ndela jha Lilobhe lya Chapanga lilibhii ughome, mangota mmelwikwe nhyono, chi ngita yana chibhelukwa na tate jwawegha, nambo jwatamikii machiko ghoha ghangapeta.
1PE 1:24 Ngita Majhandiko gha Chapanga chighalonge: “Kila mundo abhii ngita mahamba, na ung'alicho gwake ngita lilobha lya kwanyahe, nhwalo mahamba unyala na malobha upuluta.
1PE 1:25 Nambo lilobhe lya Bhambo litamikii machiko ghoha ghangapeta.” Lilobhe lyenio ndi Lilobhe lya Mbone lilitangichwe kwino.
1PE 2:1 Yene mughalekengane ghanganandela ghoha na uwange na kukitenda maumbone, wiho na malobhe gha maligho ghakoto kubhehe kabhele.
1PE 2:2 Ngita chibhii yana ilemba chibhapala mabhele, na mangotamwe hele mipalwa kubhehe na kilolo chukunywe mabhele gha uchakaka gha ki uhuke, kupala nkolangane na kukombolelwa,
1PE 2:3 ngohe, umanye kubhehe Bhambo ndi jwaumbone.
1PE 2:4 Munnyendelele Bhambo! Jweniojho ndi lighanga lighome lilikanitwe na bhando, nambo lijheketilwe na Chapanga kubhehe lighanga lilihobholeka.
1PE 2:5 Mangota munnyendelele jwenio ngita maghanga maghome, nchengwite na kubhehe nyumba jha kihuke. Natumika ngita akapiya matambiko gha nyahinyahi, kumpikii matambiko gha kihuke ghijheketelwa na Chapanga kwa ndela jha Yecho Kilichitu.
1PE 2:6 Nhwalo Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge: “Nnola! Meka lighanga ku Chayune, lighanga lilihaghulilwe lya nchinge na lina ichima. Mundo jwapala kunhobholela jwenio nakola jhe hone.”
1PE 2:7 Kwino mangota bhimilihobholela lighanga lyenio ndi lya chamane hake, nambo kwa bhangalihobholela lighanga lyenio ngita Majhandiko gha Chapanga chighalonge: “Lighanga lilikanitwe na mapunde kuchenga, ngohe lyenio ndi lighanga likolongwa lya nchinge.”
1PE 2:8 Kabhele Majhandiko ghilonge: “Lighanga lyenio ndi lighanga lya kukobhala, Lindalabho lya kwagwikii bhando.” Bhando ukobhala nhwalo gwangalihobholela lilobhe lya Chapanga, yenio ndi bhakapangilwe kuhumii makacho.
1PE 2:9 Nambo mangota ndi bhando lilihaghulilwe, na kubhehe akapiya matambiko na unahota nkolongwa gwa nyahinyahi, kilambo cha nyahinyahi, bhando bha Chapanga jwenio, nhoto kutangacha itendwa ikolongwa ya kukangacha ya jwenio jwankemingine kubhoka mulubhendo na kujhingii mulumule lwake lwa kukangacha.
1PE 2:10 Makacho mangotamwe makibha mabhando bha Chapanga jhe, nambo ngohe mangota ndi bhando bhake. Makacho mangotamwe makapatite jhe kiya jha Chapanga, nambo ngohe mpatangine kiya jhake.
1PE 2:11 Makalongo bhango, nimpembekeya mangota ngita makaghene na bhapeta ndela pannema pano, nnekane na tama jha yegha jhikanana na uhuke gwino.
1PE 2:12 Mma na matyangilo ghamaha pakate jha bhando bhangaumanya Chapanga, kupala anda bhakopokii kilebhe changanandela, bhaibhona itendwa hino yamaha bhannumbalila Chapanga lichiko lyaipala kuhika Bhambo.
1PE 2:13 Majhokanikiya bhando bhubhabhii na ukindendeke bhibhabhekitwe na bhando kwa nhwalo gwa Bhambo: Munahota nkolongwa jwabhii na kindendeke kikolongwa,
1PE 2:14 amu ilongoche ihaghulilwe na jwenio kwahadabuu bhibhahenga ghanganandela na kalumbalii bhibhahenga ghambone.
1PE 2:15 Nhwalo Chapanga ipala nhoto kupyata nnomo malobhe gha kimbebhebhe gha bhando bhangabhehe na malango kwa itendwa yambone imuhenga.
1PE 2:16 Ntamengana ngita bhando bhangatabhwa, nambo gwangatabhwa gwino ukoto kubhehe kijhobhelo cha ubhoho, nambo ntamangana ngita akabhanda bha Chapanga.
1PE 2:17 Mwatembekeya bhando bhoha, mwapala ajhino bhibhahobholela Kilichitu, munyoghope Chapanga na muntembekeye munahota nkolongwa.
1PE 2:18 Mangota makatumiche majhokanikiye akanahota bhino kwa utembekeho ghoha anda bhabhii bhambone amu manuu amu bhina kihokola.
1PE 2:19 Nhwalo anda nhimbilile mang'ahe ghangatope nhwalo gwa kuntembeke Chapanga, jwenio nampela mota.
1PE 2:20 Bho, nanyambulila ndweko ghane kwa kuhimbilila kubulwa kwa malemo ghinteile? Nambo anda mibulwa kwa kuhenga ghambone na mmii kuhimbilila gheniya, umanya Chapanga apakumpe mota kwa gheniya ghinteile.
1PE 2:21 Gheniya ndi ghinkemilwe, nhwalo jwenio Kilichitu akang'ahike kwa nhwalo gwino, nganekela nnandanikiho kupala nkengame ndela jhake.
1PE 2:22 Jwenio akatei jhe uhakaho, amu akalongii jhe kilebhe chochoha chuwange mu nnomo gwake.
1PE 2:23 Palighitwa, akabhujhichii jhe, pang'ahika akayengii jhe, nambo ngauhobholila Chapanga jwahadabuu changalolekeya kumiho.
1PE 2:24 Yecho jwenio ngagheghita uhakaho gwito payegha jhake pa nchalaba, kupala tulekane na uhakaho na kutama muughome kwa mambu ghambone. Kwa ilonda yake mangota nnamite.
1PE 2:25 Nhwalo mangota mukibha ngita mambelele ghighahobhite, nambo ngohe mumujhii Nnucha na Nnonda jwa ughome gwino.
1PE 3:1 Mangota bhintolilwe, majhokanikiya akanganabhino, kupala anda abhii munalome jhojhoha jwangahobhelela lilobhe lya Chapanga, ajheketela papala kulola matyangilo ghino. Changapalwa kulonge chochoha,
1PE 3:2 nhwalo chalola matyangilo ghino chighabhii ghambone na gha ichima.
1PE 3:3 Kukilembekeya kwino kwangabhehe kwa panja tujhe ngita kuloka mangongo na kuwala chaabo na ngobho ya bei ngolongwa.
1PE 3:4 Nambo kukilembelekeya kwino kutumbulila nkate jha mwojho gwino, uhalano gwangatundungila, yenio ndi uhuke gwa uhengwa na unuu ndi kilebhe chambone hake palonge jha Chapanga.
1PE 3:5 Yene ndi chibhakilembanikiya akakeghe bha makacho bhibhahobholila Chapanga, bhakilembanikiya kwa kwajhokanikiya akangana bhabhe.
1PE 3:6 Ngita Chala panyokanikiya Ulahimo na pankemita unganamundo. Na mangota ngohe mmii akachikana mundo anda ntei ghaumbone changajhoghopa kilebhe chochoha.
1PE 3:7 Hele na mangota akanalome bhitolile, ntamangana na akaana bhino kongo umanye bheniya akaleghelau. Yene matendela kwa kwatembekeya nhwalo bhene hele nabhapokela pamonga na mangota hupo jha ughome gwampeke Chapanga. Peniya ndi kujhopa kwino nakujheketelwa.
1PE 3:8 Kukujhomolela nilonge naha, mma mwojho ghumo na nholela ghamo na mmonelana kiya, mpalane anda akalongo, mma akanuu na kunyenyekehana.
1PE 3:9 Mangalepechela bhando ubhoho kwa ubhoho anda jhe maligho kwa maligho, nambo majhopela mota, nhwalo mangota nkemitwe na Chapanga nhoto kupoke mota.
1PE 3:10 Ngita Majhandiko gha Chapanga chighalonge: “Mundo jhojhoha jhola jwaupala ughome na kughabhona machiko ghaumbone, nnomo gwake gwangalonge jhe ghanganandela na lulime lwake lwangalonge jhe uwange.
1PE 3:11 Jwenio ajhepa ghanganandela, ahenge ghambone, apalaha uteeke nu kukamulila.
1PE 3:12 Nhwalo miho gha Bhambo ghalolekeya bhando bhibhahenga ghaumbone na machikilo ghake ujhokanikii kujhopa kwabhe, nambo Bhambo abhalangii kihogho bhando bhibhahenga ghanganandela.”
1PE 3:13 Bho, ghane jwapala kumengwa mangota anda nnyendelii kuhenga ghaumbone?
1PE 3:14 Nambo anda mipalwa kung'ahika kwa nhwalo gwa kuhenga ghapala Chapanga, mina mota mangota. Mangampwele jhe mundo jhojhoha hilu mangabhehe jhe na kiholo.
1PE 3:15 Nambo mnnombe Kilichitu ngita Bhambo mu miojho jhino. Machiko ghoha nhoto kunnyanguu kila mundo jwapakunkonya nhwalo gwa manhobholelo ghino ghighabhii mu miojho jhino.
1PE 3:16 Nambo ntendengane yenio kwa unuu na ichima. Mma na mwojho gwangakilangii kubhehe na malemwa, kupala bhala bhibhanchonjola matyangii ghino ghaumbone anda bhando bhibhahobholela Kilichitu, bhabha na hone ndii.
1PE 3:17 Nambo mbaha kung'ahika kwa kuhenga ghaumbone, anda apahi Chapanga, kuliku kung'ahika kwa kuhenga ghanganandela.
1PE 3:18 Nhwalo Kilichitu ngang'ahika na kuwe malajhimo tu nhwalo gwa ubhoho gwa bhando bhoha, mundo jwamaha nga jhumo ngawila kwa nhwalo gwa bhando bhanganandela, kupala kumpeleka mangota palonge jha Chapanga. Ngakomitwa kiyegha nambo ngabhekwita kubhehe ghome kwa uhotolo gwa Uhuke gwa Chapanga,
1PE 3:19 na kwa ndela jha jhojho Uhuke gwa Chapanga ngajhenda kuitangachii ihuke hela ibhii mu kipungo.
1PE 3:20 Bheniya ndi bhibhankanita kuntembeke Chapanga pabhalendila kwa kwahimbilila kipinde cha Nuho palenganikiya chapina. Mu chapina jhene bhakajhingii bhando bhandina tu yane bhando nane tu bhibhakombolilwe mu mache,
1PE 3:21 mache gheniya ghalandanichwa na ubaticho ghukunkombo mangota ngohe. Na chi ubaticho ghukunda luku lwa payegha, nambo ndi lilaghano lya Chapanga lilitendike kwa mwojho gwambone kwa ndela jha kuyoka kwa Yecho Kilichitu.
1PE 3:22 Na jwenio ajhawii kunane kwa Chapanga na ngohe atamite lubhoko lwalelo lwa Chapanga. Ndi jwalongocha akatumiche bha kunane kwa Chapanga, na bhina kindendeke na bhina makakala ghoha.
1PE 4:1 Nhwalo Kilichitu akang'ahike kiyegha na mangota hele mipalwa ghughakengama matyangilo ghake, nhwalo mundo anda ang'ahike kiyegha ipalwa alekane na uhakaho.
1PE 4:2 Kutumbulii ngohe kwa utamo ghuhighalike kwa kutama kwino pannema pano, mipalwa kulongochwa ngita chaipala Chapanga na chi kutama kwa kunkengemii tama mbajha jha kimundo.
1PE 4:3 Kipinde chikipetita, machiko ghamahele nhengita ilebhe ngita ibhatehila bhando bhangaumanya Chapanga. Ntamita kwa kupala kukihanga na kukipala mabhene na kulobhela na bhulo na ntamita mukuhenga ngongola, kulobhela, kulobhela kwa kupetecha na kuhenga ilebhe ya hone na kuijhinamii inyagho.
1PE 4:4 Ngohe bhando bheniya bhangaumanya Chapanga bhitenda kukangacha pibhannolekeya mmijhe pamo na bheniya mu kuhenga mughanganandela gheniya hake ndi nhwalo bhinighingana.
1PE 4:5 Nambo nabhapalwa kujhanguu ilebhe yenio palonge jha Chapanga, jwakilenganikiye kwahadabuu bhibhabhii ghome na bhubhawile.
1PE 4:6 Nhwalo gwa Lilobhe lya Mbone lilitangichwa ata kwa bhando bhubhawile, anda bhahadabwilwe muughome gwabhe kiyegha ngita bhange, bhatame kwa nhwalo gwa Chapanga kwa ndela jha Uhuke.
1PE 4:7 Kujhomoke kwa ilebhe yoha kubhandikile, bhahe, ntamangane maha, nkeluwa mukunnyopa Chapanga.
1PE 4:8 Kuchocha kwa gheniya ghoha mpalane mabhene kwa mabhene kwa mwojho ghoha, nhwalo mapalano ghayekelila ghanganandela twe.
1PE 4:9 Mpokelane kajhino mabhene kwa mabhene changakokaleka.
1PE 4:10 Kila mundo pakate jhino ipalwa kukitumii kitoi champeki Chapanga kwajhangatii bhange bhando. Anda ntumiche jwaumbone jwa hupo ya ndela yamahele yapatite na Chapanga.
1PE 4:11 Mundo jwatangacha pa bhando malobhe ghake ghabhaha malobhe gha Chapanga. Anda apala kuntumikii atumika kwa makakala ghapata kuhumii kwa Chapanga, kwa ilebhe yoha Chapanga alombwe kwa ndela jha Yecho Kilichitu. Nhwalo ung'alicho na makakala ndi ghake machiko ghoha ghangapeta. Amina.
1PE 4:12 Makalongo bhango bhinimpahile, makangacha jhe kwa majhighanikilo majhundupaho ghimikongana nako na kulola kubhehe nakongana na kilebhe changachimulika.
1PE 4:13 Nambo nhwanganila kubhehe mulombana mu mang'ahika gha Kilichitu kupala papakubhujha kabhele mu ung'alicho gwake nhoto kuhanganila hake.
1PE 4:14 Anda bhinongama kwa nhwalo gwa liina lya Yecho Kilichitu ndi mota kwino nhwalo Uhuke gwa ung'alicho yane Uhuke gwa Chapanga utama nkate jhino.
1PE 4:15 Angabhe jhe mundo pakate jhino jwang'ahika kwa nhwalo gwa jwaikoma amu likwatulo amu jwatenda ghanganandela amu jwakomanicha bhando.
1PE 4:16 Nambo anda ming'ahika kwa nhwalo gwa Kilichitu, bhahe, angakola jhe hone, nhwalo mundo ikemwa nkilichitu.
1PE 4:17 Kwa nhwalo kipinde cha luhadabulo kiikite na kitumbulii kwa bhando bha Chapanga, ndi twenga, bho, kujhomolela kwake nakubhaha bhole kwa bhando bhangajhokanikiya Lilobhe lya Mbone lya Chapanga?
1PE 4:18 Ngita chighalonge Majhandiko gha Chapanga: “Ndi ijhundwipe kwa bhando bhibhabhii na matyangilo ghamaha kughombolelwa, bhahe, naijhundupa bhole kwa bhando bhangannyopa Chapanga na bhina uhakaho?”
1PE 4:19 Kwa gheniya, bhando bhibhang'ahika kwa kuhenga ghapala Chapanga, bhipalwa bhakibheka pahe jha Npanganwa jwabhe ndi jwakunhobholeka hake, kwa itendwa yabhe yambone ibhahenga.
1PE 5:1 Nenga ng'ogholwike pakate jha ilongoche bha lilongo lya bhando lilinnyeketii Kilichitu, ndi jhunighawene mang'ahe gha Kilichitu. Nane mbakubhehe pamonga mu ung'alicho ghupala kuyekulilwa. Nimpembekeya hake mangota akailongoche ajhango kubhehe,
1PE 5:2 mulilonde lilongo lya bhando bha Chapanga libhankamwiingine, mililonde chi anda ntei kuchokolekelwa, nambo kwa kupala ngita chapala Chapanga. Nhenga lihengo lyenio kwa kupala kunnepa jhe, nambo kwa mwojho gwino gwoha.
1PE 5:3 Mangalongocha jhe kwa makakala bheniya bhimalongocha mulilongo lino, nambo mma nnandanikiho kwa lilongo lyenio.
1PE 5:4 Na Nnucha Nkolongwa papakuhika, mangota nampokela hupo jhu ung'alicho jhangatundingila.
1PE 5:5 Hele machikangombo mipalwa kuijhokanikiya ighogholo. Mangota mabhoha mipalwa kunhengelana kwa utembekelo, nhwalo Majhandiko gha Chapanga ghilonge, “Chapanga ubhakana bhando bhibhakikweya nambo bhapela bhando umbone bhina utembekelo.”
1PE 5:6 Ntende utembekelo palonge jha Chapanga jhuna makakala, kupala anyinule kipinde chamaha.
1PE 5:7 Mnekele Chapanga malola ghino ghoha, nhwalo jwenio ndi jwantunja muughome gwino ghoha.
1PE 5:8 Mma miho na nkelukiya! Nhwalo likoko lino, Limbembela ilyungalyunga ngitalihimba lilikuluma liyema mundo limmemene.
1PE 5:9 Mukanile Limbembela na kubhehe nganganga mu kihobholelo, mmanyingine kubhehe ajhino bhibhahobholela Kilichitu pannema ghoha bhakongana na mang'ahe ngita gheniya hele.
